bibl.title: Sarva-darśana-saṁgraha of Sāyaṇa-Mādhava
Edited with an original commentary in Sanskrit by Mahamahopadhyaya Vasudev Shastri Abhyankar, Pandit, Fergusson College, Poona
bibl.author: Sāyaṇa-Mādhava
bibl.note: Sāyaṇa's Sarvadarśanasaṃgraha is not included in this file.
Scans of this edition are available on https://archive.org/details/in.ernet.dli.2015.281910/page/n1/mode/2up.

list.item: The text is structured in 16 chapters, one for each darśana. These were encoded as div-elements.

The new lines of the original file have been preserved. Line breaks have been encoded as lb-elements (but no lb precedes a p-, l- or lg-element). Hyphens at the end of lines were removed and the attribute break="no" was added to the following lb-element instead. The ed-attribute "vsa" refers to Vasudev Shastri's 1924 edition.
Brackets enclosing bibliographic references were replaced with ref-elements. All other brackets were encoded as hi-elements with the rend-attribute "brackets".

Accents in quotes from the Ṛgveda have been encoded according to the marking system in Devanāgari script. The vertical stroke used to mark svarita accent has been encoded as ! (U+0021); the diacritic undescore used to mark the anudātta has been encoded as ̲ (U+0332), for instance sṛ_ṇye!va.

div.head: || cārvākadarśanam || 1 ||
div.p:
praṇamya paramātmānaṃ saccidānandavigraham |
vyākhyāsyāmi satāṃ prītyai sarvadarśanasaṃgraham ||
athātra saṃpradarśyante darśanāni samāsataḥ |
nāstikāstikagītatvāddvidhā tāni pracakṣate ||
nāsti vedodito loka iti yeṣāṃ matiḥ sthirā |
nāstikāste tathāstīti matiryeṣāṃ ta āstikāḥ ||
avaidikapramāṇānāṃ siddhāntānāṃ pradarśakāḥ |
cārvākādyāḥ ṣaḍvidhāste khyātā lokeṣu nāstikāḥ |
vedapramāṇakānīha procurye darśanāni ṣaṭ |
nyāyavaiśeṣikādīni te smṛtā āstikāmidhāḥ ||
cārvākādyāścārvākamādhyamikayogācārasautrāntikavaibhāṣikajainarūpāḥ ṣaṇnā
stikāḥ | nyāyavaiśeṣikādīnītyatrādipadena sāṃkhyayogapūrvamīmāṃsāvedānta
śāstrāṇāṃ saṃgrahaḥ | tatra prathamaṃ cārvākamataṃ pradarśayati — atheti | niḥśreyasa
pradatvam | mokṣapradatvam | cārvākeṇeti | cārū ramaṇīyo vāka uktiryasya
sa cārvākaḥ | ayaṃ bṛhaspatiśiṣyaḥ | etadukteḥ pariṇāme duḥkhapradatve'pi
śravaṇasamaye śrotṝṇāṃ manorañjanādramaṇīyatvam | durucchedamiti | cārvāka
matātikramo'śakyaḥ | yata upadeśaṃ vinā svabhāvata eva tanmatānusāriṇo
lokāḥ | puṇyapāpayoradṛṣṭatvānna tatra viśvāsaḥ prāyeṇa prāṇinām | yāvajjīva
miti | tapaścaryādikleśena jīvane'pi yato mṛtyuravaśyaṃbhāvyataḥ kṛtaṃ kleśena |
yāvacchakyaṃ sukhamupabhujyatām | nanu janmāntare sukhātiśayārthaṃ kleśasahanamiti
cettatrāha — bhasmībhūtasyeti | deha evātmā | tadatiriktasyātmano'darśanāt |
dehastu maraṇakāle bhasmībhūtaḥ | tathā ca na paralokagatirnāpi janmāntaraprā
ptiriti vyarthameva kleśasahanamiti bhāvaḥ | arthakāmau | dravyasaṃgrahaviṣayo
pabhogau | ata eva | lokānāṃ cārvākamatānusaraṇasya svābhāvikatvādeva |
lokāyatamiti | loka āyataṃ prasṛtamityarthaḥ |
catvārīti | pṛthivyaptejovāyurūpāṇītyarthaḥ | ākāśasya pratyakṣābhāvena
pratyakṣaikapramāṇavādibhiścārvākairākāśaṃ nāṅgīkriyate | caturṇāṃ ca teṣāṃ śarīrarūpeṇa
pariṇāme pariṇāmaviśeṣasvābhāvyāttatra caitanyamutpadyate | śarīravināśe ca
caitanyamapi naśyatyeva | caitanyaṃ jñānam | kiṇvādibhya iti | kiṇvaśabdena
surāyāḥ prakṛtibhūto vṛkṣaviśeṣaniryāsa ucyate | tatra prakṛtyavasthāyāṃ madaśaktyabhā
vepi tadvikṛtibhūtasurāyāṃ madaśaktirutpadyamānā dṛśyate tadvat | vijñānaghanaḥ |
caitanyarūpo'rthaḥ | na pretyeti | maraṇānantaraṃ kimapi jñānaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ |
pratyakṣaikapramāṇavāditayeti | anumānaṃ na pramāṇam | taddhi vyāptijñānasā
pekṣam | vyāptiśca vyabhicārarahitaḥ saṃbandhaḥ | sa na jñātuṃ śakyate | vyabhicārasya
durapohatvāt | yathā kācidvahnivyaktirdhūmādhikaraṇavṛttiriti buddhistathā kācidvahni
vyaktirdhūmādhikaraṇāvṛttirapi syāditi buddherapi saṃbhavāt | na ca vahnidhūmayorbhūyo
darśanena vyabhicāranirāsaḥ śaṅkyaḥ | mahānasādau vahnidhūmayorbhūyodarśana
sāhasrye'pi yathā tapte lohapiṇḍe vahnirdhūmavyabhicarito dṛśyate tathā kvaci
ddhūme vahnivyabhicaritatvadarśanasyāpi saṃbhavāt | na ca vahnidhūmayoḥ sāmā
nyapratyāsattyā sakaladhūmavahnīnāmalaukikapratyakṣasaṃbhavādvyāptigrahaḥ sulabha iti
naiyāyikoktaṃ yuktamiti vācyam | sāmānyasyaivābhāvāt | na hi ghaṭādivya
ktyapekṣayātiriktaṃ kiṃciddhaṭatvādikaṃ saṃdṛśyate yena sāmānyakalpanārthavatī
syāt | ghaṭo'yamiti pratyakṣaṃ tu ghaṭasadbhāve pramāṇaṃ na tu ghaṭatvasattve | anyathā
kāśasyāpyaṅgīkārāpatteḥ | kiṃ ca tapte lohapiṇḍe kevalāgnivadgopālaghuṭikādau
kevaladhūmasyāpi pratyakṣadarśanena bhūyodarśanena vyabhicāranirāsāsaṃbhava eva | evaṃ
bhūyaḥ sahacaritayorapi mitrayormitho vyabhicāraḥ strīsaṅgādau dṛśyata eva | tathā
ca vyāptigrahāsaṃbhavādanumānaṃ na pramāṇam | evamupamānamapi na pramāṇam |
mahiṣa iva puruṣo mātaṅgīva yoṣidityupamānātpramājñānāsaṃbhavāt | evaṃ
śabdo'pi na pramāṇam | kasyāpi yathārthavakturabhāvāt | arthāpattirapi
na pramāṇam | pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkta ityatra divābhojanābhāva
viśiṣṭapīnatvena rātribhojanasya kalpanā tu na niyamena bhavati | divā
rātrau cābhojino'pyāmavātādinā pīnatvadarśanāt | evamanupalabdhirapi na
pramāṇam | tatprameyasyābhāvasyaivābhāvāt | bhūtale ghaṭo nāstīti pratyakṣaṃ hi keva
labhūtalasattve pramāṇaṃ na tu bhūtalavyatiriktabhūtalaniṣṭhābhāvasattve | na cāsyeti |
viṣayopabhogajanitasukhasya duḥkhamiśritatvenetyarthaḥ | saśalkāniti | śalkaṃ
matsyatvak | sapalālānīti | palālaṃ stambaḥ kaṇiśādadhobhāgaḥ | busaṃ
vā | na hi mṛgā iti | agre mṛgāḥ sasyavināśaṃ kariṣyantīti bhiyā
kṣetre śālīnāmāvāpa eva na kārya iti buddhiḥ kasyāpi nodeti | tathāgre
yācakā āgamiṣyantīti bhiyā cullyāṃ pākabhāṇḍānyeva na prasthāpanīyānīti
buddhirna kasyāpi dṛśyate | nādhiśrīyanta iti | adhiśrayaṇaṃ prasthāpanam |
etaduttaraṃ na vā sapatnyaḥ santīti preyānparihniyate iti kvacitpāṭho dṛśyate |
tyājyamiti | viṣayasaṃbandhajanyaṃ yatsukhaṃ tadduḥkhayuktatvāttyājyamiti yo
vicāraḥ sa mūrkhāṇāmeva | na hyantaḥsvacchataṇḍulapūrṇānvrīhīnkevalaṃ bahistuṣeṇa
kaṇena copahitā iti buddhyā ko'pi tyaktumicchati | kiṃ tu tuṣānkaṇāṃśca dūrī
kṛtyāntaḥsthāṃstaṇḍulāngṛhṇātyevetyarthaḥ | nanviti | viduṣāṃ yāgnihotrādau pravṛtti
rdṛśyate tatra na kiṃcitsukhaṃ dṛśyate | pratyuta pracurasya dravyasya vyayaḥ śarīrakleśa
ścānubhūyate | tathā ca sā pravṛttiḥ kevalaṃ pāralaukikasukhoddeśenaiveti tayā pravṛttyā
paralokāstitvaṃ kalpanīyamiti śaṅkāśayaḥ | tadapi neti | neyaṃ pravṛttiḥ para
lokāstitvakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇabhūtā bhavatītyarthaḥ | anṛteti | oṣadhe trāya
svainam tai. saṃ. 1 | 2 | 1 iti mantro darbhaviṣayaḥ | svadhite mainaṃ hiṃsīḥ
tai. saṃ. 1 | 2 | 1 iti mantraḥ kṣuraviṣayaḥ | śṛṇota grāvāṇaḥ tai. saṃ. 1 | 3 | 13
iti pāṣāṇaviṣayaḥ | eteṣvacetanānāṃ darbhakṣurapāṣāṇānāṃ cetanavatsaṃbodhanaṃ śrūyate |
taccāsaṃbhavi | ataścānṛtārthabodhakatvādasyāprāmāṇyam | eka eva rudro na
dvitīyāya tasthe tai. saṃ. 1 | 8 | 6 sahasrāṇi sahasraśo ye rudrā adhibhūmyām
tai. saṃ. 4 | 5 | 11 ityanayormantrayormitho viruddhārthakatvena vyāghātādaprāmāṇyam |
āpa undantu tai. saṃ. 1 | 2 | 1 iti mantro yajamānasya kṣaurakāle jalena śirasaḥ
kledanaṃ brūte | asya mantrasya lokaprasiddhārthānuvādakatvena punaruktatvādanadhigatārtha
gantṛtvābhāvādaprāmāṇyam | evaṃ karmabodhakasya vedabhāgasyāprāmāṇyaṃ jñānakāṇḍa
prāmāṇyavādibhirvedāntibhiruktam | tathā jñānakāṇḍe'nnaṃ brahmeti vyajānāt
tai. 3 | 2 prāṇo brahmeti vyajānāt tai. 3 | 3 ityādāvanna
prāṇādīnāṃ vastuto'brahmabhūtānāmapi brahmatvamuktam | ataścānṛtārthabodhakatvāda
syāprāmāṇyam | tathaikamevādvitīyam chā. 6 | 2 | 1 ityatrātmaikyaṃ prati
pādyate | dvā suparṇā sayujā mu. 3 | 1 | 1 ṛtaṃ pibantau kā. 3 | 1
ityatrātmabhedaḥ pratipādyate | tathā cānayormitho viruddhārthakatvena vyāghātādaprā
māṇyam | tathā pṛthivyā oṣadhayaḥ | oṣadhībhyo'nnam tai. 2 | 1 | 1 asya
mantrasya lokaprasiddhārthānuvādakatvena punaruktatvādanadhigatārthagantṛtvābhāvādaprā
māṇyam | evaṃ jñānakāṇḍasyāprāmāṇyaṃ karmakāṇḍaprāmāṇyavādibhirmīmāṃsakairukta
m | tathā ca dvayoḥ kalahe tṛtīyasya lābha iti nyāyena cārvākāḥ kṛtsnasyāpi
vedasyāprāmāṇyamicchanta itthaṃ bruvate — ṛgyajuḥsāmarūpā vedatrayī dhūrtānāṃ pralāpa
mātram | dhūrtā hyagnihotrādikarmapratipādakaṃ vedaṃ viracya tatra śraddhājaḍānāṃ viśvā
samutpādya pāralaukikasukhalobhena saṃbhavadbahuvittavyaye'pi kleśasādhye'pi ca
yajñādau lokānpravartya tebhyaḥ sakāśātpracuraṃ dravyaṃ labdhvā svajīvikāṃ saṃpāda
yantīti | ābhāṇakaḥ | lokoktiviśeṣaḥ | agnihotramiti | agniho
trapadenāgnisādhyānyakhilāni śrautasmārtakarmāṇyupalakṣyante | trayo vedā ṛgyajuḥ-
sāmarūpāḥ | atharvavedastu tadantargata eva | tasyaiva pṛthaktvavivakṣayā vedacatuṣṭaya
miti loke prasiddhiḥ | ete ca vedā dhūrtaiḥ svayaṃ viracitā apyajñānāṃ śraddhotpā
danāyāpauruṣeyatvena prasiddhiṃ prāpitā iti cārvākābhiprāyaḥ | tridaṇḍaśabdena
karmatyāgarūpaḥ saṃnyāso gṛhyate | bhasmaguṇṭhanaṃ śarīre bhasmalepaḥ | tena ca bhasma
dhāraṇapūrvakāṇi saṃdhyāvandanadevapūjanajapādīni karmāṇi gṛhyante | buddhimantaḥ
puruṣāḥ svabuddhivaibhavena rājñaḥ sāmadānādyupāyeṣu tattaddeśakālocitamantrapradānena
sāhāyyamācaranto rājñaḥ prītipātratāṃ bhajante | pauruṣaśālino'pi parākrameṇa
śatrūnvijitya rājñaḥ prītimātanvate | dvaye'pyamī rājñaḥ sakāśāllabdhadhanā nayena
jīvikāṃ saṃpādayanti | ye caitādṛśabuddhivikalāḥ parākramahīnāśca puruṣāste nayena
svajīvikāṃ saṃpādayitumapārayanto lokavañcanādanyajjīvikāsādhanamapaśyanto
'gnihotrādyanekaviṣayajālaṃ prasārya bhinnarucīlloṃṃkānkāṃścitkvacidityevaṃ prāyo'
khilāñjanānkarmapāśabaddhānsaṃbhāvya paśyatoharā ete vaidikaṃmanyā dhūrtabakā
lokebhyo dravyaṃ labdhvā svajīvikāṃ saṃpādayantītyarthaḥ | duḥkhameva naraka
iti | nānyaḥ kaścana kumbhīpākādiḥ | lokasiddhaḥ | prajānāṃ niyantṛtvena dṛṣṭaḥ |
na tu jagata utpattisthitisaṃhārakartānya īśvaraḥ kaścijjanmāntarapradātā |
utpattyādi tu jagataḥ svābhāvikameva | svabhāvata eva sarvaṃ pariṇamati | janmā
ntaraṃ tu nāstyeva | deha evātmā | tadvināśo maraṇameva mokṣaḥ | dehātmavāda
iti | dehavyatiriktasyātmano'ṅgīkāre tu maraṇasamaye dehādbahirgacchatastasyāda
rśanena tasyāmūrtatvāṅgīkārāvaśyaṃbhāvena tatra kṛśatvasya kṛṣṇādirūpasya cāsaṃbha
vādahaṃpadavācyātmanaḥ kṛśakṛṣṇādipadaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ kṛśo'haṃ kṛṣṇo'hami
tyevaṃ lokaprasiddhaṃ na saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ | nanu yadi śarīramevātmā tarhi tasyaivāhaṃpa
davācyatvenāhaṃ śarīramiti vaktavyaṃ syānna tu mama śarīramitītyata āha — mameti |
rāhoḥ śiromātrarūpatvena yadyapi rāhuḥ śira iti vaktavyaṃ tathāpyekasyaiva tasya
śabdabhedena kathaṃcidbhedaṃ parikalpya ṣaṣṭhyupapattiḥ kriyate tathaivātreti bhāvaḥ |
bhūmīti | bhūmiḥ pṛthivī | vāri jalam | analo'gniḥ | anilo vāyuḥ | ā
kāśaṃ tu naiva cārvākairaṅgīkriyate | śarīrarūpo yaḥ pṛthivyādīnāṃ saṃghātaviśeṣastadrū
peṇa pariṇatebhyaḥ pṛthivyādibhyaścaturbhyo bhūtebhyaścaitanyaṃ saṃjāyate | caitanyaṃ jñānam |
kathamanyatheti | dhūma eva dhvajaścihnaṃ yasya sa dhūmadhvajo'gniḥ | prekṣā
vanto vicāraśīlāḥ | te hi parvatādau dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvātrāgnirastītyanumānapramā
ṇena niścityāgniprāptyarthaṃ pravartamānā loka upalabhyante | tathā yathārthavaktrā
kenacinnadyāstīre phalāni santītyukte śabdapramāṇena nadyāstīre phalāni santīti
niścitya phalaprāptyarthaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ phalārthināṃ tatra pravṛttirdṛśyate | pratyakṣaikapramāṇa
vādinaye tvanumānasya śabdasya ca prāmāṇyābhāvena loke dṛśyamānā prekṣāvatāṃ
pravṛttirnopapadyata ityarthaḥ | vyāptīti | yatra dhūmastatrāgniriti sāhacaryaniyamo
vyāptiḥ | hetordhūmasya yatparvatādipakṣavṛttitvaṃ sā pakṣadharmatā | vyāptiḥ pakṣadharmatā
cetyubhayaṃ jñātaṃ ceddhūmādiliṅgenāgnyādeḥ sādhyasyānumānaṃ bhavati | līnamapratyakṣama
gnyādikamarthaṃ gamayati bodhayati talliṅgaṃ jñāpako heturdhūmādiḥ | vyāptiśceti | yatra
dhūmastatrāgnirityevaṃ hetusādhyayoryaḥ sāhacaryaniyamaḥ sa upādhisattve na saṃbhavati |
yathā hiṃsā adharmasādhanaṃ hiṃsātvāt | atra niṣiddhatvamupādhiḥ | upādhisvarūpaṃ
cānupadameva sphuṭībhaviṣyati | upādhisattvāccātra hiṃsātvādharmasādhanatvayoḥ
sāhacaryaṃ na niyatam | kiṃ tu vyabhicaritam | yato yatrayatra hiṃsātvaṃ tatratatrā
dharmasādhanatvamiti na niyamaḥ saṃbhavati | yāgīyapaśuhiṃsāyāṃ vedavihitāyāṃ
hiṃsātve'pyadharmasādhanatvābhāvāt | upādhiśca śaṅkito niścitaśceti dvividhaḥ |
upādhiśaṅkāyāmapi vyāptiniścayābhāvenānumānapratibandhāt | vyāptiśca vastutaḥ
satyapi nānumāne kāraṇaṃ bhavati | kiṃ tu niścitajñānaviṣayībhūtaiva tathā | yatra
niścitopādhistatra vyāptervastuta evābhāva iti na tatrānumānāvasaraḥ | yatra tu
śaṅkitopādhistatra vastutaḥ kvacidvyāptirnāsti kvacidastīti dvaividhyam | ādye
naivānumānam | dvitīye tu vyāptisattve'pi tasyā niścitajñānābhāvena nānu
mānam | upādhiśaṅkāpanodottaraṃ tu vyāpterniścayādanumānaṃ bhavatyevetyanyat |
sa ceti | cakṣurādikamindriyaṃ svayamajñātamapi darśanādisādhanaṃ bhavati yathā
bālasya na tathā vyāptirajñātā kevalasattayānumānasādhanaṃ bhavati | kiṃ tu niści
tajñānaviṣayībhūtaiva | niścayātmakaṃ jñānaṃ ca pramāṇajanyam | pramāṇāni ca
pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdarūpāṇi catvāri nyāyanaye | anyeṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ tannai
vāntarbhāvaḥ | pramāṇacatuṣṭayamadhye na kenāpi pramāṇena vyāptijñānaṃ saṃbhavati |
tadāha — kaḥ khalviti | prathamaḥ | prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ | saṃprayukteti | bāhye
ndriyasāhāyyena jāyamānaṃ bāhyapratyakṣaṃ hi bāhyendriyasaṃyuktameva viṣayaṃ gṛhṇāti |
indriyasaṃyogaśca vartamānasyaiva vastuno na tu bhūtasya bhaviṣyato vā vastunaḥ
saṃbhavati | vyāptau tu traikālikadhūmāgnyoḥ saṃgraha āvaśyaka iti na bāhyapratyakṣeṇa
vyāptijñānaṃ saṃbhavati | bhavati | vartamāne | sarvopasaṃhāravatyāḥ | sarveṣāṃ
traikālikānāṃ dhūmādīnāmupasaṃhāraḥ saṃgraho yatrāsti tathābhūtāyāḥ | na ceti |
sāmānyaṃ jātirdhūmatvāgnitvādiḥ | yadyapi traikālikānāṃ dhūmāgnyādivyaktīnāṃ
pratyakṣajñānaṃ na saṃbhavati tathāpi tadgatadhūmatvāgnitvādijātīnāṃ pratyakṣaṃ sula
bham | traikālikeṣvapi dhūmeṣu dhūmatvasyaikatvāt | yacca vartamāne dhūme dhūmatvaṃ
tadeva bhūte bhaviṣyati ca dhūme dhūmatvaṃ nānyaditi traikālikavyaktigatadhūmatvādi
jāteḥ pratyakṣasaṃbhavaḥ | tathā ca dhūmatvāgnitvayorvyaktidvārā paraṃparayā parvatādau
sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vyāptiriti vyāptipratyakṣaṃ jāyate | paraṃ tu vyaktyordhūmāgnyo
rvyāptijñānābhāvena dhūmenāgnyanumānāsaṃbhavastadavastha eveti bhāvaḥ | caramaḥ |
vyāpterāntaraṃ pratyakṣamityevaṃrūpo dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ | antaḥkaraṇasyeti | yadyapyā
ntarasyātmanastadgataguṇānāṃ sukhādīnāṃ ca manasā jāyamānaṃ mānasapratyakṣaṃ bāhye
ndriyasāhāyyaṃ vinaiva bhavati tathāpi bāhyārthānāṃ manasā jāyamānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ
bāhyendriyadvāreṇaiva | dhūmādigatā vyāptiśca bāhyo'rtha eveti bhāvaḥ | cakṣu
riti | cakṣurādibāhyendriyaiḥ pradarśito rūpādirviṣayo yasya tādṛśaṃ mano bāhyā
rthapratyakṣe paratantraṃ bahirindriyādhīnamityarthaḥ | tatratatrāpīti | agnyādisā
dhakānumānasādhanībhūtā dhūmādiniṣṭhā vyāptiryenānumānāntareṇa jñāyate tādṛśā
numānasādhanībhūtā vyāptiḥ punastṛtīyenānumānenetyevamanavasthā syāditi
bhāvaḥ | tadupāyaḥ | vyāptijñānopāyaḥ | kāṇādeti | kāṇādā vaiśeṣikāḥ |
te hi pratyakṣānumānarūpaṃ pramāṇadvayamevecchanti | taduktaṃ bhāṣāparicchede —

iti | anupalabdheḥ pratyakṣe'ntarbhāvaḥ | śabdopamānārthāpattisaṃbhavaitihyaceṣṭā
pariśeṣāṇāṃ cānumāne'ntarbhāvastanmate | anumānasya ca vyāptijñānopāyatvama
navasthādoṣagrastamityuktameva | naiyāyikādayo hyanumānāpekṣayā śabdaṃ pramāṇā
ntaramicchanti | tanmate'pyāha — anantarbhāva iti | vṛddheti | śabdo hi
śaktijñānasahakāreṇaivārthabodhajanakaḥ | śaktijñānajanakopāyeṣu ca vṛddhavyavahāro
mukhyaḥ | vyavahāreṇa śaktijñānaṃ cānumānapramāṇasahāyenaiva | yathottamavṛddho
ccāritaṃ gāmānayeti vākyaṃ śrutvā madhyamavṛddho gopaśumānayati | tādṛśagavānayanaṃ
dṛṣṭvā tena liṅgena bālo gāmānayeti vākyasya gavānayanarūpe'rthe saṃbandhaṃ kalpa
yati dhūmenāgnimiva | sa saṃbandha eva śaktiḥ | tathā cānumānapramāṇasādhanībhūtaṃ
dhūmāgnyorvyāptirasti iti kenaciduktādvākyācchabdapramāṇena jāyamānaṃ vyāpti
jñānaṃ tādṛśavākyaghaṭakānāṃ dhūmāgnivyāptiśabdānāṃ śaktigrahe satyeva bhavenna tu
tataḥ prāk | śaktigrahaśca vyavahārarūpaliṅgenānumānapramāṇenaiveti punaranumānā
ntarāpekṣāyāṃ tadarthaṃ punarvyāptijñānamityanavasthā duruddhareti bhāvaḥ | nanu vṛddha
vyavahāraṃ vināpi vyākaraṇakośādibhireva dhūmāgnivyāptiśabdānāṃ śaktigrahe jāte
śabdapramāṇena vyāptijñānaṃ syāditi nānavasthetyata āha — dhūmadhūmadhvajeti |
dhūmadhvajo'gniḥ | avinābhāvo vyāptiḥ | manvādivaditi | sādharmye dṛṣṭāntaḥ |
nāstikānāṃ cārvākāṇāṃ manorapi vākye viśvāsābhāvāt | tathā ca śabdapramāṇaṃ
naiva vyāptijñānopāya iti siddham | etena svārthānumāne pūrvaṃ pramāṇāntareṇa gṛhī
tavyāptikaḥ puruṣaḥ parvatādau pakṣe dhūmādikamarthāntaraṃ dṛṣṭvāgnyādikamarthāntara
manuminotīti tatrānavasthā bhavatu nāma | parārthānumāne tu pañcāvayavavākyā
ntargatodāharaṇavākyādeva vyāptijñānaṃ sulabhamiti nānavastheti parāstam |
udāharaṇavākyājjāyamānaṃ hi śabdapramāṇenaivetyuktadoṣatādavasthyāt | atha pañcā
vayavavākyaprayoktāpi durlabha ityāha — anupadiṣṭeti | vyāpteśca jñānābhāve sati
naiva dhūmādināgnyāderanumānamiti nāmaśeṣameva svārthānumānam | tathā ca pañcāva
yavavākyaprayogāsaṃbhavenārthādeva parārthānumānasya nāmāpi grahītuṃ na śakyata iti
bhāvaḥ | athopamānādikamapi na vyāptigrahopāya ityāha — upamānādika
miti | gosadṛśapiṇḍe saṃjñini gavaya iti saṃjñāyā yaḥ saṃbandhaḥ śaktirūpaḥ
sa upamānapramāṇena jñāyate na tu tādṛśasaṃbandhaviśeṣātiriktaṃ kiṃcit | eva
manupalabdhipramāṇenābhāva eva jñāyate na tu tadatiriktaṃ kiṃcit | tathā ca na
so'pi vyāptijñānopāyaḥ | anaupādhikasaṃbandhaḥ | vyāptiḥ |

atha vyāptijñānaṃ prakārāntareṇāpi durlabhamityāha — kiṃ ceti | anaupādhika
saṃbandho hi vyāptiḥ | anaupādhika upādhirahitaḥ | upādhirāhityaṃ ca sarvavidha
syopādherabhāvaḥ | upādhyabhāvajñānaṃ copādhijñāne satyeva | abhāvajñānasya pratiyo
gijñānasāpekṣatvāt | upādhiśca dravyarūpo dharmī guṇādirdharmaśca mūrto'mūrtaśca pratya
kṣo'pratyakṣaśca sarvavidho'pi saṃbhavati | kaścinniścitaḥ kaścicchaṅkitaścetyanyat |
tatrāpratyakṣopādhyabhāvajñānārthamanumānāntarāpekṣā syādeva | tathā cānumānapramāṇaṃ
vyāptijñānāpekṣam | vyāptisvarūpasya copādhyabhāvaghaṭitatvenopādhyabhāvajñānārthaṃ
punaranumānāntarāpekṣetyanavasthā syādeveti bhāvaḥ | prakārāntareṇāpi doṣamāha —
api ceti | vyāptisvarūpasyopādhyabhāvaghaṭitatvenopādhijñānāpekṣā | upādhi
svarūpasya ca vyāptighaṭitatvena vyāptijñānāpekṣetyanyonyāśrayadoṣa ityāśayaḥ |
upādhisvarūpamāha — sādhanāvyāpakatva iti | anitye sādhya iti |
śabdo'nitya utpannatvāt | saddheturayam | utpannatve'nityatvavyāpteranaupādhikatvāt |
paraṃ tu yadyupādherlakṣaṇaṃ sādhyavyāpakatvamityeva kriyate tarhi sakartṛkatvamupādhiḥ
syāt | tasyānityatvavyāpakatvāt | na ca prāgabhāve'nityatvasattve'pi sakartṛkatvā
bhāvānna sādhyavyāpakatvamiti vācyam | sakartṛkatvasya bhāvāvacchinnānityatvavyā
pakatvāt | ataḥ sādhanāvyāpakatvamityuktam | sakartṛkatvaṃ tu notpannatvasyāvyā
pakam | sādhanāvyāpakatvamātramupādherlakṣaṇaṃ ceduktānumāna eva ghaṭatvamupādhiḥ
syāt | ghaṭatvasyotpannatvarūpasādhanāvyāpakatvāt | ataḥ sādhyavyāpakatvamityu
ktam | ghaṭatvasyānityatvarūpasādhyavyāpakatvābhāvāt | tāvatāpyaśrāvaṇatvamu
pādhiḥ syāt | aśrāvaṇatvaṃ hyutpannatvarūpasādhanasyāvyāpakaṃ bhavati | śabda utpa
nnatvasattve'pyaśrāvaṇatvābhāvāt | dravyatvāvacchinnānityatvasya vyāpakaṃ ca bhavati |
ataḥ sādhyasamavyāptatvamityuktam | aśrāvaṇatvaṃ nityeṣvātmākāśādāvastīti
na taddravyatvāvacchinnānityatvena samaniyatam | ato neyaṃ samavyāptiḥ | samā
sametyādineti |

samāsamāvinābhāvāvekatra sto yadā tadā |
samena yadi no vyāptastayorhīno'prayojakaḥ ||
khaṇḍanakhaṇḍakhādyaṭīkāyāmānandapūrṇaviracitāyāmanumānakhaṇḍane pṛ. 707
dhṛtoyaṃ ślokaḥ | asyārthaḥ — yadaikatraikasminpadārthe samāsamāvinābhāvau staḥ |
avinābhāvo vyāptiḥ | sā ca dvidhā — samavyāptirasamavyāptiśca | samaniya
tayordvayormadhya ekenāparasya vyāptiḥ samavyāptiḥ | yathā pṛthivītvagandhayoḥ |
yā cāsamaniyatayordvayormadhya ekenāparasya vyāptiḥ sā'samavyāptiḥ | yathāgni
nā dhūmasya | ayogolake'gneḥ sattve'pi dhūmasyāsattvenāgnidhūmayorasamaniyatatvāt |
agninā saha ya ārdrendhanasya saṃyogastasminnekasminpadārthe dhūmena saha samavyāptiḥ |
dhūmārdrendhanasaṃyogayoḥ samaniyatatvāt | yā cāgninārdrendhanasaṃyoge vyāptiḥ
sā tvasamavyāptiḥ | ayogolake'gneḥ sattve'pyārdrendhanasaṃyogasyāsattvenāgnyārdre
ndhanasaṃyogayorasamaniyatatvāt | tathā caikatrārdrendhanasaṃyoge dhūmena samavyāpti
ragninā cāsamavyāptiriti vyāptidvayaṃ vartate | tayoḥ samāsamayordhūmāgnyormadhye
hīno'samo'gniḥ samena dhūmena yadi no vyāpto'gnirdhūmavyāpyo na bhavati tarhi
so'samo'gniraprayojakaḥ | dhūmarūpasādhyasya sādhako heturna bhavatīti | evamu
pādhisvarūpaṃ pradarśya vyāptijñānopādhijñānayoranyonyāśrayadoṣamupapādayati — tatra
vidhīti | adhyavasāyo niścayaḥ | upasaṃharati — tasmāditi | avinā
bhāvasya | vyāpteḥ | etāvatā granthasaṃdarbheṇa vyāptijñānopāyābhāvenānumānasya
na prāmāṇyamiti pratipāditam | śabdastu na pramāṇamityanupadameva vyāptijñāno
pāyavicāraprasaṅgenopapāditam | kiṃ ca pramāṇāntarāṇāṃ prāyo vaiśeṣikairanumā
ne'ntarbhāvaḥ kṛtaḥ | tatra coktarītyānumānasya prāmāṇyaṃ na sidhyatītyarthādeva
tadantarbhūtānāṃ pramāṇāntarāṇāmapyaprāmāṇyameveti bodhyam | nanu yadi nānu
mānaṃ pramāṇaṃ tarhi yā loke dhūmaṃ paśyato'gniprāptyarthaṃ pravṛttirdṛśyate sā na saṃga
cchata iti cettatrāha — dhūmādijñāneti | pratyakṣamūlatayeti | pūrvaṃ pratyakṣato
dṛṣṭo'gniḥ | paścātkiyadbhiḥ kṣaṇairdhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvodbuddhasaṃskāro'gniṃ smṛtvā pravartata iti
bhāvaḥ | kalpāntaramāha — bhrāntyeti | dhūmāgnyoḥ sāhacaryeṇa dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvāgnibhramā
tpravṛttiriti bhāvaḥ | nanu bhrāntyā pravṛttau kathaṃ satyasyāgneḥ pratilambhastatrāha —
kvaciditi | śārīrasāmarthyadhanakīrtyādyaiśvaryaprāptaye tathotpannasya rogādernivṛ
ttaye ca maṇisparśo mantraprayoga auṣadhasevanaṃ ca kriyamāṇaṃ dṛśyate loke | paraṃ tu
maṇyādyupayoge'pi kvacitkāryaṃ na dṛśyate | kvacicca tadabhāve'pi kāryaṃ dṛśyate |
ato'nvayavyatirekavyabhicārānnaiva tatra vastutaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ | aiśvaryā
diprāptistu svabhāvata eva kvacidbhavati kvacinna bhavati | tathā rogādinivṛttirapi
svabhāvata eva bhuktānnādipariṇāmaviśeṣātkvacidbhavati kvacinna bhavati | tatra
kvacitkākatālīyanyāyena jāyamānaṃ kāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhrāntāḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ manyante |
vastutastu naiva tatra kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ | tadvadatrāpi naiva dhūmajñānāgnijñānayoḥ
kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ | bhrāntyā pravṛttāvapi yādṛcchikatayaiva vastusato'gneḥ pratilambha
iti | kecittu sadasatkarmajanyaṃ puṇyapāparūpamadṛṣṭaṃ sukhaduḥkharūpasvaphaladānonmukhaṃ
sadaiśvaryaṃ dadāti rogotpattyādikaṃ ca karoti | tathā caiśvaryādinā kāryeṇa svakā
raṇamadṛṣṭaṃ sādhyate dhūmenāgnirivetyāhuḥ | tanna | aiśvaryaprāptyādeḥ svābhāvikatvāt |
tadāha — atastatsādhyamiti | paśuścediti | taduktaṃ viṣṇupurāṇe —

lg.l: svapitā yajamānena tadā kiṃ na nihanyate ||

div.p:
tṛptaye jāyate puṃso bhuktamanyena cettataḥ |
dadyācchrāddhaṃ śramāyānnaṃ na vaheyuḥ pravāsinaḥ || vi. pu. 3 | 18 | 85 iti |
tathā tatraiva yajñādikarmaviṣaye'pyuktam —

yajñairanekairdevatvamavāpyendreṇa bhujyate |
sasyādi ca samitkāṣṭhaṃ tadvaraṃ patrabhukpaśuḥ || vi. pu. 3 | 18 | 82-83 iti |

jarbharīti | sṛ_ṇye!va ja_rbharī! tu_rpharī!tū naito_śeva! tu_rpharī! parpha_rīkā! | u_da_
nya_jeva_ jema!nā made_rū tā me! ja_rāyva_jaraṃ! ma_rāyu! ṛ. saṃ. 10 | 106 | 6 | aśvi
nīkumārayoḥ prārthaneyam | paṇḍitānāṃ dhūrtānām | atra loke'tyantāprasiddhānāṃ
jarbharīturpharītyādiśabdānāṃ prayogātprayogakārairdāmbhikairdhūrtairlokā vañcitā ityā
śayaḥ | arthastvayam — sṛṇyeva sṛṇyāviva | sṛṇiraṅkuśaḥ | tatra sādhuḥ pā. sū.
4 | 4 | 98 iti sūtreṇa yatpratyayaḥ | aupratyayasya supāṃ sulak pā. sū. 7 | 1 | 39
iti sūtreṇākāraḥ | aṅkuśārhau mattagajāviva jarbharī gātravināmaṃ kurvantau | jṛbhadhā
torauṇādiko'ripratyayaḥ | upadhāguṇaḥ | turpharītū hantārau ca | nitarāṃ tośaya
tīti nitośaḥ | tasyāpatyaṃ naitośaḥ | tata aupratyayasyākāraḥ | naitośāviva
turpharī śatrūṇāṃ hantārau | parpharīkā parpharīkau stotṝṇāṃ dhanapradānena pūrayitārau
ca | udake bhavamudanyam | tatra jātāviva nirmalau kāntiyuktau | jemanā jaya
śīlau | jayatermanin | upadhādīrghābhāvaśchāndasaḥ | maderū balādhikyena mattau
stutyau vā | tā tau aśvinau me madīyaṃ jarāyu jarāyujamata eva marāyu maraṇaśīlaṃ
śarīramajaraṃ jarāmaraṇarahitaṃ kurutām | aśvasyeti | aśvamedhayajñe'śvaśiśnaṃ
yajamānapatnyā grāhyamiti vidhirbhāṇḍaiḥ kathito vede | evamanyadapyaślīlaṃ trapā
karamanyattaiḥ kathitam | bhaṇḍā unmattāḥ | māṃsānāmiti | yajñe māṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ
yadveda uktaṃ tanniśācarairmāṃsapriyairuktamityarthaḥ ||

div.head: || atha bauddhadarśanam || 2 ||
div.p:
śrīḥ | taduktamiti | nyāyabindusaṃjñake granthe dharmakīrtinaitaduktamityarthaḥ |
citsukhamuniviracitatattvapradīpikāyā vyākhyāyāṃ nayanaprasādinyāṃ pṛ. 71
tadapyuktaṃ kīrtinetyullikhyāyaṃ śloko nirdiṣṭaḥ | tathā ca dharmakīrtiḥ kevala
kīrtināmnāpi prasiddha ityanumīyate | kāryeti | vyāptiniścāyakaśca kāryakā
raṇabhāvaḥ svabhāvaśceti tasmādavinābhāvaniścayo bhavati | svabhāvastādātmyam |
kāryaṃ hi kāraṇādhīnātmalābhaṃ na kāraṇena vinā bhavitumalamiti tatrāvinā
bhāvaniyamovagamyate | tathā yadātmā yo bhāvaḥ sa tadvinā kathaṃ bhavediti
tādātmyepi yukta evāvinābhāvaniyamaḥ | sapakṣe darśanamātrādvipakṣe cādarśana
mātrānna vyāptiniścayaḥ | kevalānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vyāptiniścayo na bhavatī
tyarthaḥ | anvayeti | anvayavyatirekau hi vartamānāḥ saṃnihitāśca yā dhūmāgni
vyaktayastadviṣayāveva saṃbhavataḥ | na hyagnisattve dhūmasattvamagnyabhāve dhūmābhāva
ityevaṃ niścayo bhūtavastusaṃbandhena bhaviṣyadvastusaṃbandhenāsaṃnihitavastusaṃbandhena
copapadyate | tathā ca tatra kadācidagniṃ vināpi dhūmaḥ syāditi vyabhicāraśaṅkā
durvāreti bhāvaḥ | vyāghāteti |

śaṅkā cedanumāstyeva na cecchaṅkā tatastarām |
vyāghātāvadhirāśaṅkā tarkaḥ śaṅkāvadhirmataḥ || nyā. ku. 3 | 7
anumānumānam | kālāntaradeśāntarayorvyabhicāropādhyanyatarāśaṅkā yadi
tadānumānamastyeva | anumānena vinā tayorapratīteḥ | yadi ca tayorapratītau satyāṃ
na śaṅkā tarhi sutarāmanumānamastyeva | śaṅkānirāsakasyāpyanapekṣaṇāt | śaṅkāyā
avadhistarkaḥ | tarkasya śaṅkānivartakatvāt | nanu tarkepi vyāptimūlakatayā tarkā
ntarāpekṣāyāmanavasthetyato vyāghātāvadhirāśaṅketyuktam | tarkamūlavyāptau svakri
yāvyāghātena vyabhicāraśaṅkaiva nodetīti na tatra tarkāpekṣetyarthaḥ | pratyakṣopala
mbheti | upalambhadvayamanupalambhatrayamityevaṃ militvā pañcakaṃ bodhyam | pañca
kāraṇyeti | pañcānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ samāhāraḥ pañcakāraṇī tayā | militānāmevā
mīṣāṃ pañcānāṃ kāraṇatvamiti samāhāradvandvena bodhyate | atipatet | atikrā
met | vṛkṣatvānadhikaraṇavṛtti śiṃśapātvaṃ bhavedityarthaḥ | sāmānādhikaraṇyeti |
bhinnapravṛttinimittānāṃ śabdānāmekasminnarthe vṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti śābdi
kāḥ | yathā nīlo ghaṭa iti | nīlaśabdasya hi nīlaguṇaḥ pravṛttinimittam | ghaṭa
śabdasya tu ghaṭatvajātiḥ pravṛttinimittam | tayornīlaguṇaghaṭatvayorāśrayībhūtortha
stvekaeva | tatrārthasyaikyānnātyantaṃ bhedaḥ | pravṛttinimittabhedācca nātyantamabhedaḥ |
tasmaditi | kāryātmānāviti prathamāntaṃ kartṛpadam | kāraṇātmānāviti dvitī
yāntaṃ karmapadam | yathāsaṃkhyenānvayaḥ | dhūmādikāryaṃ kāraṇānumāpakam | śiṃśa
pādi viśeṣasvarūpaṃ sāmānyasvarūpānumāpakam |

prathamaḥ | sādhanānupanyāsapakṣaḥ | aśiraskavacanasyeti | parvato vahnimā
nityetāvanmātraṃ dhūmavattvādityādivākyarahitaṃ yaducyate tadaśiraskam | parvato
vahnimānityukte kuta ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ tannirvartakaṃ yaddhūmavattvādityādivākyaṃ tadā
kāṅkṣāśāmakatvācchirobhūtamiva bhavati | vacanapramāṇamiti | sādhanopa
nyāsapakṣe ca tadeva vacanaṃ pramāṇatvenopanyastamityaṅgīkartavyam | vacanaṃ pramāṇaṃ
ca śābdaṃ pramāṇam | tvayā tu pratyakṣamekameva pramāṇaṃ nānumānādikamiti bruvatā
śābdamapi na pramāṇatvena svīkriyate tadviruddhaṃ ca vacanaṃ pramāṇamupanyasyata iti
vyāghātaḥ | yathā mātā vandhyetyukte mātā cenna vandhyā vandhyā cenna mātā |
mātṛtvavandhyātvayorvirodhāt | tathā anumānādikaṃ pramāṇaṃ na bhavati ityukte
numānādikaṃ pramāṇaṃ na bhavati cedetadvacanamapi na pramāṇaṃ syāt | vacanaṃ pramāṇaṃ
cedanumānādikaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt | pramāṇatadābhāseti | mārge gacchatā dūrato
jale dṛṣṭa idaṃ jalajñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ pramāṇābhāso veti saṃśaye pūrvamekadaitādṛśa
meva jñānamabhūt | paraṃ tu tatra jalaṃ labdham | tajjātīyameva caitaddṛśyate | ata eta
dapi pramāṇamevetyevaṃ niścayaḥ svabhāvānumānena tvayaiva kriyate | atha vā tādṛśa
saṃśayottaraṃ pūrvametādṛśameva jñānamabhūt | paraṃ tu tatra jalaṃ na labdham | tajjātīya
meva caitaddṛśyate | ata etadapi pramāṇābhāsa evetyevaṃ niścayastvayaiva kriyate |
vipratipattiriti | viruddhā pratipattirvipratipattiḥ | viparītajñānamiti yāvat |
yādṛśaṃ ca yasya jñānaṃ tadanurūpameva sa vaktīti paravacanena tatkāraṇībhūtaṃ tanma
nogataṃ tvayānumīyata eva | anupalabdhyeti | yato ghaṭastatra nopalabhyateto
nāstyeveti ghaṭānupalabdhyā ghaṭābhāvonumīyate | tathāgataiḥ | bauddhaiḥ | pramā
ṇāntareti | pūrvoktānumānatrayasaṃgrāhakaḥ ślokoyam | parākrāntaṃ cātreti |
atrānumānaprāmāṇyaviṣaye sūribhiḥ paṇḍitaiḥ parākrāntam | bahūktamiti yāvat |
atha vā parākrāntamityasyopekṣitamityarthaḥ |

boddhavyānām | śiṣyāṇām | budhadhātorṇyantātprayojye karmaṇi tavyapratyayaḥ |
buddhibhakṣārthayoḥ śabdakarmakāṇāṃ nijecchayā |
ityukteḥ | buddhibhedāditi | buddhiprakārabhedādityarthaḥ | buddhitāratamyāditi
yāvat | jāreti | krameṇānvayaḥ | jārobhisaraṇasya cauraḥ parasvaharaṇasyānūcānaḥ
sadācaraṇasya samayaṃ budhyate | vedasyānuvacanaṃ kṛtavānanūcānaḥ | svalakṣaṇamiti |
svena lakṣyate na tu sāmānyena tatsvalakṣaṇam | pūrvamadṛṣṭopi ghaṭo ghaṭatvasāmānyena
hetubhūtenāyaṃ ghaṭa ityevaṃ lakṣyata iti naiyāyikādayaḥ | vastutastu na kimapi
vastu sāmānyalakṣaṇam | sāmānyasyaivābhāvāt | nīlādikṣaṇānāmiti | yathā
yasyakasyacitpadārthasya nāmnā nirdeśe kartavye ghaṭaśabdollekha ityādhunikānāṃ śailī
dṛśyate tathā nīlaśabdenollekha iti prācīnānāṃ śailī | na tvatra nīlarūpe padārthavi
śeṣe tātparyam | kṣaṇaśabdaḥ padārthavācī | ghaṭādipadārthānāmiti yāvat | jala
dhareti | jaladharapaṭalaṃ hi pratikṣaṇamanyathānyathā dṛśyate | bhāvāḥ | padārthāḥ |
arthakriyeti | prayojanabhūtā yā kriyā tatkāritvameva sattvam | kiṃcitkārya
kāritvamiti yāvat | anyaḥ prakāra iti | kramākramaitadubhayābhāvarūpastadubha
yarūpaścānyaḥ prakāro na saṃbhavati | tatrādyo na saṃbhavati | prakāśāndhakārayoriva
kramākramayoḥ parasparamatyantavirodhena kramābhāve'kramasyāvarjanīyatvenākramābhāve ca
kramasyāvarjanīyatvenobhayābhāvasya śaśaviṣāṇāyamānatvāt | nāpi tadubhayarūpaḥ
prakāraḥ saṃbhavati | mithotyantaviruddhayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyasyāsaṃbhavaduktikatvāt |

akṣaṇikasya | sthāyitvena parābhimatasyeśvarakulālādeḥ | arthakriyayoriti |
kulālo yadaikaṃ ghaṭaṃ karoti tadā tasya bhūtabhāvighaṭarūpārthotpādakakriyākaraṇasā
marthyaṃ kimastyatha vā nāstītyarthaḥ | tayoḥ | bhūtabhaviṣyatkālikayorghaṭotpādakakri
yayoḥ | anirākaraṇeti | ekadaiva traikālikaghaṭotpādakakriyākaraṇaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ |
kṣepāyogāditi | na hi samarthaḥ kālakṣepaṃ sahate | ekaghaṭotpādakakriyākaraṇakāle
ghaṭāntarotpādakakriyākaraṇāsāmarthye tvāha — dvitīya iti | kadāpi na kuryādi
ti | sthāyina ekasminkāle'sāmarthye kālāntarepyasāmarthyameva tasyāṅgīkartavyam |
anyathā hyasamarthavastusvarūpāpekṣayā samarthavastusvarūpe bhedasyāvarjanīyatvena vastunaḥ
sthāyitvabhaṅgaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ | sāmarthyamātreti | mātrapadena sahakārivyā
vṛttiḥ | sahakāriviṣaye tvanupadameva vakṣyate | tadviparyayāditi | prasaṅgavipa
ryayādityarthaḥ | bhūtabhaviṣyatkālayorapi tattatkālikaghaṭotpādakakriyākaraṇaprasaṅgā
bhāvaḥ syādityarthaḥ | kramavaditi | sthāyī traikālikakriyākaraṇasamarthaḥ sarvadai
karūpa eva | kiṃ tu yadā yādṛśasahakārisaṃnidhānaṃ bhavettadā tādṛśakāryotpattiriti
na sarvadā sarvavastūtpādo nāpi kadāpi na kuryāditi prāgukto doṣaḥ | tathā ca
kāryakramaḥ sahakārikramādhīno na tu sāmarthyāsāmarthyamūlaka iti vastunaḥ sthāyi
tvopapattirityāśayaḥ | sahakāriṇaḥ kimiti | sahakāriṇaḥ salilamṛtpavanā
dayaḥ sthāyitvena parābhimate bījādau padārthe kiṃ viśeṣamādadhate na vetyarthaḥ |
tādarthyāyogāditi | aṅkurarūpakāryaprayojanakatvāyogādityarthaḥ | bhāvaḥ |
sthāyitvena parābhimataḥ sahakāribhiḥ salilapavanādibhiranupakṛta eva bījādiḥ |
sahakāribhiḥ sahaiveti | evaṃ ca sahakāriṇāṃ salilādīnāmaṅkurādikāryārtha
tvamupapannamityāśayaḥ | na jahyāditi | aṅkurādikāryamanutpādya kusūlādau yā
bījānāṃ tūṣṇīṃ sthitirdṛśyate sā svabhāvavirodhānna kadāpi dṛśyetetyarthaḥ | so
yamupakāra iti | sahakārijanyaḥ sthāyiniṣṭho viśeṣaḥ svāśrayabhūtātsthāyibhā
vātsakāśādbhinnotha vā na bhinna ityarthaḥ | tatra bhedapakṣe dūṣaṇamāha — bhedapakṣa ityā
dinā tṛtīyānavasthā duravasthā syāt 2 | 97 ityantena | āgantuka
syaiva tasya | apūrvotpannasya sthāyiniṣṭhasyātiśayasyaiva | āgantukātiśa
yeti | bījādisthāyibhāvaniṣṭhātiśayasattveṅkurotpattirityanvayaḥ | tādṛśāti
śayābhāveṅkurābhāva iti vyatireka ityevamaṅkurādikāryamatiśayanirūpitānvaya
vyatirekāvanuvidhatte na tu bījanirūpitau | yadyapi bījābhāveṅkurābhāva iti
vyatirekaḥ saṃbhavati tathāpi bījasattveṅkurasattvamityanvayo na saṃbhavati | ati
śayotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ bījasattvepyaṅkurādarśanāt | varṣeti | varṣo varṣaṇam | vikārāyogya
ākāśe varṣaṇena nārdratā saṃpadyate nāpyātapena śuṣkatā | varṣātapayorārdratā
śuṣkatārūpaṃ phalaṃ vikārayogye carmaṇi dṛśyate | tathā yadi sthāyitvenābhimato
bījādirbhāvo vikārayogyaḥ sahakārijanyātiśayena vikṛto bhavettarhi sa bhāvo'
nityaḥ syāt | athākāśatulyo'vikṛta eva cedasatphalaḥ syāt | asadavidyamānaṃ
phalaṃ yasminnetādṛśaḥ sahakārijanyaviśeṣarūpaphalānādhāraḥ syāt | tathā ca kiṃ
salilapavanādisahakārisaṃnidhāneneti |

ubhayathāpi prāguktadūṣaṇeti | salilapavanādisahakārijanyo bīja
niṣṭhopi bījādatyantaṃ bhinnotiśayo bījetiśayāntaraṃ notpādayati cetkiṃ
sahakārijanyātiśayena | kuto vā sahakārijanyātiśayotpatteḥ prāgbījānnāṅkuro
tpattiḥ | atha sahakārijanyaḥ prathamātiśayo bīje dvitīyātiśayamutpādayati
cetsopi dvitīyotiśayo bījādatyantabhinno bīje tṛtīyātiśayamutpādayati
na vā | evaṃ tatra tatrāpītyanavasthā | atiśayasya bījādabhinnatve tu dūṣaṇamagre atha
bhāvādabhinnotiśaya 2 | 97 ityādinā mūla eva vakṣyate | bhedapakṣa eva prakā
rāntareṇa dūṣaṇamāha — atiśayāntarārambhapakṣa iti | sahakārijanyabījaniṣṭhai
kātiśayotpattyā na nirvāha ityatotiśayāntarotpattiṃ svīkartṝṇāṃ mata ityarthaḥ |
sā cātiśayāntarotpattiḥ sahakāriṣu sahakāryantarebhyo vā bījādiṣu sthāyiṣu
sahakāryantarebhyo vā atiśayeṣu bījādisthāyibhyo vā bījādiṣvatiśayebhyo
vetyanyat | yo yadapekṣate tenāpekṣitena tasminnapekṣake kaścidviśeṣa utpādayi
tavya iti | bahumukheti | bahuprakāretyarthaḥ | tatraikaṃ prakāramāha — atiśaye
janayitavya iti | sahakāryantarāpekṣāyāmiti | sahakāriṇaḥ salilādeḥ
sahakāryantarāpekṣāyāmityarthaḥ | atiśayotpādanasya sahakāryantarānapekṣāyāṃ tu
tasya svābhāvikatvātsarvadaiva bījādīngale pāśena baddhvā teṣvatiśayaṃ salilādaya
utpādayeyuḥ | ekā | ekaprakārā | prakārāntareṇa trividhānavasthāmāha — tatheti |
ādhīyamāna iti | etena bījagatātiśayasya naimittikatvaṃ sādhitam | apa
rathā | bījagatātiśayasya svābhāvikatve | tadabhāvepi | salilādisahakāri
ṇāmabhāvepi | ādadhānam | gṛhṇānam | sahakārisāpekṣam | sahakāryantara
sāpekṣam | anyatheti | atiśayadhāraṇasya sahakāryantarānapekṣayā svābhāvika
tvāṅgīkāre | sarvadopakārāpattau | salilādisahakāriṇo gale pāśena baddhvā
tebhyaḥ sadaiva bījenātiśayadhāraṇāpattau | atiśayārtham | prathamātiśayadhāra
ṇārtham | sahakāribhiḥ | sahakāryantaraiḥ | janakatve | ādhāratayā janakatve |
dhārakatva iti yāvat | upakārādheyeti | upakārajanyetyarthaḥ | bhā
vādabhinnotiśayaḥ | bījādeḥ sthāyibhāvasyaivāvasthāviśeṣabhūtotiśayaḥ |
kurvadrūpam | pariṇāmonmukhaṃ rūpam | phalitamiti | yadi ca sahakāri
bhiratiśayotpādanepi bījādiḥ sthāyyavasthāntaraṃ na prāpnoti kiṃ tu pūrvāvastha
evāvatiṣṭhata ityucyate tadātiśayasya vaiyarthyameveti kiṃ sahakāribhūtasali
lādisaṃnidhānena | avasthāntaraprāptau tu kṣaṇikatvaṃ siddhameveti |

akrameṇa | yugapat | svabhāva iti | sa bhāva iti kvacitpāṭho
dṛśyate | sa na yuktaḥ | ananuvṛttipakṣe viruddhadharmādhyastatvenāśrayanānātvasādhana
syānupayogāt | anuvartata iti | svāśraye ityādiḥ | āpatediti |
svabhāvasyānapāyāt | sthāyitvavṛttīti | bījādau bhāve sthāyitvasya vṛttirva
rtanam | yathā mūṣakādibhakṣitādantaḥśūnyādbījādaṅkurotpattyāśā niṣphalā tathā
bījādau bhāve sthāyitvāśā niṣphalā | tathā ca prayogaḥ — bījādirbhāvaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ
bhinnaḥ viruddhadharmaviśiṣṭatvāditi | bījādau sāmarthyamasāmarthyaṃ ca mitho viru
ddham | na ca kālabhedena sāmarthyāsāmarthyayorekatra na virodha iti vācyam |
dharmisvarūpasya pūrvāvasthatve dharmavyatyayasyāsaṃbhavāt | dharmavyatyaye svarūpabhedāva
śyaṃbhāvāt | śītoṣṇe iti | guṇopasarjanadravyavācakayoḥ śītoṣṇaśabdayo
rdvaṃdvaḥ | śītoṣṇasparśau mitho viruddhau | jaladhara iti | pratibandho vyāptiḥ |
megho hi pratikṣaṇaṃ navanavasvarūponubhūyata iti tatra viruddhadharmādhyastatvanānātva
yorvyāptiḥ sidhyati | asiddha iti | bījādau pakṣe kālabhedenāpi viruddhadharmā
dhyastatvasya hetoradarśanādviruddhadharmādhyastatvahetuḥ svarūpāsiddhaḥ śabdo guṇaścākṣu
ṣatvāditivaditi śaṅkāśayaḥ | prasaṅgatadviparyayeti | vyatirekavyāptimukhena
pradarśitamanumānaṃ prasaṅgānumānamityucyate | anvayavyāptimukhena pradarśitamanumānaṃ
prasaṅgaviparyayānumānamityucyate | asataḥ sattvāpādanaṃ prasaṅgaḥ | yathā parvato
vahnimāndhūmādityatra yatra vahnyabhāvastatra dhūmābhāvo yathā hrada iti vyatireka
vyāptiḥ | tayā ca parvate'sato dhūmābhāvasya sattvamāpādyate yadi hrada iva parvate
vahnirna syāttarhi dhūmopi na syāditi | etaddhūmābhāvāpādanasahakṛtena parvate dhūma
darśanena vahniranumīyate | etatprasaṅgānumānam | prakṛte tu sthāyini vartamānārtha
kriyākaraṇakāletītānāgatakriyākaraṇāsāmarthyaṃ sādhyam | taccātītānāgatakri
yāyāstadānīmakaraṇena sādhyate | tatra ca yatsamarthaṃ tatkarotyeveti vyatirekavyā
ptyā vartamānārthakriyākaraṇakāletītānāgatakriyāyāḥ karaṇamāpādyate | tādṛśā
pādanasahakṛtena vartamānakāletītānāgatakriyāyā akaraṇadarśanenāsāmarthyaṃ sādhi
tam | ādye tayoranirākaraṇaprasaṅgaḥ 2 | 62 ityādināyamasāmarthyasādhakaḥ
prasaṅgaḥ prāguktaḥ | sataḥ sattvapradarśanaṃ prasaṅgaviparyayaḥ | yathā yatra dhūmastatra vahniri
tyanvayavyāptiṃ pradarśya parvate sato dhūmasya pradarśanam | tena ca tatra vahniranumīyate |
sopyasāmarthyasādhakaḥ prāgukta eva yadyadā yanna karoti tattadā tatrāsamartham
2 | 66 ityādinā | sāmarthyasādhakāvapi prasaṅgatadviparyayāvevameva bodhyau |
atrāyaṃ niṣkarṣaḥ — kriyākaraṇasāmarthyayoḥ samaniyatatvāttayormitho vyāpyavyāpa
kabhāvādvyāptidvayaṃ saṃbhavati | yatkaroti tatsamarthamityekā | yatsamarthaṃ tatkarotī
tyaparā | evamakaraṇāsāmarthyayorapi mitho vyāpyavyāpakabhāvādvyāptidvayaṃ saṃbhavati |
yanna karoti tadasamarthamityekā | yadasamarthaṃ tanna karotītyaparā | saṃkalite vyāpti
catuṣṭayesminnādyā sāmarthyasādhikānvayavyāptiḥ | dvitīyā tvasāmarthyasādhikā
vyatirekavyāptiḥ | tṛtīyā cāsāmarthyasādhikānvayavyāptiḥ | caturthī tu sāmarthya
sādhikā vyatirekavyāptiriti | vipakṣa iti | niścitasādhyābhāvavānvipakṣaḥ |
kṣaṇikatve sādhye'kṣaṇikatvena parābhimata īśvarakulālādirvipakṣaḥ | tasya ca kārya
kāritve uktarītyā kramo'kramaśca na saṃbhavatītyarthakriyākāritvavyāpakasya kramākra
mānyataratvasyeśvarādāvabhāvādvyāpyasyārthakriyākāritvasyāpyabhāvaḥ | vyāpakābhāve
vyāpyasyābhāva iti vyatirekavyāptiḥ | tathā cākṣaṇikasyārthakriyākāritvābhāva
āvaśyaka iti vyatirekavyāptiḥ sidhyati | prasaṅgeti | vyāpyasattve vyāpakasa
ttvamityanvayavyāptiḥ | yathā yatsattatkṣaṇikamiti | sat — arthakriyākāri | tasya
kṣaṇikatvābhāve nityasya tasya sāmarthyasattve sadā sarvakāryaprasaṅgaḥ | sāmarthyābhāve
kadāpi na kuryāditi viparyayaḥ | atorthakriyākāriṇaḥ kṣaṇikatvamāvaśyakamityanva
yavyāptiḥ sidhyati | yatsaditi | sat — sattāviśiṣṭam | amī bījādayo
ghaṭādayaśca bhāvāḥ padārthāḥ santaḥ sattayā yuktā vartante | arthakarmaṇi yā
śaktiḥ saiva sattā | kiṃcidvastūtpādanakriyāsāmarthyamiti yāvat | miteḥ | pramā
ṇāt | yena na kiṃcijjanyate yasmājjñānamapi notpannaṃ tādṛśaṃ vastu nāstyeva |
śilāghanamadhyasthapradīpasahasravattasyāstitve pramāṇābhāvāt | ata eva vaiśeṣikā
apekṣābuddheḥ prāgdvitvaṃ necchanti | sā sattā siddheṣvakṣaṇikeṣu siddhā akṣaṇikā
na | kiṃ tu kṣaṇikeṣveva | svayaṃca sā sattā kṣaṇikaiva | nāpyekaiva vidhā | akṣa
ṇikātkāryotpattāveka eva prakāro na | kiṃ tu tatkāryotpādanaṃ svābhāvikaṃ
cetkrameṇa yugapadvā | ubhayathāpyasaṃbhavasya prāguktatvāttṛtīyasya cāsaṃbhavātkāraṇa
syākṣaṇikatvaṃ nāstheyam | anyathā | kāryotpādanasyānaimittikatve | pareṇa saha
kāriṇā kṛtenopakāreṇāpi kāryotpattirbhavetkiṃ kāraṇenetyetāvatāpi kāraṇasyā
kṣaṇikatvaṃ na saṃgacchate | evaṃ dvedhāpi vastunaḥ kṣaṇikatvameva sādhyakoṭau pravi
śatītyarthaḥ |

kaṇabhakṣeti | kaṇabhakṣaḥ kaṇādaṛṣirvaiśeṣikaśāstrasūtrakāraḥ | akṣacaraṇo
gautamaṛṣirnyāyaśāstrasūtrakāraḥ | anyatreti | anyatraikasminghaṭe vartamānasya
ghaṭatvasya tatastasmāddhaṭādanyadyatsthānaṃ ghaṭāntararūpaṃ tasya janmanyutpattau jāya
mānāyāṃ satyāmacalata eva pūrvasthānāttatra ghaṭāntarepi vṛttiḥ sthitirbhava
tītyaho atiyuktatā etadayuktamityarthaḥ | yadvā atiyuktateti sopahāsoktiḥ |
etadatyantaṃ sayuktikamityarthaḥ | yatreti | asau ghaṭarūpo bhāvo yatra bhūtale
vartate tena bhūtalena ghaṭatvaṃ na saṃbadhyate | taddeśinaṃ tatra bhūtalarūpe deśe vidyamānaṃ
ghaṭaṃ caitaddhaṭatvaṃ vyāpnoti | antarbahirūrdhvamadhaḥ paritaśca sarvairghaṭāvayavaiḥ saṃbadhyate |
etatkimapyāścaryamityarthaḥ | na hi bhūtalenāsaṃbadhyamānaṃ vastraṃ bhūtalavṛttighaṭasya
sarvānavayavānvyāptuṃ śaknuyāt | na yātīti | ghaṭatvādijātirna yāti netastato
gacchati | jātau kriyāyā abhāvāt | karmaṇo dravyamātravṛttitvāt | tathā ca
ghaṭotpattau tatra ghaṭatvasya saṃbandho na syāditi doṣaḥ | nanu mṛtpiṇḍe vidyamānaṃ
ghaṭatvamutpannena ghaṭena saṃbadhyetetyata āha — na ceti | tatra ghaṭotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ mṛtpiṇḍe
ghaṭatvaṃ nāsīt | paścāddhaṭotpattau satyāṃ tatra ghaṭesti | etadayuktamityaparo doṣaḥ |
nanvanyatra ghaṭe vidyamānameva ghaṭatvaṃ vardhamānaṃ sattatra saṃbadhyetetyata āha — na
cāṃśavaditi | vṛddhirhi sāvayavasya dṛṣṭā | ghaṭatvaṃ tu niravayavam | ato vṛddhi
rna saṃbhavati | vṛddhyabhāvepi saṃbandheṅgīkriyamāṇe pūrvatra sthitirna syāt | tathā
tu na dṛśyata ityāha — jahātīti | iyaṃ doṣaparaṃparā jātivādina ityarthaḥ |
anuvṛttapratyayaḥ | ghaṭoyaṃ ghaṭoyamityekākārapratyayaḥ | ghaṭatvasāmānyābhā
veyaṃ pratyayo nirmūlaḥ syāditi śaṅkāśayaḥ | anyāpoheti | apoho vyāvṛttiḥ |
bheda iti yāvat | kṛtsnaghaṭeṣu ghaṭetarabhedo yo vartate tanmūlaka eva ghaṭoya
miti pratyaya iti bhāvaḥ |

sarvatīrthakareti | tīrthakarāḥ śāstrakārāḥ | sāṃkhyā naiyāyikā vaiśeṣikā
dvaitino'dvaitino viśiṣṭādvaitinaśca sarvepi saṃsārabandhasya duḥkhātmakatvena heyatva
micchanti | svalakṣaṇānāṃ kṣaṇānāmiti | kṣaṇāḥ kṣaṇikapadārthāḥ | te ca
sarve svalakṣaṇā eva na tu sāmānyalakṣaṇāḥ | svenāsādhāraṇena rūpeṇa lakṣyanta
iti svalakṣaṇāḥ | sāmānyena sādhāraṇena rūpeṇa na kepi lakṣyante | sādhāraṇa
rūpasya kvāpyabhāvāt | taduktam —

etāsu pañcasvavabhāsinīṣu pratyakṣabodhe sphuṭamaṅgulīṣu |
sādhāraṇaṃ rūpamavekṣate yaḥ śṛṅgaṃ śirasyātmana īkṣate saḥ ||
iti | kiṃ ca sarveṣāṃ padārthānāṃ kṣaṇikatvena jñāturapi kṣaṇadvayāvasthānaṃ nāsti |
tathā cāmukena jñātrā sādhāraṇadharmapuraskāreṇa ghaṭoyamityevaṃ ghaṭarūportho
lakṣita iti vaktuṃ na śakyate | svapna iti | śuktau rajatabhrameṇa pravṛttastatra gato
rajatamapaśyansvapne jāgaraṇe ca na mayā dṛṣṭamidaṃ rajatam iti niṣedhamanusaṃdhatte |
tatra ca kārakādyanvitakriyāyāṃ nañarthānvayena kārakādyanvitakriyāyā niṣedho
nañā bodhyata iti darśanakriyā tatkartā draṣṭā tatkarmādikaṃ dṛśyaṃ ca niṣiddhaṃ
bhavati | dṛśyaṃ ca — dharmī dharmastayoḥ saṃbandhaśceti trividhamapyaviśeṣānniṣiddhaṃ
bhavati | tathā ca dharmibhūtāyāḥ śuktestaddharmasyedaṃtāyā rajatatvasya ca niṣedhā
drajatatvasyeva śuktyādīnāmapyasatyatvameveti śūnyavāde paryavasānam | atra
naiyāyikāḥ — yadyapi viśiṣṭakriyāyāṃ nañarthānvayastathāpi na sarvatra sarvaṃ niṣi
dhyate | tamasi mayā ghaṭo na dṛśyata ityatra darśanakriyāyā eva niṣedho na
draṣṭurghaṭasya tamaso vā | padbhyāṃ gacchati sati rathena na gacchatītyatra na pradhāna
bhūtāyā api gamanakriyāyā niṣedhaḥ | kiṃ tu vidhipratiṣedhau viśeṣaṇe paryavasyataḥ
sati viśeṣye bādhe iti nyāyena rathasyaiva niṣedhaḥ | evaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ tatra
tatrohanīyamiti | tanna | ardhajaratīyasyānaucityāt | saṃvṛtyeti | saṃvṛtira
vidyā | kalpanāmātramitiyāvat |

artha iti | ghaṭādirartho yo jñānagrāhyo bhavati sa tathāvidho bhavankimu
tpannastathāvidho grāhyo bhavatyanutpanno vā | nādyaḥ kalpaḥ saṃbhavati | utpannasya
kṣaṇikatvena dvitīyakṣaṇe sthityabhāvāt | utpattikṣaṇe tu na jñānagrāhyatvam |
arthasya jñānakāraṇatvāt | kāraṇasya ca kāryapūrvakālikatvaniyamāt | nāntyaḥ |
asattvāt | atīta eveti | jñānakāle'vidyamānasyāpyarthasya jñānajanakatva
saṃbandhenaiva jñānagrāhyatvamityarthaḥ | grāhyatvaprasaṅgāditi | indriyāṇāmapi
jñānasādhanatvena jñānajanakatvāt | kṛtsneti | avayavirūpo ghaṭādiḥ kiṃ kṛtsno
jñānagrāhyo bhavati tadekadeśo vā | nādyaḥ | kṛtsnasyendriyasaṃbandhābhāvāt | na
dvitīyaḥ | ayaṃ ghaṭa iti vyavahārānupapatteḥ | ekadeśe ghaṭatvābhāvāt | ṣaṭke
neti | pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarordhvādhararūpeṇa diśāṃ ṣaṭkena saha niravayavasya para
māṇoryugapatsaṃbandho na bhavitumarhati | bhavati cenniravayavatvaṃ tasya na saṃbhavati |
etadeva paramāṇūnāṃ niravayavatvāṅgīkāre bādhakamityarthaḥ | ṣaṭkeneti |

ṣaṭkoṇayugapadyogātparamāṇoḥ ṣaḍaṃśatā |
ṣaṇṇāṃ samānadeśatve piṇḍaḥ syādaṇumātrakaḥ ||
ityanyatra pāṭho dṛśyate | teṣāmiti | ekaḥ samāno deśo yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ bhāva
ekadeśatvam | ṣaṇṇāmaṃśānāṃ samānadeśatve tu teṣāmaṃśānāṃ mithaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kārtsnye
naivāṅgīkārya iti ghaṭādeḥ piṇḍasyāṇutvameva syānna mahattvam | uparyadhaḥ pārśvataśca
vyāptiḥ kārtsnyam | yadi tādṛśā aṃśā mithaḥ kārtsnyena saṃyujyeraṃstarhi yāvati
deśe ekoṃśaḥ saṃmitastāvatyeva deśeparepi saṃmitāḥ syuḥ | ataḥ prathimānu
papattiḥ | tadātmikā | viṣayātmikā | ghaṭādiviṣayarūpākāradhareti yāvat |
nānya iti | buddhyānubhāvyo grāhyo ghaṭādirbuddheḥ sakāśādanyo nāsti | tasyā
buddheranubhavo naiyāyikādyabhimatonuvyavasāyarūpaḥ | sopi buddheḥ sakāśāda
paronyo na | evaṃ buddheḥ sakāśādanyayorgrāhyagrāhakayorvaidhuryādabhāvātsaiva svayaṃ
prakāśata ityarthaḥ | yadvedyata iti | yena jñānena yadvastu jñāyate tadvastu tasmā
jjñānānna bhidyate | yathā jñānenātmā | advaitavedāntimatamanusṛtyāyaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ |
teṣāṃ mata ātmano jñānarūpatvāt | evaṃ viṣayavijñānayorabhedaṃ prasādhya bhedapakṣe
bādhakamāha — bhede hīti | saṃbandhitvam | saṃbandhaḥ | yadyajjñānaṃ tattatsaviṣaya
mevetyevaṃ jñānena saha yorthasya niyatasaṃbandhastadbījaṃ tādātsyameva | tattu bhedapakṣe
na saṃbhavatīti saṃbandhaniyamo lokenubhūyamāno nopapadyeta | nanu bhedapakṣerthasya
jñānanimittatvamaṅgīkriyate | tathā ca viṣayājjāyamānā jñānasyotpattireva
saṃbandhaniyāmikāstviti cettatrāha — tadutpatteriti | na hi ghaṭaḥ kulāladaṇḍa
cakrādibhirnityasaṃbaddho bhavati | sahopalambheti | nīlataddhiyorviṣayavijñānayoḥ
sahopalambhaniyamo dṛśyate | na hyanayorekasyānupalambhenyasyopalambhosti |
yadyena saha niyamenopalabhyate tattena sahābhinnameva | yathā ghaṭo mṛdā sahaivopa
labhyate iti mṛdabhinnaḥ | tathaivātreti bhāvaḥ | taduktaṃ vivaraṇaprameyasaṃgrahe
pṛ0 75

bhāsate cetkutaḥ sarvaṃ na bhāsetaikasaṃvidi |
niyāmakaṃ na saṃbandhaṃ paśyāmo nīlataddhiyoḥ || iti |
avibhāgopīti | buddhyātmā buddhisvarūpamavibhaktamekameva yadyapi tathāpya
nādibhedavāsanayā yeṣāṃ darśanaṃ jñānaṃ viparyāsitaṃ viparyāsaṃ prāptaṃ tairbuddhisvarūpame
kamapi jñeyajñātṛjñānarūpeṇa trividhamivālakṣyata ityarthaḥ | na ca raseti |
vijñānavādibauddhavyatiriktamate bauddhāḥ kevalaṃ buddhyā kalpitā āśāmodakādayorthā
bhinnāḥ | bāhyāścopārjitamodakādayorthā bhinnāḥ | tatra bāhyamodakabhakṣaṇe śarīre
rasavīryādirūpeṇa pariṇāmo bhavati | na tvāśāmodakasthale | teṣāṃ kevalaṃ kalpi
tatvenāsatyatvāt | vijñānavādimate tūpārjitamodakānāmapyāśāmodakavatkevalaṃ
kalpitatvena dvayoḥ samatvātpariṇāmasāmyaṃ syādityāśayaḥ | vastuta iti |
buddhirjñānam | tacca vastuto na jñeyākāraṃ nāpi jñānākāram | tathāpi tajjñānama
nādimithyājñānajanyavāsanayā jñeyākāraṃ jñātrākāraṃ ca bhinnabhinnaṃ bhavati | etacca
vyavahartṝṇāṃ ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmītyādiparijñānānurodhena svīkāryam | tathā ca yathā
pittādidoṣadūṣitanetrāṇāmākāśe kadācitkeśavadrekhā dṛśyante kadāciduṇḍuka
vatkadācittu nāḍīvadityevaṃ jñānavaicitryaṃ vāsanāvaicitryamātrādeva jāyate tatho
pārjitamodakasthale bhakṣitā modakāstṛptohamityākāraṃ jñānaṃ jāyate āśāmoda
kasthale tu na tatheti jñānavaicitryaṃ vāsanāvaicitryamātrādevopapadyate | ataḥ prāgu
ktapraśnasyānavakāśaḥ | timiro netrarogaviśeṣaḥ | ādipadena pittasaṃgrahaḥ | lūtā
tantujālasadṛśaṃ netrayoḥ purato bhāsamānaṃ jālamuṇḍukaśabdenocyate | upaplavo
mithyājñānam | sāmarthyaṃ śaktiḥ | paryanuyogaḥ praśnaḥ | avedyeti | vastuto
vedyavedakākārarahitāpi buddhiryathā buddheḥ sakāśādvibhaktasvarūpaṃ yadgrāhyaṃ ghaṭādi
grāhakaścātmānuvyavasāyo vā tadākārayuktā bhrāntairavalokyate tatheyaṃ grāhyagrāha
kasvarūpā buddhiryadā keśādijñānabhedavatkṛtavyavasthā tadā na saṃcodyā | pariṇāma
sāmyaṃ nāpādanīyam | anādivāsanāvaicitryavaśādākāravaicitryopapatterityarthaḥ |
prāgukteti | sarvaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ duḥkhaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ śūnyamiti bhāvanāyā utkarṣeṇa
nikhilagrāhyagrāhakavāsanāyā ucchede sati vigalito vividhagrāhyagrāhakākārasaṃ
bandho yasya tādṛśaṃ viśuddhaṃ vijñānamudayate | ayameva mahodayo mokṣaḥ |

anye | sautrāntikāḥ | vedyeti | yataśca viṣayavijñānayoḥ sahopalambhaniya
motastayorabheda ityevaṃ yo vijñānavādyabhimato'bhedasādhako hetuḥ so'prayojakaḥ |
anukūlatarkarahitaḥ | yathā vanhyabhāvavatsu padārtheṣu vipakṣeṣu madhye deśāntare
kālāntare vā kvaciddhūmaḥ kadācitsyāt vipakṣeṣu kvāpi nāstyevetyevaṃ kuto niyama
ityāśaṅkā dhūmavanhyoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvabhaṅgaprasaṅgena nirasyate | ayamanukūlastarkaḥ |
tathātra bhedepi kadācitsahopalambhaniyamaḥ syāt ityāśaṅkā na kathamapi
nirasyate | evaṃ ca vipakṣe hetorvyāvṛttiḥ saṃdigdhetyanumānaṃ na saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ |
nanu bheda iti | sādhanaṃ hetuḥ | sa cābhedasādhakatvenābhimato viṣayavijñā
nayoḥ sahopalambhaniyamātmakaḥ | yadi viṣayavijñānayorbhedastarhi gavāśvayoriva
sahopalambhaniyamenāpi na bhāvyam | paraṃ tu yato dṛśyate sahopalambhaniyamota
statra tatkāraṇatvenābhedonumeya iti śaṅkāśayaḥ | jñānasyeti | uktānumānaṃ
bādhitam | pratyakṣaviruddhatvāt | yato jñānamāntaratvena ghaṭādijñeyaṃ ca bāhyatvena
pratyakṣamupalabhyate | antarmukhamāntaram | bahirmukhaṃ bāhyam | evaṃ sahopalambhaniya
mamaṅgīkṛtyānumānasya bādhitatvamuktam | vastutaḥ sahopalambha eva nāstītyāha —
ekadeśatveti | jñānamātmaniṣṭham | viṣayo ghaṭādiśca bhūtalādiniṣṭhaḥ | tathā
jñānamuttarakṣaṇikam | viṣayastu pūrvakṣaṇikaḥ | evaṃ ca na deśataḥ kālataśca sāhityaṃ
saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ | kiṃ ca nīleti | yathā vijñānavādimate jñātātmā na vastuto
jñānādbhinnaḥ | kiṃ tu jñānamevātmā | sa cāhamityevaṃrūpeṇa bhāsate | tathā ghaṭā
dirviṣayopi yadi vastuto na tasmādbhinnastarhi sopyahamiti pratīyetetyarthaḥ |
jñānasvarūpopīti | jñānasvarūpehamartha ātmani yo jñeyākārādhyāsaḥ sa
idamarthe raṅge yathā rajatasyābhedenādhyāsastathā nābhedena yena rajatasyedaṃtayā
pratītivajjñeyasyāhaṃtayā pratītiḥ syāt | kiṃ tu bhedena | yathā śaṅkhe pītinnaḥ |
tatra hi pittādidoṣeṇa śaṅkhe śvetimānamapahnutya pītimā bhāsate tathātrāhamarthe
jñānarūpa ātmanyāntaratvamapahnutya bāhyatvaṃ bhāsate | yathā pītimādhyāsepi
śaṅkhasvarūpaṃ bhāsate tathā jñeyākārādhyāsepi jñānaṃ bhāsate | ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti
pratyayāt | paricchedeti | jñānasya ya āntaraḥ paricchedo viṣayaprakāśarūpo
bhāgastasmādanyo yoyaṃ jñeyākārasvarūpo bhāgo bahiriva sthitaḥ sa upaplavo
mṛṣā | tathā tasyābhedina ekasya jñānasya bhedapratibhāsopi mṛṣaiva | jñānasya
na kevalaṃ bāhyoṃśa eva mṛṣā | kiṃ tu jñāne bhedapratītirapi mṛṣaivetyarthaḥ | bahi
riva sthita ityatra bahiravasthita ityapi pāṭho dṛśyate | tadvyutpattirahitatayā |
bahiḥśabdārthajñānarāhityena | bhedapratibhāsasyeti | nāyaṃ sarpa iti bādha
darśanena rajjvāṃ sarpajñānasya bhramatvaṃ niścīyate | tathā nātra bhedo bādhyate |
tathā ca bhedajñānasya bhramatvaṃ viṣayavijñānayoraikyajñānasya prāmāṇyenaiva niśceyam |
prāmāṇyaniścayaśca bhedajñānasya bhramatvaniścaye satyeva nānyathā | loke hi viṣaya
vijñānayoraikyajñānameva nāsti kutastasya prāmāṇyam | atonyonyāśrayadoṣaḥ |
avisaṃvādāditi | āntaraṃ bāhyaṃ ceti padārthadvayāṅgīkāro gauravagrastatvānna
kārya iti ye naiyāyikādayo manyante te nīlādīnbāhyārthānpratyakṣata upalabhamānā
bāhyārthaviṣaye kasyāpi visaṃvādābhāvena jagati bāhyārthameva svīkurvate | āntara
viṣaye tu teṣāmupekṣā dṛśyate | bhavanto vijñānavādinastu nirvivādatayā loka
prasiddhamapi bāhyārthameva na svīkurvantīti koyaṃ mārgaḥ | bāhyābhyantarobhaya
vādinaḥ sautrāntikā vaibhāṣikāḥ sākārajñānavādinonye ca | anubhayavādino
mādhyamikāḥ | āntaramātravādino vijñānavādinaḥ | bāhyamātravādino nirā
kārajñānavādino naiyāyikādayaḥ | gomayeti | gomayaṃ pāyasaṃ gavyatvādubhaya
siddhapāyasavadityatra gavyatvaheturaprayojakaḥ | ato hetvābhāsastadvat | gomaya
pāyasīyanyāyaśca tatpratiṣedhārthamekatattvābhyāsaḥ pā. yo. sū. 1 | 32 iti
pātañjalayogasūtre bhāṣye pradarśitaḥ | bhavadīya eveti | bāhyārthamanaṅgīkurvatāṃ
bahirvadityuktireva na saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ |

nanu jñānāditi | ghaṭādayorthāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnāḥ | jñānamapi tathaiva | tatra
jñānakālikortho na jñānagrāhyaḥ | viṣayasya jñānakāraṇatvena viṣayasamakālaṃ
jñānotpattyasaṃbhavāt | tathā ca jñānakṣaṇātpūrvakṣaṇikortha eva jñānagrāhya iti
vaktavyam | tasya ca grāhyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati | yasminkṣaṇe viṣayo na tasminkṣaṇe
jñānam | yasmiṃśca kṣaṇe jñānaṃ na tasminkṣaṇe viṣaya ityevaṃ jñānaviṣayayorbhinna
kālatvāt | indriyeti | ghaṭādirviṣayo hi svadvitīyakṣaṇe svasadṛśaṃ ghaṭāntara
mutpādayati | sa pūrvakṣaṇiko ghaṭādirevendriyasaṃnikṛṣṭaścetsvadvitīyakṣaṇe svākārasa
dṛśākāraviśiṣṭaṃ jñānamapyutpādayati | tādṛśena ca jñānākāreṇa svakāraṇībhūtaḥ
pūrvakṣaṇiko ghaṭādiranumīyate | etadeva ca jñānagrāhyatvam | paryanuyogeti |
praśnottarayorayaṃ saṃgraha ityarthaḥ | bhinneti | bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyamiti praśnaḥ |
ghaṭādivyakteryajjñāne svākārasadṛśākārotpādanasāmarthyarūpaṃ hetutvaṃ tadeva grāhyatva
miti parihāraḥ | saṃbhrameṇa | ādareṇa | artheneti | enāṃ saṃvidaṃ jñātā arthena
viṣayeṇa saha yaddhaṭayati saṃyojayati tatsaṃyojanaṃ saṃvidortharūpatāṃ muktvārthākā
rasadṛśākāratāṃ vinā prakārāntareṇa nāsti | tasmātsaṃvido meyarūpatā viṣayākā
rataiva prameyādhigaterviṣayapramiteḥ pramāṇamityarthaḥ | na hīti | teṣāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ yā
vedanā prakāśaḥ sa vittisattā kevalaṃ jñānasyāstitvamātramiti na yuktam | tasyā
vitteḥ sarvatra ghaṭapaṭādiṣvaviśeṣāt | tathā ca ghaṭajñānapaṭajñānayorbhedo na syāt |
kiṃ tu sārūpyaṃ viṣayasamānākāratā tāṃ vittimāviśatpraviṣṭaṃ sadvittiṃ jñānaṃ sarū
payituṃ viṣayākārasadṛśākāraṃ prāpayituṃ ghaṭayedviṣayeṇa saha saṃyojayedityarthaḥ | ye
yasminniti | yeṅkurādayo yasminbījādau satyapi kādācitkāḥ | kusūlasthita
bījeṣvaṅkurotpattyadarśanāt | teṅkurādayastasmādbījādatiriktaṃ yanmṛtsalilādi tatsā
pekṣā iti niyamaḥ | yathā svabhāvato vacanecchāvirahavato devadattasya kādāci
tkavacanaṃ dūrataḥ śrutvā caitraḥ praṣṭrā puruṣāntareṇātra bhavitavyam ityanuminoti |
tathā nīlādyullekhino ghaṭādiviṣayakā ayaṃ ghaṭoyaṃ paṭa ityādayo ye pravṛttipratya
yāḥ pravṛttivijñānāni tehamityālayavijñāne satyapi kādācitkatvādālaya
vijñānātiriktabāhyaghaṭādiviṣayasāpekṣā ityanenānumānenāpi bāhyaghaṭādiviṣaya
siddhiḥ | ahamāspadam | ahamityākāram | nīlādyullekhi | ghaṭādiviṣaya
kamidaṃtāspadam | tasmāditi | ahamityālayavijñānasaṃtānamevātmā | tadati
riktaḥ kādācitkaṃ yatpravṛttivijñānaṃ taddhetubhūto bāhyo ghaṭādiḥ svīkārya eva |
na tu pravṛttivijñānasya kadācidutpattirvāsanāparipākapratyayasya kādācitka
tvāt | vijñānavādimate vāsanāparipākapratyayasya kādācitkatve hetvabhāvāt |

tadevāha — vijñānavādinaye hīti | ahamityākārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikānāmālayavi
jñānānāṃ saṃtānaḥ paraṃparā pratijīvaṃ bhinnā | caitrīyālayavijñānasaṃtānaghaṭakamāla
yavijñānaṃ caitrīyapravṛttivijñānaṃ janayati | tathā cālayavijñānaniṣṭhā yā pravṛtti
vijñānajananaśaktiḥ saiva vāsanā | tasyā vāsanāyāḥ pravṛttivijñānarūpasva
kāryotpādane yadābhimukhyamunmukhatvaṃ sa tasyāḥ paripākaḥ | vāsanānāmapi
kṣaṇikatvena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnānāṃ vāsanānāṃ madhye kāsāṃcideva paripāko na
sarvāsām | paripākajanyasya pravṛttivijñānasya sarvadotpattyadarśanāt | tasya ca
kādācitkasya paripākasya kādācitkameva kiṃcitkāraṇamavaśyaṃ vācyam | tacca
ghaṭādibāhyārtharūpaṃ sautrāntikamate saṃbhavati | na tu bāhyārthamanaṅgīkurvatāṃ
vijñānavādināṃ mate | tathā ca teṣāṃ mate vāsanāparipākasya vāsanāsaṃtānagata
tatpūrvakṣaṇikavāsanaiva kāraṇamāstheyam | tasyāśca pūrvakṣaṇikavāsanāyāḥ svottara
kṣaṇikavāsanāparipākakāraṇatve tasyā ivānyāsāṃ sarvāsāmapyālayavijñāna
saṃtānaniṣṭhatvasya tulyatayā sarvāsāmeva vāsanānāṃ svasvottarakṣaṇikavāsanāpari
pākakāraṇatvaṃ durvāramiti pravṛttivijñānasya sarvadotpattiprasaṅga iti | saṃtānā
ntareti | jñānasaṃtānāpekṣayānyo ghaṭādijñeyasaṃtānaḥ saṃtānāntaram | tanni
bandhanatvaṃ tanmūlakatvaṃ vāsanāparipākasya vijñānavādibhirnāṅgīkriyate | teṣāṃ mate
jñānātiriktasya jñeyasyābhāvāt | pravṛttīti | pravṛttivijñānajanakībhūtaṃ yadā
layavijñānaṃ tanniṣṭhavāsanāyāḥ paripākakaraṇe sarvā apyālayavijñānaniṣṭhāsta
ttatpūrvakṣaṇikā vāsanāḥ samarthā ityarthaḥ | ekopi | ekaḥ kṣaṇopi | ekāpi
kṣaṇikavāsaneti yāvat | ālayavijñānasaṃtānavartitvam | ālayavijñāna
paraṃparāniṣṭhatvam | śabdeti | śabdādibāhyaviṣayakāṇi pañca jñānāni sukhādyā
ntaraviṣayakamekaṃ jñānamiti militvā ṣaḍjñānāni kāraṇacatuṣṭayaṃ prāpyotpadyanta
iti svīkartavyam | caturaḥ pratyayānpratītya | caturvidhāni kāraṇāni prāpya |
anācchādya | anapalapya |

catvāraḥ pratyayāḥ | caturvidhāni kāraṇāni | tatra jñāneti | sākāraṃ
cittaṃ jñānapadavācyam | tasya cākāragrahaṇaśaktireva bodharūpatā | yathā pūrva
kṣaṇikāddhaṭāttatsadṛśo ghaṭa uttarakṣaṇa utpadyate tathā pūrvakṣaṇikādākāragra
haṇasamarthājjñānāttatsadṛśamuttarakṣaṇe jñānamutpadyate | soyaṃ jñānapravāhonādiḥ |
ākāraśca dvividhohamākāra idamākāraśca | tatrādyaḥ pūrvakṣaṇikājjñānājjā
yate | na tatra kāraṇāntarāpekṣā | sa cānādiḥ sārvadika ekarūpaśca | ayaṃ
ghaṭa ityādipravṛttivijñānaṃ yadā jāyate tadāpyahamākāro vartata eva | dvitīya
idamākārastu kādācitkota eva kāraṇāntarasāpekṣaḥ sādirbhinnabhinnarū
paśca | jñāne svākārasadṛśākārasamarpakaḥ śabdasparśādiranekavidho viṣayasta
ttadākārātmakapravṛttijñānasya kāraṇam | viṣaya evālambanapratyaya ityucyate |
pravṛttivijñānasya viṣayālambanatvāt | uttarakṣaṇikajñāne ākāragrahaṇa
sāmarthyaṃ dadatpūrvakṣaṇikaṃ jñānaṃ samanantarapratyaya ityucyate | jñāne vaiśadyaṃ
dadadālokaḥ sahakāripratyaya ityucyate | manaḥsaṃyogādikaṃ sahakāryeva | indriya
madhipatipratyaya ityucyate | adhipatirniyāmakaḥ | yathā cakṣurindriyaṃ hi jñāne
rūpākārameva dāpayati | rasanendriyaṃ hi rasākārameva dāpayatītyādi | evaṃ
citteti | bāhyā ghaṭādaya ivāntarā api sukhādayo viṣayā jñānādbhinnatayā
sautrāntikairaṅgīkriyante | tathā ca tatrāpi sukhānubhavakāle sukhākārasadṛśākāraṃ
yatsukhānubhavarūpaṃ pravṛttivijñānaṃ tasya catvāri kāraṇāni bhavanti | rūpavijñā
neti | bhūtavyatiriktānyamūrtāni tattvāni skandhaśabdenocyante | rūpādiṣu
pañcasu skandheṣu dvitīyo vijñānaskandhaścittam | itare catvāraḥ skandhāścaittāḥ |
vijñānaṃ dvividham | ālayavijñānaṃ pravṛttivijñānaṃ ca | ahamityākāramālayavi
jñānam | tatsantāna evātmā | idamākāraṃ pravṛttivijñānam | tacca viṣayākāra
pariṇataṃ rūpaskandhaśabdenocyate | rūpyata īdṛśamiti paricchidyate tadrūpamiti
vyutpatteḥ | rūpyatenena tadrūpamiti vyutpattyendriyāṇyapi rūpaskandhaśabde
nocyante | indriyāṇi hi caittānyeva na tu bhautikāni | vijñānaskandhasya rūpa
skandhena saha saṃbandhājjāyamāne sukhaduḥkhe vedanāskandhaḥ | sukhaduḥkhe abhautike
cittapariṇāmabhūte eva | ghaṭādināma saṃjñāskandhaḥ | ghaṭādau nāmarūpātmakāṃśadva
yamadhye rūpāṃśo bhautikaḥ | nāmāṃśastvabhautikaścaitta eva | rāgadveṣādayaḥ saṃskāra
skandhaśabdenocyante | tepyabhautikāścaittā eva |

tadidaṃ sarvamiti | idaṃ sarvaṃ vastujātaṃ duḥkhasādhanatvādduḥkhāyatanamityupaca
ryate | duḥkhāyatanatvācca duḥkhamityupacaryate | tattvajñānamiti | tattvānāṃ duḥkha
samudāyanirodhamārgarūpāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ tattvānāṃ yāthārthyena jñānamityarthaḥ | samudāya
iti | duḥkhakāraṇasya samudāya iti pāribhāṣikī saṃjñā | taddvividhamiti |
pratyayopanibandhato hetūpanibandhataśca kāryotpatterdṛśyamānatvātsamudāyo dvividha
ityarthaḥ | aṅkurādi kāryaṃ hi mṛjjalabījādikāraṇasamudāyājjāyamānaṃ dṛśyate | na
tatra kaścittadanyaścetano dṛśyate | ataśca kāraṇasamudāyasvabhāvata eva kāryotpattiḥ |
ayaṃ pratyayopanibandhanaḥ kāryotpādaḥ | pratyayaḥ kāraṇasamavāyaḥ | tadupanibandhana
stanmātramūlaka ityarthaḥ | tathāṅkurātkāṇḍaṃ kāṇḍānnāla ityādikrameṇa yaḥ
kāryotpādo dṛśyate tatrāpi cetanasya kasyacidadarśanāttattatkāraṇasvabhāvata eva
kāryotpādaḥ | ayaṃ hetūpanibandhana ityucyate | hetuḥ kāraṇaṃ tanmātramūlaka
ityarthaḥ | idaṃ kāryamiti | sūtrasthedaṃpadena kāryajātasya parāmarśaḥ |
tanmātrasya phalamityanenānvayaḥ | kāryajātaṃ kāraṇasamavāyamātraphalamityarthaḥ |
pratyayanti gacchantīti | hetvantaramiti śeṣaḥ | kāraṇāntareṇa samavetā
bhavantīti yāvat | ayamānānāmiti | kāraṇāntareṇa saha militānāmi
tyarthaḥ | dhātūnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ samavāyāditi | atra cāhamīdṛśaṃ kāryaṃ karomī
tyevaṃ na jñānaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnām | nāpi ca tattatkāryasya jñānamahamanenotpādita
miti | tathā ca kāryakāraṇeṣu caitanyasyābhāvādanyasya ca cetanasyādarśanātkāryaṃ
kāraṇasamavāyamātrasya phalamiti niścīyata iti bhāvaḥ | utpādādveti |
yasminsati yadutpadyate ityanvaya utpādādityanena sūcitaḥ | yasminnasati
yannotpadyate iti vyatirekonutpādādityanena sūcitaḥ | vāśabdaḥ samuccaye |
dharmāṇāṃ kāryakāraṇānāṃ dharmatā kāryakāraṇabhāvonvayavyatirekābhyāṃ sthita eve
tyarthaḥ | na cātreti | ahamaṅkuramutpādayāmītyevaṃ na jñānaṃ bījasya | tathāhaṃ
bījenotpādita ityevaṃ na jñānamaṅkurasya | etena tatra cetanakāraṇatvavādinaḥ
parāstāḥ | yeṣāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo dṛśyate na teṣāṃ caitanyam | yasya ca caitanyamī
śvarāderna sa tatra kāryaṃ kurvannupalabhyate | etena kṣityaṅkurādi sakartṛkaṃ kāryatvāddhaṭa —
vadityādyanumāneneśvaraṃ sādhayanto nirastā veditavyāḥ | hetoraprayojakatvāt |
evamādhyātmikeṣvapīti | tatra pratyayopanibandho yathā — pṛthivyaptejovāyvā
kāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyādbhavati kāyaḥ | tatra pṛthivīdhātuḥ kāyasya
kāṭhinyaṃ nirvartayati | abdhātuḥ kāyaṃ snehayati | tejodhātuḥ kāyasyāśitapīte
paripācayati | vāyudhātuḥ kāyasya śvāsādikaṃ karoti | ākāśadhātuḥ kāya
syāntaḥ suṣirabhāvaṃ karoti | vijñānadhāturnāmarūpādi nirvartayati | ādhyātmi
keṣu hetūpanibandho yathā — kṣaṇikeṣu sthiratvabhrāntiravidyā | tādṛśāvidyātaḥ
saṃskāraḥ | sa ca viṣayaprītyādyātmakaḥ | saṃskārādgarbhasthasyāhamityālayavijñānam |
tasmānnāma | nāmapadena nāmāśrayaṃ śarīrakāraṇībhūtaṃ pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayamucyate |
tasmāccharīram | tasmādindriyajātam | tato viṣayasaṃbandhaḥ | tataḥ sukhādikā
vedanā | tato viṣayatṛṣṇā | tataḥ pravṛttiḥ | tato dharmādharmau | tato garbhavāsa
ityādi | bāhyeṣvivādhyātmikeṣvapi kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇānāṃ ca jñānābhāvaḥ samāna
eva | soyaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dṛṣṭatvānnānyathayitavyaḥ | pratītya prāpya | samutpādaḥ
samutpattiḥ | kāraṇasvabhāvādeva kāraṇaṃ prāpya kāryasyotpattirbhavati nānyaścetanaḥ
kāraṇatvena tatrāśrayitavya iti | puraḥ sthita iti |

puraḥ sthite prameyābdhau granthavistarabhīrubhiḥ |
vistāraṃ saṃparityajya diṅmātramupadarśyatām ||
iti nyāyaḥ | tadubhayeti | duḥkhaṃ tatkāraṇaṃ cetyarthaḥ | tannirodheti | duḥkha
tatkāraṇetyubhayanirodhetyarthaḥ | sūtrasyāntaṃ pṛcchatāmiti | buddhena hi prathamataḥ
sarvaṃ śūnyamityupadiṣṭam | tato vijñānavādibhirjagadāndhyaprasaṅgāpādanapūrvakaṃ
sarvaśūnyatvāsaṃbhave pṛṣṭestunāmeti jñānamātrāstitvaṃ svīkṛtam | tato bāhyārtha
mantareṇa kathaṃ jñānamityāśaṅkite bāhyārthāstitvaṃ svīkṛtam | evaṃ kiyatparyantaṃ
sūtrasyānto bhaviṣyatīti yaiḥ pṛṣṭaṃ te sautrāntikāḥ saṃjātāḥ | sūtrāntaṃ pṛcchati
sautrāntikaḥ | pṛcchatau susnātādibhya iti ṭhak pratyayaḥ |

kecana bauddhā iti | vaibhāṣikākhyayā khyātā ityatrānvayaḥ | vineyān |
śiṣyān | vītyupasargapūrvakasya nīdhātoḥ śikṣaṇamarthaḥ | ete śiṣyā mādhyamikāḥ |
dvitīyāniti | ete vijñānavādino yogācārā iti prasiddhāḥ | tṛtīyā
niti | ete sautrāntikāḥ | ubhayam | bāhyamāntaraṃ ca | vijñeyānumeyatva
vāde | sautrāntikamate | vyāptisaṃvedaneti | yatra dhūmastatrāgniriti vyāptā
vucyamānāyāṃ kathamiyaṃ jñātuṃ śakyetyāśaṅkā mahānasodāharaṇena nirākriyate |
mahānase hi dhūmāgnyoḥ pratyakṣajñānena vyāptiḥ sugṛhītā bhavati | ato mahānasaṃ
vyāptisaṃvedanasthānam | sautrāntikamate tu kvāpyarthasya pratyakṣajñānābhāvena vyāpti
jñānāsaṃbhava iti bhāvaḥ | artho dvividha iti | indriyasaṃyogānantaraṃ sadya
evedaṃ kiṃcidityevaṃ nirvikalpakajñāne viṣayībhūto devadattādirartho grāhya ityu
cyate | sa eva paścājjātyādiviśiṣṭatayā brāhmaṇoyaṃ śyāmoyaṃ pācakoyaṃ ḍitthoyami
tyevaṃ savikalpakajñāne viṣayībhūtodhyavaseya ityucyate | nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ grahaṇam |
savikalpakaṃ jñānamadhyavasāyaḥ | kalpanāpoḍhatvāditi | kalpanārahitatvādi
tyarthaḥ | kalpanājñānatvāditi | yathā vastutaḥ śuktau satyāṃ tatredaṃ rajatamiti
jñānaṃ kalpitarajatatvaviśiṣṭatvānna pramāṇaṃ tathā jātyādīnāṃ kalpitatvāttadviśiṣṭaṃ
jñānaṃ na pramāṇam | kalpitatvamevāsatyatve tantramiti bauddhā manyante | tatra
ḍitthādayaḥ saṃjñā na vastutantrāḥ kiṃ tu puruṣatantrā ataḥ kalpitā eveti sarvaira
nubhūyata eva | guṇakriyayorapi yāvadāśrayasthitisaṃbandhitvābhāvena vastutantratvaṃ
nāstīti kalpitatvameva svīkāryam | jātirapi na vastubhūtā kiṃ tvatadvyā
vṛttyātmikā tucchaiva | yato ghaṭatvaṃ ghaṭetarabheda eva | ataḥ sāpi kalpitaiveti |
kalpanāpoḍhamiti | abhrāntaṃ satyam | pramāṇamiti yāvat | vikalpaḥ savi
kalpakajñānam | saṃvādaḥ sarveṣāmaikamatyena jñānam | upaplavo bhramaḥ | apramāṇa
miti yāvat | nirvikalpakaṃ pratyakṣajñānaṃ kalpanārahitatvātpramāṇam | savikalpakaṃ
pratyakṣajñānaṃ tu na pramāṇam | yatastatra kalpitena jātyādirūpeṇedṛśaṃ tādṛśamityevaṃ
vastu nirbhāsyate | kalpitatvādeva ca na tatra sarveṣāmaikamatyamityarthaḥ | grāhya
miti | grāhyaṃ nirvikalpakajñānaviṣayībhūtaṃ yattadeva vastu satyam | hi yato
grahaṇaṃ nirvikalpakajñānameva pramāṇam | ito grāhyādgrahaṇācca yadanyathānyat
grāhyādanyatsavikalpakajñānaviṣayībhūtamadhyavaseyaṃ tanna vastu kiṃ tu tuccham |
tathā grahaṇādyadanyatsavikalpakajñānamadhyavasāyātmakaṃ tanna mānam | na pramāṇam |
tacca savikalpakajñānaṃ śabdajaṃ liṅgajamindriyādijaṃ ca | śabdajaṃ śābdaṃ jñānam |
asmadgrāme nadītīre pañca phalāni santīti śabdaṃ śrutvā śrotānyatra pūrvadṛṣṭanadī
sadṛśākārāṃ tatra nadīṃ kalpayati | tasyāśca nikaṭe pūrvadṛṣṭatīrasadṛśākāraṃ tīraṃ
kalpayati | tatra ca tādṛśāni phalāni kalpayatītyevamanugatākārāvagāhi śābdaṃ
jñānaṃ kalpitaviṣayakatvānna pramāṇam | līnamarthaṃ gamayati talliṅgaṃ dhūmādikam |
tajjaṃ jñānamanumitiḥ | parvate dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahānasādau pūrvadṛṣṭāgnisadṛśākāramagniṃ
tatra kalpayati | ata etadapi pūrvavatkalpitaviṣayakatvānna pramāṇam | indriyajaṃ
savikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ kalpitaviṣayakatvānna pramāṇamityanupadamevoktam | ādi
padenopamānādijñānasaṃgrahaḥ | arthaprāptiḥ saṃvādaśceti | yathā śuktau rajata
bhrameṇa pravṛttasya rajataprāptirna bhavati | tathā satyarajatasthalepīdaṃ rajatamiti
savikalpakajñānasyāprāmāṇye rajataprāptirna bhāvyā | sā tu dṛśyate | kiṃ ca
tādṛśarajataviṣaye na kasyāpi vivādaḥ | kiṃ tu sarveṣāṃ saṃvāda eva | saṃvāda
aikamatyam | tathā ca tatra rajatasya vastutvaṃ tajjñānasya prāmāṇyaṃ cāṅgīkāryameveti
śaṅkāśayaḥ | maṇiprabheti | yathā maṇiprabhāyāmayaṃ maṇiriti bhrameṇa pravṛttasya
prabhādvārā maṇiprāptirbhavati tathā satyarajatasthale idaṃ rajatamiti savikalpakena
bhramajñānena pravṛttasya tādṛśarajatadvārā satyavastuprāptirbhaviṣyatīti bhāvaḥ |
na ca vineyeti | vineyāḥ śiṣyāḥ | śiṣyāṇāṃ buddhitāratamyepi gurorupadeśa
ekarūpa eva yukta ityāśayaḥ | deśanā iti | upadeśabhedena hi tattvabhedo na
śaṅkanīyaḥ | kiṃ tu mārgabhedaḥ | tattvaṃ tu śūnyatārūpamekameva | hīnamadhyamotkṛṣṭa
dhiyo hi śiṣyā bhavanti | tatra ye hīnamataya ekapade śūnyatātattvaṃ jñātumasama
rthāste sarvāstitvavādena tadāśayānurodhācchūnyatāyāmavatāryante | ye tu madhya
māste jñānamātrāstitvena śūnyatāyāmavatāryante | ye tu prakṛṣṭamatayastebhyaḥ sākṣā
deva śūnyatātattvaṃ pratipādyate | deśanā upadeśāḥ | sattvānāṃ prāṇināmāśayādhī
nāstadanusāriṇo lokanāthānāṃ sanmārgapradarśakānāmupadeśā upāyānāṃ mārgāṇāṃ
bahutvādbhidyante | deśanā ca kvacidgambhīrā gūḍhārthā kvaciduttānā spaṣṭārthā
kvacidaṃśabhedenobhayarūpeti bhinnā bhavati | advayalakṣaṇā śūnyatā tvabhinnaiva |
ekarūpaṃ śūnyatātattvaṃ tu na bhidyata evetyarthaḥ |

jñānendriyāṇīti | indriyāṇāṃ pūjanaṃ cāpratiṣiddhatattadyogyaviṣayasevana
dvārā bodhyam | āryasatyākhyayeti | āryasattveti pāṭhāntaram ||

div.head: || athārhatadarśanam || 3 ||
div.p:
muktakacchānām | kaccharahitānāṃ bauddhānām | vivasanāḥ | vastrarahitā
digambarāḥ jaināḥ | pūrvāpareti | yathā dinasya pūrvo bhāgaḥ pūrvāhṇoparo
bhāgoparāhṇa ityevaṃ pūrvāparabhāgakalpanā bhavati tādṛśī sarvato nyūne kālāṃśe
na vaktuṃ śakyate | tathā ca pūrvāparabhāgarahitā yā kālakalā kālasya sūrkṣmo
śastanmātre yāvasthitistadrūpā kṣaṇikatārhadbhirjainairna svīkartuṃ śakyā | parīkṣakaiḥ |
satyānveṣibhiḥ |

śaṅkate — atha manyethā ityādinā kiṃ na paśyasītītyantena | pramā
ṇavattvāditi | ayogyamiti bhāsamānamapi pramāṇasiddhaṃ cedavaśyaṃ svīkārya
meveti nyāyatātparyam | tathā ca yatsattatkṣaṇikamiti prāguktānumānasiddhaṃ
kṣaṇikatvamanubhavānārūḍhamapi na tyaktuṃ śakyamityarthaḥ | prācīnaḥ pratyayaḥ |
pūrvakṣaṇika ātmā | pratyayo jñānam | jñānarūpa eva cātmā bauddhadarśane |
kṣaṇikānāmātmanāṃ saṃtānaṃ ca prativyakti bhinnam | tathā ca devadattīya
saṃtānaghaṭakena pūrvakṣaṇikena kenacidātmanā kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ tatsaṃtāna
vartinaiva kenaciduttarakṣaṇikenātmanopabhujyate | nanvevamanyena kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ
phalamanyenopabhujyate cetsaṃtānāntaravartināpyātmanopabhujyeta | tathā ca devadatta
kṛtakarmaphalopabhogo yajñadattasyāpi prāpnoti | tadevāśaṅkate — na cātiprasaṅga
iti | uttarayati — kāryakāraṇabhāvasyeti | ekasminneva saṃtāne tattatpūrva
kṣaṇikārthasya svasvottarakṣaṇikārthaṃ prati kāraṇatvamiti devadattīyasaṃtānaghaṭaka
syātmano yajñadattīyasaṃtānaghaṭakenātmanā saha kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāvena nokta
doṣa iti bhāvaḥ | yathā madhureti | halādinā vibhedanena śithilīkṛtāyāṃ
bhūmau nihitādbījādaṅkurakāṇḍādidvārā phalotpattirbhavati | tathā ca bījaṃ
paraṃparayā phalasya kāraṇam | tatrāmrabījaṃ yadi madhurarasena saṃskṛtaṃ cettasmātparaṃ
parayotpadyamānaṃ phalaṃ madhurarasayuktamutpadyate tadvat |

uttarayati — tadapīti | kāśakuśeti | kāśaḥ kuśaśca tṛṇaviśeṣaḥ | yathā
jale nimajjataḥ kāśādyālambanenoddhāro na saṃbhavati kāśādīnāmatilaghutvāt
tathātmanaḥ kṣaṇikatve svakṛtakarmaphalopabhogāsaṃbhava iti doṣasāgare nimajjataḥ
kṣaṇikavādino bauddhasyoddhāro na saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ | āmrabījādidṛṣṭāntaścāna
nurūpaḥ | na hi tatra bījādau kāraṇe vidyamānasya mādhuryasya raktimno vā
paraṃparayā tatkārye saṃkramaḥ | kiṃ tu madhurāṇāṃ raktānāṃ ca bījādyaṃśānāmeva
kārye saṃkramaḥ | kāraṇaṃ hi kāryānvayi | tathā cāṅkurādikāryānvayināṃ bījā
dyantargatānāmaṃśānāmevāṅkurādikāraṇatvaṃ na samagrasya bījasya | bījamaṅkurādi
kāraṇamiti vyavahārastu bhāktaḥ | kāryotpādanavelāyāṃ kāraṇībhūtānāṃ bījāṃ
śānāṃ sthiterbījasthityadhīnatvadarśanāt | tathā ca ye bījādyaṃśā madhurarasabhāvitā
lākṣārasāvasiktā vā ta eva kāryānvayino madhurā raktāścānubhūyante | evaṃ
cānyatra jātasya saṃskārasya phalamanyatra dṛśyata ityetadviṣaye na kopi dṛṣṭānta
iti | anena pramāṇeneti | anumānapramāṇenetyarthaḥ | pramāṇāntareṇa |
pratyakṣādinā | bhavadabhimatasyeti | saṃsārasya kṣaṇabhaṅguratvaṃ vadanti sādhavaḥ |
tatra kṣaṇaśabdo nyūnakālopalakṣakaḥ | naiyāyikāśca jīvaniṣṭhānāṃ jñānādiguṇānāṃ
śabdasya ca kṣaṇikatvamicchanti | tatra kṣaṇikatvaṃ kṣaṇatrayasaṃbandhitvam | utpatti
sthitilayārthaṃ nāntarīyakatayā vastunaḥ kṣaṇatrayasaṃbandhāvaśyaṃbhāvāt | bauddhā
bhimataṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ tvekakṣaṇamātrasaṃbandhitvam | tādṛśaṃ tu na kvāpi saṃdṛśyate |
kṣaṇaśabdārthastu yadapekṣayā nyūnaḥ kālāṃśo nāsti tādṛśo nyūnatāyāśca
ramāvadhibhūtaḥ kālāṃśaḥ | nimeṣaparyantaṃ nyūnaḥ kālāṃśonubhūyate | tadape
kṣayāpyayaṃ nyūnaḥ kṣaṇo na kadāpyanubhūyate | yata ekasminnimeṣepi kṣaṇa
catuṣṭayaṃ bhavati | 1 pakṣmacalanarūpā kriyā | 2 kriyātaḥ pūrvadeśavibhāgaḥ |
3 pūrvasaṃyoganāśaḥ | 4 uttarasaṃyogotpattiśceti | kṣaṇasyānanubhavādeva kriyādi
saṃyogāntānāmuktānāṃ caturṇāṃ yaugapadyābhimāno dṛśyata etaccatuṣṭayaṃ yugapajjāta
miti | evaṃ ca kṣaṇatvena kālaparicchedasyātyantāśakyatayā bauddhābhimataṃ kṣaṇi
katvaṃ na kvacidapi dṛṣṭacaraṃ bhavati | pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭacaram | bhūtapūrve caraṭ
pā. sū. 5 | 3 | 53 iti sūtreṇa caraṭpratyayaḥ | jaladharo yadyapi kadācitprati
kṣaṇaṃ navo navo dṛśyate tathāpi tatra kṣaṇaśabdo nimeṣādikālopalakṣakaḥ |
nimeṣāpekṣayāpi nyūnasya mukhyasya kṣaṇaśabdārthasya kenāpyanākalanāt | tenaiva
nyāyeneti | yadyananubhūyamānamapi jaladharakṣaṇikatvaṃ pratyakṣata eva jñāyata iti
bauddho vaiyātyena brūyāttarhi ghaṭādiṣvapi tathaiveti kimarthaṃ yatsattatkṣaṇikamityanu
mānaparyantamanudhāvanam | atha sarvaṃ kṣaṇikamiti buddhamunerupadeśāccettadapi ghaṭā
diṣu samameva | tathā ca kṣaṇikatvānumānaṃ vyarthamiti bhāvaḥ | sattvānumāneti |
sattvahetukaṃ kṣaṇikatvānumānamityarthaḥ | atha vā sattvasyānumānamityevārthaḥ |
yenārthakriyākāritvarūpasattvena kṣaṇikatvaṃ sādhyate tādṛśaṃ sattvaṃ ghaṭādiṣu pratikṣaṇaṃ
na pratyakṣatonubhūyata iti tadapi pūrvamanumeyam | tacca prāgupadarśitada. 2 paṃ.
52, 118meva | tathā ca kṣaṇikatvānumānārthaṃ yadbauddhābhimatasya sattvasyānumānaṃ
tatkṣaṇikatvasya pramāṇāntarasiddhatve vyarthaṃ syāt | mithyāsarpeti | śaṅkāviṣā
dinimittamaraṇādikāryopalabdheḥ | yadyapi śaṅkā svarūpeṇa satyaiva tathāpi viṣarū
paviṣayasahitatvenāsatyaiva | tādṛśyā api maraṇādyarthakriyākāritvena bauddhamate
sattvāpattirityarthaḥ | utpādeti | utpattilayasthitiyuktaṃ sadityarthaḥ | sāma
rthyeti | kusūlanihitaṃ bhūmāvuptaṃ ca bījaṃ yadyekameva tarhi tatrāṅkurotpādana
sāmarthyamasti na vā | ādye kusūlanihitādapyaṅkurotpattiḥ syāt | sahakāryapekṣātu
prāgeva da. 2 paṃ. 70 nirastā | antye bhūmāvuptādapi na syāt | sāmarthya
masāmarthyaṃ ceti dvayamekatra viruddham | ato'gatyā kṣaṇikatvaṃ svīkāryamiti
kṣaṇikatvasiddhiriti bauddhāśayaḥ | syādvādināmiti | syādvādino jaināḥ |
te hi ghaṭostīti sāṃkhyādibhirukte syādastīti vadanti | tathā mādhyamikairghaṭo
nāstītyukte syānnāstīti vadanti | syādityanekāntadyotakamavyayam | anekānto'
niścayaḥ | yadi ghaṭostyeva tarhi kathaṃ śvetaghaṭasattve rakto ghaṭo nāsti, alpaghaṭasattve
mahānghaṭo nāsti ekaghaṭasattve ghaṭadvayaṃ nāstītyevaṃ prayogāḥ | ghaṭe raktimā
nāsti mahattvaṃ nāsti dvitvaṃ ca nāstītyevameva prayujyatām | atha yadi nāstyeva
tarhi kathaṃ ghaṭostīti prayogaḥ | tathā ca prayogadvayanirvāhāya ghaṭādāvastitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ
cāvirodhena yugapadevāstītyāstheyam | tathā ca sāmarthyāsāmarthyayorapyekatrāvirodha
iti bījādeḥ kṣaṇikatvaṃ na sidhyati | yukteranukteriti | na hi dṛṣṭānta
mātreṇa kaścidapyarthaḥ sidhyati | mahānase dhūmāgnyoḥ pratyakṣepi — dhūmavati kuto
vāgnerāvaśyakatvam ityāśaṅkāyāṃ dhūmāgnyoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvarūpayuktipradarśanena
niḥsāritāyāmeva parvate dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvāgniranumātuṃ śakyate nānyathā | tarhi kārpā
sādau kā yuktiriti cettatrāha — tatrāpīti | bauddhā niranvayanāśamicchanti |
tanna | nāśasya sarvatra sānvayatvāt | ghaṭe naṣṭe kharparādi dṛśyate | tasminnaṣṭe cūrṇaṃ
dṛśyate | paṭe dagdhe rakṣā dṛśyate | taptāyasi patitasyodabindorvināśe tasyānva
yombudhāvanumeyaḥ | taduktam —

udabindau ca sindhau ca toyabhāvo na bhidyate |
nirastepi tato bindāvasti tasyānvayombudhau || iti |
tathā ca kāryānvayayogyeṣu kārpāsabījāvayaveṣu lākṣārasāvasekasteṣvevāva
yaveṣu phalaparyantamanviteṣu raktimeti | evaṃ cānyatra saṃskāronyatra tatphala
mityatra dṛṣṭāntābhāva iti kāraṇātmani karma kāryātmani tatphalopabhoga iti
bauddhāmimataṃ na sidhyati | na ca saṃtānīti | yathā puṣpamālāyāṃ puṣpātiriktaḥ
sakalapuṣpānugatastanturdṛśyate tathā saṃtāninaḥ kramotpannā ya ātmānastadatiriktaḥ
saṃtāno yadi kaścidanyaḥ syāttarhyeka eva sa saṃtānaḥ karmakartā phalabhoktā ceti
vaktuṃ śakyeta | na tu tathāstītyāśayaḥ | pratyāsannāḥ | avyavahitāḥ | kārya
kāraṇabhāvasya niyāmakatvādityuktaṃ dūṣayati — na ceti | upādhyāyabuddhīti |
upādhyāyabuddhisaṃtāne kramotpannāḥ kṣaṇikā anekā buddhayaḥ | tāsu madhye śiṣyo
padeśakālikakṣaṇikabuddheḥ sakāśādbuddhidvayaṃ samutpannam | ekā tatraiva |
aparā śiṣye | tathā ca yathopadeśātprāgupādhyāyabuddhyanubhūtamupadeśottaratatsaṃ
tānasthopādhyāyabuddhiranusaṃdadhāti tathopadeśottaraṃ śiṣyabuddhirapi tadanusaṃda
dhīta | śiṣyabuddhyupādhyāyabuddhyoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasattvāt | tathopādhyāyabuddhisaṃ
pāditasya karmaṇaḥ phalopabhogaḥ śiṣyabuddherapi syāt | tathā copādhyāyakṛtakarmaṇa
statra phalopabhogaṃ vinā praṇāśaḥ śiṣyeṇa cākṛtasya karmaṇaḥ śiṣye phalopabhoga
iti doṣadvayāpattiḥ | bauddhamate buddhikṣaṇaparaṃparāyā evātmatvāt | kṛta
praṇaśeti | kṛtapraṇāśadoṣamakṛtakarmabhogadoṣaṃ bhavabhaṅgadoṣaṃ pramokṣabhaṅgadoṣaṃ
smṛtibhaṅgadoṣamityetānsākṣādityanubhavasiddhānupekṣyānādṛtya sākṣātkurvannapi gaja
nimīlikāmavalambamānaḥ sarvavastūnāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgamudayānantaravināśarūpakṣaṇakṣayi
tāmicchannasau paro bauddho mahāsāhasikaḥ | atyantamavimṛśyakāryakārī |
sahasā avimarśātmakena balena vartate sāhasikaḥ | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ — bauddhamate kṣaṇika
buddhiparaṃparāmātramevātmā | na tu muktāphalanikarānusyūtaikasūtravattadanvayī kaści
danyaḥ | tathā ca yena kṣaṇikajñānena karma kṛtaṃ tasya niranvayavināśānna tatphalo
pabhogaḥ | yasya ca kṣaṇikajñānasya phalopabhogastena na tatkarma kṛtam | tathā ca
karmakāriṇaḥ svakṛtakarmaphalānupabhogātkṛtapraṇāśadoṣaḥ | upabhuñjānasya ca svaya
makṛtasya parakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalopabhogādakṛtakarmabhogadoṣaḥ | tathā bhavasya
saṃsārasya bhaṅgaḥ | saṃsāro hi pūrvajanmakṛtakarmānusāreṇa bhavati | ātmanaḥ
kṣaṇikatve tu tadasaṃbhavaḥ | pramokṣabhaṅgaḥ | prakarṣeṇāpunarbhāvena karmabandhanānmuktiḥ
pramokṣaḥ | tasya bhaṅgaḥ syāt | bauddhamata ātmanaḥ sthirasyābhāvātkaḥ pretya
sukhībhavanārthaṃ yatiṣyate | ātmasaṃtānastu na vāstavaḥ kaścit | vāstavatve tu
sarvaṃ kṣaṇikamiti siddhāntahāniḥ syāt | smṛtibhaṅgaścānubhavituḥ sadyo vinā
śātsyāditi |

kiṃ ca kṣaṇikatveti | viṣayo hi jñānasya kāraṇībhūtaḥ | kāraṇaṃ ca
kāryātpūrvabhāvīti niyamaḥ | tathā ca pūrvakṣaṇiko ghaṭādirjñeyortha uttarakṣaṇi
kena jñānena gṛhyata iti vaktavyam | tacca na saṃbhavati | jñānajñeyayoryugapadasa
ttvena grāhyagrāhakabhāvāsaṃbhavāt | ālambanapratyayatveti | viṣayasya jñānaṃ pratyā
lambanakāraṇatvaṃ sautrāntikamataprastāve prāguktameva da. 2 paṃ. 276 | ākā
rārpakatveneti | kṣaṇikopi ghaṭādirviṣayaḥ svākārasadṛśākāraṃ samarpya vinaṣṭa
iti jñānakāle'sannapi jñānagrāhya ityucyate | ākārārpakatvameva hi grāhyatva
mityāśayaḥ | durvacatveneti | yadā cākārasamarpako viṣayaḥ pūrvakṣaṇo na
tadānīmākāragrāhakaṃ jñānam | yadā cottarakṣaṇa ākāragrāhakaṃ jñānaṃ na tadānī
mākārasamarpako viṣaya ityākārasamarpakatvameva vaktumaśakyamiti sākārajñānavāda
eva bauddhamate na saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ | nanu jñānānāṃ nirākāratve cākṣuṣaṃ rāsanaṃ
spārśanamityādi ṣaḍvidhamapi sarvaṃ jñānaṃ samameveti cākṣuṣasya rūpameva viṣayo
rāsanasya rasa evetyevaṃ pratiniyataviṣayavyavasthā na syāditi cettatrāha —
nirākāreti | sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ sāmyepi cakṣurindriyajaṃ jñānaṃ yogyatāvaśādrūpa
syaiva grāhakaṃ rasanendriyajanyaṃ jñānaṃ yogyatāvaśādrasasyaiva grāhakamityevaṃ vyavasthā
saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ | sākārajñānavādepi cakṣurindriyajaṃ jñānaṃ rūpasyaivākāraṃ
gṛhṇāti na rasasyetyatra yogyataiva niyāmakatvena śaraṇīkaraṇīyā | pratikarma
vyavasthāyāḥ | pratiniyataviṣayavyavasthāyāḥ | nirākārajñānavāde pratyakṣānubhavaṃ
pramāṇayati — tathā hīti | jñānecchāsukhaduḥkhādayo hyāntarā arthā āntarapratya
kṣeṇānubhūyante | tathā ca yathā darpaṇo bimbākārasadṛśākāraṃ pratibimbaṃ svasminpra
tigṛhya tadyuktonubhūyate tathā jñānaṃ ghaṭādyarthākārasadṛśākāraṃ viṣayatvena svasmi
nparigṛhya tadyuktamāntarapratyakṣeṇānubhūyeta | tathānanubhavānnirākārameva jñāna
miti bhāvaḥ | atha ghaṭajñānaṃ bhinnaṃ paṭajñānaṃ bhinnamityādivyavahārasya mukhyatve
nopapattaye jñāne bheda āśrayaṇīya iti tatra jñāne'dṛṣṭopyākāronumīyata
iti matvā sākārajñānavāde dūṣaṇāntaramāha — viṣayākāreti | yathā
chāyācitrāśraye darpaṇe mahāparvatādiralpe darpaṇe mātuṃ yogyena svākāra
sadṛśenānyenālpenākāreṇa praviśati tathā sākārajñānavādibauddhanaye parvatādi
pratyakṣajñānakāle mahānapi sa parvatādirjñānamaye citte parimātuṃ yogyena svākā
rasadṛśenānyenālpenākāreṇa praviśati | sa ca jñānamaye citte praviṣṭolpaḥ parva
tādirjñānasya viṣayībhūtortho na tu tādṛśākārasamarpako bahiṣṭhaḥ parvatādiḥ |
ato viṣayībhūtortho dūre nikaṭe dīrgha ityādivyavahārāsiddhiriti bhāvaḥ |
tathā vyavahāra iti | ākārasamarpakasya parvatāderdūratvādiviśiṣṭatayā jñānena
gṛhīte tadākārepi dūratvādyanumānena vyavahāropapattiriti śaṅkāśayaḥ | darpaṇā
dāviti | darpaṇo hi dūrasthasyāpi mahatopi ca parvatādeḥ svātmasthaṃ svasmi
nmātuṃ yogyamalpaṃ ca pratibimbaṃ gṛhṇātītyupalabhyate | tadvadeva jñānagṛhītā
kāraḥ kalpanīyaḥ syādityākāre dūratvādyanumānaṃ na saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ |
jaḍatāmapīti | anukarotītyanuṣajyate | yadi jñānaṃ yathā ghaṭagatamākāraṃ
gṛhṇāti tathā ghaṭagatāṃ jaḍatāmapi gṛhṇīyāttarhi ghaṭavajjñānamapi jaḍaṃ syāt |
tathā ca jñānasya svarūpahānireva syāt | jaḍatvaṃ hi prakāśarūpatvābhāvaḥ | tathā
ca ghaṭākāragrahaṇena jāyamāno ghaṭaprakāśo dūre | svayamapi jñānaṃ na prakāśeta |
yathā dhanasvāminādhikadravyaprāptaye kasmaicinmūladhane pradatte grahītā śaṭhaścetta
smādadhikadravyalābho dūra eva mūladhanamapi na prāpyate tadvat | mūladhanāpekṣayā
dhikaṃ prāpyamāṇaṃ dravyaṃ vṛddhiḥ | tasyāḥ | jaḍatāyāḥ | ghaṭādirjaḍa iti jñānaṃ na
syādityāśayaḥ | mā bhūditi | na hi ghaṭādigatamaprakāśasvarūpatvaṃ kasyāpi
pratyakṣaṃ bhavati | tayorbheda iti | ghaṭākārajaḍatayorbhedo vyabhicāro vā
syādityarthaḥ | ghaṭo jaḍa ityukte jaḍo nāma ghaṭāpekṣayā kaścidanyaḥ padārtha iti
na kopi pratyeti | tathā ca jaḍatā ghaṭasvarūpameva | paraṃ tu yadi ghaṭe gṛhītepi
jaḍatā na gṛhyate tarhi tau bhinnāviti saṃśayaḥ syāt | abhedaniścayo na syāt |
aparathā | agṛhītamapi gṛhītasya svarūpamevetyaṅgīkāre |

saugatī | sugato buddhaḥ | tena pradarśitā | ārhatī | jainamatapravartake
