nārhanmuninā pradarśitā | bauddhamatānusāreṇa kaścicchaṅkate — nanviti | pramā
ṇapañcakasya | pratyakṣānumānaśabdopamānārthāpattirūpasya | tautātitaiḥ | bauddhaiḥ |
sarvajña iti | anenārdhaślokena sarvajñaviṣaye pratyakṣaṃ na pramāṇamityuktam | dṛṣṭa
iti | anenārdhaślokenānumānaṃ tatra na pramāṇamityuktam | liṅgaṃ jñāpako hetuḥ |
tādṛśahetubhūtaḥ sarvajñaikabhāgo yadi dṛśyeta tarhyanumānaṃ saṃbhavet | sopi na
dṛśyata ityarthaḥ | śabdopi tatra na pramāṇamiti ślokaṣaṭkenāha — na cāgama
vidhiriti | ajñātajñāpako vidhiḥ | tādṛśo nityasarvajñabodhaka āgamo
nopalabhyate | nityasarvajñatātparyakamarthavādavākyamapyāgame nopalabhyate | na cā
nyārthapradhānairiti | anyatātparyakārthavādavākye nityasarvajñānuvādaḥ kvaci
ddṛśyeta cedapi tanmātreṇa na nityasarvajñāstitvaṃ vidhīyate | arthavādavākyenūdita
syānyataḥ prāptirahitasyāsādhakatvāt | anyairabodhanācca na siddhānuvādaḥ saṃbhavati |
anāderiti | jainamate yaḥ sādirarhanmuniḥ sa sarvajñaḥ | na tvāstikamatavadanā
dirīśvaraḥ | tādṛśasādyarhanmunipratipādaka āgamaḥ syāccetsa āgamonādiḥ
sādirvā | ādye pūrvasiddhenāgamena paścādbhāvyarhanmunirīdṛśostītyevaṃ vaktuma
śakyam | antya āgamasya sāditvena kṛtrimatvādasatyatvamiti tena kathaṃ pramā
ṇībhūtārthapratipādanaṃ syāt | atheti | arhanmunivacanenaiva sorhanmuniḥ
sarvajña iti lokairjñāyata ityapi kalpanā na saṃbhavati | anyonyāśrayadoṣagrasta
tvāt | anyonyāśrayadoṣamevāha — sarvajñoktatayeti | tena | sarvajñoktavākyena |
tadastitā | sarvajñāstitvam | ubhayam | vākyasatyatvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ca | upamāna
pramāṇena na sarvajñasiddhirityekena ślokenāha — sarvajñasadṛśamiti | arthā
pattirapi tatra na pramāṇamiti ślokadvayenāha — upadeśopīti | evamiti |
upadeśasya satyatve hyarthāpatteravasaraḥ | tadeva tu durvacam | tathā coktam —

buddhādayo hyavedajñāsteṣāṃ vedādasaṃbhavaḥ |
upadeśaḥ kṛtotastairvyāmohādeva kevalāt || iti |
tadgrahaṇeti | sakalapadārthagrahaṇasvabhāvakatvesati prakṣīṇapratibandhapratyayatvaṃ hetuḥ |
kaścidātmā | ayamevārhanmuniḥ | nanu cakṣurādīndriyāṇāṃ rūparasādi
niyatatattadbiṣayagrahaṇasvabhāvaḥ prasiddha eva | manasa ātmanaśca svābhāvike grahaṇe
yadyapi viṣayomuka eveti na niyatastathāpi pratyakṣajñāne sa viṣaya indriya
saṃbaddha eva, anumānādau tvindriyasaṃbaddhasaṃbaddha eveti na kvacidakhilārthagrahaṇa
svabhāvaḥ prasiddhaḥ | tathā coktahetuḥ svarūpāsiddha iti cettatrāha — na tāva
diti | ātmanaḥ | arhanmuneḥ | codaneti | codanā pravartanā | vidhiriti
yāvat | vidhau tāvatsarvavidhā arthā nirdiśyamānā dṛśyante | mīmāṃsakairapyevama
bhyupagatam | tatra bhūtāḥ siddhā arthā vidhyaṅgabhūtārthavādeṣu bāhulyena dṛśyante |
bhavanto vartamānakālikā yāgādyarthāḥ | tannirdeśastu vidhau prasiddha eva yajeta
svargakāma ityādau | bhaviṣyatkālikasvargasukhāptirapi tatra nirdiṣṭaiva | yāgādi
karmakartā tatphalabhoktā jīvaścātisūkṣmaḥ śarīrādinā vyavahitaśca nirdiṣṭaḥ |
viprakṛṣṭopi dūraśca svargādirartho nirdiṣṭaḥ | evameva nikhilārthaviṣayakacoda
nārhanmunipraṇīta āgame saṃdṛśyate | tathā ca tādṛśacodanābalāccodanāka
rturarhanmunernikhilārthajñānamavaśyāpekṣaṇīyam | tacca nikhilārthagrahaṇasvabhāvaṃ vinā
nopapadyata ityarhanmunestādṛśasvabhāvorthāpattipramāṇasiddhaḥ | kiṃ cārhanmuninā
sarvamanekāntātmakaṃ sattvādityanumānamuktam | anekāntātmakamaniścayātmakam |
anumānaṃ ca vyāptijñānaṃ vinā na saṃbhavatīti sarvārthaviṣayakaṃ vyāptijñānamarha
nmuneravaśyāpekṣaṇīyam | tadarthaṃ ca nikhilārthagrahaṇasvabhāvopi tasyāṅgīkārya
eveti | hetau viśeṣyāsiddhiṃ śaṅkate — na cākhilārtheti | arhanmunerakhilārtha
viṣayakajñāne na kvāpi kimapi pratibandhakaṃ bhavati | samyagdarśanasamyagjñāna
samyakcāritrarūpasya ratnatrayasya tatra sattvāt | ratnatrayasvarūpamagre 3 | 153 vakṣyate |
mudrayā | prakāreṇa | kṣudrāḥ | jainamatākṣepakāḥ |

naiyāyikamatānusāreṇānādimuktaḥ sarvajña īśvara iti manvānaḥ śaṅkate —
nanviti | āvaraṇeti | āvaraṇasya jñānapratibandhakasya prakarṣeṇa kṣayāda
khilaviṣayakaṃ vijñānamityarthaḥ | tadrahite | baddhavyapadeśarahite | asyāpi |
mukta iti vyavahārasyāpi | ākāśavaditi | yathākāśādiṣvacetaneṣu baddha
iti vyavahārābhāvānmukta ityapi vyavahāro na bhavati tadvadityarthaḥ | anādeḥ |
avijñātādeḥ | tatsādhanam | kāryatvasādhanam | ākāśādāviti |
anaikāntyaṃ vyabhicāraḥ | ākāśasya yevayavā bhāgāstatsaṃyoga ākāśe vartata
ityavayavasaṃyogitvarūpaṃ sāvayavatvaṃ kāryatvasya sādhanībhūtamākāśe vartate |
paraṃ tu naiyāyikaistatrākāśe kāryatvasyānabhyupagamātsādhyābhāvavadvṛttitvarūpavyabhi
cāragrastaḥ sāvayavatvahetuḥ | ākāśasya bhāgā eva na santīti tu na bhramita
vyam | bhāgābhāve tasya vyāpakatvāsaṃbhavāt | sāmānyādāviti | dravya
tvādi sāmānyaṃ yathā ghaṭe samavāyi tathā ghaṭāvayaveṣvapi | na hi ghaṭāvayavā
adravyabhūtā iti vaktuṃ śakyate | atha vā ghaṭatvādikaṃ sāmānyamapyavayavasamavāyi
bhavati | ghaṭatvasya ghaṭe vyāpyavṛttitvena ghaṭāvayavasamavāyasya ghaṭatva āva
śyakatvāt | na hyavayavaiḥ saha saṃbandhamantareṇa ghaṭatvādijātirghaṭasya mūlamāra
bhyāgraparyantaṃ kṛtsnaṃ ghaṭaṃ vyāpnoti | tathā ca dravyatvaghaṭatvādisāmānyevayava
samavāyitvarūpaṃ sāvayavatvaṃ vartate | paraṃ tu tatra kāryatvaṃ neṣyate naiyāyikaiḥ | ato
vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ | sādhyāviśiṣṭatvāt | sādhyasamānatvāt | yathā sādhyaṃ
kāryatvaṃ saṃdigdhatvātsādhanīyaṃ bhavati tathā tatsādhakaṃ sāvayavatvamapyavayava
janyatvarūpaṃ saṃdigdhatvātsādhanīyameva bhavati | saṃghībhūtāstantava eva paṭa ityevaṃ
paṭādau kāryevayavajanyatvasyāprāmāṇikatvāt | anyatra samavetadravyatva
miti | svasmādanyatra samavāyasaṃbandhena vidyamānatve sati dravyatvamityarthaḥ |
yathā paṭaḥ svasmādanyeṣu tantuṣu samavāyasaṃbandhena vidyamāno dravyabhūtaśca bhavati |
guṇādisamavāyavattveti | ākāśaniṣṭhānāṃ śabdādiguṇānāṃ dravyatvādi
jātīnāṃ cākāśe samavāyāt | anyaśabdārtheṣviti | paṭādanye paṭasamavā
yikāraṇabhūtāstantavonyatra samavetadravyatvamityatratyānyaśabdena grāhyāḥ | paraṃ tu teṣu
paṭādanyatvasyāprāmāṇikatvenānyatra samavetadravyatvarūpaṃ sāvayavatvaṃ sādhya
kāryatvavatsādhanīyameva syāditi bhāvaḥ | na samasti | na saṃbhavati | vedā
ntibhiriva jainairapi samavāyasyānaṅgīkārāt | sāvayavārthasaṃbandheneti |
sāvayavā ye śarīrādayorthāstaiḥ sākamātmanaḥ saṃbandhena gauṇī sāvayavatva
buddhirātmani jāyate na tu tāttvikīti nātmani vyabhicāraḥ | sādhyakāryatvā
bhāvavatyātmani sāvayavabuddhiviṣayatvarūpahetorvastuto'bhāvāt | sthapatyādīnā
miti | sthapatiḥ śilpī | sthapatiḥ kārubhedepītyamaraḥ | vaimatyam | buddhibhedaḥ |
kartāstīti | jagataḥ pratyakṣādipramāṇopalakṣyamāṇacarācararūpasya viśvasya
kaścidanirvacanīyasvarūpa īśvaraḥ kartāsti | sa caikaḥ | sa sarvagaḥ sarvavyāpī | sa
svavaśaḥ svatantraḥ | sa nityaḥ | imāsteṣāṃ naiyāyikādīnāṃ kuhevākaviḍambanāḥ
kutsitā hevākā āgrahaviśeṣāḥ | ta eva viḍambanāḥ syuḥ | vicāracāturī
bāhyatvena tiraskārarūpatvāt | he jina tvaṃ yeṣāṃ nānuśāsako na śikṣādātā |
sa caikaḥ sa sarvaga ityevaṃ pratyekaṃ tacchabdaprayogādasūyā dhvanyate | nindanīyaṃ
prati hītthaṃ vaktāro vadanti sa mūrkhaḥ sa pāpīyānsa daridra iti | tatreśvarasyai
katvaviṣaye mūla evoktam | sarvagatvādiviṣaye tūcyate | tvadabhimatasyeśvarasya
sarvavyāpitvaṃ nopapadyate | sarvavyāpitve tadīyenaiva dehena jagato vyāptatvādita
ranirmeyapadārthānāmāśrayānavakāśaprasaṅgāt | kiṃ ceśvarasya sarvavyāpitve narakā
disthaleṣvapi tasya vṛttiḥ prasajyate | tatheśvarasya svātantryamapi na kṣodakṣamam |
tasya svatantratve tasya kāruṇikatvātsukhitameva prāṇijātaṃ ghaṭayenna tu kvāpi
duḥkhitam | yadi tattatprāṇikṛtaśubhāśubhakarmapreritaḥ saṃstathā karotīti cettarhi
svātantryāya datto jalāñjaliḥ | kiṃ ceśvarasya karmāpekṣatva īśvarasya sarveśvaratvaṃ
na syāt | karmaṇāmīśvaraniyāmyatvābhāvāt | tatheśvarasya jagatkarturnityatvamapi
nopapadyate | jagannirmāṇamīśvarasya svabhāvaścetpralayābhāvaḥ syāt | saṃhāraḥ svabhā
vaścejjagadutpattisthityorasaṃbhavaḥ | ubhayasvabhāvatvaṃ virodhādasamañjasam | kāla
bhedena svabhāvabhedaścedanityatvameva syāditi | karteti | veti tatpūrvaślokoktā
tpakṣāntare | atha veha yathecchayā jagataḥ kartā kopi na tāvaddṛṣṭaḥ | adṛṣṭopi
kalpyata iti cetpratyakṣotpanneṣu kaṭādiṣvapi sa eva kartā kalpyeta | api ca
takṣakādyaiḥ kaṭādikartṛbhirbhavataḥ kiṃ kāryam | yataḥ sa eveśvaraḥ sākṣādeva tribhuvanaṃ
kuryādityarthaḥ | kāraṇatritayam | samyagdarśanasamyagjñānasamyakcāritrarūpam |
bījāṅkureti | na hi yoṅkuro yasmādbījādutpadyate tadbījaṃ tasmādaṅkurādevo
tpadyate | kiṃ tvanyasmādaṅkurāt | sa cāṅkuronyasmādeva bījādityanyonyāśrayasya
prasaṅga eva nāsti | kiṃ tu tatrādau bījamatha vādāvaṅkura iti jñātumaśakyatvādaga
tyā anāditvaṃ svīkriyate tathaivātra bodhyam |

arhaditi | arhatārhanmuninā kṛtāni yāni pravacanāni teṣāṃ saṃgrahaḥ paramā
gamasāranāmake granthe kṛtaḥ | tatraitannirūpitamityarthaḥ | saṃgraho nāma —

vistareṇopadiṣṭānāmarthānāṃ tattvasiddhaye |
samāsenābhidhānaṃ yatsaṃgrahaṃ taṃ vidurbudhāḥ || iti |
samyagiti | samyagdarśanasamyagjñānasamyakcāritrāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ militānāṃ
kāraṇatvaṃ daṇḍacakrādīnāmiva ghaṭasya | na tu tṛṇāraṇimaṇīnāṃ vahneriva |
kāraṇatāvacchedakaṃ tu na militatvam | kiṃ tu daṇḍatvādivatpratyekavṛtti samyagdarśa
natvādikameva | śraddhānaṃ śraddhā | bhāve lyuṭ | ātmasvarūpam | ātmasva
bhāvaḥ | vyākhyāneti | vyākhyānādirūpo yo gurūpadeśastajjanitamityarthaḥ |

dvitīyaṃ ratnaṃ samyagjñānaṃ lakṣayati — yeneti | moho mithyājñānam | saṃśayo
nekakoṭikaṃ jñānam | jñānāvaraṇeti | atra vyācakṣate — jñānāvaraṇaṃ jñānaprati
bandhakam | tattrividhaṃ — manogatamindriyagataṃ viṣayagataṃ ca | mātsaryādikamādyam |
kācakāmalādikaṃ dvitīyam | kāco netrarogaḥ kācabindu iti pra. | sūkṣma
tvāndhakāravyāpṛtatvādikaṃ tṛtīyam | āvaraṇasya sarvathā nāśaḥ kṣayaḥ | vidya
mānasyaivāvaraṇasyānudbhūtāvasthopaśamaḥ | tatra jñānāvaraṇasya kṣaya upaśame vā
ghaṭādipratyakṣātpūrvaṃ yatprathamato jñānaṃ mananātmakaṃ bhavati sā matiḥ | mananā
nmatiḥ | idaṃ ca mananaṃ cakṣurādīndriyānapekṣayaiva jāyamānātsmaraṇātmaka
viṣayacintanādanyadeva | yathā nāṭakādyavalokane javanikāpasāraṇāvyavahita
pūrvakāle kiṃ pātramāgacchatītyautsukyena prekṣakāṇāṃ javanikāpradeśe manovyāpāra
pūrvikā dṛṣṭiḥ saṃlagnā bhavati tādṛśaṃ jñānam | etaddṛṣṭāntenācintitākasmika
viṣayāvalokanasthalepi prathamakṣaṇe matijñānamastītyanumeyam | bālānāṃ tu
ṣaṇmāsaparyantaṃ prāyaśo na matijñānam | tāvatparyantaṃ dṛṣṭisthairyābhāvāt | dṛṣṭi
sthairyameva matijñānānumāpakam | tato matijñānajanyaṃ yatspaṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ tacchrutam |
idameva nirvikalpakaśabdena naiyāyikā vyapadiśanti | idamindriyajanyatvātsvayaṃ
pratyakṣamapyatīndriyam | indriyajanyajñānaviṣayībhūtaṃ na bhavati | ataḥ śrutamiti
kathyate | tatovacchinno maryādito viṣayo yasya tādṛśamidamīdaśamityākārakaṃ
jñānamavadhiḥ | avadhīyate dravyakṣetrakālabhāvaiḥ paricchidyate viṣayonenetyavadhiḥ |
ava samantāddravyādibhiḥ parimitatvena dhīyate dhriyate viṣayoneneti vā |
atha vādhastādbahutaraviṣayagrahaṇādavadhiḥ | devāḥ khalvavadhijñānena saptamanaraka
paryantaṃ paśyanti | upari tu stokaṃ nijavimānadaṇḍaparyantameva | asyāvadhi
jñānasya naiyāyikādidarśane savikalpakaśabdena vyavahāraḥ | īrṣyādayo yentarāyā
manogatā jñānapratibandhakībhūtā vighnāsteṣāṃ samyagdarśanena kṣaya upaśame vā
sarveṣāṃ manasāṃ mitho bhedapratibhāsābhāvena paramanogatopyartho yajjñāyate
tajjñānaṃ manaḥparyāyasaṃjñakam | manaḥśabdena manogatortho lakṣyate | tasya paryāyaḥ
paryayaṇaṃ manontareṣu parigamanaṃ bhavatītyato manaḥparyāya ityucyate | idamanyai
ralaukikapratyakṣamiti gīyate | samyakcāritreṇa sakalānāṃ jñānapratibandhakānāṃ
sarvathā kṣaye satyanyajñānāsaṃsṛṣṭaṃ yajjñānaṃ tatkevalam | idameva mokṣasādhanībhūtaṃ
tattvajñānam | anyajñānāsaṃsṛṣṭatvenāsahāyatvātkevalamityucyata iti | vijñāna
miti | vijñānaṃ svaprakāśakamanyaprakāśakaṃ ca dīpavat | tacca vijñānaṃ yadi
bādhavarjitaṃ bhavettarhi tatpramāṇaṃ syāt | meyasya jñeyasya vastuno viniścayo yato
dvidhā bhavati tatastajjñānamapi pratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ ceti dvidhā bhavatītyarthaḥ |
antargaṇiketi | antargaṇikabhedovāntarabhedaḥ | yathā vyāvahārikaṃ pratyakṣaṃ
caturvidham | avagrahehāvāyadhāraṇābhedāt | ayaṃ puruṣa iti jñānamavagrahaḥ |
tataḥ kimayaṃ dākṣiṇātya utodīcya iti saṃśaye nūnamayaṃ dākṣiṇātya iti
jñānamīhā | idaṃ cotprekṣārūpaṃ na tu niścayaḥ | tato bhāṣādiviśeṣajñānādayaṃ
dākṣiṇātya eveti jñānamavāyaḥ | tatastasyaiva viṣayasya yatpunarjñānaṃ saṃskāra
janakaṃ jāyate sā dhāraṇā yayā kālāntare tadviṣayasmaraṇaṃ bhavatītyādi |

atha tṛtīyaṃ ratnaṃ samyakcāritrarūpaṃ lakṣayati — saṃsaraṇeti | saṃsāra
kāraṇībhūtasya karmaṇo vināśa udyukto yaḥ puruṣaḥ śraddhāvāṃstattvajñānī caādyara
tnadvayavānityarthaḥ | tasya yatpāpavināśakāraṇībhūtakriyācaraṇaṃ tatsamyakcā
ritram | sarvatheti | avadyaṃ pāpam | tatsaṃbandhānāṃ tyāgaḥ pāpaviyogakāraṇī
bhūtakriyācaraṇamityarthaḥ | ahiṃsādipañcasvahiṃsāṃ lakṣayati — na yaditi |
manuṣyapaśupakṣiyūkālikṣādayaścarāḥ | latāvṛkṣādayaḥ sthāvarāḥ | teṣāṃ jīvita
vyaparopaṇaṃ prāṇaviyojanaṃ pramādenāpi yanna bhavati tadahiṃsāvratamucyate | pramā
donavadhānatā | yadvā pramādaḥ pramattatā | asminnarthepiśabdādhyāhāro na kāryaḥ |
sūnṛtavrataṃ lakṣayati — priyamiti | priyaṃ śravaṇakāle sukhadam | pathyaṃ pariṇāme
hitakaram | tathyaṃ satyam | yadbhāṣaṇaṃ sadyaḥ sukhadaṃ pariṇāme hitakaraṃ vā na bhavati
tatsatyamapi na sūnṛtavratamucyate | asteyavrataṃ lakṣayati — anādānamiti |
parakīyaṃ dravyādikaṃ vastu dānakrayādidvārā pareṇa dattaṃ cettarhyeva gṛhṇāti,
na tvadattaṃ kathamapi gṛhṇāti tadasteyavratamucyate | yato dravyaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ bāhya
prāṇavat | tathā ca tasya haraṇena prāṇaharaṇameva bhavati | brahmacaryavrataṃ lakṣa
yati — divyeti | kāmā viṣayopabhogāḥ | te dvividhā divyā audari
kāśca | śarīrāntareṇa sevyā divyāḥ | etaccharīreṇa sevyā audarikāḥ |
udaraśabdenodarapradhānakametaccharīraṃ lakṣyate | te dvividhā api punastrividhāḥ
svayaṃkṛtāḥ pareṇa kāritāḥ saṃmatipradānena kevalamanumoditāśca | saṃkalanayā
ṣaḍvidhāḥ | te punarmanasā vācā kāyena ceti karaṇatraividhyātpratyekaṃ trividhā aṣṭāda
śabhedā bhavanti | teṣāmaṣṭādaśānāṃ tyāgopyaṣṭādaśadhā bhavati | sa eva viṣaya
bhogatyāgo brahmaśabdenocyate | tadanusāreṇa yadvartanaṃ tadbrahmacaryavratamityarthaḥ |
aparigrahavrataṃ lakṣayati — sarveti | mūrchā icchā | ‘icchā prārthanā kāmobhilāṣaḥ
kāṅkṣā gārdhyaṃ mūrchetyanarthāntaram’ iti ‘mūrchā parigrahaḥ’ ta. sū. 7 | 12
iti sūtre bhāṣyam | sarvabhāveṣu cetaneṣvacetaneṣu bāhyeṣvābhyantareṣu ca sarveṣu
dravyeṣu yā niricchatā tadevāparigrahavratam | icchā hyasatsvapi manorājyādau
kevalaṃ kalpiteṣvapi vastuṣu cittāsthairyaṃ karoti | atastattyāga āvaśyaka iti
bhāvaḥ | bhāvanābhiriti | pañcabhirbhāvanābhiḥ kramātpañcadhā bhāvitānya hiṃsā
dīni mahāvratāni lokasyāvyayaṃ paraṃ mokṣaṃ sādhayanti |

pañcānāṃ vratānāṃ pratyekaṃ bhāvanāpañcakaṃ bhinnam | tatra sūnṛtavratasya bhāvanā
pañcakaṃ pradarśayati — hāsyeti | hāsyaṃ vinodaḥ | tena hyasatyabhāṣaṇe pravṛttirdṛśyate |
tathā lobhena bhayena krodhāveśena cāsatyabhāṣaṇaṃ saṃbhavati | ato hāsyādīnāṃ caturṇāṃ
pratyākhyānenāsatyabhāṣaṇaṃ pariharet | tathāpyajñānenāsatyabhāṣaṇaṃ syādatastatparihā
rāyālocyabhāṣaṇarūpā pañcamī bhāvanā | nirantaraṃ vicārapūrvakaṃ saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ kuryāt |
etadbhāvanāpañcakena sūnṛtavrataṃ bhāvayetsādhayedityarthaḥ | ahiṃsāvrate bhāvanāpañcakaṃ
tu vāgguptiḥ manoguptiḥ īryāsamitiḥ ādānasamitiḥ ālokitapānabhojanaṃ
ceti | viṣayeṣu yendriyapravṛttistasyāḥ sakāśādātmano gopanaṃ guptiḥ | tatra
vācā guptirvāgguptiḥ | manasā guptirmanoguptiḥ | īryāsamitirādānasamitiśca
mūla evāgre sphuṭībhaviṣyati | jalamannaṃ ca samyagālocya saprāṇikaṃ parihṛtye
tarasya sevanamālokitapānabhojanam | asteyavrate tu śūnyāgāreṣu giriguhādiṣu
nivāsaḥ 1 paraistyakte sthale vasatiḥ 2 pareṣāmuparodhākaraṇam 3
ācāraśāstramārgeṇa bhaikṣaśuddhiḥ 4 paraiḥ saha mabhedaṃ tavedamityevaṃ vivāda
syābhāva — 5 śceti pañca bhāvanāḥ | brahmacaryavrate tu strīrāgakathāśravaṇatyāgaḥ
1 tanmanoharāṅganirīkṣaṇatyāgaḥ 2 pūrvaratānusmaraṇatyāgaḥ 3
śaktivardhakarasatyāgaḥ 4 svaśarīrasaṃskāratyāgaśceti pañca bhāvanāḥ | apari
grahavratamākiṃcanyavratam | tatra śrotrādīnāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ śabdādiṣu pañcasu
viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣavivarjanamityevaṃ pañca bhāvanā iti |

cidaciditi | ayamarthaḥ — paraśabdo mukhyaparyāyaḥ | mukhyaṃ tattvadvayaṃ
cidacidrūpam | tayormadhya idaṃ cididamacidityevaṃ yadvivecanaṃ pṛthakkaraṇaṃ sa
vivekaḥ | yadupādeyaṃ grahītuṃ yogyaṃ tatkurvato mokṣārthaṃ yatamānasyopādeyaṃ
svīkaraṇīyam | kurvata iti kṛtyānāṃ kartari vā pā. sū. 2 | 3 | 71 iti
kartari ṣaṣṭhī | tathā yaddheyaṃ tyaktuṃ yogyaṃ taddheyaṃ tyājyam | heyopādeye darśayati —
heyaṃ hīti | karturmokṣārthaṃ yatamānasya yadrāgadveṣamohādikaṃ tattyājyam | yatastasya
rāgādeḥ kāryamavivekitā jāyate | avivekitā avivekaḥ | upayogarūpamekaṃ
lakṣaṇaṃ cihnaṃ yasya tādṛśaṃ paraṃ jyotirātmarūpamupādeyam |

sahajeti | upayogaśabdena vivakṣitārthaparicchittilakṣaṇorthagrahaṇavyāpāro
gṛhyata iti bṛhaddravyasaṃgrahe pṛ. 1 pa. 6 uktam | sa ca vyāpāro dvividhaḥ —
jñānarūpo darśanarūpaśca | dvividhepi vyāpāre jīvātmanaḥ svābhāvikaścaitanyarūpeṇa
pariṇāmaḥ samāna eva | jīvātmano yaḥ svābhāvikaścaitanyarūpeṇa pariṇāmastadanu
vidhāyitvājjñānadarśanayoḥ | tatra pratyakṣaṃ sākāraṃ jñānam | parokṣaṃ nirākāraṃ
darśanam | asyopayogasya jīvātmalakṣaṇatvamupapādayati — sa iti | pradeśo
vayavaḥ | jīvāvayavānāṃ mitho yaḥ saṃyogaḥ sa kadāciddṛḍhaḥ kadācicchithilaḥ |
tatra phaladānonmukhasya karmaṇovayavā jīvāvayavasaṃyogaṃ śithilīkṛtyāntaḥ
praviśanti | jīvakarmaṇoravayavānāṃ mitho yanmiśraṇaṃ sa pradeśabandhaḥ | tena ca
pradeśabandhenāyaṃ jīvaḥ karmaṇā sahaikībhūto bhavati | bhedena jñātuṃ na śakyate | yathā
dugdhaṃ jalamiśritaṃ jalena sahaikībhūtaṃ pārthakyena jñātuṃ na śakyate tadvat | upayogena
tvayaṃ jīvātmā svasminmiśritebhyaḥ karmaparamāṇubhyaḥ sakāśātpārthakyena jñātuṃ
śakyate | karmapudgalānāṃ caitanyarūpeṇa pariṇāmābhāvāt | sakaleti | ātmani
karmaṇaḥ svaśakteḥ kāraṇavaśādanudbhūtirupaśamaḥ | yathā katakādi — nivaḷī
iti pra. dravyasaṃbandhājjale paṅkasyopaśamaḥ | kṣaya ātyantikī nivṛttiḥ |
yathā kācādipātrasthe meghasthe vā jale paṅkasyātyantābhāvaḥ | ubhayātmako miśraḥ
kṣayopaśama ucyate | yathā kūpasthe jale paṅkasya kṣīṇākṣīṇavṛttiḥ | dravyādinimi
ttavaśātkarmaṇāṃ phalaprāptirudayaḥ | yathā jale paṅkasyodbhūtatvam | dravyātmalābha
mātrahetukaḥ pariṇāmaḥ | upaśamaḥ prayojanamasya bhāvasyetyaupaśamiko bhāvo
jīvasyāvasthāviśeṣaḥ | evaṃ karmaṇaḥ kṣayaḥ prayojanamasyeti kṣāyiko bhāvaḥ |
evaṃ kṣāyopaśamika audayikaḥ pāriṇāmikaśca | ta ete pañca bhāvā jīvaparyāya
vivakṣāyāṃ jīvasya svarūpamityucyante | kramabhāvinovasthāviśeṣāḥ paryāyāḥ |
yathā mṛdo ghaṭakapālādayaḥ | dravyavivakṣāyāṃ tu mṛtsvarūpa eva bhāvaḥ | dravati
gacchati tāṃstānparyāyāniti dravyam | tatra pāriṇāmiko bhāvaścaitanyādiḥ
svābhāvikaḥ | karmodayādyanapekṣatvāt | aupaśamikādayaścatvāro jīvasya bhāvā
naimittikāḥ | karmopaśamādyapekṣatvāt | bhavyasyeti | samyagdarśanādibhāvena
bhaviṣyatīti bhavyo jīvaviśeṣaḥ | tadviparīto'bhavyaḥ | bhavyatvamabhavyatvaṃ ceti
jīvasya bhāvadvayaṃ caitanyavatpāriṇāmikameva | nanu caitanyaṃ jñānam | tacca jīvā
tmaniṣṭhaṃ jīvātmaguṇabhūtam | na tu jīvātmanaḥ svarūpam | tathā ca kathaṃ caitanyasya
jīvabhāvatvamityāśaṅkāyāmāha — taduktamiti | jñānāditi | caitanyaṃ hi
jīvasya svābhāviko bhāvaḥ | tadanusārī jīvasyāvasthāviśeṣo jñānam | ava
sthāviśeṣatvādevāvasthābhūtājjñānānnātyantaṃ bhinno jīvaḥ | nāpyatyantamabhinnaḥ |
asyeyamavastheti vyavahārānupapatteḥ | tathā ca jīvo jñānādbhinno na | abhinno
na | kiṃ tu kathaṃcidbhinnābhinnaḥ | atha vā tattajjīvānāṃ svāpekṣayā jñānavattva
mastyeveti jñānādabhinnatvam | parāpekṣayā punarajñānavattvamiti jñānādbhinnatvam |
kathaṃ ca netyavyayasamudāyo'nekāntadyotakaḥ | pūrvāparībhūtaṃ jñānaṃ jñānasaṃtatiḥ | sa
ātmetyarthaḥ | ubhayātmakatvam | jīvasya jñānādbhinnābhinnatvam | anupalambhaḥ |
ekatra bhedābhedayoranupalambhaḥ | anekāntātmakatvasyeti | etaccaitaddarśanaśeṣe
“yadi vastvastyekāntataḥ” ityādigranthena mūle eva sphuṭībhaviṣyati |

āhārabhayamaithunādijñānaṃ saṃjñeti lokaprasiddhaṃ saṃjñāśabdārthaṃ nirākurvannāha —
śikṣeti | śikṣā śikṣaṇam | upadeśa iti yāvat | parakṛtopadeśādīnye
gṛhṇanti te jīvāḥ samanaskāḥ | ayamīdṛśa ityevaṃ parakīyaguṇadoṣavicāraṇe
yā śaktiḥ sā saṃjñā tadyuktāḥ | te ca devā gandharvā manuṣyāśca | paśuṣu
kecideva gajāśvādayaḥ | tathā pakṣiṣvapi kecideva śukādayaḥ | te cāmanaskā
dvividhā iti | samanakāstu kevalaṃ trasā eva | teṣvapi pañcendriyā
eva | traseti | atra “trasyanti calanti te trasāḥ sthitiśīlāḥ sthāvarā”
iti nārthaḥ | kiṃ tu traseti sthāvareti ca karmaviśeṣanāmadheyam | śubhamaśubhaṃ ceti
miśraṃ karma trasam | aśubhaprāyaṃ karma sthāvaram | trasakarmodayavaśīkṛtā jīvā
strasāḥ | sthāvarakarmodayavaśīkṛtā jīvāḥ sthāvarāḥ | dvīndriyādaya iti |
ādipadena trīndriyacaturindriyapañcendriyagrahaṇam | tatra dvīndriyāḥ śaṅkha
gaṇḍolakaśuktikṛmyādayaḥ | tvagrasanarūpamindriyadvayam | gaṇḍolako gaṇḍakīsthaḥ
paṣāṇaḥ | trīndriyāḥ pipīlikayūkādayaḥ | eṣāṃ ghrāṇendriyamadhikam |
caturindriyā daṃśamaśakabhramarādayaḥ | eṣāṃ cakṣurindriyaṃ caturtham | pañcendriyā
manuṣyapaśupakṣyādayaḥ | eṣāṃ śrotrendriyamadhikam | iṣṭakādiriti | ādi
śabdena khaneḥ sakāśādbahirniṣkāśitāḥ pṛthivīkāyikena jīvena parityaktā
mṛtamanuṣyādikāyavatsthitāḥ pāṣāṇā gṛhyante | pṛthivīkāyika iti | matvarthe
ṭhan | abādiṣvapīti | āpaḥ apkāyaḥ apkāyikaḥ abjīva iti bhedacatu
ṣṭayam | evaṃ tejasi vāyau ca bodhyam | ekatvaśālina iti | taduktaṃ
sūtrakāraiḥ “ā ākāśādekadravyāṇi” ta. sū. 5 | 6 | yathā jīvāḥ pudgalāśca
bahuvidhāstathā na dharmādharmākāśāḥ pratyekaṃ bhinnāḥ | sarvānpratyekarūpā evetyarthaḥ |
teṣāṃ niṣkriyatvamapyuktaṃ sūtrakāraiḥ — “niṣkriyāṇi ca” ta. sū. 5 | 7 iti |
ābhyantarabāhyanimittavaśādutpadyamānovasthāviśeṣaḥ svāśrayasya dravyasya deśā
ntaraprāptihetubhūtaḥ kriyetyucyate | tādṛśakriyārahitā dharmādharmākāśā ityarthaḥ |
tathāpyete jīvānāṃ pudgalānāṃ ca deśāntaraprāptihetavo bhavanti | ālokeneti |
ākāśaṃ dvividhaṃ lokākāśamalokākāśaṃ ceti | tatra lokasaṃbaddhamākāśaṃ lokā
kāśam | tatraiva dharmādharmāstikāyāḥ saṃcaranti | bhūtānāmiva dharmādharmayorapi
pudgalā vidyante | tileṣu tailavallokākāśe sarvatra dharmādharmayoravasthitiḥ | na tu
tādṛśākāśaikadeśe | taduktaṃ sūtrakāraiḥ — “dharmādharmayoḥ kṛtsne” ta. sū. 5 | 13
iti | upagṛhyata ityupagrahaḥ | jīvena gṛhītā yā gatiḥ sa dharmasyopakāraḥ |
tathā jīvena gṛhītā yāvasthitiḥ so'dharmasyopakāraḥ | sarvatrāvasthitistu
dvayorapi | tatra yathā matsyānāṃ gatau jalaṃ sādhāraṇāśrayo bhavati tathā jīvānāṃ
gatau dharmaḥ | yathā cāśvādīnāṃ sthitau pṛthivī sādhāraṇāśrayo bhavati tathā
jīvānāṃ sthitāvadharmaḥ | gatiḥ sthitiśca jīvapariṇāmaviśeṣa eva | ata eveti |
dharmādharmayorapratyakṣatvepi gatisthitibhyāṃ tadanumānaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ | sparśeti |
varṇo rūpam | atra sparśarasavarṇavanta ityapapāṭhaḥ | “sparśarasagandhavarṇavantaḥ
pudgalāḥ” ta. sū. 5 | 23 iti sūtre gandhaśabdadarśanāt | tatra sparśoṣṭavidhaḥ
kaṭhino mṛdurgururlaghuḥ śīta uṣṇaḥ snigdho rūkṣa iti | rasaḥ pañcavidhastiktaḥ
kaṭuḥ kaṣāyomlo madhura iti | gandho dvividhaḥ surabhirasurabhiśca | varṇaḥ pañca
vidhaḥ kṛṣṇo nīlo lohitaḥ pītaḥ śukla iti | aṇava iti | aṇyante
sparśādyavasthotpādanasāmarthyena śabdyanta ityaṇavaḥ | te cātyantasūkṣmatvādgra
haṇanikṣepaṇādyayogyatayā bhoktumaśakyāḥ | skandhanātskandhāḥ | skandhanaṃ ca
grahaṇanikṣepaṇādivyāpāropayogitvam | aṇuḥ skandhaśca pudgalānāṃ pariṇāma
viśeṣaḥ | tatra dvyaṇukādiskandhavidāraṇena pudgalānāmaṇupariṇāmo jāyate |
aṇvādīnāṃ mithaḥ saṃyogācca pudgalānāṃ skandhapariṇāmo jāyate | bhedo
vidāraṇam | pṛthagbhūtānāmekatra saṃhananaṃ saṃghātaḥ | kvaciditi | yathā tryaṇukā
dividāraṇādaṇūnāṃ saṃghātācca dvyaṇukādipariṇāmo jāyate | taduktamiti |
sūtrakṛdbhiriti śeṣaḥ | guṇaparyāyeti | dravyaṃ dravyāntarādyena dharmeṇa bhidyate
sa dravyānvayī dharmo guṇaḥ | yathā jñānatvādiḥ | tena hi jīvarūpaṃ dravyaṃ pudgalā
didravyebhyo bhidyate | pudgalāśca rūpatvenetaradravyebhyo bhidyante | kramabhāvī dravya
syāvasthāviśeṣaḥ paryāyaḥ | yathā jīvasya ghaṭajñānaṃ paṭajñānaṃ krodho māna
ityādiḥ | pudgalānāṃ ca śvetakṛṣṇādiḥ | paryāyāṇāṃ dravyasyaivāvasthāviśeṣarūpa
tvātteṣu guṇā vartanta eva | bṛhaddravyasaṃgrahe guṇaparyāyalakṣaṇamuktaṃ yathā — sahabhāvī
guṇo dharmaḥ kramabhāvī paryāyaḥ | ayamarthaḥ — dravyasya sahabhāvī yāvadvravyabhāvī
yo dharmaḥ sa guṇa ucyate | yathā jīvadravyasyopayogākhyo guṇaḥ | pudgalasya
grahaṇaṃ guṇaḥ | dharmāstikāyasya gatihetutvaṃ guṇaḥ | adharmāstikāyasya sthitihetutvaṃ
guṇaḥ | kālasya vartanāhetutvaṃ guṇaḥ | yadaiva dravyamutpadyate tadaiva te dravyeṇa
saha guṇā utpadyante | paurvāparyabhāva eva nāsti | guṇaguṇinoḥ samāna
sāmagrīkatvātsavyetaraviṣāṇavat | atha kramabhāvī ayāvaddravyabhāvī paryāyaḥ |
yathā jīvasya narakādiparyāyāḥ | pudgalasya rūparasasparśādiparyāyāḥ | dharmasya vyañja
nārthaparyāyau | adharmasya vyañjanārthaparyāyau | ākāśasya vyañjanārthaparyāyā
viti | dravyāśrayā iti | dvyaṇukādivyāvṛttaye nirguṇā ityuktam | teṣāṃ
paramāṇvādidravyāśritatvāt | dharmādharmeti | gatihetutvaṃ dharmasya guṇaḥ |
sthitihetutvamadharmasya guṇaḥ | avagāhahetutvamākāśasya guṇaḥ | vartanāhetutvaṃ
kālasya guṇaḥ | vartanā vartanaṃ dravyasya tattadavasthāviśeṣavaiśiṣṭyenāvasthānam |
yathā taṇḍulānāmodanarūpeṇa payaso dadhirūpeṇa ca | bījasyāṅkurakāṇḍapatrapuṣpa
phalarūpeṇa ca | navīnasya vastuno jīrṇatākaraṇaṃ ca | evatsarvaṃ kālādhīnameva |
guṇaṃ pradarśya paryāyaṃ pradarśayati — tasyeti | uktarūpeṇa | pūrvoktatattadavasthāviśeṣa
vaiśiṣṭyena | tadbhāva iti | dharmādīni dravyāṇi yena svarūpeṇa bhavanti tena
rūpeṇa bhāvovasthānamityarthaḥ |

tadāheti | sūtrakāra iti śeṣaḥ | jīvājīveti | eṣāṃ sāmā
nyalakṣaṇānyucyante | cetanālakṣaṇo jīvaḥ | sa ca jñānādibhedādanekadhā
bhidyate | tadviparyayalakṣaṇo'jīvaḥ | śubhāśubhakarmāgamadvāramāsravaḥ | ātma
karmaṇoranyonyāvayavānupraveśo bandhaḥ | āsravanirodhaḥ saṃvaraḥ | karmaikade
śasaṃkṣayo nirjarā | kṛtsnakarmaviyogo mokṣa iti | audāriketi | kāyaḥ
pañcavidhaḥ | taduktaṃ sūtrakāraiḥ — audārikavaikriyikāhārakataijasakārmaṇāni śarīrāṇi
ta. sū. 2 | 36 | śīryata iti śarīram | udāraṃ sthūlam | tatra bhavamaudāraṃ
sthūlaśarīrasādhyaṃ karmādikam | tatprayojanamasyetyaudārikaṃ dṛśyamānametatsthūlaṃ
śarīram | tadapekṣayā sūkṣmaṃ vaikriyikam | sāmarthyaviśeṣeṇānaṇoraṇutvāpāda
namamahato mahattvāpādanaṃ ca vikriyā | sā prayojanamasyeti vaikriyikam | etacca
na dṛśyam | tadapekṣayāpi sūkṣmamāhārakam | āhriyate svīkriyate tadityāhārakam |
etacca sūkṣmavastuparijñānārthaṃ svīkriyate | tadapekṣayāpi sūkṣmaṃ taijasam | tejasi
bhavaṃ taijasam | tadapekṣayāpi sūkṣmaṃ kārmaṇam | etadatyantasūkṣmam | atra
śabdādyupalabdhyabhāvaḥ | pañcavidhaśarīrasya karmanimittatvepi rūḍhivaśātkārmaṇa
śabdotraiva saṃketitaḥ | ayaḥpiṇḍegniparamāṇupraveśavattaijasakārmaṇayorvajrādāvapi
praveśaḥ | eṣu pañcavidhaśarīreṣūttarottaraṃ vyāpakatvamadhikam | kāyādītyādipadena
vāco manasaśca grahaṇam | ātmapradeśasaṃcalanaṃ yoga ityucyate | sa ca kāyika
vācikamānasikakarmarūpatrividhanimittabhedāttrividhaḥ | kāyayogo vāgyogo
manoyoga iti | ayaṃ yoga evāsravaḥ | śarīrasaṃcalananimittamātmapradeśasaṃcalanaṃ
kāyayogaḥ | vākpariṇāmābhimukhasyātmanaḥ pradeśasaṃcalanaṃ vāgyogaḥ | manaḥ
pariṇāmābhimukhasyātmanaḥ pradeśasaṃcalanaṃ manoyogaḥ | yogapraṇāḍikayā |
ātmapradeśasaṃcalanarūpayogadvāreṇa | yathā praṇālyā jalamāsravati tathātmaprade
śasaṃcalanena bahiḥsthāḥ karmapudgalā ātmapradeśamadhye praviśanti | sa dvividha
iti | yogo dvividha ityarthaḥ | arhatsiddheti | arhat 1 siddha 2 ācārya 3
upādhyāya 4 sādhu 5 nāmakā ye pañca parameṣṭhinasteṣu bhaktiḥ tapasi ruciḥ
śrutasya śāstrasya vinayanaṃ śikṣaṇamityādikaḥ śubho manoyoga ityarthaḥ |
etadviparīta iti | prāṇātipātacauryamaithunādiraśubhaḥ kāyayogaḥ | anṛtapa
ruṣāsabhyavacanādiraśubho vāgyogaḥ | vadhacintanerṣyāsūyādiraśubho manoyogaḥ |
sasaṃrambham | saṃrambhaḥ prayatnaviśeṣaḥ |

mithyādarśaneti | mithyādarśanādayonupadameva vakṣyante | mithyādarśa
nādibhirhetubhūtairayaṃ jīvātmā sūkṣmāṇāmekasmiñcharīre praviśatāmanantāvaya
vānāṃ pudgalānāmaṇudvyaṇukādīnāṃ karmarūpeṇa pariṇāmayogyānāmupaśleṣaṇamavi
bhāgena saṃbandhaṃ karoti | ayameva bandha ityucyate | mithyādarśanādyāve
śādārdrīkṛtasyātmanaḥ sarvato yogaviśeṣāduktarūpaiḥ pudgalaiḥ sahāvibhāgena
saṃbandho bhavati | yathā pātraviśeṣe prakṣiptānāṃ vividharasabījapuṣpaphalānāṃ
madirārūpeṇa pariṇāmo bhavati tathā pudgalānāmapyātmani sthitānāṃ
yogakaṣāyavaśātkarmarūpeṇa pariṇāmo bhavatīti tātparyam | taduktamiti |
umāsvātivācakācāryeṇa sūtrakāreṇeti śeṣaḥ | sakaṣāyatvāditi | kaṣāyeṇa
krodhamānādinā saha vartata iti sakaṣāyaḥ | tasya bhāvaḥ sakaṣāyatvam | kaṣā
yasya mandamadhyatīvratvatāratamyena bandhepi tāratamyaṃ bhavati | karmapadamāvartate |
ekaṃ pañcamyantamaparaṃ ṣaṣṭhyantam | karmaṇo hetorjīvaḥ sakaṣāyo bhavati | sakaṣā
yatvācca sa karmabhāvayogyānpudgalāngṛhṇāti sa bandha ityarthaḥ | ayaṃ ca jīva
karmaṇoḥ saṃbandhonādiriti nātra heturvicāraṇīyaḥ | etenāmūrtasya jīvasya
mūrtena karmaṇā kathaṃ saṃbandho jāyata ityapāstam | mithyākarmodayāditi |
yadā mithyākarmaṇa udayo bhavati tadā parakṛtopadeśaṃ vinā svabhāvata eva
jīvājīvādiṣu tattvabhūtārtheṣvaśraddhotpadyate tadekaṃ mithyādarśanam | paropadeśena
jāyamānā aśraddhā dvitīyaṃ mithyādarśanam | pṛthivyādīti | na viratiraviratiḥ |
viratirnāma jñātvābhyupetyākaraṇam | akaraṇaṃ nivṛttiruparamo viratirityete
paryāyāḥ | sā ca viratiḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyusthāvarajaṅgamarūpaṣaḍvidhapudgalāsti
kāyasyānupādānarūpā ṣaḍindriyasaṃyamanarūpā ca | anupādānamasvīkaraṇam |
saṃyamanaṃ niyamanam | tadviparītā cāviratirarthāddvādaśavidhā-pṛthivyādipaṭko
pādānarūpā ṣaḍindriyāsaṃyamanarūpā ceti | pañcasamitīti | samitiguptayonu
padaṃ mūla eva 3 | 316 vakṣyante | krodhādiriti | ādipadena mānamāyālo
bhānāṃ grahaṇam | kaṣāyāntāḥ | mithyādarśanāviratipramādakaṣāyāḥ | prakṛtisthi
tīti | anena sūtreṇa bandhaścaturvidha ityuktamityanvayaḥ | tasya bandhasya vidhayaḥ pra
kārāḥ prakṛtyādayaścatvāraḥ | prakṛtibandhaḥ sthitibandhonubhavabandhaḥ pradeśabandhaśceti
bandhacatuṣṭayaṃ bodhyam | tatra prakṛtibandhoṣṭavidhaḥ | tamāha — yathetyādinā |
prakṛtiḥ svabhāvaḥ | nimbasya kā prakṛtiḥ | tiktatā | guḍasya kā prakṛtiḥ |
madhuratā | tadvadaṣṭavidhasya karmaṇaḥ svabhāvavaicitryeṇa prakṛtibandhasyāṣṭavidhatvaṃ
bhavati | jñānāvaraṇa 1 darśanāvaraṇa 2 vedanīya 3 mohanīya
4 āyuḥ 5 nāma 6 gotra 7 antarāya 8 bhedenāṣṭavidhaṃ
karmocyate | tatra jñānāvaraṇasya svabhāvorthānavagamaḥ | etatkarmādityaprabhācchā
dakameghavajjñātṛtvaśaktimāvṛṇoti | darśanāvaraṇasya svabhāvorthānālocanam |
etatkarma pradīpaprabhātirodhāyakakumbhavaddarśanamāvṛṇoti | vedanīyasya sadasadrūpasya
svabhāvaḥ sukhaduḥkhasaṃvedanam | etatkarma sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ cotpādayati | yathāsidhā
rāgatasya madhuno lehanaṃ mādhuryarasāsvādanena sukhaṃ jihvātodanena duḥkhaṃ cotpā
dayati tadvat | mohanīyaṃ darśane cāritre ca mohamutpādayati | ādyasya svabhāva
stattvārthāśraddhānam | etatkarma durjanasaṅgavattattvārthe'śraddhāmutpādayati | dvitīyasya
svabhāvosaṃyamaḥ | asaṃyama indriyaniyamanābhāvaḥ | etatkarma tvācaraṇa indri
yāṇāmavyavasthāmutpādayati madyamadavat | āyurnāmakakarmaṇaḥ svabhāvo bhava
dhāraṇam | etatkarma dehaṃ dhārayati | yathā jalaṃ taritṝṇāṃ manuṣyapaśvādīnāṃ dehaṃ
dhārayati tadvat | nāmasaṃjñakakarmaṇaḥ svabhāvo nārakādināmakaraṇam | etatkarma
citrakāravannānāvidhāḥ saṃjñā ādhatte | gotrābhidhasya karmaṇaḥ svabhāva uccanīca
saṃśabdanam | etatkarma kumbhakāro ghaṭeṣviva śarīra uccanīcāvasthāṃ saṃpādayati |
antarāyakarmaṇaḥ svabhāvo vighnotpādanam | etatkarma kṛpaṇavaddānādiṣu vighnamutpā
dayati | dravyakarmeti | dravyarūpaṃ yatkarma dharmādharmākhyaṃ tasya yevāntarabhedā
steṣāṃ mūlasvabhāvaṃ jñātvāṣṭavidheṣu prakṛtibandheṣvīdṛśoyamiti vedanīya ityarthaḥ |
ādya iti | ādyaḥ prakṛtibandho jñānāvaraṇādibhedairaṣṭavidho jñeyaḥ | āvṛṇo
tyanenetyāvriyateneneti vā āvaraṇam | tacca jñānadarśanābhyāṃ pratyekamabhisaṃba
dhyate | vedayati vedyata iti vā vedanīyam | mohayati muhyateneneti vā moha
nīyam | etyanena nārakādibhavamityāyuḥ | namayati nānāyoniṣu nārakādi
paryāyaiḥ śabdayatyātmānamiti nāma | ṇama prahvatve śabde ca | namyateneneti
vā | gūyata uccairnīcaiśca śandyata iti gotram | dātṛdeyādīnāmantaraṃ madhyametī
tyantarāyaḥ | ekenātmapariṇāmenādīyamānāḥ pudgalā jñānāvaraṇādyanekabhedaṃ prati
padyante sakṛdupabhuktānnapariṇāmarasarudhirādivat | tadbhedamiti | jñānāvaraṇādī
nāmaṣṭānāṃ karmaṇāṃ pratyekaṃ ye bhedāsteṣāṃ saṃgrahaṃ sūtrakāraḥ pañcanavadvītyādisūtreṇa
kṛtavānityarthaḥ | jñānāvaraṇaṃ pañcavidham | darśanāvaraṇaṃ navavidham | vedanīyaṃ
dvividham | mohanīyamaṣṭāviṃśatividham | āyuścaturvidham | nāma dvicatvāriṃśa
dvidham | gotraṃ dvividham | antarāyaḥ pañcavidhaḥ | eteṣāṃ bhedānāṃ pratyekaṃ svarūpaṃ
sarvārthasiddhau pradarśitaṃ tata eva draṣṭavyam | sthitibandhamāha — yathājeti | yathājā
gomahiṣyādikṣīrāṇāṃ pratiniyatakālaṃ mādhuryasvabhāvo na vihanyate tathāṣṭānāṃ
karmaṇāmapi pratiniyatakālaṃ svabhāvo na vihanyate | tāvatkālaparyantaṃ sthitibandhaḥ |
tatra karmacatuṣṭayasya svabhāvāvighātakāla āditastisṛṇāmityanena sūtreṇoktaḥ |
sāgaropamaṃ kālaparimāṇaviśeṣaḥ | koṭīnāṃ koṭyaḥ koṭikoṭyaḥ | parotkṛṣṭā |
āditastisṛṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ jñānāvaraṇadarśanāvaraṇavedanīyānāmantarāyasya ca triṃśa
tsāgaropamakoṭikoṭikālaparyantamutkṛṣṭā sthitirbhavati | tāvatkālaparyantaṃ teṣāṃ
svabhāvo na vihanyate | ityādīti | yathoktaṃ sūtrakāraiḥ — saptatirmohanasya
ta. sū. 8 | 15 | mohanīyasya karmaṇaḥ saptatisāgaropamakoṭikoṭyaḥ parā
sthitirbhavati | viṃśatirnāmagotrayoḥ ta. sū. 8 | 16 | nāmagotrayoḥ karma
ṇorviṃśatisāgaropamakoṭikoṭyaḥ parā sthitirbhavati | trayastriṃśatsāgaropamāṇyā
yuṣaḥ ta. sū. 8 | 17 | āyuḥkarmaṇastrayastriṃśatsāgaropamaparyantaṃ parā
sthitirbhavati | ayaṃ karmaṇa utkṛṣṭasthiteḥ kāla uktaḥ | jaghanyasthiteḥ kālastu
aparā dvādaśamuhūrtā vedanīyasya ta. sū. 8 | 18 ityādisūtrairuktastata eva
draṣṭavyaḥ | yathā durdāntasya mattasya gajādeḥ kiṃcitkālaparyantaṃ svabhāvo na pracyavate
tathā triṃśatsāgaropamādyuktakālaparyantaṃ svīyasvabhāvo na pracyavata ityarthaḥ | anu
bhavabandhamāha — yathājeti | pradeśabandhamāha — karmabhāveti | pūryante galanti
ceti pudgalāḥ | karmarūpeṇa pariṇatā ye pudgalāstadrūpā ye skandhā dvyaṇukādayasteṣā
manantāvayavānāmātmāvayaveṣu nīrakṣīranyāyenānupraveśaḥ pradeśabandha ucyate |

saṃvaraṃ lakṣayati — āsraveti | āsrava ātmanaścalanam | idameva yogapade
nocyate | tasya nirodhe hi karmapudgalānāmātmani praveśo na saṃbhavati | saṃcāreti |
karmapudgalānāṃ yaḥ saṃcāraḥ praveśastatkāraṇībhūtādyogātsakāśādātmano gopanaṃ
rakṣaṇaṃ guptirityucyate | ayanaṃ vartanam | seryābhāṣeti | īryāsamitirbhāṣāsa
mitireṣaṇāsamitirādānasamitirutsargasamitiśceti pañcavidhetyarthaḥ | loketi |
lokairativāhite janapādakṣuṇṇe | anena jantūnāṃ viralatvaṃ sūcitam | sūrya
kiraṇaiḥ spṛṣṭe prakāśite mārge jantūnāṃ rakṣaṇārthaṃ mārgamālokya jantūnāṃ yathā
pīḍā na bhavettathā pādavinyāsaḥ kartavyaḥ | iyamīryāsamitirucyate | anavadya
mṛtaṃ sarveti | anavadyamanindyamṛtaṃ satyaṃ sarvajanahitakārakaṃ mitaṃ ca yadbhāṣaṇaṃ
kriyate sā bhāṣāsamitirucyate | anavadyamṛtamityasya sthāne'padyatāṃ gatamiti
pāṭhaḥ pustakāntare dṛśyate | pādavedhakārthakasya padyaśabdasya vedhakamātrārthakatvamatra
lakṣaṇayā | avedhakatvaṃ prāptamityarthaḥ | vedhājanakamiti yāvat | atha vā gadyā
tmakaṃ na tu padyātmakam | yathā gadyācchīghraṃ vaiśadyena cārthapratītirna tathā padyādi
tyāśaya iti kecit | iyaṃ bhāṣāsamitirvācaṃyamānāṃ maunavratināṃ priyetyarthaḥ |
dvicatvāriṃśateti | dvicatvāriṃśatsaṃkhyākairbhikṣādoṣairadūṣitasyānnasya yadgrahaṇaṃ
seṣaṇāsamitirucyate | āsanādīnīti | dhyāyanmunirāsanādīnyādāvavalokya
tadgrahaṇārthaṃ samullaṅghanāvaśyakatve yatnataḥ prāṇipīḍāparihāreṇa gṛhṇīyāt gṛhītvā
prasthāpayeccetyevaṃrūpādānasamitirucyate | kapheti | kaphādayaḥ śarīragatā
styājyāḥ padārthā janturahite bhūpradeśe yattyajyante sotsargasamitirucyate | etāḥ
pañca samitayo viditajīvasthānasya muneḥ prāṇipīḍāparihārābhyupāyā bhavanti |
evaṃvidhasya ca karmāsravābhāvātsaṃvaro bhavati |

nirjarāṃ lakṣayati — arjitasyeti | pūrvasaṃpāditasya karmaṇastapodhyānajapādi
bhirnirjaraṇaṃ kṣapaṇaṃ nirjaretyucyate | keśollañcanādikaṃ tapa iti | ulluñcanamu
tpāṭanam | yadyapi tapobhyudayasādhanatvādabhyudayāṅgaṃ bhavati tathāpi tasya nirjarā
ṅgatvamapīṣyate | ekasyānekakāryakāritve bādhakābhāvāt | yathāgnirekopi kledana
bhasmāṅgārādiprayojano bhavati tadvat | yatkarma tapobalāditi | anudayāva
sthasyāpi karmaṇa udayāvasthāṃ haṭhātsaṃpādayati tapasvī tapobalādeva |

mokṣaṃ lakṣayati — mithyādarśaneti | saṃvaro nirjarā ceti mokṣe hetu
dvayam | tatra saṃvareṇa karmapudgalānāṃ jīvātmani praveśābhāvādabhinavaka
rmābhāvaḥ | saṃcitasya ca nirjarayā kṣapaṇam | evaṃ kṛtsnakarmavimokṣe mokṣaḥ
sidhyati | tadanantaramiti | kṛtsnakarmakṣayānantaramityarthaḥ | ālokā
ntādityatrāṅabhividhyarthakaḥ | ūrdhvagamane hetucatuṣṭayaṃ darśayati — yatheti |
tasmin | hastadaṇḍādisaṃyoge | praṇidhānaṃ yogaḥ | tadabhāvepi | muktā
vasthāyāṃ praṇidhānābhāvepi | apetamṛttikābandham | jalakledaviśleṣṭamṛtti
kāsaṃbandham | tena hyapagatagauravaṃ svābhāvikalaghutvenordhvaṃgacchati | eraṇḍeti |
bījakośabandhacchedāderaṇḍabījasyordhvaṃ gatirdṛśyata iti prasiddham | tadvanmanuṣyā
dibhavaprāpakagatijātināmādisakalakarmabandhacchedānmuktasyordhvaṃ gatiravasīyate |
āviddheti | kulālaprayogāpāditahastadaṇḍacakrasaṃyogenotpāditabhramaṇamāvi
ddham | gatasamasteti | gatāḥ samastāḥ kleśāstadvāsanā ca yasyāta evānāvṛtaṃ
jñānaṃ yasyāta eva sukhaikatānasyātmano yatsvābhāvikamuparideśāvasthānaṃ sā
muktirityarthaḥ | atra kṛtsnakarmavimokṣaṇaṃ mokṣa iti pūrvamatameva yuktam |
mokṣaśabdārthānuguṇyāt | uktānīti | jīvājīvāsravabandhasaṃvaranirjaramokṣa
rūpāṇi sapta tattvānītyarthaḥ | saṃgrahe |

vistareṇopadiṣṭānāmarthānāṃ tattvasiddhaye |
samāsenābhidhānaṃ yatsaṃgrahaṃ taṃ vidurbudhāḥ ||
ityuktalakṣaṇalakṣite |

saptabhaṅginayākhyamiti | saptānāmastitvanāstitvādīnāmekatra vastuni mitho
virodhasya yo bhaṅgo yugapadekatra sarveṣāṃ samuccayaḥ sosminnastīti saptabhaṅgī |
atha vā saptānāṃ sāṃkhyādyuktānāmastitvādyekāntānāṃ bhaṅgaḥ saptabhaṅgaḥ | sosminnasti
pratipādyatayā vidyata iti saptabhaṅgī | tādṛśo nayo yuktiḥ | saptabhaṅganaya iti
pāṭhe saptabhaṅge naya iti saptamīsamāsaḥ | saptabhaṅgīnayākhyamiti pāṭhe saptānāṃ
bhaṅgānāṃ syādastītyādīnāṃ prakāraviśeṣāṇāṃ samāhāraḥ saptabhaṅgī | tādṛśo
naya ityarthaḥ | syādastīti | syācchabdoyamanekāntadyotakaḥ kathaṃcidityarthako
nipātaḥ | yadi hi ghaṭāderastitvameva cetkulālavyāpāronarthakaḥ prasajyate |
evaṃ ghaṭādernāstitvameva cettathāpi kulālavyāpārasyānarthakyameva | asatsva
bhāvasya hi vyāpārasahasreṇāpyastitvaṃ saṃpādayituṃ na śakyate śaśaśṛṅgā
deriva | evaṃ vidyamānasyaiva vastunaḥ prāptyarthaṃ prayatno loke dṛśyate | yathā
nidāghe candanasya gharṣaṇe lepane ca sopi viphalaḥ syāt | vastunaḥ sattvameva
svabhāvaśceddhṛṣṭatvalisatvādinā prāpyena rūpeṇāpi candanasya pūrvaṃ sattvāt | asa
ttvameva svabhāvaścetprāpyaṃ ghṛṣṭatvādirūpaṃ prayatnenāpi naiva prāpyeta | evamātapani
vāraṇādyarthaṃ chatradhāraṇādiḥ prayatno dṛśyate sopi viphalaḥ syāt | vastunaḥ sattvameva
svabhāvaścedātapasya yatsaṃtāpātiśayajanakatvaṃ nivāraṇīyaṃ rūpaṃ tena rūpeṇa sadā
sattvātkṛtepi prayatne kiṃ syāt | asattvameva svabhāvaścetsaṃtāpātiśayajanakatvena
rūpeṇāpyasattvātkimarthaṃ prayatna iti | ato'gatyā sadānekarūpatvameva vastuna
āstheyam | anekarūpatve tu prāpyarūpasyāsattvepi tatrāsattvaikāntābhāvena yatnaḥ
saphalaḥ | evaṃ nivāraṇīyasya rūpasya sattvepi tatra sattvaikāntābhāvena nivāraṇārthaṃ
prayatnaḥ saphala iti | yadyapyekasminvṛkṣegrāvacchedena kapisaṃyogo na mūlāvacche
deneti saṃyogasya sattvamasattvaṃ ca yugapadeva naiyāyikādibhirapi svīkriyate tathā
pyavacchedakabhedena tat | jainaistu niravacchinnamapratihatameva sarvatra sattvamasattvaṃ ca
svīkriyata iti viśeṣaḥ | kiṃ ca kapisaṃyogasyāvacchedakaṃ vṛkṣāgraṃ kimavacchedena
vartate | mūlābhāvāvacchedena cetsa kimavacchedenetyanavasthāyāmantyāsiddhau sarvāsi
ddherādyaḥ kapisaṃyoga eva niravacchinno naiyāyikairapi svīkāryaḥ syāditi |

anye tu vyācakṣate — sarvo hi ghaṭādiḥ padārthaḥ svakīyairdravyakṣetrakālabhāvairasti
parakīyairnāsti ca | yathā puṇyagrāme vasantaṛtau vidyamānaḥ pārthivaḥ śyāmo ghaṭo
dravyataḥ pārthivattvenāstyāpyatvena nāsti | kṣetrataḥ puṇyagrāmasthatvenāsti kāśyādi
sthatvena nāsti | kālato vāsantikatvenāsti śaiśiratvena nāsti | bhāvataḥ
śyāmatvenāsti raktatvena nāsti | tathā ca svakīyairdravyādibhirastīti vidhikalpanayā
parakīyairdravyādibhirnāstīti niṣedhakalpanayā ca sarve padārthā bhāvābhāvātmakā
anaikāntikāḥ | ekānto niścayaḥ | sattvasyāsattvasya vā niścayo nāsti |
etādṛśā eva sarve padārthā ityartha iti |

jainavyatiriktāḥ sarve ekāntavādinaḥ | te ca saptavidhāḥ | tatra satkārya
vādinaḥ sāṃkhyāḥ 1 padārthānāṃ sarvadāstitvameveti vadanti | śūnyavā
dino bauddhaviśeṣā mādhyamikāḥ 2 padārthānāṃ nāstitvamevetyāhuḥ | asa
tkāryavādino naiyāyikādayaḥ 3 padārthānāmutpatteḥ pūrvamabhāva utpattyanantaraṃ
sattvaṃ tato nāśe punarabhāva iti kālabhedena padārthānāṃ sattvamasattvaṃ ca
manyante | jagato māyopādānakatvaṃ manyamānā māyāvedāntinaḥ 4 padārthā
nāmanirvācyatvamācakṣate | yato māyikaṃ mṛgajalādi pratītikālepi nāstīti
paścādbādhyate | ataḥ padārthānāṃ sattvakāla eva vastuto'sattvam | astitvanā
stitvayormitho viruddhayoryugapadvācā vaktumaśakyatvenānirvācyā eva padārthā iti
tadabhiprāyaḥ | kecinmāyāvedāntina 5 eva sāṃkhyoktaṃ padārthānāṃ sattvaṃ svīku
rvanto māyikatvenānirvācyatvaṃ pratipedire | anye ca māyāvedāntinaḥ 6 śūnya
vādyuktaṃ padārthānāṃ nāstitvaṃ svīkurvanto māyikatvenānirvācyatvaṃ bruvate | apare
ca māyāvedāntino 7 naiyāyikādyuktaṃ padārthānāṃ kālabhedena sattvamasattvaṃ
ca svīkurvanto māyikatvenānirvācyatvamaṅgīkurvate | ekāntavādinaścaite sāṃkhyā
dayaḥ sapta ghaṭādipadārthānāṃ svarūpapradarśanakāle svasvamatānusāreṇa ghaṭosti
ghaṭo nāstītyevaṃ pratipādayanti | jaināstu tattaduktamaṅgīkṛtya kevalaṃ tatra syātpa
daprakṣepaṃ kurvanti | yathā sāṃkhyairghaṭostītyuktestīti satyameva paraṃ tu na niścitaṃ
tatsvarūpam | ataḥ syādastīti vaktavyamiti |

tadvidhāneti | ghaṭādipadārthānāṃ vidhirūpeṇa pratipādanecchāyāmastīti prayogo
bhavati | niṣedharūpeṇa pratipādanecchāyāṃ nāstīti prayogo bhavati | evaṃ sarvatrohyam |
samudāyaḥ | asti nāstīti rūpadvayasamudāyaḥ | aśaktitaḥ | astitvanāstitvayo
rviruddhayoryugapadvaktumaśakyatvāt | tiṅantapratirūpakaḥ | varṇānupūrvyā kriyāpada
sadṛśaḥ | vākyeṣviti | arthayogitvātsārthakatvāt | gamyaṃ vidheyam | syādastī
tyādivākyeṣu tiṅantapratirūpakaḥ syādityayaṃ nipātaḥ sārthakatvādanekāntadyotakaḥ
sanvidheyasyāstītyāderviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati | syādityasyaikāntārthakatve tu tasya sārtha
katvaṃ na syādityarthaḥ | tadāha — yadīti | syādvāda iti | kimā kiṃśabdena
vṛttaṃ niṣpannaṃ kathamityavyayam | tasya cidvidheścidityanena yogātkathaṃciditi
bhavati | kathaṃcidastītyukte sarvathaikāntasyāstītyādiniścayasya tyāgādayaṃ syādvādaḥ
sidhyati | ayaṃ ca syādvādaḥ pūrvoktasaptabhaṅginayāpekṣayā idaṃ heyamidamādeyamiti
bhedāya kalpate | vastuno niścitasvarūpatve tu tasya heyatvamādeyatvaṃ ca na saṃbhava
tītyarthaḥ | tadevāha — yadi vastviti | idamanupadamevopapāditam | prāptā
prāpaṇīyatvāditi | aprāptaṃ hi vastu pravṛttyādiprayatnena prāpaṇīyaṃ bhavati |
na tu pūrvameva prāptam | tathā hātuṃ yogyasya hānaṃ saṃbhavati na tvaheyasya | samasti |
saṃbhavati | virodhācceti | ghaṭo nāstītyapi prayogo nopapadyata iti śeṣaḥ |
sanneva | satsvarūpa eva |

anekāntātmakamiti | yato ghaṭādirarthaḥ sarvasaṃvidāmastināstītyā
disarvajñānānāṃ gocaro viṣayo bhavati tato ghaṭādi vastvanekāntātmakaṃ sidhyati |
ekāntasvarūpatve tu tādṛśasyaikasyaiva jñānasya viṣayaḥ syānna sarvavidhasya jñānasya |
ghaṭādirartho hyastītyādīnāṃ pūrvoktānāṃ saptavidhajñānānāṃ viṣayo bhavati |
tatrānekāntātmakasya ghaṭādyarthasya satsvarūpamekadeśaḥ | asatsvarūpamekade
śāntaram | ghaṭostītyeko nayaḥ | nāstītyaparaḥ | nayo nītirnyāya iti paryāyāḥ |
nīyate paricchidyata ekadeśaviśiṣṭorthoneneti nayaḥ | devasūripādairapyuktam —
nīyate yena śrutākhyapramāṇaviṣayīkṛtasyārthasyāṃśatastaditarāṃśaudāsīnyataḥ sa prati
patturabhiprāyaviśeṣo naya iti | ghaṭostyeveti durnayaḥ | durnayatvaṃ cāsya mithyārū
patvāt | nāstitvarūpasya satopi dharmāntarasyaivakāreṇa nihnavānmithyārūpatvam |
ghaṭostīti nayaḥ | na cāsya durnayatvam | nāstitvādidharmāntareṣu gajanimī
likāvalambanenaudāsīnyāṅgīkārāt | nāpi pramāṇatvam | syācchabdāprayogeṇa
dharmāntarāṇāmasūcanāt | syādastīti tu pramāṇavākyam | evaṃ syānnāstītyā
dyapi | śrutavartmani pramāṇamārge ekaniṣṭhānāṃ pramāṇapratipannārthaikadeśaparāmarśasva
rūpāṇāmanekeṣāṃ nyāyānāṃ pravṛttau satyāṃ saṃpūrṇasya sakalasvarūpaviśiṣṭasyārthasya
niścāyakaṃ syādastītyādyuktaṃ ghaṭādi vastu pramāṇasiddhamucyate | yathā viśakalitānāṃ
muktāmaṇīnāmekasūtrānusyūtānāṃ hāravyapadeśa evaṃ pṛthagabhisaṃdhīnāmanekeṣāṃ
nayānāṃ syādvādalakṣaṇaikasūtraprotānāṃ śrutākhyapramāṇavyapadeśa iti bodhyam |
anyonyeti | pravādā darśanāni | yathānyāni sāṃkhyādidarśanāni matsaragra
stāni | kutaḥ | anyonyapakṣapratipakṣabhāvāt | sāṃkhyasya hi satkāryamiti pakṣaḥ |
sa evāsatkāryavādino naiyāyikasya pratipakṣaḥ | mitho virodhādityarthaḥ | tathā
rhato jinasya samayaḥ siddhānto na pakṣapātī | matsarābhāvāt | tatra hetugarbhaṃ
viśeṣaṇaṃ nayānaśeṣānaviśeṣamicchanniti | anekāntavādasya sarvanayātmakatvāt |
yathā samīcīnaṃ madhyasthaṃ nyāyanirṇetāramāsādya parasparaṃ vivadamānā api vādino
vivādādviramante tathā mitho viruddhā api nayāstvatsiddhāntamupetya syācchabda
prayogopaśamitavirodhāḥ santaḥ parasparaṃ suhṛdbhāvenāvatiṣṭhante | tathā cārhatsamaye
na kvāpi pakṣapāta iti tātparyam |
balabhogeti | taduktamanyatrāpi —

lg.l: hiṃsā ratyaratī bhītirjugupsā śoka eva ca ||

div.p:
kāmo mithyātvamajñānaṃ nidrā cāviratistathā |
rāgo dveṣaśca no doṣāsteṣāmaṣṭādaśāpyamī || iti |
eteṣṭādaśa doṣā yasya na santi sa jino devo guruḥ samyaktattvajñā
nopadeśaka ityarthaḥ | jñāneti | saṃmoharahitaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānam | arhadupadi
ṣṭerthe viśvāsaḥ samyagdarśanam | cāritraṃ pāpakarmabhyo viratiḥ | jagati sarvatattvānāṃ
moharahitaṃ jñānaṃ jinoktau viśvāsaḥ pāpakarmabhyo viratiścetyetānyapavargasya mokṣasya
vartanī mārga ityarthaḥ | syādvādasyeti | vastunonekarūpatvaṃ pūrvoktaprakāreṇa
pratyakṣamanubhūyata eva | upāditsājihāsoddeśena pravṛttinivṛttidarśanālliṅgādvastu
nonekarūpatvamanumānenāpi sidhyatītyarthaḥ | nityānityeti | yathā sattvāsattva
viṣaye syādvāda uktastathā nityatvānityatvādiviṣayepi | yathā jīvādayorthāḥ
syānnityāḥ syādanityāḥ syānnityānityāḥ syādavācyāḥ syānnityā avācyāḥ
syādanityā avācyāḥ syānnityānityā avācyā iti | naveti | jīvājīva
puṇyapāpāsravasaṃvarabandhanirjaramuktirūpāṇi tattvāni nava | eteṣu puṇyasya saṃvare
ntarbhāve pāpasya cāsraventarbhāve sapta tattvāni bhavanti | eteṣāṃ tattvānāṃ śraddhā
pūrvakena moharahitena samyagjñānena cāritrayogyatā saṃpadyate | taduktam —

etāni tatra tattvāni yaḥ śraddhatte sthirāśayaḥ |
samyaktvajñānayogena tasya cāritrayogyatā || iti |
tasyāṃ ca satyāṃ pāpakarmabhyo viratau mokṣaḥ saṃpadyate | labdheti | jñānaṃ
darśanaṃ vīryaṃ sukhaṃ cetyanantacatuṣkaṃ pāpakarmavirāmādyena labdhamata eva ca yo
nena lokasaṃbaddhenākāśena gūḍho dṛḍhasaṃbaddho na bhavati tādṛśasyātmanoṣṭakarma
kṣayāduparyalokākāśe gacchato yā vyāvṛttiśūnyatā jāyate saiva muktiḥ | sara
joharaṇā iti | rajo hriyateneneti rajoharaṇaṃ picchikā saṃmārjanīviśeṣaḥ |
tena sahitāḥ | luñcitā utpāṭitā mūrdhajāḥ keśā yaistādṛśāḥ śvetāmbarāḥ | ete
ca na raktāmbarā nāpi digambarāḥ | digambarānāha — luñcitā iti | pāṇi
pātrāḥ | pāṇau pātraṃ pāṇireva vā pātraṃ yeṣāṃ tādṛśāḥ | annadāturgṛha ūrdhvāśina
ete jainasādhavaḥ | bhuṅkta iti | kevalī pūrvoktakevalajñānavānbhojanarahitaḥ |
kiṃ cāsmindigambaramate strīṇāṃ mokṣo nāsti | tāsāṃ tu puṃjanmagrahaṇottaraṃ
mokṣa iti ||

div.head: atha rāmānujadarśanam || 4 ||
div.p:
vikalpa iti | yatra samuccayo na saṃbhavati tatra vikalpaḥ kriyate | yathodite
juhoti anudite juhotīti | atrādyena vākyena sūryodayottaraṃ homo vidhīyate |
dvitīyena tu sūryodayātprāk | uditānuditahomayośca yugapadasaṃbhavena samuccayā
saṃbhavādvikalpaḥ kenacidudite kenacidanudita iti | tadvadatra kuto netyarthaḥ |
kriyā hīti | yatsādhyaṃ tatkartrādibhedena prakāradvayena sādhayituṃ śakyata iti
tatra vikalpostu nāma | yattu siddhaṃ tattadanyatareṇaikenaiva prakāreṇa siddhamiti na
kathamapi siddhavastuni vikalpaḥ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ | dravyātmaneti | mṛd dravyam |
mṛtpiṇḍaḥ kapālaṃ ghaṭa iti paryāyāḥ | tatra mṛtpiṇḍāvasthāyāṃ mṛdrūpeṇa dravyātmanā
sattvaṃ kapālādiparyāyarūpeṇāsattvam | evaṃ kapālāvasthāyāṃ mṛdrūpeṇa sattvaṃ mṛtpi
ṇḍaghaṭādirūpeṇāsattvaṃ bodhyam | pratiyogibhedeneti | yathā tryaṇukaṃ dvyaṇukā
pekṣayā mahat caturaṇukāpekṣayā cālpamiti dvyaṇukacaturaṇukarūpapratiyogibheda
ityāśayaḥ | evaṃ ca viruddhayorekatra samāveśaḥ kartṛbhedena deśabhedenāvasthābhedena
kālabhedena pratiyogibhedena vā bhavatu | paraṃ tūpādhirāhityena svabhāvata eva viru
ddhayorekatra samāveśo jainābhimato na saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ | sarvamanekānta
miti | anekāntamaniścitasvarūpam | saptabhaṅginayo yadi niścitasvarūpastadā
sarvamanekāntamiti pratijñāvirodhaḥ | saptabhaṅginayasyāpi sarvāntargatatvāt | yadi
saptabhaṅginayopyaniścitasvarūpastarhi svayamaniścitasvarūpeṇāta evāpramāṇabhūtena
saptabhaṅginayena kathamanyeṣāṃ sarvavastūnāmaniścitasvarūpatvaṃ sidhyet | seyamubha
yataḥpāśā rajjuḥ | ubhayataḥ pāśau yasyāstathābhūtetyarthaḥ | kvacidubhayataḥspāśeti
pāṭhaḥ | spaśadhātorbhāve ghañ | spāśo bandhanam | api ceti | jīvājīvapuṇya
pāpāsravasaṃvaranirjarabandhamokṣarūpāṇi nava tattvāni | eteṣu puṇyasya saṃsrave pāpa
sya cāsraventarbhāvaṃ kurvatāṃ mate sapta tattvāni | etatprameyam | etannirdhāraṇasādhanaṃ
pramāṇam | nirdhārayitā pramātā | nirdhāraṇaṃ phalam | nirdhāraṇaṃ niścayātmakaṃ
jñānam | eteṣāṃ prameyapramāṇapramātṛphalānāṃ niścitasvarūpatve sarvamanekāntamiti
pratijñāvirodhaḥ | aniścitasvarūpatve tu kimetaiḥ kṛtaṃ syāt | nirdhāraṇasya cāni
ścitasvarūpatve svarūpahānireva | tīrthakaratvam | śāstrapravartakatvam | yoga
balāditi | yogī hi svayogasāmarthyena yugapadanekāni śarīrāṇi dhārayati |
tādṛśaśarīrāṇāṃ samūhaḥ kāyavyūha ityucyate | tatra jīvasya vibhutve mitho
viyukteṣvapyanekeṣu śarīreṣvekasya jīvasya saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati | jīvasya śarīrapa
rimāṇatve tu śarīrādbahiḥ saṃbandhābhāvenaikasminkāya ekaṃ jīvaśakalamaparamapara
treti jīvavicchedaḥ syāt | dūṣaṇāntaramāha — manujeti | prācīneti | pipī
likāśarīre praveśātprāggajāvasthāyāṃ yādṛśaśarīrākāreṇa saṃniveśovayavaracanā
viśeṣastādṛśākārasya jīvasya pipīlikāśarīre praveśāsaṃbhavena pūrvākārasya
vināśaḥ kalpanīyaḥ syāt | prapeti | prapā pānīyaśālā | devānāṃ rājñāṃ ca
gṛhaṃ prāsāda ityucyate | yathā prapādyāśrayānurodhena dīpaprabhāvayavānāṃ saṃkoca
vikāsau bhavatastathā jīvāvayavānāmapīti kṛtsnagajaśarīre jīvasya vyāptiḥ
pipīlikāśarīre praveśaśca siddha ityāśayaḥ | anityatvaprāptāviti | yadyapi
manuṣyaśarīragato jīvastaddehāvasāne mataṃgajaśarīraprāptau vikasitāvayavaḥ sa eva
pipīlikāśarīraprāptau saṃkucitāvayava ityeka eva jīvastathāpi saṃkocavikāsā
nāmutpattivināśavyāptatvena kadācidutpattirvināśaśca tasyāvaśyaka iti yadotpa
ttistadā akṛtābhyāgamaḥ syāt | utpattyavyavahitānantarabhāvinoḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
kāraṇasya puṇyapāpākhyasya karmaṇaḥ pūrvamakṛtatvāt | utpattyanantaraṃ karmācaraṇā
tprāk sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā naivopabhujyata iti tvanubhavaviruddham | kiṃ ca karmācaraṇamapi
manovṛttyanurodhena sukhadaṃ duḥkhadaṃ vā bhavatyeva | evaṃ yadā jīvasya vināśaḥ
syāttadā kṛtapraṇāśaḥ syāt | vināśottaraṃ bhokturabhāvena vināśātprākkṛtasya
karmaṇaḥ phalopabhogābhāvepi nāśasyāṅgīkartavyatvāt | vināśakālenupabhuktaṃ
karma naivāvaśiṣyata ityatra tu pramāṇābhāvaḥ | anyatrāpi | vedāprāmāṇyeśvarā
naṅgīkārādiviṣayeṣvapi | akṛto'nādisiddho vedaścenna pramāṇaṃ tarhi tvadabhima
torhanmunipraṇītaḥ kṛtaka āgamaḥ kathaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavet | vedo hyapauruṣeya iti
puruṣasvātantryābhāvena nirastasamastadoṣāśaṅkaḥ svata eva pramāṇamiti tasya
prāmāṇyaṃ na kenāpyapahnotuṃ śakyam | tatprāmāṇye ca yato vā imāni bhūtāni
jāyante tai. 3 | 1 | 1 dyāvābhūmī janayandeva ekaḥ śve. 3 | 3 ityā
diśrutisiddha īśvaropyanapalapanīya eveti | tathā ca yathā pradhāne malle nipatite
taditare bāhuyuddhaṃ kartuṃ saṃmukhā api na bhavanti tathā jaināṅgīkṛtaṃ jīvasvarūpaṃ pradhā
namallasthānīyaṃ dūṣitaṃ cejjīvānuṣaṅgiṇāmitareṣāṃ padārthānāṃ svarūpamapi jainakalpitaṃ
dūṣitaprāyameva bhavati | naikasminniti | jainamataṃ nopapadyate | ekasminvastunya
stitvanāstitvāderviruddhasya cchāyātapavadyugapadasaṃbhavāditi tatsūtrārthaḥ | rāmānuje
neti | yadyapi śaṃkarācāryādibhirapyetatsūtraṃ jainamatanirākaraṇaparatvenaiva vyākṛtaṃ
tathāpyatra rāmānujadarśanasya prastūyamānatvādrāmānujenetyuktam |

cidaciditi | cijjīvo bhoktā | acijjaḍapadārthajātaṃ bhogyam | īśvaraśca
tayorantaryāmī bhūtvā niyāmako bhavati | etattattvatrayaṃ mitho bhinnaṃ mithaḥ saṃbaddhaṃ
ca pāramārthikam | haririti | harirīśvara iti proktaḥ | jīvaściditi proktaḥ |
dṛśyaṃ tu sarvametadaciditi proktam | punariti tvarthe |

apare | māyāvādinaḥ śaṃkarācāryamatānusāriṇaḥ | cidacidīśvararūpaṃ
tattvatrayavibhāgaṃ na sahante ityatrānvayaḥ | māyāvādino hīṣadapi dvaitaṃ na
sahante | aśeṣāḥ kṛtsnā ye viśeṣā hrasvatvadīrghatvādayaḥ śabdasparśādayo
nityatvajñātṛtvādayaścedamīdṛśamiti vyavahāraprayojakāḥ sarve eva teṣāṃ pratyanīkaṃ
śatrubhūtaṃ sakalaviśeṣarahitaṃ cinmātraṃ svayaṃprakāśajñānamātrasvarūpaṃ brahmaikameva
paramārthaḥ | tacca brahma nityamavināśi śuddhaṃ nirmalaṃ buddhamajaḍaṃ muktaṃ prapañcarahitam |
etādṛśasvarūpamapi jīvarūpeṇa badhyate | nanu jīvo baddho bhavatu brahma tu kathaṃ
badhyate jīvabrahmaṇorbhedādityāśaṅkya hetugarbhaṃ viśeṣaṇamāha — tattvamasītyā
dīti | tattvamasītiśrutau jīvabrahmaṇoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśādbrahmaṇo jīvena
sahaikyamavagamyata iti brahmaiva badhyata ityucyate | aikyasākṣātkāre tu tadeva mukta
mityucyate | tādṛśabrahmātiriktaḥ sarvopyayaṃ prapañco brahmaṇyavidyayā parikalpitaḥ
yasminprapañce nānāvidhā bhoktāro jīvāstathā śabdasparśādaya ākāśavāyvādayaśca
bhogyārthā mitho bhinnā bhāsante | sadeveti | he somyedaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ jagadagre
sṛṣṭeḥ purā sadrūpamevāsīt tathaikamevādvitīyamāsīdityarthaḥ | anena brahmaṇo nirvi
śeṣatvaṃ sidhyati | saviśeṣatve tena viśeṣeṇa brahmaṇaḥ sadvitīyatvāpatteḥ | tara
tīti | śoko manastāpaḥ | tarati atikrāmati | ātmavidadvitīyātmasākṣā
tkārī kṛtārtho bhavatītyarthaḥ | mṛtyoriti | ya ihādvitīye brahmaṇi bhedamiva
paśyati sa mṛtyormaraṇātpunarmṛtyuṃ maraṇaṃ prāpnoti | janmādidvāreṇetyarthaḥ | tathā
cāyamakhilo bhedo mithyābhūta evājñānena kalpitaḥ | idaṃ ca jaganmūlabhūtama
jñānamanādi bhāvarūpaṃ na tu jñānābhāvarūpam | bhāvarūpatvena pratīyamānasya jaga
tosyābhāvopādānakatvāsaṃbhavāt | idameva bhāvarūpamajñānamavidyāśabdenocyate |

na caitaditi | etadahamajño māmanyaṃ ca na jānāmīti pratyakṣaṃ na māyāvādya
bhimatabhāvarūpājñānaviṣayakam | kiṃ tu jñānābhāvaviṣayakamiti nāśaṅkanīya
mityarthaḥ | ko hyevamiti | prābhākarā bhaṭṭāśca mīmāṃsakaviśeṣāḥ | prābhākara
matameva gurumatamityabhidhīyate | bhaṭṭaḥ kumārilabhaṭṭastutātabhaṭṭaśca | prabhākarasya
guruśabdavācatva itthamākhyāyikā śrūyate — kadācidayaṃ prabhākaro guroḥ sakā
śādadhyayanasamaye — ‘atra tunoktaṃ tatrāpinoktamataḥ paunaruktyam’ iti paṅktyarthāna
vabodhavyagramānase gurau svayaṃ pratibhayā tadarthamavabudhya guroḥ parokṣaṃ tādṛśapaṅktau —
atra tunā uktam | tatra apinā uktam ityākārakapadacchedacihnaṃ kṛtavān |
tunā — tuśabdena | apinā — apiśabdena | tadālokya cakitacetā guruḥ prabhākarasyedaṃ
kṛtyamiti śiṣyāntarebhyovagatya tvameva guruḥ iti prabhākaramīritavāniti |
ahamajña iti pratyakṣaṃ jñānābhāvaviṣayakamiti yaducyate tatprābhākaramatena bhaṭṭamatena
vetyarthaḥ | svarūpeti | ghaṭapaṭādyakhilaṃ vastujātaṃ pratyekaṃ rūpadvayātmakam | svakīyena
rūpeṇa sadātmakaṃ parakīyeṇa rūpeṇāsadātmakam | tathā ca kadācittatsadrūpeṇa jñāya
te kadācidasadrūpeṇa | sadrūpeṇa jñānakālepyasadrūpaṃ vartata eva | evamasadrūpeṇa jñānakā
lepi sadrūpaṃ vartata eva | yathā āmrādiphale rūparasagandhasparśādayaḥ sadā vartanta eva |
jñānaṃ tu tasya kadācidrūpavaiśiṣṭyena kadācidrasavaiśiṣṭyenetyādi bodhyam | bhāvā
ntaramiti | bhāvo ghaṭādiḥ padārthaḥ | anyo bhāvo bhāvāntaram | tadeva ca
kayācidvyapekṣayā tadīyāsadrūpapratipipādayiṣayā abhāvaśabdena vyavahriyate | na
tvabhāvo nāma bhāvāntarādatiriktaḥ kaścana padārthaḥ | tasya nirūpayitumaśa
kyatvāt | bhūtale ghaṭātyantābhāvaḥ kevalabhūtalasvarūpaḥ | ghaṭaprāgabhāvo mṛdeva |
ghaṭadhvaṃsaśca kharparameva | ghaṭabhedaśca paṭādireva | atra ca bhūtalamṛtkharparapaṭādīnāṃ
yadasadrūpaṃ tadeva tattadabhāvaśabdena vyavahriyate | bhūtalādi parakīyeṇa rūpeṇā
sadātmakamityuktam | tacca dvividham | pararūpeṇa paraviśiṣṭarūpeṇa ca | ādyaṃ
bhūtalaṃ na ghaṭa iti vyavahriyate | etacca yāvadāśrayasthāyi | dvitīyaṃ ca bhūtale na
ghaṭa iti vyavahriyate | sadrūpamasadrūpaṃ ceti dvividhamapi rūpaṃ pratyekaṃ punaḥ kiṃci
nnityaṃ kiṃcidanityamiti dvividham | nityaṃ cātra yāvadāśrayasthāyi na tu kadā
pyavināśi | anabhyupagamāditi | prābhākarā hyabhāvaṃ padārthāntaratvena nāṅgī
kurbanti | na dvitīya iti | bhaṭṭamate yadyapyabhāvaḥ padārthāntaraṃ vartate tathā
pyahamajña iti pratyakṣaṃ na jñānābhāvaviṣayakam | jñānaṃ yadi pratyakṣapramāṇena
gṛhyeta tarhi tadabhāvaḥ pratyakṣaviṣayaḥ syāt | na cāhaṃ jānāmītyanuvyavasāyā
tmakāntarapratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ jñānasya saṃbhavatīti naiyāyikamataṃ yuktamiti vācyam |
tathā sati tādṛśānuvyavasāyātmakaṃ jñānamapyanyenānuvyavasāyāntareṇa grāhyaṃ
tadapyanyena grāhyamityanavasthāpātāt | ataḥ svaprakāśatvameva tasya yuktaṃ dīpa
vat | na hi dīpo dīpāntareṇa prakāśyate | ato jñānamatīndriyameveti bhaṭṭaiḥ
siddhāntitam | tataśca pratyakṣayogyārthasya yo'bhāvastasya pratyakṣatvepi pratyakṣā
yogyasya jñānāderyo'bhāvastasyāpratyakṣatvamevetyahamajña iti pratyakṣaviṣayaṃ bhāva
rūpamajñānaṃ svīkāryameva | ṣaṣṭheti | abhāvasyānupalabdhirūpaṣaṣṭhapramāṇaviṣaya
tvāt | anupalabdhipramāṇasya pratyakṣapramāṇentarbhāva iti pakṣepyāha — jñāna
syeti | pratyakṣābhāvavādī kaścit | abhāvaḥ pratyakṣo bhavatīti bruvāṇo
naiyāyikādiḥ | nanvanuvyavasāyasyāpyanuvyavasāyāntareṇa grāhyatvaṃ syāditi cetpratha
monuvyavasāyo dvitīyenānuvyavasāyena gṛhyate dvitīyastṛtīyenetyevaṃ yāvadanu
bhavaṃ svīkāryatvāt | anavasthā tu na | carameṇānuvyavasāyena svayamajñātenāpi
vastusataiva svaprāgvartyanuvyavasāyasya grahaṇāt | tathā ca paragatasya jñānamātrasya
svagatasya ca nirvikalpakasyātīndriyatvepi svagatasya savikalpakasya jñānasya
pratyakṣaviṣayatvamastyevetyahamajña iti pratyakṣaṃ jñānābhāvaviṣayakamiti vaktuṃ śakyata
ityāśayaḥ | ahamajña iti | ahamajña ityasya hi tava rāmānujasya mate jñānā
bhāvavānahamityarthaḥ | asminnanubhave jñānābhāvādhikaraṇatvenāhamarthasyātmano jñānaṃ
vidyate na vā | tathā tatraivānubhave jñānābhāvapratiyogitvena jñānasya jñānaṃ vidyate
na vā | ādye jñānasya sattvena tadānīṃ jñānābhāva eva nāstīti dūre tasyānubhavaḥ |
dvitīye vidyamānasyāpi jñānābhāvasyānubhavo na saṃbhavati | abhāvajñānaṃ pratya
bhāvādhikaraṇajñānasyābhāvapratiyogijñānasya ca kāraṇatvāt | bhāvarūpasyājñānasya
tu na jñānena saha virodha iti māyāvādināmāśayaḥ |

gaganaromantheti | carvitasyāpakṛṣya punaryaccarvaṇaṃ paśvādibhiḥ kriyate sa roma
nthaḥ | sa tu tṛṇādereva saṃbhavati na tu gaganasya | amūrtatvāt | māyāvādyuktaṃ gaganaro
manthavadatyantāsaṃbhavītyarthaḥ | samānayogakṣematvāditi | tulyatvādityarthaḥ |
viṣayatveneti | māyāvādinomate hyātmasvarūpaṃ yajjñānaṃ sa evājñānasya viṣayaḥ |
ajñānāśrayaścātmaiva | sa eva cājñānasya vyāvartakaḥ | ahamajña ityevamajñānapratīti
kāle tasya jñānasvarūpasyātmanaḥ pratītirasti na vā | ādye'jñānavyāvartakasyātmasva
rūpajñānasya sattvena tadānīmajñānasya naiva sthitiḥ saṃbhavati | ātmasvarūpajñānani
vartyatvādajñānasya | dvitīye'jñānaviṣayasyājñānāśrayasya ca jñānābhāvenājñānasya
pratītirna syāt | vyāvartakasyaivātrājñānaviṣayatvādajñānāśrayatvācca | atheti |
ātmapratītirhi dvidhā sphuṭā asphuṭā ca | tatra sphuṭāyā evājñānavyāvartakatvam |
ahamajña ityādyajñānapratītikāle tvajñānasya viṣayatayāśrayatayā ca yātma
pratītirasti sā na sphuṭeti nājñānaṃ vyāvartayatīti śaṅkāśayaḥ | jñānābhā
vepīti | jñānābhāvepyadhikaraṇapratiyoginorviśadasvarūpāvabhāsa eva virodhī
nāviśadasvarūpāvabhāsa iti tulyameva sarvaṃ kevalamabhiniveśaṃ varjayitvā | abhi
niveśa āgrahaḥ | pakṣapāta iti yāvat | māyāvādināṃ yo bhāvarūpājñāne
pakṣapātaḥ sosmākaṃ nāsti | ata itarāṃśataulyepi na vādavicchittiḥ |

vivādāspadamiti | sādhyavattvena vādagrastamityarthaḥ | pramāṇajñānamiti
pakṣanirdeśaḥ | jñānamityukte brahmasvarūpajñānasya vastvantarapūrvakatvābhāvāttadvyāvṛttyarthaṃ
pramāṇajñānamityuktam | svaprāgabhāvetyādiḥ sādhyanirdeśaḥ | svaprāgabhāvavyatiriktaṃ
svaviṣayāvaraṇabhūtaṃ svanivartyaṃ svadeśagataṃ ca yadvastvantaraṃ tatpūrvakamityarthaḥ |
svaviṣayāvaraṇabhūtam | svasya pramāṇajñānasya viṣayabhūtaṃ yadbrahmādi tatsvarūpatiraskā
rakam | svadeśagatam | svasya pramāṇajñānasya yo deśa āśraya ātmā tanniṣṭham |
svasya pramāṇajñānasya yaḥ prāgabhāvastadvyāvṛttyarthaṃ svaprāgabhāvavyatirikteti | bhayādi
vyāvṛttyarthaṃ svaviṣayāvaraṇeti | dharmādharmavyāvṛttyarthaṃ svanivartyeti | tayorjñāna
viṣayāvaraṇatvaṃ tu kutracidyojanīyam | vedyagato yo vittyabhivyaktiprāgabhāva
stadvyāvṛttyarthaṃ svadeśagateti | vyavadhānabhūtabhittyādi tu na svanivartyaṃ nāpi
svadeśagatam | etādṛśaṃ ca bhāvarūpamajñānameva sidhyati | aprakāśiteti hetu
nirdeśaḥ | prakāśakatvādityetāvanmātroktau dhārāvāhikajñānasthala uttarottarajñā
nānāṃ prakāśakatvepi sādhyadharmābhāvādvyabhicāraḥ syāt | ato'prakāśitārtheti |
dvitīyadīpaprabhāyā aprakāśitārthaprakāśakatvābhāvātprathamotpannetyuktam | prathamo
tpannāyā api dīpaprabhāyā divā aprakāśitārthaprakāśakatvābhāvādandhakāra ityu
ktam | andhakāra eva tathāvidhaṃ vastvantaramiti na dṛṣṭānte sādhyavikalatā |

ajñānepīti | yathā aprakāśitārthaprakāśakatvena hetunā pramāṇajñānasya niru
ktavastvantarapūrvakatvaṃ sādhyate tathā tādṛśavastvantarasyājñānasyāpyaprakāśitapra
pañcarūpārthaprakāśakatvena niruktavastvantarapūrvakatvāpattāvajñānāntaraṃ sidhyet |
tathā sati tenājñānāntareṇa prapañcasyāvaraṇe saṃsāra eva na saṃbhavatītyapasiddhāntaḥ
syāt | atha vā ajñānasādhakasyoktānumānasya pramāṇajñānatvāttasya niruktavastva
ntarapūrvakatvasādhane'jñānāntaraṃ sidhyet | tena cājñānāntareṇānumānaviṣayasya
bhāvarūpājñānasyāvaraṇātsaṃsāra eva na saṃbhavatītyapasiddhāntaḥ syādityarthaḥ |
tadasādhana iti | bhāvarūpājñānasya tatsādhakānumānasya vā niruktavastvantara
pūrvakatvāsādhane tu tadgatasyāprakāśitārthaprakāśakatvasya tatraiva sādhyābhāvavadvṛ
ttitvena hetorvyabhicaritatvaṃ syāt | dūṣaṇāntaramāha — dṛṣṭāntasyeti |

pratiprayogaḥ | pratyanumānam | ajñānaṃ pakṣaḥ | jñānamātraṃ yadbrahma tadāśritatvā
bhāvaḥ sādhyam | mātrapadena jñānaguṇakatvavyavacchedaḥ | yathā jīvasya jāyamānaṃ śukti
kādyajñānaṃ jñātṛniṣṭhaṃ na tu jñānaniṣṭhaṃ jīvasya jñātṛtvāttathaivedaṃ māyāvādyabhimataṃ
bhāvarūpājñānaṃ jñātrāśritaṃ syānna tu jñānāśritamityarthaḥ | māyāvādibhistu tada
jñānaṃ jñānarūpabrahmāśritamabhyupeyate | nanviti | māyāvādimate jīvasya vastuto
naiva jñātṛtvaṃ kiṃ tu jñānamātrasvarūpatvamiti śuktikādyajñānaṃ jñānamātrāśritameveti
dṛṣṭānto na saṃbhavatīti śaṅkāśayaḥ | jīvasya jñātṛtvaṃ jñānasya ca jīvaguṇatvaṃ
prasiddhyanurodhena sādhayati — anubhūtirhīti | kasyacidvastuna iti | svavi
ṣayasyetyarthaḥ | ghaṭajñānameva hi ghaṭasya jalāharaṇādivyavahārānuguṇyaṃ saṃpādayati |
jñānamavagatiḥ saṃvidityādīnyanubhūternāmāni | ādipadena bodhanāmaparigrahaḥ |
nanu jñāneti | rāmānujīyairjīvātmanaḥ paramātmanaśca jñānasvarūpatvamaṅgīkriyata
eva | tathā ca kathaṃ tayorjñānaguṇakatvam | na hi svarūpameva svasya guṇo bhavatīti
śaṅkāśayaḥ | tadasāramiti | apratyakṣasyātmano yathā jñānasvarūpatvaṃ śruti
pramāṇena svīkriyate tathā tenaiva pramāṇena tasya jñānaguṇakatvamapi svīkriyate |
svarūpasya guṇatvaṃ kathamiti tu nāśaṅkanīyam | svarūpabhūtajñānātpārthakyena guṇa
bhūtajñānasya svīkārāt | tatra dṛṣṭāntamāha — yathā hīti | maṇirhīrakādiḥ |
dyumaṇiḥ sūryaḥ | sa ca svayaṃ tejaḥsvarūpopi tejorūpāyāḥ prabhāyā āśrayo
bhavati | tasya prabhāviśiṣṭarūpeṇāvasthitatvāt | nanu prabhāyā dravyatvameva nāsti
kutastadvyāpyaṃ tejastvamiti cettatrāha — svāśrayāditi | guṇāḥ kecidavyāpya
vṛttayaḥ | yathākāśe śabdaḥ | sa hyākāśaikadeśe vartate na kṛtsne | kecidvyā
pyavṛttayaḥ | yathā ghaṭe rūpam | taddhi antarbahiśca kṛtsnaṃ ghaṭaṃ vyāpya vartate | prabhā
tu nityaṃ sūryasaṃbaddhāpi sūryādanyatra samudraparvatabhūmyādau dṛśyate | ato na tasyā
guṇatvam | kiṃ ca prabhāyāḥ śuklarūpāśrayatvāddravyatvameva svīkāryam | guṇeṣu guṇā
saṃbhavāt | prabhāyā guṇatvavyavahārastu tasyāḥ sūryāditejontarāvalambitvena guṇa
sādṛśyādgauṇaḥ | evaṃ prabhāyā dravyatve siddhe tasyāstejastvaṃ pratyakṣasiddhameva |
tathātmano guṇabhūtaṃ jñānamapi vastuto dravyameva | tasya guṇatvavyavahārastu gauṇaḥ |
nityamātmarūpadravyāntarasaṃbaddhatvena guṇasādṛśyāt | svaprakāśeti | svaprakāśā
yā cid jñānaṃ tatsvarūpa eva san jñānāntaraguṇakaḥ | ātmano jñānasvarūpatve
jñānaguṇakatve ca pramāṇabhūtā dvividhā api śrutīrdarśayati — tathā ceti | sa
yatheti | yathā saindhavaghano lavaṇakhaṇḍonantarontarāvayavavyatirikto'bāhyo
bāhyāvayavavyatiriktaśca sarvopi rasaghano bhavati | atrāntaro bāhyaśca rasaghana
ityukte madhyāvayavānāṃ rasaghanatvaṃ na syāt | atastatsaṃgrahāyānantaro'bāhya iti
vyatirekeṇoktam | kiṃ cātmano niravayavatvāttaddṛṣṭāntabhūtasya saindhavaghanasya tatsā
dhāraṇyasaṃpādanāyetthamuktiḥ | evamayamātmā prajñānaghana ityarthaḥ | atrātmano
jñānasvarūpatvamuktam | atrāyamiti | atrāsyāṃ svapnāvasthāyāmayamātmā
sva yaṃjyotirbhavati | jñānasvarūpatvātsvaprakāśo bhavati | svāpnahastyādipadārtha
bhānaṃ tu dharmabhūtajñānenaivetyanyat | na hi vijñāturiti | vijñāturvijñānāśraya
syātmano yā vijñātirguṇabhūtajñānaṃ tasyā vināśo nāsti nityatvādityarthaḥ |
atha ya iti | atrātmanovaghrātṛtvoktyā jñātṛtvaṃ sidhyati | avaghrāṇasya
jñānaviśeṣatvāt | tena cātmano jñānaguṇakatvaṃ sidhyati | yoyamiti | vijñā
namaya iti prācuryārthe mayaṭpratyayaḥ | tenātmano jñānavyatireka ukta iti tasya
jñānaguṇakatvaṃ sidhyati | prāṇeṣu indriyeṣu madhye | ātmano jyotīrūpatvoktyā
jñānasvarūpatvaṃ ca sidhyati | ātmā svayaṃ jñānarūpopi guṇabhūtajñānadvārendriyā
disādhanaiśca viṣayāvabhāsako bhavati | pramādvārā sūrya ivetyarthaḥ | eṣa hīti |
atra draṣṭā spraṣṭetyādinirdeśādātmano jñānaguṇakatvaṃ sidhyati | vijñānātmetyanena
jñānasvarūpatvaṃ ca sidhyati | etenātmano jñātṛtvameva na jñānasvarūpatvamiti
vadantastārkikāstathātmano jñānasvarūpatvameva na jñātṛtvamiti vadanto māyā
vādinaśca nirastā bhavanti |

anṛteneti | ṛtaṃ satyam | taditaradanṛtamasatyaṃ jaganmūlakāraṇaṃ māyākhyaṃ
bhāvarūpamajñānam | tena svakāryabhūtaśabdādiviṣayadvārā kāmādīnutpādya prajā
hṛtāḥ svarūpādbahirapakṛṣṭā ityarthaḥ | karmavacanaḥ | puṇyakarmavācī | ṛtaṃ
pibantāviti śrutau sukṛtasya loka ityuktatvāt | ṛtaṃ pibantāvityasyāvaśyaṃ
bhāvikarmaphalamanubhavantāvityarthaḥ | parameti | paramapuruṣasya brahmaṇa ārādhana
meva veṣaḥ svarūpaṃ yasya tādṛśam | nanu māyāṃ tu prakṛtimiti śrutau māyāśa
bdena jagatprakṛtibhūtaṃ bhāvarūpamajñānamucyata iti cettatrāha — māyāṃ tviti |
teneti | bālasya prahlādasya dehaṃ rakṣatāśugāminā tena viṣṇucakreṇa śambarasya
prahlādanāśārthaṃ hiraṇyakaśipupreṣitasya śambaranāmakadaityasya tanmāyāsahasramastrajā
lamekaikāṃśena sūditaṃ nāśitam | atra na māyāśabdasyānirvacanīyārthakatvam | tasya
jñānabādhyasya śastracchedyatvāsaṃbhavāt | na hi rajjusarpaḥ śastracchedyo bhavati |

nanu tattvamasīti śrutau jīvaparayoraikyamupadiśyate | tacca tayorvastuto
bhede na saṃbhavati | ato bhedasya kālpanikatvameva svīkāryam | tada
nyathānupapattyā tādṛśabhedajñānajanakatvenānirvacanīyājñānaṃ sidhyatītyarthāpatti
pramāṇena bhāvarūpamajñānaṃ sādhayantaṃ māyāvādinaṃ pratyāha — nāpīti | tattvaṃ
padayoriti | viruddhayorjīvaparayoḥ svarūpaikyamasmādvākyātpratipattumaśakyam |
tattvaṃpadayorubhayorapi saviśeṣabrahmapratipādakatvāt | tathā ca nīlo ghaṭa ityatreva
sāmānādhikaraṇyena vākyārthopapattāvarthāpattiratra nodayamāsādayati | anava
dhiketi | na avadhirmaryādā yasya tādṛśotiśayo yeṣāṃ tathābhūtā asaṃkhyeyāśca
ye kalyāṇakārakā guṇāstadāspadam | vibhavo viśiṣṭāvasthitiḥ | tadaikṣateti |
tatparaṃ brahma vicitrānantacidacinmiśravyaṣṭijagadrūpeṇāhameva bahu syāṃ tadarthaṃ
cādau prajāyeya prakarṣeṇa tejobannādisamaṣṭirūpeṇa jāyeyetyarthaḥ | ayaṃ ca
jagadutpattiprākkāliko brahmaṇaḥ saṃkalpaḥ | etādṛśo jagadutpattiviṣayakaḥ
saṃkalpaśca brahmaṇokhiladoṣarāhityenantakalyāṇaguṇāśrayatve satyeva saṃbhavati
nānyatheti tādṛśadharmavaiśiṣṭyaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sidhyati | atastathāvidhameva brahmāgre
tattvamasītyatra tatpadena parāmṛśyate | acidviśiṣṭeti | acitā jaḍena dehena
viśiṣṭo yo jīvastaccharīrakaṃ brahmeti viśiṣṭaṃ brahmaiva tvaṃpadārtho na tu jīva
mātram | prakāradvayeti | yathā nīlo ghaṭa ityatra nīlaguṇarūpaprakāraviśiṣṭaṃ
vastu nīlapadavācyam | ghaṭatvajātirūpaprakāraviśiṣṭaṃ vastu ghaṭapadavācyam | vastu
naścaikatvānnīlaghaṭapadayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyamityarthaḥ |

māyāvādī śaṅkate — nanviti | viruddheti | viruddho yo bhārgośastasya
tyāgo yasyāṃ tādṛśī yā lakṣaṇā tayetyarthaḥ | vartamānakālasaṃbandhīti |
puruṣaḥ pratīyata iti parāmṛśyate | tayoriti | tadbodhakapadasāmānādhikaraṇyena
tayoḥ puruṣayoraikyamavagamyata ityarthaḥ | yugapadviruddheti | mitho viruddhaṃ yadbhinnaṃ
dūrasaṃnihitarūpaṃ deśadvayaṃ tatraikasya puruṣasya yugapatsthitirna saṃbhavati | tathā mitho
viruddhaṃ yadbhūtavartamānarūpaṃ kāladvayaṃ tatraikasya yugapatsthitirna saṃbhavati | svarūpa
paratve | svarūpaṃ vyaktiḥ | deśakālavaiśiṣṭyarahitavyaktimātraparatve ityarthaḥ |

samādhatte — viṣama iti | ayukta ityarthaḥ | dṛṣṭāntepi | soyaṃ devadatta
iti vākyepi | apinā tattvamasītyasya samuccayaḥ | virodhavaidhuryeṇa | virodha
rāhityena | virodharāhityamevopapādayati — ekasyeti | ya eva devadattaḥ pūrva
māsītsa evedānīmastītyekasya bhinnakālasaṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati pratīyate ca | yuga
panna saṃbhavatīti cetkiṃ tataḥ | na hi soyaṃ devadatta ityatra yaugapadyaṃ kasmādapi
śabdātpratīyate | ekakālaviśiṣṭeparakālavaiśiṣṭyasyāsaṃbhavepyekatra dvayamiti
pakṣasyāṅgīkāre bādhakābhāvāt | tathā ca kālayormitho virodhepyekatra tayoḥ
saṃbandho na viruddhaḥ | evaṃ bhinnadeśayormitho virodhepyekatra tayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ
kālabhedena saṃbhavatyeveti sopi na viruddhaḥ | tadevāha — deśāntareti | lakṣa
ṇāmabhyupetya doṣāntaramāha — lakṣaṇāpakṣepīti | lakṣaṇā hi jaghanyā vṛttirna
mukhyā | sā ca mukhyārthabādhe satyagatyā svīkriyate | tathā caikapade tatkalpana
yaivopapattau padadvaye tatkalpanamanyāyyam | na hi gaṃgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gaṃgāghoṣa
padayordvayorapi lakṣaṇā svīkriyate | vastuta idaṃ cintyam | lakṣaṇāyāṃ hi nānva
yānupapattimātraṃ tantram | kiṃ tu tātparyānupapattiḥ | tathā ca tātparyārthāvirodhāyai
kasyeva dvayostrayāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ vā padānāṃ lakṣaṇā na doṣāya | viṣaṃ bhuṅkṣvetyādau
mā cāsya gṛhe bhukthāḥ ityarthe sarvapadalakṣaṇāyā dṛṣṭatvāt | kiṃ cātra padadvaye
lakṣaṇāyāmapi na tādṛśaṃ gauravam | ubhayatra lakṣyatāvacchedakasyaikatvāditi |
itarathā | lakṣaṇāṃ vināpi vākyārthopapatteḥ prāgdarśitāyā anabhyupagame | ayaṃ
bhāvaḥ — kālabhedena vastu bhidyate na vā | na bhidyate cetkimarthaṃ lakṣaṇāśrayaṇam |
bhidyate cetkṣaṇikavādino bauddhasya mataṃ svīkṛtaṃ syāditi bauddho vijayeteti |
vastuta idaṃ cintyam | upādhigatena bhedenopadheye bhedāṅgīkāre hi bauddhamatāṅgīkāraḥ
syāt | na tu tathā | aupādhiko bheda ityasya hyupādhirbhinna ityarthaḥ | upadheyaṃ
tu vastuta ekarūpameva | kevalamupādhigato bheda upadheye bhedavyavahāraprayojako
bhavati | upadheye'vidyamānopi bheda ālakṣyata iti yāvat | soyaṃ devadatta iti
vākyaṃ tu nābhedotpattyartham | tasya vastuta eva sattvāt | kiṃ tvabhedajñāpanārtham |
tathā ca vastusata evābhedasya jñāpanārthesminvākye lakṣaṇāśrayaṇamāvaśyakamiti |
atrāpi | tattvamasītyatrāpi | jīvaḥ śarīram | paramātmā hi tasyātmā |
ātmaśarīraśabdau hi pratidvandvibhūtau | tathā ca jīvaparamātmanormadhye śarīrā
tmabhāvasaṃbandhasya sattvāttvaṃśabdasya ca jīvaśarīrakaparamātmavācakatvāttattvamiti
padadvayapratipāditaṃ tādātmyaṃ na virudhyate | jīvātmā hīti | jīvātmā hi
brahmaśarīrarūpeṇa sadā brahmaprakārabhūtaḥ | brahmaprakāratvenaiva hi jīvasya vastutvam |
ato jīvapratipādakastvaṃśabdo brahmaparyantameva svārthamabhidadhāti | brahmātmakaḥ |
brahma ātmā yasya tādṛśaḥ | tatra pramāṇamāha — ya ātmanīti |

atyalpamiti | tvaṃśabdo jīvāntaryāmiparamātmavācaka iti yaducyate tada
tyalpam | kiṃ tu sarve eva śabdā ghaṭapaṭādayastattadantaryāmiparamātmaparyantārthakāḥ |
ghaṭapaṭādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ brahmaśarīratvenaiva vastutvāt | na ca ghaṭapaṭādiśabdānāṃ
sarveṣāṃ paramātmārthakatvena paryāyatvamiti vācyam | ghaṭaśabdo hi ghaṭavyaktidvārā
tadantaryāmiparamātmavācakaḥ | paṭaśabdastu paṭavyaktidvāreti prakārībhūtadvārabhedāt |
jīvasyeti | saṃsthānaṃ hastapādādyavayavaracanāviśeṣaḥ | yathā devamanuṣyādi
śarīrāṇi tattadabhimānijīvasya śarīratayā tatprakārabhūtāni tathā sarvāṇi vastūni
brahmātmakāni | brahma ātmā yeṣāṃ tādṛśāni santyeva vastutvamāpannāni | devo
manuṣya iti | kāṣṭhaśilādiṣvapyanudbhūtaṃ caitanyamastyeveti devādiśabdavatkā
ṣṭhādiśabdā api tattadarthābhimānijīvāntaryāmiparamātmaparyantamevārthamabhidadhati |
jīvasya tadantaryāmiṇaścāpratyakṣatvena lokāḥ kevalaṃ bāhyamevārthaṃ tattacchabdavācyaṃ
manyante | tadvācyatayeti | tattacchabdavācyatayā pratīyamānaṃ yattattadākāra
viśiṣṭaṃ vastu tasya taddvārā tādṛśavastvabhimānino jīvasya tādṛśajīvadvārā
jīvāntaryāmiparamātmanaśceti vastujīvaparamātmarūpasaṃghātasya vācakāḥ | tattva
muktāvalyāmiti | tattvamuktākalāpaḥ śrīveṅkaṭanāthadeśikaviracito viśi
ṣṭādvaitamatānusārī pañcasarātmakaḥ prakaraṇagranthaḥ | mauktikānāṃ yathā sarāstathātra
granthe sarānparikalpya teṣu pañcasu sareṣu krameṇa jaḍadravyaṃ jīvo nāyako buddhi
radravyaṃ ceti pañca viṣayā nirūpitāḥ | asyaiva tattvamuktāvalītyaparaṃ nāma syāditi
bhāti | jīvamiti | devādiśabdo jīvaṃ vadati | jīvāpṛthaksiddhasya devādi
śarīrarūpasya bhāvasyābhidhānāt | jīvasaṃbandhaṃ vinā śarīrasvarūpameva na sidhya
tīti śarīrasya jīvāpṛthaksiddhatvam | kiṃ ceha viśiṣṭerthe loke vede ca devādi
śabdaprayogo niṣkarṣābhāvayukto bhūyāndṛśyate | niṣkarṣaḥ pārthakyam | tadeva yatra
pratipādyaṃ tatra kevalārthe prayogostu nāma | loke hi devamanuṣyapaśupakṣyādayaḥ
śabdā na kevalaṃ jīve nāpi kevalaṃ śarīre prayujyante | vedepi catvāraḥ pañcadaśa
rātrā devatvaṃ gacchantīti | atra devatvamityasya devaśarīraviśiṣṭatvamityarthaḥ |
evaṃ loke vede ca viśiṣṭārthe eva prayoga ityevaṃ yo niyamo dṛśyate tatrāpṛtha
ksiddhaviśeṣaṇatvameva tantram | asti cāpṛthaksiddhatvaṃ śarīriṇā śarīrasya | yata
ātmano'saṃbandhakāle maraṇottaraṃ devamanuṣyādimūrteḥ sthitiḥ pūrvavannāvagamyate |
na hi mṛtasya śarīraṃ kṣaṇamapi pūrvavadavatiṣṭhate | vibhuḥ paramātmāpi sarvatra jīvā
tmanonupraveśādeva jagati nāmarūpe vyākarot | ato'ciccharīrako jīvaḥ aci
jjīvaśarīraka īśvara iti cetanācetanaśabdānāṃ paramātmaparyantārthābhidhānaṃ yukta
miti | saṃsthāneti |

saṃsthānaikyādyabhāve bahuṣu nirupadhirdehaśabdasya rūḍhi-
rlokāmnāyaprayogānugatamiha tato lakṣma niṣkarṣaṇīyam |
avyāptatvādiduḥsthaṃ paramatapaṭhitaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tatra tasmā-
dyaddhītulyāśrayaṃ yadvapuridamapṛthaksiddhimad dravyamasya ||
saṃsthānaṃ hastapādādyavayavasaṃniveśaviśeṣaḥ | sa ca devamanuṣyapaśupakṣilatādyaneka
vidhaśarīreṣveko nāsti | teṣu sarveṣu dehaśabdasya rūḍhiśca nirupadhireva loke vede
ca dṛśyate | atastadanusāreṇa śarīrasya lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam | naiyāyikādiparamate
paṭhitaṃ yacceṣṭāśrayatvādi lakṣaṇaṃ tadavyāptyādidoṣaduṣṭam | īśvaraśarīratvenābhimateṣu
kālādiṣu ceṣṭāyā abhāvāt | tasmād dhiyā jñānena saha tulyāśrayaṃ samā
nādhikaraṇaṃ yad dravyaṃ yasyāpṛthaksiddhimad bhavati tattasya vapurityucyate |
śabdairiti |

śabdaistanvaṃśarūpaprabhṛtibhirakhilaḥ sthāpyate viśvamūrte-
ritthaṃbhāvaḥ prapañcastadanavagamatastatpṛthaksiddhamohaḥ |
śrotrādyairāśrayebhyaḥ sphurati khalu pṛthak śabdagandhādidharmo
jīvātmanyapyadṛśye vapurapi hi dṛśā gṛhyatenanyaniṣṭham ||
tatsarvaṃ vai harestanuḥ vi. pu. 1 | 22 | 37 mamaivāṃśo jīvaloke gī. 15 | 7
dve rūpe brahmaṇastasya vi. pu. 1 | 22 | 53 viṣṇuśaktiḥ parā proktā vi. pu.
6 | 7 | 61 yadambu vaiṣṇavaḥ kāyaḥ vi. pu. 2 | 12 | 37 yasyātmā śarīram |
bṛ. 3 | 7 | 22 ityādiṣu tanvādiśabdairayamakhilaḥ prapañco viśvamūrterviṣṇo
ritthaṃbhāvo'pṛthaksiddhaviśeṣaṇībhūta iti sthāpyate | loke tu tasya viśeṣyabhū
tasyeśvarasyānavagamādetatpṛthaksiddhamiti mohaḥ pāmarāṇām | jñānināṃ tu sarvadā
prapañcasyeśvarādapṛthaksiddhatvenaiva pratītirvyavahāraśca | yathā śrotraghrāṇādyairimdriyaiḥ
śabdagandhādiguṇā ākāśapṛthivyādyāśrayāpekṣayā pṛthakkevalā eva jñāyante | śrotrā
dīnāmāśrayagrahaṇāsāmarthyāt | tatheśvaragrahaṇānarhairalpajñānāṃ pramāṇairīśvarātpārtha
kyena kevalasya prapañcasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati | jīvātmanyapi cakṣurādibhiradṛśye
manogrāhye sati cakṣuṣā gṛhyamāṇaṃ śarīraṃ na jīvaviśeṣaṇatvena gṛhyate | kiṃ
tvananyaniṣṭhaṃ pṛthaksiddhamiti gṛhyate | jīvasya cakṣurgrāhyatvābhāvāt | jagataḥ
paramātmāpṛthaksiddhimuktvā tadvācināṃ padānāṃ niṣkarṣābhiprāyābhāve sati
paramātmaparyantārthakatvamityāha — niṣkarṣeti |

niṣkarṣākūtahānau vimatipadapadānyantarātmānamekaṃ
tanmūrtervācakatvādabhidadhati yathā rāmakṛṣṇādiśabdāḥ |
sarveṣāmāptamukhyairagaṇi ca vacasāṃ śāśvatesminpratiṣṭhā
pākaistasyāpratīterjagati taditaraiḥ syācca bhaṅktvā prayogaḥ ||
niṣkarṣaḥ pārthakyam | ākūtamabhiprāyaḥ | apṛthaksiddhasyāpi vastuno yatra
pārthakyena pratipādanamabhipretaṃ tatra kevalaśarīrārthakatvaṃ śabdasyāstu nāma | yathā
jīvātmana idaṃ bhautikaṃ śarīram — ityatra śarīraśabdo na śarīrāntargatajīvaparya
ntārthakaḥ | yasya pṛthivī śarīramityādau pṛthivyādayaḥ śabdā apyevam | paraṃ tu yatra
tathā vivakṣā nāsti tatra sarvatrāntaryāmiparyantārthakatvam | tadevātra pūrvārdhenu
mānena sādhitam | vimatipadāni vivādāspadāni padāni sarvāṇyekāntarātmapa
ryantārthamabhidadhati | niṣkarṣābhiprāyarahitatve sati tadapṛthaksiddhatanmūrtivācaka
tvāt | yathā rāmakṛṣṇādiśabdāḥ | āptamukhyairmaharṣibhiḥ sarveṣāṃ vacasāṃ śabdānāṃ
śāśvatesminparamātmani pratiṣṭhā vācakatvenāvasthitiragaṇi kalpitā | yathā vacasāṃ
vācyamuttamam | natāḥ sma sarvavacasāṃ pratiṣṭhā yatra śāśvatīti | pākā ḍimbhā
ajñāninaḥ | taistādṛśārthasyāpratīterviśeṣaṇībhūtaśarīramātrārthakatvena prayogaḥ
kriyate | tādṛśājñānibhiḥ saha jagati vyavaharadbhistaditarairvidvadbhirapi bhaṅktvā
lakṣaṇayā kevalārthe śabdānāṃ prayogaḥ kriyata ityarthaḥ |

sarvapramāṇasyeti | viśeṣarahitasya vastuno rūpādyabhāvānna tatra pratyakṣapra
māṇapravṛttiḥ | nāpītarapramāṇāni | pratyakṣamūlakatvātteṣāmiti bhāvaḥ | ni
rvikalpaketi | niṣprakārakajñānaṃ nirvikalpakamityevaṃ naiyāyikoktaṃ nirvika
lpakamatra na gṛhyate | tādṛśasya niṣprakārakajñānasya rāmānujīyaiḥ kvāpyanaṅgī
kārāt | kiṃ tvekajātīyadravyeṣu prathamapiṇḍagrahaṇam | yathā pūrvamadṛṣṭa
ghaṭasya devadattādeḥ prathamato jāyamānamayaṃ ghaṭa iti jñānam | atra yadyapi
ghaṭatvarūpaḥ prakāro bhāsata eva tathāpīdaṃ ghaṭatvametādṛśeṣu ghaṭāntareṣvanuvṛtta
mityevamanuvṛttākāratā na pratīyata ityāśayenaitadrāmānujīyairnirvikalpakamucyate |
dvitīyādighaṭajñāneṣu tu pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭo yo ghaṭastajjātīyoyamityevamanuvṛttirghaṭa
tvasya pratīyata iti tasya savikalpakatvam | evaṃ ca rāmānujābhimate nirvikalpake
saviśeṣameva vastu pratīyata iti siddham | anyatheti | prathamajñāne yadi prakāro
na bhāsate tarhi soyamiti tacchabdena pūrvajñātaghaṭatvādiprakāraviśiṣṭapratītiryā
jāyate sā nopapadyate | naiyāyikādayastu prāthamikasavikalpakajñāne soyamityevaṃ
pratītireva na bhavatīti manyante |

ita eva vārucerāha — kiṃ ceti | sarvaḥ prapañco bhrāntyāvabhāsata ityevaṃ
vādināṃ māyāvedāntināṃ mate prapañcāntargato vedopi bhrāntimūlaka eveti
tena prapañcasya bādho na syāt | vastuto rajjvāṃ bhrāntena kenacidayaṃ sarpa
ityukte yathā tatra na viśvāso jāyate tadvat | nivartakamiti | prapañcasyeti
saṃbadhyate | tatra | brahmātmaikye | avidyāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvasya prāgupapādita
tvena pratyakṣasiddhasya bhedasyānapalapanīyatayā brahmātmaikyasya pramāṇasiddhatvaṃ na
bhavati | kiṃ ca sarvapramāṇāni saviśeṣavastuviṣayāṇyevetyanupadamevoktam | viśe
ṣeṇa ca vastunaḥ sadvitīyataiva bhavatīti nātmaikyaṃ pramāṇasiddhaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ |
na ceti | paramātmavyatiriktasya prapañcasya satyatve paramātmana ekasya jñānena
prapañcasya jñānaṃ na saṃbhavati | na hi ghaṭajñānena paṭajñānaṃ bhavitumarhati | tathā
caikavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñā chāndogyaśrutyuktā rāmānujamate viruddhā syāt |
māyāvādimate tu sarvasya prapañcasyātmanyāropitatvena prapañcādhiṣṭhānabhūtasyaikasyā
tmano jñānenāropitasya jñānaṃ sulabham | yathā rajjau jñātāyāṃ tatra kalpitasya
sarpasya kiṃ tattvaṃ tajjñāyate tadvat | sarvavastujñānaṃ ca sarvavastugatatattvāṃśajñāna
meveti | atra caikena mṛtpiṇḍena vijñātena sarvaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavatīti śrutau
dṛṣṭānta āmnātaḥ | yadyapi dṛṣṭānte mṛtpiṇḍaghaṭādīnāṃ mṛṇmayānāṃ mṛtpariṇāmyu
pādānakāraṇaṃ dārṣṭāntike tu paramātmā sarvasyāsya jagato vivartopādānakāraṇa
miti vaiṣamyaṃ tathāpi na tadbādhakam | yato vivakṣitenāṃśena dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭānti
kayoḥ sāmyamāvaśyakam | aṃśāntareṇa sāmyaṃ tu yathāsaṃbhavamupapādanīyaṃ na
tvāvaśyakam | atra tvekavijñānena sarvavijñānamityayamaṃśo vivakṣitaḥ | tena
sāmyamastyeveti | rāmānujamatenottarayati — prakṛtīti | prakṛtiḥ sarvasya jaḍa
jātasya mūlakāraṇaṃ triguṇātmakaṃ pradhānam | puruṣā jīvāḥ | mahattatvaṃ buddhisā
mānyam | ahaṃkārohamityākāro buddhiviśeṣaḥ | tanmātraṃ cedamityākāro buddhiviśeṣaḥ |
idameva pañcamahābhūtānāṃ sūkṣmaṃ rūpam | prakṛtyādyātmakaṃ yadbrahmāṇḍaṃ tadantarvarti
naśca ye devatiryagādayaḥ sarvaprakārāstadrūpeṇa racanāviśeṣeṇāvasthitametatkāryaṃ brahma
śarīratvādbrahmaiva | mūlakāraṇaṃ pradhānamapi brahmaśarīratvādbrahmaiva | pradhānaṃ sūkṣmaṃ
śarīram | tadvikārabhūtaṃ brahmāṇḍaṃ tu sthūlaśarīram | sūkṣmaśarīraviśiṣṭātma
jñānena ca sthūlaśarīraviśiṣṭātmajñānaṃ sulabhameva | yathā kaściddevadattādiḥ pūrvaṃ
bālyāvasthāyāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ sa eva punastāruṇye sthūlaśarīrako dṛṣṭaścetsoyamityevaṃ jñāyate
tadvat | sūkṣmaśarīrajñānena tadvikārabhūtasya sthūlasya jñānamiti tātparyam | sūkṣma
śarīraṃ ca sthūlasya pariṇāmyupādānakāraṇaṃ mṛdādirghaṭāderiveti dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭānti
