kayoḥ pariṇāmitvāṃśenāpi sāmyādupapannataratvamityuktam | vastutastu nāyaṃ śrutera
bhiprāyo yuktaḥ | śrutyakṣarāsvārasyāt | ekavijñānena sarvavijñānamityatra kāraṇī
bhūtaṃ yadvijñānaṃ tadviṣayībhūtaḥ sūkṣmaśarīraviśiṣṭa ātmā rāmānujairuktaḥ | kārya
bhūtajñānaviṣayībhūtaśca sthūlaśarīraviśiṣṭa ātmā tairuktaḥ | ubhayatrāpi cātmaśa
bdokterna viśiṣṭaṃ kiṃcitprayojanam | sūkṣmaśarīrajñānena tatkāryasya sthūlaśarīrasya
jñānamityatraiva tātparyam | kāryakāraṇayoraikyāt | paraṃ tu na tathā śrutau nirdeśo
dṛśyate | tatra hi kāraṇībhūtajñānaviṣayatvenātmā nirdiṣṭaḥ | kāryabhūtajñānaviṣaya
tvena ca jagannirdiṣṭamiti | ita eva vārucerāha — api ceti | bādhyeteti |
sato hi vijñānaṃ na tvasataḥ | na hi śaśaśṛṅgasya vijñānaṃ saṃbhavati | nanu jagataḥ
satyatve tadvināśāsaṃbhavātpralayānupapattiriti cettatrāha — nāmarūpeti | eta
nnāmaka īdṛśaścāyamityevaṃ yo nāmarūpavibhāgastadanarhā yā sūkṣmāvasthā tadyuktā
prakṛtirmahattattvādirūpeṇāpariṇateti yāvat | tathāvidhāśca ye puruṣā jīvā ayaṃ
devoyaṃ manuṣya ityādirūpeṇa nirdeṣṭumaśakyāstaccharīrakaṃ brahma kāraṇāvastham |
iyamavasthaiva pralaya ityucyate |

nanvevaṃ brahmaṇaḥ saviśeṣatve nirguṇam cū. 7 ityādiśrutivirodha itya
trāha — nirguṇavādā iti | hātuṃ yogyā heyāstyājyāḥ | prakṛtisaṃbandha
mūlakā ye jarāmaraṇādayastyājyā guṇāste paramātmani na santīti nirguṇa
śrutestātparyamiti bhāvaḥ | nanvevamapi paramātmanaḥ sakāśājjīvānāṃ jaḍava
stūnāṃ ca bhedenāvasthitau neha nānāsti bṛ. 4 | 4 | 19 ekamevādvitīyam
chā. 6 | 2 | 1 ityādiśrutivirodhota āha — nānātveti | cetanāceta
nātmakam | jīvajaḍasvarūpam | jīvānāṃ jaḍānāṃ ca brahmaprakāratvenaiva vastutvam |
sarvaprakāramiti | bahuvrīhiḥ | jīvajaḍaprakārakamityarthaḥ | sarvātmaketi |
sarvamātmā svarūpaṃ yasya | sarvaṃ hi jagatparamātmaśarīratayā paramātmasvarūpameva |
tathā ca jīvajaḍarūpaśarīraviśiṣṭaṃ yadbrahma tādṛśaviśiṣṭabrahmaṇaḥ sakāśātpṛthagbhūtaṃ
kiṃcidapi nāsti | yadbrahmaśarīrabhūtaṃ na bhavati tādṛśaṃ kiṃcidapi nāstīti nānā
tvaniṣedhapratipādakaśrutestātparyamityarthaḥ |

kimatreti | rāmānujīyāḥ kiṃ bhedavādina utābhedavādinotha vā bhedā
bhedavādina iti praśnārthaḥ | uttarayati — sarvaṃ tattvamiti | rāmānujīyā
bhedavādino'bhedavādina ubhayavādinaścetyarthaḥ | tadupapādayati — tatra sarveti |
sarvaśarīratayeti sarvaprakāramiti ca bahuvrīhiḥ | svarūpasvabhāveti | citāṃ
jīvānāṃ svarūpaṃ jñānātmakamityacitsvarūpāpekṣayā citāṃ svarūpavailakṣaṇyam |
cidīśvarayostu yadyapi jñānātmakaṃ svarūpaṃ samameva tathāpīśvarasvarūpaṃ vibhu
jīvānāṃ tvaṇviti cidīśvarayoḥ svarūpavailakṣaṇyaṃ bodhyam | asaṃkuciteti |
asaṃkucitaṃ paricchedarahitaṃ nirmalaṃ ca yajjñānaṃ tatsvarūpāṇāṃ jīvātmanāmi
tyarthaḥ | anena jīvānāṃ jaḍāpekṣayā svarūpavailakṣaṇyamuktam | jīvānāṃ
svarūpabhūtajñānasya na kadāpi saṃkocaḥ | karmaṇā saṃkocastu guṇabhūtajñāna
syaiva | anādi yatkarma tadrūpayā avidyayā veṣṭitānām | rāmānujamate karmai
vāvidyā | jaganmūlabhūtāyāḥ śrīśaṃkarācāryairuktāyā avidyāyā rāmānujīyaira
svīkārāt | jñānasaṃkoceti | guṇabhūtajñānasya saṃkoco vikāśaśca jīvānāṃ
svabhāvaḥ | tathā bhogyabhūtaṃ yadacidvastu tatsaṃsargaḥ sukhaduḥkhopabhogau bhagavatsvarūpa
jñānaṃ bhagavatpadaprāptiśca teṣāṃ svabhāva ityarthaḥ | apuruṣārthatvamiti | asu
rādiśabdeṣviva virodhārthakotra nañ | jaḍavastuno mokṣarūpapuruṣārthavirodhitvaṃ
svābhāvikamityarthaḥ | puruṣārthatvamiti pāṭhe puruṣāyedaṃ puruṣārtham | tasya bhāvaḥ
puruṣārthatvam | pārārthyamiti yāvat | vikāreti | rūpāntareṇa pariṇāmo vikāraḥ |
jñānaiśvaryeti | jñānaṃ nāma sarvadā sarvaviṣayaprakāśakaḥ svaprakāśo guṇaviśeṣaḥ |
aiśvaryaṃ ca svātantryeṇa kartṛtvaṃ sakalajīvajaḍaniyamanasāmarthyaṃ vā | vīryaṃ jagadu
pādānakāraṇatvepi svarūpavikārābhāvaḥ | śaktirjagatprakṛtibhāvo'ghaṭitaghaṭanā
sāmarthyaṃ vā | tejaḥ sahakārinairapekṣyaṃ parābhibhavanasāmarthyaṃ vā | na avadhiryasya
tādṛśotiśayo yeṣāṃ tādṛśā asaṃkhyeyāḥ saṃkhyātumaśakyāḥ kalyāṇakārakā ye
jñānādayo guṇāsteṣāṃ gaṇaḥ | aparicchedyastādṛgguṇagaṇo yasyeśvarasya tasya bhāva
ityarthaḥ | guṇagaṇaśabdāntabahuvrīhestalpratyayaḥ |

veṅkaṭanātheneti | veṅkaṭanāthena svakṛte tattvamuktākalāpanāmake grantha itthaṃ
padārthavibhāgaḥ siddhāntita ityarthaḥ | ayaṃ ca veṅkaṭanātho drāviḍabrāhmaṇo
viśvāmitragotraḥ śrī 6 puṇḍarīkākṣācāryasya pautraḥ śrī 6 madanantācāryasya
putro vādihaṃsāmbudācāryasya śiṣyaḥ | śrī 6 totārammāsya mātā | aya
meva vedāntācārya ityākhyāyate | ayaṃ ca śrīmadvidyāraṇyasamakālīnaḥ |
yataḥ śrīmadvidyāraṇyamunīnāṃ madhvasaṃpradāyānuvartibhirakṣobhyamunibhiḥ sākaṃ
vivāde jāyamāna ebhirvedāntācāryairmādhyasthyaṃ svīkṛtamityaitihyaṃ śrūyate | dravyā
dravyeti | atra śloke padārthajātaṃ sādharmyavaidharmyabhedaiḥ saṃgṛhya vibhajya ca nirdi
ṣṭam | mitaṃ pramāṇasiddhaṃ tattvaṃ padārthajātaṃ dravyādravyabhedāddvividhamāhuḥ |
tadvido bāhyakudṛṣṭirahitāḥ | dravyaṃ dvividham | jaḍamajaḍaṃ ca | svaviṣayakajñāne
naiva prakāśamānatvaṃ jaḍatvam | prācyaṃ pūrvaṃ jaḍamavyaktakālabhedena dvividham | avyaktaṃ
triguṇātmikā mūlaprakṛtiḥ | tatpariṇāmabhūtaṃ vyaktaṃ jagadapyavyaktaśabdena lakṣyate |
antyamajaḍaṃ dvividham | pratyak parāk ceti | svasmai bhāsamānaṃ pratyak |
parasmā eva bhāsamānaṃ parāk | prathamaṃ pratyak jīveśvarabhedena dvividham | aparaṃ
parāk nityavibhūtirmatiśceti dvividham | nityavibhūtirvaikuṇṭhalokaḥ | matirjñāna
mātmaguṇatvena prasiddham | kecidrāmānujīyaikadeśino nityavibhūtirjaḍetyāhuḥ |
atha dravyaṃ tadavāntarabhedāṃśca lakṣayati — tatra dravyamiti | daśāvasthā | avasthā
śrayībhūtaṃ dravyamiti dravyasāmānyalakṣaṇam | sattvapūrvaiḥ sattvādibhiḥ sattvarajasta
moguṇairupetā prakṛtiḥ | kālo varṣartumāsādyākāraḥ | upādhikṛtabhedairvarṣādivyava
hāraviṣayaḥ | aṇurjñānāśrayo jīvaḥ | anya ātmā aṇuvyatiriktaścetana īśaḥ |
triguṇādanyā sattvākhyaguṇaviśeṣayuktā nityavibhūtirucyate | jñāturjīvasyeśvarasya
ca yo jñeyāvabhāso viṣayaprakāśaḥ sa matiḥ | etatsaṃkṣepād dravyalakṣaṇaṃ bodhya
mityarthaḥ |

dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ vṛkṣaṃ pariṣasvajāte |
tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ svādvatti anaśnannanyobhicākaśīti ||
iti śrutiḥ | dvetyādipadacatuṣṭaye aupratyayasya supāṃ suluk pā. sū. 7 | 1 | 39
iti sūtreṇa ḍādeśaḥ | dvau suparṇau jīveśvarau | suparṇau iti pakṣisādṛśyādrūpakā
tiśayoktiḥ | yujyata iti yuk | yukśabdo guṇaparaḥ | sayujā sayujau samāna
guṇakau | sakhāyā sakhāyau apahatapāpmatvādiguṇairmithaḥ samānau | dvau suparṇau
pakṣitvena rūpitau jīveśvarau samānamekaṃ vṛkṣaṃ vṛkṣavacchedanārhatvādvṛkṣatvena
rūpitaṃ śarīraṃ samāśritau | tayormadhye anyataro jīvaḥ svādu paripakvaṃ pippalaṃ
karmaphalaṃ bhuṅkte | anyastu paramātmā abhuñjāna eva prakāśate | atra śarīratadā
śrayajīvaparādiviṣayavācakaśabdanigaraṇena viṣayivācakavṛkṣasuparṇādiśabdairvṛkṣatvā
dyadhyavasānalakṣaṇarūpakātiśayoktirvicchittiviśeṣāya | atropabṛṃhaṇaṃ ca śrīma
dbhāgavata ekādaśaskandhe dṛśyate —

suparṇāvetau sadṛśau sakhāyau yadṛcchayaitau kṛtanīḍau ca vṛkṣe |
ekastayoḥ khādati pippalānnaṃ sa pippalādo na tu pippalādaḥ || bhāga 11 | 11 | 6 iti |
nānātmāna iti | kasyacitsukhaṃ kasyacidduḥkhaṃ kaścitsaṃsarati kaścinmucyata
iti vyavasthā yato dṛśyateto jīvātmāno nānābhūtāḥ | na tu jīvaikyamityarthaḥ |
taduktaṃ tattvāvalyām —

kaścidraṅkaḥ kaścidāḍhyaḥ kaścidanyavidhaḥ punaḥ |
anayaivātmanānātvaṃ sidhyatyatra vyavasthayā || tattvā. 90 iti |
na jāyata iti | vipaścit jñānī | vipaścittvārhoyaṃ jīva idānīmapi na
jāyate mriyate vā | idānīmapi jananamaraṇaśūnya ityarthaḥ | nāyaṃ kutaścit |
utpādakaśūnya ityarthaḥ | na babhūva kaścit | pūrvamapi jananaśūnyaḥ | na jāyata
ityatra heturaja iti | na mriyata ityatra heturnitya iti | na kutaścidityatra hetuḥ
śāśvata iti | śaśvadbhavaḥ śāśvataḥ | pūrvaṃ na babhūvetyatra hetuḥ purāṇa iti | nanu
kathamasya nityatvam | śarīrāntarvartinaḥ śarīravināśānuvināśitvāvaśyaṃbhāvā
dityāha — na hanyata ityādi | aparathā | jīvātmano nityatvābhāve | śarīreṇa
saha jīvasyotpattivināśāṅgīkāreṇa jīvasyānityatvāśrayaṇe tu karma kṛtvā mṛtasya
phalopabhogābhāvena kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ praṇāśaḥ | ayaṃ kṛtapraṇāśadoṣaḥ | tathā
janmāntarābhāvena pūrvamakṛtasyāpi karmaṇaḥ phalībhūtaḥ sukhādyupabhoga utpanna
mātrasya jīvasya dṛśyate | ayamakṛtābhyāgamadoṣaḥ | vītarāgeti | vītarāgasya
viṣayāsaktirahitasya janma utpattirna dṛśyate | arthātprāṇī sarāga eva jāyate |
prāṇī rāgānubaddha eva janma prāpnoti | rāgasya ca pūrvānubhūtaviṣayānucintanaṃ
kāraṇam | pūrvānubhavaśca viṣayāṇāmanyasmiñjanmani śarīramantareṇa nopapadyate |
soyaṃ jīvaḥ pūrvaśarīrenubhūtānviṣayānanusmaraṃstatra rajyate | tathā cāyaṃ dvayorja
nmanoḥ pratisaṃdhiḥ | evaṃ pūrvaśarīrasya pūrvatareṇa pūrvatarasya pūrvatamenetyādinānā
diścetanasya śarīrayogonādiśca rāgānubandha iti siddhaṃ nityatvamiti | bālā
greti | bālaḥ keśaḥ | tasyāgrāduddhṛtaḥ śatatamo bhāgastasmādapyuddhṛto yaḥ śata
tamo bhāgastattulyo jīvo vijñeyaḥ | sa cedṛśa evānantyāya mokṣāya prabhavatī
tyarthaḥ | āreti | totraprotāyaḥśalākāgramārāgram | tasmāduddhṛtā mātrā mānaṃ
yasya tādṛśaḥ puruṣo jīva ityarthaḥ | aṇuriti | jīvātmāṇurata eva durvijñeyaḥ
śuddhena cetasā grāhya ityarthaḥ |

bhogyeti | bhogyaṃ viṣayaḥ śabdādiḥ | bhogasyopakaraṇaṃ sādhanamindriyam |
bhogasyāyatanaṃ sthānaṃ śarīram |

upādānamiti | prakṛtirūpaṃ yatparamātmanaḥ sūkṣmaṃ śarīraṃ taddvārā sthūlasya jagata
upādānakāraṇaṃ paramātmeśvaraśabdārtha ityarthaḥ | arcā nāmeti | gṛhe devālayādiṣu
vā devatātvena kalpitā yāḥ pāṣāṇādipratimāstāḥ śarīratvena svīkṛtya tatra sūkṣma
divyaśarīraviśiṣṭaḥ paramātmā vartate | ayaṃ cārcakaparādhīnasnānabhojanāsanaśayana
sthitiḥ sarvasahiṣṇuḥ | ayaṃ ca kvacitsvayameva vyakto bhavati | kvaciddevaiḥ siddhairma
nuṣyairvā sthāpito bhavati | vibhava iti | vibhavaśca mukhyagauṇabhedena dvividhaḥ |
tatra mukhyaḥ sākṣātsvecchayāvatāraḥ | ayaṃ copāsakaviśeṣānugrahārthaṃ kvacitprakaṭo
bhavati | gauṇastvāveśāvatāraḥ | jīvenādhiṣṭhite śarīre kāryaviśeṣaṃ sādhayituṃ
paramātmā svarūpeṇa śaktyā vā praviṣṭo bhavati | tatra svarūpeṇāveśaḥ paraśurāmā
diṣu | śaktyāveśaḥ kāryakāle vidhiśivādiṣu cetaneṣu śaktimātreṇa sphuraṇam |
matsyakūrmādayo daśāvatārāḥ padmanābhādayaśca vibhavaviśeṣā eva | tatra mukhya
vibhavāḥ sarve dīpādutpannadīpavatsthitā mumukṣūṇāmupāsyāḥ | gauṇavibhavāstu
vidhiśivapāvakavyāsajāmadagnyādayo bubhukṣūṇāmevopāsyā bhavanti | vyūha
iti | vyūho nāma paramātmaivopāsanārthaṃ jagatsṛṣṭyādyarthaṃ ca vāsudevasaṃkarṣaṇa
pradyumnāniruddhabhedena caturdhāvasthitaḥ | tatra jñānaiśvaryādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhirguṇaiḥ pūrṇaḥ
śrīvāsudevaḥ | jñānabalābhyāṃ yuktaḥ saṃkarṣaṇaḥ | aiśvaryavīryābhyāṃ yuktaḥ pradyumnaḥ |
śaktitejobhyāṃ yuktoniruddha iti triṣu guṇavibhāgaḥ | saṃkarṣaṇa aiśvaryādiguṇa
catuṣṭayasadbhāvepi tatrādhikṛtakāryānuguṇyena jñānabalarūpaṃ guṇadvayameva prakāśate |
evameva pradyumnaniruddhe coktaguṇadvayādanyadguṇacatuṣṭayāvasthitiraprakāśitā draṣṭavyā |
tatra saṃkarṣaṇasya kāryaṃ śāstrapravartanaṃ saṃhāraśca | pradyumnasya dharmanayanaṃ sṛṣṭiśca |
aniruddhasya tattvagamanaṃ rakṣaṇaṃ ca | atrādyavyūhasya vāsudevasya ṣaḍguṇatayānu
saṃdheyatvāttasya parasmādabhedavivakṣayā kvacidvyūhatrayamuktam | sūkṣmamiti | ayaṃ
ca sūkṣmamityādinocyamāno nārāyaṇaḥ śrīvaikuṇṭhākhye pure śrīmaddivyālaye
śrīmahāmaṇimaṇḍape siṃhāsane śeṣaparyaṅke niṣaṇṇo divyamaṅgalavigrahadhārī śrībhū
nīlāsahitaścaturbhujaḥ śaṅkhacakrādidivyāyudhopetonantagaruḍādibhirupāsyamāno
bhagavān | ayameva muktaprāpyaḥ | sopahateti | pāpmā pātakam | pātaka
rāhityajarārāhityādayo guṇāḥ | kāmo viṣayābhilāṣaḥ | saṃkalpodhyavasāyaḥ |
antaryāmīti | antaryāmitvaṃ nāma jīvātmanāṃ svarganarakādyanubhavadaśāyāmapi
suhṛttvena yogibhirdraṣṭavyatayā hṛdayapradeśāvasthitaṃ rūpam | ayaṃ ca jīvena sākaṃ
vidyamānopi tadgatadoṣairna spṛśyate |

puruṣārtheti | puruṣārtho mokṣaḥ | tatparipanthibhūtastatprāptau pratibandhako yo
duritanicayaḥ pātakasamūhastasya kṣaye satītyarthaḥ | tadanu | tadanantaram |

evamupāsaneti | uktopāsanārūpaṃ yatkarma tadyukternāntaryāmivijñānena
draṣṭurjīvasya darśanaṃ tatkarmakāvalokanaṃ naṣṭaṃ bhavati | jīvasya svābhāvikaṃ
yatsvamātrāvalokanaṃ tadvinaṣṭaṃ bhavati | taddhi mokṣapratibandhakam | tadu
ktam — na dṛṣṭerdraṣṭāraṃ paśyeḥ bṛ. 3 | 4 | 2 ityādi | atra dṛṣṭerdraṣṭāramiti pākaṃ
pacatītivannirdeśaḥ | dṛṣṭerdraṣṭāraṃ darśanakartāramityarthaḥ | darśanaśravaṇamanananidi
dhyāsanānāṃ yaḥ kartā jīvaḥ sa na draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ |
kiṃ tu darśanādikarturjīvādanya eva svāntara ātmā draṣṭavyaḥ | indriyādhīnadarśa
nakartāraṃ jīvaṃ prāṇanakartṛtvena na paśyeriti śrutitātparyam | svabhaktamiti |
vāsudevopi svabhaktaṃ saṃprāpya tasmā ānandarūpamavināśi punarāvṛttirahitaṃ
svapadaṃ dadātītyarthaḥ |

śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣyamiti | idameva śrībhāṣyamiti prasiddham |
pūrvavṛtteti | anārabhyādhītasya śāstrārambhe saṃprayuktasyāthaśabdasyānantaryārthakatve
tadānantaryaṃ kasyetyākāṅkṣāyāṃ yogyatābalānnirṇetavyaṃ bhavati | yatra tu madhyetha
śabdastatra tadānantaryaṃ kasyetyākāṅkṣāyāṃ pūrvaprakaraṇapratipāditaviṣayasyaivānantaryaṃ
grāhyaṃ bhavati | tadvadevātra mīmāṃsāśāstramadhyasthoyamathaśabdaḥ | tathā cāsmātpūrvaṃ
yatpūrvamīmāṃsārūpaṃ jaimininoktaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tatra karmarūpo viṣayaḥ pratipādita iti
karmajñānamevātra pūrvavṛttam | hetvartha iti | hetuśca buddhisthaḥ karmaphalavināśi
tvajñānādiḥ | kāryakāraṇatveneti | pūrvottaramīmāṃsayoḥ saṃbhūya yadekaśāstratvaṃ
tatsayuktikameva | pūrvamīmāṃsāpratipāditakarmajñānasyottaramīmāṃsāpratipāditabrahma
jñānasya ca kāryakāraṇabhāvena saṃgativiśeṣadarśanāditi bhāvaḥ | mīmāṃseti sa
mākhyābalādapyekaśāstratvaṃ sidhyati | ṣoḍaśalakṣaṇeneti | lakṣaṇaśabdodhyā
yavācī | jaiminiproktāyā dvādaśalakṣaṇyāḥ saṃkarṣakāṇḍenādhyāyacatuṣṭayātmakena
saha ṣoḍaśalakṣaṇatvaṃ bodhyam |

parīkṣyeti | karmasaṃpādyānsvargādilokānparīkṣya mīmāṃsānyāyairnirūpya
karmaphalasya kṣayitvaṃ niścitya akṛto nityaḥ paramātmā kṛtena karmaṇā nāsti
na labhyate iti yo brāhmaṇodhītasāṅgavedo nirvedamāyānnirviṇṇo bhavetsa
gurumabhigacchedityuttaratra saṃbandhaḥ | ityādīti | ādiśabdena tadyatheha
karmacito lokaḥ kṣīyata evamevāmutra puṇyacito lokaḥ kṣīyate chā.
8 | 1 | 6 | antavadevāsya tadbhavati bṛ. 3 | 8 | 10 na hyadhruvaiḥ prāpyate
dhruvaṃ karmabhiḥ kā. 2 | 10 iti śrutisaṃgrahaḥ | antavat vināśi | tat
brahmajñānamantareṇa kriyamāṇaṃ karma | adhruvaiḥ anityaphalasādhanabhūtairanityadravyasā
dhyairvā karmabhiḥ | dhruvaṃ nityaṃ tadātmatattvam | anumāneti | karmaphalaṃ vināśi
bhāvatve sati kṛtakatvāddhaṭādivat | brahmajñānaphalamavināśi akṛtakatvādātmavat
— ityādyanumānaṃ draṣṭavyam | arthāpattyāpyetatsidhyati | śukavāmadevādikṛtakarmatyā
gasyānyathānupapatteḥ | ekaikanindayeti | kevalakarmaṇaḥ kevalajñānasya ca ninda
yetyarthaḥ | karmaviśiṣṭasyeti | jñānameva mukhyaṃ mokṣasādhanam | karma tu jñāna
syāṅgabhūtamiti gauṇaṃ sādhanam | etena karmajñānayorubhayorapi mokṣaṃ prati mukhyameva
hetutvamiti samuccayavādo nirastaḥ | andhaṃ tama iti | ye bhogaiśvaryaprasaktā
avidyāṃ vidyāyāḥ sakāśādanyāṃ kriyām | vidyāvidhuraṃ kevalaṃ karmetyarthaḥ | avidyā
karmasaṃjñānyā vi. pu. 6 | 7 | 61 iti smṛteḥ | upāsatenutiṣṭhanti tendhama
tigāḍhaṃ tamo'jñānaṃ narakaviśeṣaṃ vā praviśanti | u iti nipātovadhāraṇe vidyā
yāmityuttaraṃ yojyaḥ | ye svādhikārocitakarmaparityāgena vidyāyāmeva ratāste
ndhatamasādbhūya iva tamastadadhikamajñānaṃ praviśanti | yo vidyāṃ brahmopāsanarūpāṃ
tadaṅgabhūtakarmarūpāmavidyāṃ caitadubhayaṃ saha veda aṅgāṅgibhāvena sahānuṣṭheyaṃ veda
so'vidyayā vidyāṅgatayā coditena karmaṇā mṛtyuṃ vidyotpattipratibandhakībhūtaṃ
puṇyapāparūpaṃ prāktanakarma tīrtvā nirviśeṣamullaṅghya vidyayā paramātmopāsanarūpa
yā amṛtamaśnute mokṣaṃ prāpnoti | tīrtvetyatropāyavirodhitaraṇamucyate | amṛtamaśnuta
ityupeyabrahmaprāptivirodhibhūtebhyaḥ sarvapāpebhyo mokṣa iti bhedaḥ | sarvakartṛtva
miti | jagadutpādakatvaṃ paramātmana eva na muktānām | cidacinniyamanasyā
pyupalakṣaṇamidam | taduktaṃ sūtrakāraiḥ — jagadvyāpāravarjaṃ prakaraṇādasaṃnihitatvācca |
bra. sū. 4 | 4 | 17 iti | jaḍānāmutpattyādikaṃ cidacitorniyamanaṃ ca jaga
dvyāpāraḥ | tadrahitaṃ muktasyaiśvaryam | yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante tai.
3 | 1 ityādyutpattyādipratipādakaśrutiṣu yaḥ pṛthivīmantaro yamayati bṛ.
3 | 7 | 3 ityādiṣu niyamanapratipādakaśrutiṣu paramātmana eva prakaraṇāt |
kiṃ coktavyāpāraprasaṅge muktasya saṃnidhānamapi nāstīti sūtrārthaḥ | muktāstviti |
brahma kasyāpyaṅgabhūtaṃ na bhavati | ato'śeṣenaṅgabhūte śeṣiṇi aṅgibhūte mukhye
brahmaṇi śeṣarūpiṇoṅgabhūtā muktā vipaścitā nirupādhikānanyādhīnāsaṃkucitasarva
viṣayakajñānavatā tena brahmaṇā saha sarvānkāmānkalyāṇakārakānbrahmaguṇānaśnuvate
prāpnuvanti | prāptikarmatvena bhogyabhūtakāmānāṃ brahmasāhityaṃ na tu prāptikartṛtvena
muktānām | yato brahmaṇeti sahayukte'pradhāne pā. sū. 2 | 3 | 19 iti sūtreṇāpradhāne
tṛtīyā | kartṛtvena sāhityāśrayaṇe tu muktāpekṣayā brahmaṇo'prādhānyaṃ tṛtīyāsūcitaṃ
doṣāya syāt | karmatvena sāhityāśrayaṇe tu brahmaguṇāpekṣayā aprādhānyaṃ brahmaṇi
na doṣāya | pratyuta brahmāpekṣayāpi brahmaguṇeṣvādarātiśayaḥ sūcito bhavati |

tāpatrayeti | tāpastrividhaḥ | ādhyātmikādhibhautikādhidaivikabhe
dāt | ātmānaṃ dehamadhikṛtya jāyamāno naisargikośanāyāpipāsārūpo
dhātuprakopajanyo jvarātīsārādiścādhyātmikaḥ | tathātmānamantaḥkaraṇamadhi
kṛtya jāyamānaḥ kāmakrodhalobhamohabhayerṣyāviṣādasaṃśayamūlakastāpa ādhyā
tmikaḥ | bhūtāni jarāyujāṇḍajasvedajodbhijjarūpāṇi coravairisiṃhavyāghrapakṣisarpa
yūkāvṛkṣalatādīnyadhikṛtya jāyamānastāpa ādhibhautikaḥ | devānyakṣādīndivaḥ
prabhavānvātavarṣātapaśītoṣṇādīnvā nimittīkṛtya jāyamānastāpa ādhidaivikaḥ |
prakṛtīti | yasmācchabdasvarūpātparaḥ pratyayaḥ kriyate sā prakṛtiḥ | prakṛtiḥ
pratyayaścetyetāvubhau saha saṃbhūyārthaṃ pratipādayataḥ | ekārthībhāvena dvayormilita
evārtha iti yāvat | tatra ca pratyayārthasya prādhānyam | yathopagorapatyamaupagava
ityatropaguśabdaḥ prakṛtiḥ | aṇ pratyayaḥ | tayośca militayoḥ saṃbhūyaika evārtha
upagusaṃbandhyapatyamityevaṃrūpaḥ | paraṃ tvayaṃ niyamosmātsanpratyayādanyatra jñeyaḥ |
sanpratyayaprakaraṇe caitadvacanaṃ paṭhitamitīta iti nirdeśaḥ | sanpratyayasthale tu
sanpratyayavācyāyā icchāyāḥ prakṛtyarthaṃ pratyaprādhānyameva | ata eva devadattena
grāmo jigaṃsyata ityatra gamanakriyāyāḥ prādhānyena grāmarūpe tatkarmaṇi lakāraḥ
sidhyati | tathā ca jijñāsāśabdasya jñānaviṣayiṇīccheti nārthaḥ | kiṃ tvicchā
viṣayībhūtaṃ jñānamiti | ataśca jijñāsāpadottaraṃ kṛtayā vidheyasamarpikayā
prathamāvibhaktyā bodhito vidhyaṃśo jñānenaiva saṃbadhyate na tvicchayā | atha vā
snātvā bhuṅkte ityukte bhojanasya pūrvaṃ jñātatve apradhānepi snānāṃśe vidhervivakṣā
dṛśyate | vidhiścātrājñātārthajñāpanaṃ na tvapravṛttapravartanamityanyat | tadvadatra bodhyam |
āpātajñānamiti | vākyaśravaṇasamanantaraṃ sadya eva vyutpannasya puruṣasya jāya
mānaṃ vākyārthajñānamityarthaḥ | vidhānamantareṇāpīti | na hi gaurastītyukte
tadarthajñāne etadvākyārtho jñātavya iti vidhyapekṣā dṛśyate | tathā cāthāto brahma
jijñāseti sūtreṇa pratipādito jñānavidhirvyarthaḥ syāt | ata upāsanātmaka
jñānasyāyaṃ vidhiḥ | sa ca nididhyāsitavya upāsītetyādiśrautavidhimabhilakṣya
tadanusāreṇa sūtrakārairukta iti bodhyam | dhyānopāsanādiśabdavācyatvaṃ pradarśayati
— ātmā veti | na ca na cakṣuṣā gṛhyate mu. 3 | 1 | 8 ityanena draṣṭavya iti
virudhyata iti vācyam | draṣṭavya ityatra dṛśadhātunopacārāddarśanasamānākāramati
viśadaṃ jñānamucyate | tādṛśaṃ jñānaṃ ca nididhyāsanasya pāryantikaḥ pariṇāmaḥ |
tataśca draṣṭavyo nididhyāsitavya iti padadvayena saṃbhūya darśanasamānākāraṃ jñānaṃ
vidhīyate | vijñāyeti | vijñāya śravaṇamananābhyāṃ jñātvā prajñāṃ nididhyāsanaṃ
kurvītetyarthaḥ | anuvidyeti | anuvidya śravaṇamananābhyāṃ jñātvā vijānāti vijā
nīyāt | dhyeyādityarthaḥ | atra | ātmā veti śrutau | adhyayanavidhinā |
svādhyāyodhyetavya ityanena | śravaṇe | gurumukhānnyāyayuktārthagrahaṇalakṣaṇe |
mananasya | svātmanyevameveti yuktitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpanarūpasya | avicchinneti |
avicchinnatvaṃ vijātīyapratyayāntarāvyavahitatvam | dhruvā smṛtiḥ | anavarataṃ para
mātmadhyānam | śravaṇāditi | tathā caitadekavākyatayā nididhyāsitavya ityādau
na sāmānyadhyānaṃ vidhīyate | kiṃ tvanavaratamiti siddhyati | sā ca smṛtiḥ |
dhruvā smṛtiḥ | bhidyata iti | hṛdayasyāntaḥkaraṇasya granthirgranthivaddurmoco
rāgadveṣādiḥ | hṛdamayate prāpnotīti hṛdayaśabdena jīvo vocyate | tathā sarvasaṃśayā
naśyanti | brahmajñānena sarvajñatvāt | tathā prārabdhavyatiriktāni karmāṇi ca
naśyanti | nāśo nāma phalotpādanaśaktivināśaḥ | pare brahmadevādayovare
nikṛṣṭā yasmātsa parāvaraḥ paramātmā | yataścātra granthivimokṣakāraṇaṃ paramātmada
rśanamuktaṃ tatastadekavākyatāyai dhruvā smṛtirityatrāpi granthivimokṣakāraṇatvenoktā
dhruvā smṛtirdarśanasamānākāraiva grāhyeti sidhyati | vedanamiti | vedanaṃ nāmo
pāsanameva yato brahmetyupāsīta chā. 3 | 18 | 1 iti prakramya tādṛśopāsanā
viṣaya eva ya evaṃ veda chā. 3 | 18 | 3 iti vedanaṃ śrūyata iti vākyakāravaca
nārthaḥ | nāyamātmeti | pravacanaṃ mananam | medhā dhyānam | eṣa upāsaka
kṛtānavaratanididhyāsanena prītaḥ paramātmā yamevopāsakaviśeṣaṃ vṛṇute svīyatvena
svīkaroti tena paramātmā labhyaḥ | tasyopāsakaviśeṣasyaiṣa paramātmā svāṃ tanūṃ
prakāśayati | tataśca sa mukto bhavati | etacchrutyanurodhādīśvaratanupradarśanapariṇataṃ
viśeṣadhyānameva vidheyamiti bhāvaḥ | teṣāmiti | satatayuktānām | paramā
tmanaḥ satatayogaṃ kāṅkṣatām | āśaṃsāyāṃ bhūtavacca pā. sū. 3 | 3 | 132
iti pāṇinisūtreṇa kartari ktapratyayaḥ | prītipūrvakamiti madhyamaṇinyāyenobha
yānvayi |

bhajatāmityatra bhaktyā labhya ityatra coktā bhaktiḥ pūrvoktā dhruvā smṛtire
vetyāha — bhaktistviti | niratiśaya ānando yasmādetādṛśaḥ priyo yaḥ para
mātmā tasmādananyattadeva prayojanaṃ yasya tādṛśaḥ sakaletaraviṣayavairāgyayukto jñāna
viśeṣa ityarthaḥ | saṃbhavāditi | saṃbhavo yuktiḥ | nirvacanamapramāṇebhyo niṣkṛṣṭaṃ
vacanamāgamarūpam | aduṣṭāditi | jātiduṣṭaṃ kalañjagṛñjanādikam | āśraya
duṣṭaṃ patitādisvāmikam | nimittaduṣṭamucchiṣṭādikam | trividhadoṣarahitānnaseva
nena kāyaśuddhidvārā cittaśuddhirbhavatītyarthaḥ | kāmānabhiṣvaṅga iti | abhi
ṣvaṅgo manovikāraviśeṣaḥ | yena viṣayānabhuktvā sthātuṃ na śakyate | saṃśīlanam |
upāsyadevatānucintanam | satyeti | satyaṃ bhūtahitam | ārjavaṃ vākkāyamana
sāmaikarūpyam | dayā svārthanirapekṣaparaduḥkhāsahiṣṇutvam | dānaṃ lobharāhityena
dravyādidānam | ādipadenāhiṃsānabhidhyāsaṃgrahaḥ | ahiṃsā kāyena vācā manasā
ca parapīḍānivṛttiḥ | parakīye svabuddhirabhidhyā | niṣphalacintā vā | parakṛtāpa
rādhacintā vā | tadrāhityamanabhidhyā | dainyeti | deśakālavaiguṇyena śokavastu
smaraṇena vā jāyamānaṃ manaḥśaithilyaṃ dainyam | tadviparyayajeti | deśakālānu
kūlyena priyavastusmaraṇena vā jāyamānaṃ manaḥśathilyaṃ tuṣṭiḥ | ayamevoddharṣaḥ |
tadabhāvonuddharṣaḥ | śokasyevātisaṃtoṣasyāpi manaḥśaithilyahetutvāttadabhāva āva
śyaka ityāśayaḥ |

ananyaprayojaneti | na paramātmanaḥ sakāśādanyatprayojanaṃ yasya tādṛśama
navarataṃ niratiśayapriyo ya ātmā tasya yo viśadaḥ pratyayaḥ spaṣṭovabhāsastadrūpaṃ
ca yaddhyānaṃ tadrūpayā bhaktyetyarthaḥ | ubhayeti | jñānena karmaṇā ca saṃskṛ
tamantaḥkaraṇaṃ yasya tādṛśasyopāsakasyaikāntikovaśyaṃbhāvyātyantiko'vināśī ca
bhaktiyogo labhya ityarthaḥ |

janmādīti | janma sṛṣṭiḥ | ādipadena sthitipralayasaṃgrahaḥ | sṛṣṭisthitipra
layamiti samāhāradvaṃdvaḥ | janmādīti bahuvrīhistadguṇasaṃvijñānaḥ | teṣāṃ guṇānāṃ
bahuvrīhighaṭakapadārthānāṃ kāryānvayitayā saṃvijñānaṃ yatra sa tadguṇasaṃvijñānaḥ |
yathā lambakarṇamānayeti | atra lambakarṇayorapyānayanakriyāsaṃbandhaḥ | atha vā
tacchabdena viśeṣyamucyate | guṇaśabdena ca viśeṣaṇam | samityasyaikīkaraṇamarthaḥ |
viśeṣyaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ caikakāryānvitatvena yo bahuvrīhirjñāpayati sa tadguṇasaṃvijñānaḥ |
lambakarṇau viśeṣaṇībhūtau | paśurviśeṣyaḥ | citragumānayetyatra tu na tadguṇasaṃvi
jñāno bahuvrīhiḥ | citrāṇāṃ gavāmānayanakriyayā sahāsaṃbandhāt | aci
ntyeti | jīvakartṛkatvābhāvena cintayitumaśakyā ākāśavāyvādibhedena vividhā
ca yā racanā saṃsthānaṃ tadākāreṇa racanīyasya | anenācidaṃśavaicitryamuktam |
cidaṃśavaicitryamāha — niyateti | asmindeśesminkāla idaṃ phalamanena bhokta
vyamiti niyamo brahmadevamārabhya stambaparyantaṃ sarvajīveṣu sādhāraṇa evetyarthaḥ |
nikhileti | nikhilā aśeṣā ye heyāstyājyā jaḍagatā janmādayo vikārāści
dgatāḥ kleśādayaśca tatpratyanīkaṃ svabhāvata eva tadviruddhaṃ svarūpaṃ yasya tasmādityarthaḥ |
pravartanta iti | tadbrahmeti śeṣaḥ |

kāraṇamiti | kāraṇasyotpattijñaptisādhāraṇatvādutpattikāraṇanirāsāyāha —
pramāṇamiti | tadyonitvam | śāstrapramāṇakatvam | pūtikūṣmāṇḍeti |
pūti atyantaparyuṣitatvena kṛmyādiduṣṭatvena ca durgandhātiśayayuktaṃ yatkūṣmā
ṇḍaphalaṃ tadyathā dūrata eva parityajyate tadvadetadanumānamityarthaḥ | atha vā yathā
pūtisaṃjñakādvallīviśeṣātkūṣmāṇḍotpattirna bhavati tadvadityarthaḥ | tathā hi —
uktānumāne kāryatvahetustāvadasiddhaḥ | na hi samudraparvatādīnāṃ kenāpi kriya
māṇatvamupalabhyate | sāvayavatvena kāryatvānumānaṃ tu na | hetoḥ sopādhikatvāt |
śakyakriyatvamupādhiḥ | yatra kāryatvaṃ tatra śakyakriyatvamiti ghaṭādau sādhyavyāpa
katvam | yatra sāvayavatvaṃ tatra śakyakriyatvaṃ niyamena nāsti | parvatādau vyabhi
cārāditi sādhanāvyāpakatvam | kiṃ ca parvatamahārṇavādīnāṃ kāryatvāṅgīkārepye
kenaiva te nirmitā ityatra na kiṃcitpramāṇam | yenaika īśvarastatkartā sidhyet |
na ca jīvānāṃ parvatādyutpādane na sāmarthyamiti vācyam | upacitapuṇyaviśeṣāṇāṃ
devatānāṃ śaktivaicitryadarśanāt | kiṃ ca jagatkartṛtvenābhimata īśvaraḥ saśarīro
'śarīro vā | aśarīratve kartṛtvaṃ na saṃbhavati | anupalabdheḥ | saśarīratve tu
taccharīraṃ nityamanityaṃ vā | nityatve sāvayavasya tasya nityatvena jagatopi
nityatvāṅgīkāre bādhakābhāvena kāryatvaṃ na sidhyatīti neśvaraḥ sidhyet | ani
tyatve tu kenotpāditaṃ tat | svayameveti cenna | aśarīrasya tadayogāt | śarīrā
ntareṇa cedanavasthāpātaḥ | kiṃ ca tasya śarīrābhāvānna kaścijjagadutpādanakṣamo
vyāpāraḥ saṃbhavati | nirvyāpārasya kartṛtvaṃ tu na kvāpi dṛśyate |

siddharūpaṃ brahmeti | pratipādayitumityasya karmaitat | śāstraṃ kartṛ | siddha
brahmapratipādakatve svīkṛte tu śāstraṃ na kasyacitpravartakaṃ nivartakaṃ vā syāt | tathā
ca tasya sukhaparyavasāyitvaṃ duḥkhanivṛttiparyavasāyitvaṃ vā nāstītyaprayojanakatvena
tasyāprāmāṇyāpattiḥ | ato na tasya siddhabrahmapratipādakatvaṃ svīkāryamiti śaṅkā
śayaḥ | paryanuyogaḥ | praśnaḥ | paramapuruṣārthabhūtasyeti | ānandasvarūpasya
brahmaṇaḥ puruṣairarthyamānatvātpuruṣārthatvam | anavadhikātiśayatvācca tasya paramatvam |
etena siddhabrahmapratipādakasyāpi śāstrasya saprayojanakatvaṃ sidhyati | kiṃ ca yatra
yatra pravṛttinivṛttyanyataraparatvābhāvastatra tatra prayojanaśūnyatvamiti na niyamaḥ |
loke tasya vyabhicāradarśanādityāha — na ceti | putrasta iti | putraste jāta
iti vākyāddharṣaprāptirnāyaṃ sarpa iti vākyādbhayanivṛttiśceti prayojanaṃ siddhavā
kyādapi jāyamānaṃ loke dṛśyata iti bhāvaḥ ||

div.head: || atha pūrṇaprajñadarśanam || 5 ||
div.p:
jīvāṇutveti | jīvoṇuḥ | na madhyamaparimāṇo nāpi vibhuḥ | sa ca
mokṣepi paramātmano dāsa eva | apauruṣeyā nityā vedāḥ | te ca siddhabrahmārtha
bodhakā api pramāṇabhūtā eva | teṣāṃ ca na parataḥ prāmāṇyam | pratyakṣānumāna
śabdarūpaṃ pramāṇatrayam | pañcarātragranthānusaraṇam | ākāśādiprapañcaścāyamātmanaḥ
sakāśādbhinnaḥ satyaśca | etatsarvaṃ rāmānujācāryāṇāṃ pūrṇaprajñācāryāṇāṃ ca mate
samānameva | parasparaviruddheti | etacca kimatra tattvam da. 4 pa. 191
ityāśaṅkya sarvaṃ tattvam — ityādigranthena prāguktameva | kṣapaṇaketi | kṣapaṇakā
jaināḥ | taiśca parasparaviruddhāstitvanāstitvādidharmajātamekatra svīkṛtya syādvādaḥ
pratipāditaḥ | sa ca prāgukta da. 3 pa. 368 eva | bhaṅgyantareṇeti | ida
manupadameva sphuṭībhaviṣyati |
aśeṣasadguṇa iti | svātantryaśaktivijñānasukhādibhiraśeṣairguṇairyukta ityarthaḥ |

nanu sajātīyeti | nāneti pṛthagbhūtaṃ vastūcyate | tasya bhāvo nānātvaṃ
bhedaḥ | sa ca pratiyogibhedena trividhaḥ — sajātīyapratiyogiko vijātīyaprati
yogikaḥ svagatapratiyogikaśca | paramātmani jīvātmanaḥ sakāśādvidyamāno bheda
ādyaḥ | ākāśādibhyaḥ sakāśādvidyamāno bhedo dvitīyaḥ | svagatebhyaḥ kāru
ṇyādiguṇebhyaḥ sakāśādvidyamāno bhedastṛtīyaḥ | evaṃ prāptaṃ bhedatrayaṃ sadeva so
myedamagra āsīt | ekamevādvitīyam chā. 6 | 1 | 1 ityādiśrutibhirniṣi
dhyate | ekameva tattvam bhedaḥ kvāpi nāstyeveti tacchrutitātparyam | paramā
tmanaḥ saguṇatve svagatā ye guṇāstatpratiyogikabhedasya tatrāvaśyaṃbhāvāduktaśru
tivirodha ityāśayaḥ | bhedapramāpaketi | bhedasatyatvabodhaketyarthaḥ | pratyakṣa
miti | idaṃ kartṛpadam | pratyakṣapramāsādhanabhūtaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇamindriyamityarthaḥ |
adhyakṣayati | satyatvena bodhayati |

bhedamanaṅgīkurvatāṃ māyāvedāntyanusāriṇāmāśaṅkāmanuvadati — atha manyethā
ityādinā suprasaramityantena | dharmipratiyogipratipattimiti | nīlaṃ
pītādbhinnamityatra nīlaṃ bhedasya dharmi | pītaṃ bhedasya pratiyogi | tatra ca
nīlasya bhedadharmitvena jñānaṃ tathā pītasya bhedapratiyogitvena jñānaṃ yadi na
syāccedbhedajñānaṃ sutarāṃ na saṃbhavati | bhedajñānasya dharmipratiyogijñānasāpekṣa
tvāt | dvitīyepīti | bhedaviṣayakapratyakṣe dharmipratiyogināvapi dharmitvena
pratiyogitvena ca viṣayau bhavata iti pakṣepi kiṃ dharmipratiyoginoḥ pūrvaṃ
pratyakṣajñānaṃ paścādbhedasyātha vā dharmipratiyogibhedānāṃ yugapadeva pratyakṣajñāna
miti vikalpaḥ | buddherviramyeti | yathā gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gaṅgāśabdo
nīraviśeṣarūpamarthamupasthāpayati | tādṛśārthopasthāpanarūpaṃ vyāpāraṃ kṛtvā virato
ghoṣenvayārthaṃ tīrārthopasthāpanarūpaṃ vyāpāraṃ kartuṃ na prabhavati | atastīrārtho
pasthāpanaṃ nīreṇaiva sāmīpyasaṃbandhena lakṣaṇayā kartavyaṃ na tu gaṅgāśabdena |
tathā cārthasyaiva lakṣaṇā na tu śabdasya | gaṅgāśabdastīrārthopalakṣaka iti
pravādastu paraṃparayā gauṇa eva | yathā vā dhānuṣkeṇa prerita iṣuḥ krośapari
mitaṃ deśaṃ gantuṃ samarthopi madhye kenacitpratihato viratavyāpāraścettaduttarakṣa
ṇeṅguliparimitamapi gantuṃ na prabhavati tathā dharmipratiyoginau viṣayīkṛtya
viratā buddhirbhedaṃ viṣayīkartuṃ na prabhavati | etadabhiprāyeṇaiva śabdabuddhikarmaṇāṃ
viramya vyāpārābhāva iti ca sarvasiddham — iti kāvyapradīpe pañcamollāsa uktam |
anyonyāśrayeti | bhedagrahaṇārthaṃ dharmipratiyogigrahaṇaṃ dharmipratiyogigrahaṇārthaṃ
ca bhedagrahaṇamityanyonyāśrayaḥ | yato bhedagrahaṇātpūrvaṃ dharmipratiyoginordharmitvena
pratiyogitvena ca grahaṇaṃ na saṃbhavati | kāryakāraṇeti | bhedapratyayaḥ
kāryam | dharmipratyayaḥ pratiyogipratyayaśca kāraṇam | tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhūtayo
rdvayoḥ pratyayayorekadā na saṃbhava ityarthaḥ | pratiyogipratītirapīti | bhedapra
tyayasya kāraṇamityanuṣaṅgaḥ |

vastusvarūpeti | ghaṭādivastunaḥ svarūpaṃ yatkambugrīvādikaṃ sa eva bhedo
nānya iti mādhvāḥ | ghaṭādivastunaḥ sakāśādanyo ghaṭādivastudharmo bheda iti
vaiśeṣikādayaḥ | coreti | māṇḍavyanāmā kaścana ṛṣiścorabuddhyā rājñā pradharṣitaḥ |
rājā ca śāsanaṃ kartukāmo yāvattaṃ śūle samāropayati tāvadanyaṃ satyaṃ coraṃ
bubudhe | sadya eva sa muniḥ śūlādavatārya rājñā mocitaḥ kṣamasveti prārthitaśca |
kasya karmaṇoyaṃ vipāka iti suvicāryāpyātmanoparādhamajānānaḥ sa ṛṣista
jjñānārthaṃ yamasadanaṃ gato bālye kaścitkīṭastvayā baddhaḥ — iti yamena bodhitaḥ |
ajñānakṛtāparādhasya ca nānuguṇamīdṛśaṃ śāsanamiti kruddhena māṇḍavyena martya
loke śūdrayonau janiṃ labhasvetyabhiśapto yamo vicitravīryasya dāsyāṃ vyāsā
jjaniṃ lebhe | ayameva vidura iti prasiddhaḥ | tataḥ prabhṛtyajñānakṛtoparādhaḥ
kṣamya iti samayaṃ cakre yamaḥ | iyaṃ kathā bhārata ādiparvaṇi adhyāya 107,
108 draṣṭavyā | evaṃ caikasyāparādhastannimittaṃ śāsanaṃ cānyasyeti yatra viṣa
yastatraitannyāyāvatāraḥ | prakṛte ca dharmipratiyogisahitasya bhedasya pratyakṣajñānaṃ
bhavatītyasyāsaṃbhavitvena tvatsaṃmatasyārthasya yaḥ svīkārastadrūpoparādho dharmabhedavādi
naḥ | tannimittāni dūṣaṇāni ca svarūpabhedavādinaṃ pratyucyanta iti soyaṃ corā
parādhānmāṇḍavyanigrahanyāyaḥ | tadaviṣayatvāditi | vastusvarūpabhedāviṣaya
tvādityarthaḥ | yadi hi vastunaḥ sakāśādanyastaddharmabhūto bhedaḥ syāttarhi pratyakṣeṇa
kevalabhedasya grahaṇamatha vā dharmipratiyogisahitasya | tatrāpi dharmipratiyogi
bhedānāṃ grahaṇaṃ krameṇota yugapadityevaṃ tvaduktā vikalpāḥ saṃbhaveyurna tu bhedasya
vastusvarūpatva iti bhāvaḥ | atha dharmabhedavādī śaṅkate — nanviti | ghaṭava
diti | yathā ghaṭapratītirna pratiyogisāpekṣā amukāddhaṭa iti tathāmukādbheda
ityevaṃ sāpekṣā bhedapratītirna syāt | loke tu niyamena sāpekṣaiva bhedapratītirdṛ
śyate | tathā ca bhedapratīterdharmipratiyogipratītisāpekṣatvena parapratītinirapekṣapra
tītikaghaṭādisvarūpatvaṃ bhedasya nopapadyate | prathamamiti | advaitināṃ naye yathāna
pekṣapratītikapratyakcaitanyasvarūpasyāpi jīvabrahmaikyasya jīvasya brahmaṇaikyam — iti
dharmipratiyogipratītyapekṣayā pratīyamānatvaṃ svīkriyate tathā nirapekṣapratītikadha
rmisvarūpasyaiva bhedasya dharmipratiyogipratītyapekṣayā pratīyamānatvaṃ saṃbhavati |
svarūpasyaiva tathātvāt | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ — dharmabhedavādināṃ naye prathamaṃ dharmiṇo
ghaṭasya ghaṭatvena jñānam | tataḥ pratiyoginaḥ paṭādeḥ paṭatvādinā jñānam |
tatastayordharmitvapratiyogitvānusaṃdhānasahakṛtaṃ bhedajñānam | tato ghaṭaḥ paṭādbhinna
iti vyavahāra iti kramaḥ | svarūpabhedavādināṃ naye tu prathamaṃ ghaṭasya sarvato
vilakṣaṇena ghaṭatvena svarūpeṇa jñānam | idameva ca bhedajñānam | sarvato vila
kṣaṇasya kambugrīvādisaṃsthānaviśeṣasvarūpasyaiva bhedatvāt | tataḥ pratiyoginaḥ
paṭādeḥ paṭatvādinā jñānam | tataḥ pratiyogitvānusaṃdhānapūrvako ghaṭaḥ paṭādbhinna
iti vyavahāra iti kramaḥ | na hi vyavahārādavyavahitapūrvakṣaṇa eva bhedajñānamiti
niyamaḥ | paṭāddhaṭasya bheda iti vaiyadhikaraṇyena vyavahārastu ghaṭasya svarūpamiti
vyavahāravadgauṇa eveti na dharmabhedasādhakaḥ | kiṃ ca yadi na svarūpaṃ bhedastadā
padārthe dṛṣṭe prāyaḥ sarvato vailakṣaṇyaṃ tasya na jñāyeta | tathā ca gavaye dṛṣṭepi
gavārthinaḥ pravṛttiḥ syādgośabdasmaraṇaṃ ca syāt | na ceti | na hītyarthaḥ | kiṃ
citpratiyogikabhedavānpaṭa ityatra bhedo viśeṣaṇam | paṭo viśeṣyaḥ | paṭe kiṃci
tpratiyogiko bheda ityatra bhedo viśeṣyaḥ paṭo viśeṣaṇam | viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayośca
bhedo rājñaḥ puruṣa ityādau prasiddha eva | evaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatayā bhedasiddhiḥ
kriyate cetpūrvoktā doṣāḥ syuḥ | na tu tathā tasya siddhirasmābhiḥ pratipādyate |
anyonyāśrayadoṣaprasaṅgāt | tamevānyonyāśrayamupapādayati — viśeṣaṇaviśe
ṣyabhāvaśceti | viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvagrahaśca bhedagrahāpekṣa ityarthaḥ | astvevaṃ
tathāpi kathamanyonyāśraya iti cettatrāha — dharmīti | ghaṭātpaṭasya bheda iti
paṭasya bhedaṃ prati dharmitvaṃ ghaṭasya cāvadhitvena pratiyogitvaṃ pratītyaiva hi bhedaḥ
pratyetuṃ śakyate | bhedapratītyapekṣā ca dharmitvapratiyogitvapratītiriti | evaṃ ca
bhedavānpaṭaḥ paṭe bheda ityevaṃ yā viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatayā pratītiḥ sā bhedasya sādhane
yuktirna bhavati | tarhi bhedaḥ kiṃrūpa iti cetpadārthasvarūpa eva bheda iti viṣṇu
tattvanirṇayagranthārthaḥ | ata eveti | yataḥ sarvato vilakṣaṇatattadvastusvarūpajñānaṃ
tattadvastuno viśiṣṭavyavahāre kāraṇamata evetyarthaḥ | sarvato vilakṣaṇaṃ yadgoḥ svarūpaṃ
tasya gavaye dṛṣṭepyajñānānna tanmūlako gavārthipravṛttirūpo gośabdasmaraṇarūpaśca
vyavahāra iti bhāvaḥ | na ca nīreti | nīramiśrite kṣīre cakṣuṣā gṛhyamāṇe
vastusvarūpaṃ na gṛhyata iti vaktuṃ na śakyate | cakṣuḥsaṃnikarṣasya sattvāt | tathā ca
svarūpasyaiva bhedatve bhedopi gṛhīta eva bhaveditīdaṃ kṣīramidaṃ nīramityevaṃ bhedaprati
bhāsovaśyaṃ bhāvya ityāśayaḥ | samānābhihāreti | samānena vastunā
sahaikībhāvaḥ samānābhihāraḥ | yathā dūrato dṛśyamānaḥ puruṣaḥ prathamamayaṃ kaścana
padārtha iti jñāyate | tata unnata iti | tataḥ prāṇīti | tataḥ puruṣa iti | tato
yuveti | evaṃ caikasyaiva vastunaḥ svarūpaṃ tāratamyena nānāvidhaṃ tathātathā sādhana
vaśādgṛhyate | tathā ca mādhe —

cayastviṣāmityavadhāritaṃ purā tataḥ śarīrīti vibhāvitākṛtim |
vibhurvibhaktāvayavaṃ pumāniti kramādamuṃ nārada ityabodhi saḥ || māgha 1 | 2
iti | etacca svarūpatāratamyaṃ dharmabhedavādināpi svīkāryameva | tathā ca
svarūpabhedavādinaye svarūpasyānekatve bhedasyāpyanekatvamāvaśyakamiti nīrami
śrite kṣīre ghaṭādbhedo gṛhyate na nīrāt | tādṛśasvarūpajñānesmadādicakṣuṣo'sāma
rthyāt | evaṃ ca nīrakṣīrayorekībhāvānna mitho vilakṣaṇasvarūpasya jñānamiti na
tādṛśabhedajñānaṃ nāpi nīrādbhinnaṃ kṣīramiti tatra vyavahāra iti bhāvaḥ |

evaṃ svarūpabhedapakṣaṃ pratipādya bhedāṅgīkartṛtvena svayūthyānāṃ dharmabhedavādināṃ mataṃ
samarthayati — bhavatu veti | dharmipratiyogīti | prathamaṃ dharmipratiyoginorghaṭapa
ṭayorghaṭatvena paṭatvena ca grahaṇam | tatastayorghaṭapaṭayordharmitvapratiyogitvānusaṃdhāna
sahakṛtasya bhedasya samūhālambanātmakajñāna ivaikenaiva vyāpāreṇa grahaṇam | idameva
taddhaṭitabhedagrahaṇam | atra kāryakāraṇabuddhyoryaugapadyābhāvāt da. 5 paṃ. 21
iti prāgukto doṣastu nāpādanīyaḥ | ghaṭapaṭayoryaddharmitvena pratiyogitvena
ca jñānaṃ tasya bhedajñānakāraṇatvābhāvāt | ghaṭapaṭayoryaddhaṭatvena paṭatvena ca
jñānaṃ pūrvavṛttaṃ tasya bhedajñānakāraṇatvāt | ghaṭe bhedadharmitvaṃ paṭe bhedapratiyogitvaṃ
ca vastusadeva bhedajñāne kāraṇaṃ na tu jñātamiti na kaściddoṣaḥ | parasparā
śrayeti | ghaṭapaṭayorghaṭatvena paṭatvena ca yajjñānaṃ tadbhedajñānasāpekṣam | bhedajñānaṃ
ca tādṛśajñānasāpekṣamityanyonyāśraya ityāśayaḥ | prabhedaśālinaḥ | vastutaḥ
sarvato vilakṣaṇasvarūpasya | ghaṭapaṭayoryaditaravilakṣaṇena svasvarūpeṇa jñānaṃ tatpa
rānapekṣayaiva jāyamānaṃ dṛśyata iti na ghaṭapaṭayorghaṭatvena paṭatvena ca jñānaṃ bheda
jñānasāpekṣamiti bhāvaḥ | bhedāntarabhedyatveneti | bhedyaḥ — bhinna iti vyavahā
rārhaḥ | yathā ghaṭaniṣṭhena paṭapratiyogikena prathamabhedena ghaṭo bhedyo bhavati tathā
tādṛśaprathamabhedaniṣṭhena ghaṭapratiyogikena dvitīyabhedena prathamabhedo bhedyo bhavati |
dvitīya bhedopi tanniṣṭhena prathamabhedapratiyogikena tṛtīyabhedena bhedya ityevamana
vasthā syāt | kiṃ ca yathā prathamabhedena ghaṭaḥ paṭādbhinno bhavati tathā sa
eva ghaṭaḥ prathamabhedādbhinno dvitīyabhedena syāt | punaśca sa ghaṭastṛtīyabhedena
dvitīyabhedādbhinnaḥ syādityaparānavastheti bhāvaḥ | mūlābhāvāditi | yathā
ghaṭapaṭau bhinnāviti vyavahāro ghaṭaniṣṭhapaṭapratiyogikabhedasvīkāre pramāṇaṃ tathā
bhedabhedinau bhinnāviti vyavahāro dṛśyeta cettena pramāṇena bhedaniṣṭho
dvitīyo bhedaḥ sidhyet | kiṃ tu tathā vyavahāro loke naiva dṛśyata iti
nānavasthā | etena prāguktā dvitīyāpyanavasthā pratyuktā | bhedipratiyogike
bhedaniṣṭhe dvitīyabhede bhedapratiyogike bhediniṣṭhe dvitīyabhede ca pramāṇabhūto
bhedabhedinau bhinnau — ityeka eva vyavahāraḥ | tasya vyavahārasyaivādarśanena
dvividhasyāpi dvitīyabhedasyāsiddhau nānavastheti bhāvaḥ | kiṃ caika eva
bhedaḥ paṭāddhaṭo bhinna iti vyavahāre svayaṃ ca bhedo ghaṭādbhinna iti
vyavahāre ca heturbhavediti tādṛśavyavahārasattvepi na kṣatiḥ | atha bhedaparaṃparānu
mānenānavasthā syādityabhiprāyeṇāśaṅkate — na caikabhedeti | paṭapratiyogiko
ghaṭaniṣṭho yaḥ prathamabhedaḥ sa na ghaṭasvarūpaṃ kiṃ tu ghaṭasya dharma iti mate dharmibhūta
ghaṭapratiyogiko dharmabhūtabhedaniṣṭho dvitīyo bhedovaśyaṃ svīkārya eva | dharmadharmiṇo
rbhedasya ghaṭatadrūpādau prasiddhatvāt | atra ca ghaṭaḥ prathamabhedena bhedyo bhavati |
prathamo bhedaśca dvitīyabhedena bhedyo bhavati | īdṛśaṃ ca bhedāntarabhedyatvaṃ prathamabhedasya
dṛṣṭvā taddṛṣṭāntena dvitīyabhedasyāpi bhedāntarabhedyatvamanumīyate | yathā vimato
dvitīyabhedo bhedāntarabhedyo bhedatvātprathamabhedavaditi | evaṃ tṛtīyabhedasiddhau
tasyāpi punarbhedāntarabhedyatvānumānena caturthaḥ sidhyedityanavasthā syāt | dṛṣṭānta
bhedāvighāteneti | yatrānavasthā tatrāgatyā kvacidviśramovaśyaṃ siddhavadgrahītavyaḥ |
yathā ghaṭatvapaṭatvādisāmānyeṣu sāmānyatvaṃ jātiścettatsāmānyatvaṃ jātireveti
tatrāpi punastatsāmānyatvamavaśyaṃ svīkāryaṃ syādityanavasthāyāṃ sāmānyeṣu sāmā
nyatvaṃ jātirna svīkriyate | ghaṭatvapaṭatvādyā eva jātayo na svīkāryā iti tu na
yuktam | tāsāṃ pratyakṣasiddhatvenānavasthayā bādhāyogāt | keṣucidudāharaṇeṣu
svabhāvata eva viśramo bhavati | yathā naiyāyikamateyaṃ ghaṭa iti vyavasāyātmaka
jñānena ghaṭo gṛhyate | vyavasāyastvanuvyavasāyena ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmītyādyākāreṇa
gṛhyate | sa cānuvyavasāyaḥ punaranuvyavasāyāntareṇa gṛhyata iti yāvadbuddhibalaṃ
tricaturakakṣyāviśrāntaṃ bhavati grahaṇam | buddheḥ sāmarthyopakṣaye tu caramonuvyava
sāyaḥ svayamagṛhīta eva pūrvānuvyavasāyagrāhaka iti nānavasthā | prakṛte tvekena
bhedenānyasya bhedasyānumāne tenāpyaparasya bhedasyānumānamityanavasthā kvacidanumāna
viśrānti gṛhītvā nivāryatetha vā jagati bheda eva nāstīti siddhavadgṛhītvā nivā
ryate | ādye kānicidanumānāni prakalpyāvikaleṣvapi kṛtsneṣvanumānasādhaneṣu
manasaḥ sāmarthyopakṣayeṇāgrenumānābhāva iti dṛṣṭāntabhūtasya prathamabhedasyā
vighātenaivaitadanavasthodbhāvanam | tatra ca kecidbhedāḥ svīkṛtā eva tvayeti
siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitataraṃ dharmabhedamekaṃ sādhayatām | yathā tailasādhyamaṅgamārdavādikaṃ
kāryaṃ tailābhāvātkathaṃcitpiṇyākenāpi sādhanīyamiti matvā piṇyākayācanārthaṃ
gataḥ kenacidudāttāśayena khārikāparimitaṃ tailameva dadāmīti pratiśrāvitasta
dvat | piṇyākastilakalkaḥ | tilaniṣpīḍanena taile niṣkāśitevaśiṣṭo bhāgaḥ |
khārikā parimāṇaviśeṣaḥ | bheda eva nāstīti siddhavadgṛhyata iti dvitīye pakṣe
tvaduktānumāne dṛṣṭāntabhūtaḥ prathamopi bhedo nāstītyanumānameva durvacam | kuta
stanmūlakamanavasthodbhāvanam | yathā kvacidvaravighātāya kanyodvāhaścetsa naiva kri
yate tathātrānumānamupajīvya pravṛttānavasthānumānavighātāyaiva bhavatīti nāpāda
nīyā sātreti bhāvaḥ |

etaduktaṃ bhavati — ekasyānyena saṃbandhastasyāpareṇa tasyāpi punarapareṇetyevaṃ yatra
saṃbandhaparaṃparā prāpnoti tatrānavasthādoṣa āpādanīyo bhavati | saṃbandhaśca kārya
kāraṇabhāvādhārādheyabhāvaviṣayaviṣayibhāvādiryathāsaṃbhavamanekavidhaḥ | sa ca
saṃbandhaḥ punaḥ keṣucidudāharaṇeṣvāvaśyakaḥ keṣucidaniyatatvenānāvaśyakaḥ | tatrā
nāvaśyakatve yāvatpratītirbhavettāvatparyantaṃ saṃbandhaṃ kalpayitvāgre saṃbandhasyākalpane
nānavasthāyāḥ parihāro bhavati | yathānuvyavasāyaparaṃparāyām | yathā vā pṛthivyā
jalaṃ kāraṇaṃ tasya tejastasya vāyurityevaṃ mūlakāraṇamīśvaraḥ | tasya ca na kiṃci
tkāraṇam | atastaduttaraṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasaṃbandho nāvaśyakaḥ | na hi yatkāraṇaṃ
tatkasyāpi kāryaṃ bhavatyeveti niyamaḥ | pramāṇābhāvāt | kvacittu saṃbandhasyāvaśya
katvaṃ yatraikenānyasya prathamataḥ saṃbandhesvīkṛte tasyāpareṇa tasyāpareṇetyevaṃ saṃbandha
paraṃparāvaśyaṃ svīkāryā bhavati | yathā ghaṭatvapaṭatvādijātīnāmādhārabhūtānāmādhe
yabhūtayā jātitvābhidhayā jātyā sahādhārādheyabhāvarūpaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpitaścejjā
titvamapi jātireveti punastanniṣṭhaṃ jātitvamavaśyaṃ svīkāryam | tatrāpi punarjāti
tvamiti | etādṛśī yatrānavasthā tatrānavasthādoṣaparihārāyāgatyā kvacidviśrā
ntiravaśyaṃ siddhavadgrahītavyā bhavati | tathā ca ghaṭatvādiṣu jātiṣu jātitvaṃ nāma
jātirnāstīti gṛhyate | evaṃsthitetrānavasthāvādītthaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ — atrānavasthāpari
hārāya yadayaṃ bhedasya bhedāntareṇa saha bhedyabhedakabhāvaḥ saṃbandhastādṛśānkāṃścitpa
rikalpyāgre tasya saṃbandhasya viratiḥ svīkriyate caramabhedasya bhedāntarabhedyatvaṃ
nāstīti tarhi kecidbhedāḥ svīkṛtā evānavasthā ca nāstīti kiṃ sādhitaṃ bhedaṃ
khaṇḍayatā | soyaṃ piṇyākayācanārthaṃ pravṛttasya khārikātailadātṛtvābhyupagamaḥ |
kiṃ ca tathāsati bhedatvaṃ bhedāntarabhedyatvavyāptaṃ na bhavati caramabhede vyabhicāradarśa
nādityanumānamapi durvacam | athādyopi bhedo bhedāntarabhedyo na bhavatīti brūṣe
tarhi dṛṣṭāntābhāvenānumānaṃ durvacameva | soyaṃ varavighātāya kanyodvāha iti |

na hīti | sukhaṃ bhavatu duḥkhaṃ tu leśatopi mābhūditi buddhyā mumukṣavaḥ parame
śvaraṃ prati svābhīṣṭamarthayamānā yadi parameśvaraprītisaṃpādanāya tadguṇotkarṣaṃ katha
yanti tarhi prītātparameśvarātteṣāṃ svābhīṣṭalābho bhavet | yadi tu te parameśvarapada
meva kāṅkṣeyustarhi na kevalaṃ teṣāmabhīṣṭālābhaḥ pratyuta parameśvarakrodhotpādanenāni
ṣṭāvāptiḥ syāt | yato'bhedajñānādaprītirevottamānāṃ bhavati | ghātayantīti |
yathāṅgādideśādhipatayoṅgadeśādhipatirahameveti vadantaṃ prasahya ghātayanto dṛśya
nte | tena teṣāṃ bhūpatīnāṃ tādṛśe vaktaryaprītiranumīyate | svaguṇotkarṣavādināṃ tu
te rājānaḥ prītyatiśayāviṣṭāḥ svakarmakarebhyopyadhikamakhilamiṣṭaṃ dadatītyarthaḥ |
svaguṇotkarṣavādināmiti śeṣe ṣaṣṭhī | tena caturthī nāpādanīyā | svaguṇotkarṣavādi
namiti dvitīyānto vā pāṭhaḥ | tadānīṃ pratītyuddiśyeti vādhyāhṛtya tadyoge
dvitīyā bodhyā | evaṃ ceti | paramātmā nirguṇa eva | guṇāstu tatra mṛgajala
samā bhāsamānā bhithyābhūtā eveti yatparameśvarasvarūpaprāptaye mumukṣavo vadanti
sotyantaviparītaḥ prayatnasteṣām | yathā kadalīphalalābhāya jihvācchedaḥ | na hi
tatra kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ | nāpi labdhānāṃ kadalīphalānāṃ jihvācchedottaraṃ kaścano
payogaḥ | madhyamandireṇeti | madhyagehanāmnaḥ putro madhyamandiranāmā | aya
meva pūrṇaprajñācārya ityānandatīrtha iti ca gīyate | anenaiva ca mahābhāratatātpa
ryanirṇayanāmako grantho vyaraci | taduktaṃ tatraiva —

ānandatīrthākhyamuniḥ supūrṇaprajñābhidho granthamimaṃ cakāra |
nārāyaṇenābhihito badaryāṃ tasyaiva śiṣyo jagadekabhartuḥ || ma. bhā. tā. 32 | 170 iti |
anādīti | daityā anādidveṣiṇaḥ svabhāvata eva viṣṇudveṣiṇaḥ santīti
svarūpakathanam | taiśca viṣṇau vivardhito viśeṣeṇa vardhita edhito dveṣastāndaityā
nante brahmadinapralayānte viniścayānniścayenāndhe tamasi narake pātayatītyarthaḥ |

pūrvoktānumāne sevyatvaheturuktaḥ | tatprasaṅgātsevāpadārthamāha — sā ca seveti |
aṅkanamiti | taduktaṃ brahmāṇḍe —

kṛtvā dhātumayīṃ mudrāṃ tāpayitvā svakāṃ tanum |
cakrādicihnitāṃ bhūpa dhārayedvaiṣṇavo naraḥ || iti |
cakramiti | devānāṃ balaṃ sāmarthyapradamiti cakraviśeṣaṇam | duritā |
duritam | dvitīyāyā ḍādeśaśchāndasaḥ | sudarśaneneti |

dvādaśāraṃ tu ṣaṭkoṇaṃ valayatrayasaṃyutam |
hareḥ sudarśanaṃ taptaṃ dhārayettadvicakṣaṇaḥ ||
iti nāradīye |

sevyatvena hetunā bhedamanumāya hetvantaraṃ pradarśayati — evaṃ jñeyatveti | para
mātmā jīvādbhinno jīvena jñeyatvāt | yo yena jñeyo bhavati sa tasmādbhinna eva
yathā jīvāddhaṭādirityanumānaṃ bodhyam |

satyamenamiti | anuśabdo lakṣaṇārthe anurlakṣaṇe pā. sū. 1 | 14 | 84
iti pāṇinisūtreṇa karmapravacanīyasaṃjñakaḥ | tadyoga enamiti dvitīyā | gṛṇataḥ
stuvato devasya maghona indrasya rātiṃ mitramenaṃ viṣṇumanu viṣṇunā hetubhūtena viśve
sarve prāṇino madanti hṛṣyanti | etatsatyam | sa pūrvoktosya viṣṇormahimā sarvo
ttamasvarūpaḥ satyaḥ | etādṛśaṃ viṣṇuṃ viprarājyarūpeṣu yajñeṣu śavaḥ sukhamuddiśyāhaṃ
gṛṇe staumi | so asyetyatrāsaṃdhirārṣaḥ | śava iti sukhavācinaḥ śavaśśabdasya
sāntasya dvitīyaikavacanam | viprarājya ityekavacanaṃ bahutvārthakam | yajñaśca brāhma
ṇānāṃ rājyam | brāhmaṇai rañjanīyaḥ śobhanīyo yajñaḥ | brāhmaṇairhi yajñaḥ śobhate |
rañja rāge | asyāṃ śrutau mokṣānandaḥ pratipāditaḥ | satya iti | ātmā paramātmā
satyaḥ | jīvaḥ satyaḥ | tayorbhidā bhedaśca satyaḥ | satyā bhideti vaktavye chāndasaṃ
klībatvam | mā eva āruvaṇyaḥ iti padacchedaḥ | mā iti niṣedhārthe | araśa
bdāddoṣavācakānmatvarthīya uṇpratyayaḥ | taddhita iti mahāsaṃjñākaraṇāt | tebhyaḥ
prayogebhyo hitastaddhitaḥ | prayogānusāreṇa taddhitapratyayakalpanaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ |
ārubhirduṣṭairvanyo bhajanīya āruvaṇyaḥ | paramātmā duṣṭajanasevyo naiva bhavatī
tyarthaḥ | satyaṃ bhideti maivāruvaṇya iti ca śapathatvena triruktirviśvāsātiśayotpā
danāya | asyāṃ śrutau bhedaḥ pratipādyate | idamiti | idaṃ sarvottamatvena sevyatvena
ca rūpeṇa jāyamānaṃ paramātmajñānamupāśritya matsādṛśyaṃ prāptā muktāḥ sargepi brahma
devādiṣūtpadyamāneṣvapi nopajāyante notpadyante | tathā pralaye na vyathanti duḥ
khāni nānubhavanti | punarnāvartanta ityarthaḥ | vyathantītyātmanepadābhāvaśchā
ndasaḥ | iyaṃ bhagavaduktirmokṣānantaramapi bhedaṃ vakti | jagaditi | jaganniyama
nādivyāpāravarjaṃ muktaḥ sarvānkāmānavāpnotītyaiśvaryamaryādoktyā jagadvyāpāravato
viṣṇoḥ sakāśānmuktānāṃ bhedovagamyate | prakaraṇāditi | sarvānkāmānavāpno
tīti śrutirmuktaparaiva | śarīrabhedādūrdhvamutkramyeti jīvaprakaraṇāt | muktānāmapi
jīvānāṃ jagadvyāpārasāmarthye'saṃnihitatvādvidūratvāt | tādṛśasāmarthyahīnatvādi
tyarthaḥ | bṛṃhita iti | praśaṃsanīya ityarthaḥ |
māṇḍūkyaśrutivirodhamāśaṅkate — nanviti | kalpitatvamavagamyata iti |

anādimāyayā supto yadā jīvaḥ prabudhyate |
ajamanidramasvapnamadvaitaṃ budhyate tadā ||
iti pūrvavākyānuguṇyamapyasminnarthe iti bodhyam | utpadyeteti | vidyete
tyatra vidadhātuḥ sattārthakaḥ | sattā cātra kādācitkī vivakṣitā | kādācitkī
sattā cotpattireva | yadyutpadyeta tarhi nivarteta | yataśca na nivartateto naivotpadyate |
tathā cānādireva prapañcaḥ | nātra prapañco viśvavistāraḥ | kiṃ tu prakṛṣṭaṃ bhedapañcakam |
pañcavidho bhedaḥ pañcaḥ | pañcan — śabdātprakāravacane ḍapratyayaḥ | tasya pañcavidhabhe
dasya prakṛṣṭatvaṃ ca mokṣasādhanībhūtajñānaviṣayatvādbodhyam | taduktaṃ mahābhāratatā
tparyanirṇaye —

pañcabhedāṃśca vijñāya viṣṇoḥ svābhedameva ca |
nirdoṣatvaṃ guṇodrekaṃ jñātvā muktirna cānyathā || ma. bhā. tā. 1 | 82 iti |
māyāmātramidaṃ dvaitamityasyārthamāha — na cāyamiti | ayaṃ pañcavidho bhedo
naiva vidyata iti na mantavyam | māyāmātratvāt | idaṃ bhedapañcakarūpaṃ dvaitaṃ māyā
mātram | māyā bhagavadicchā mātrā mānakartrī trāṇakartrī ca yasya tādṛśam |
māṅ māne | traiṅ pālane | ābhyāṃ mūlavibhujāderākṛtigaṇatvātkartari kapratyayaḥ |
parameśvareṇa jñātatvādrakṣitatvācca na dvaitaṃ bhrāntikalpitamiti bhāvaḥ | bhagavadi
ccheti | bhagavatprajñetyapi pāṭhaḥ | icchā ca prajñāviśeṣa eva | mahāmāyeti |
purāṇavākyamidam | he ananta mahāmāyā avidyā niyatirmohinī prakṛtirvāsa
neti ṣaḍbhiḥ śabdaistvadicchaivocyata ityarthaḥ | niyatirjīvānāṃ niyamanakaraṇāt |
mohinī mohakaraṇāt | avaśiṣṭaṃ śabdacatuṣṭayaṃ nirvaktumāgamavākyaṃ darśayati —
prakṛtiriti | prakṛṣṭā kṛtirasyā iti prakṛtiḥ | vāsayet | utpādayet | vā
syata utpādyate jagadanayeti vāsanā | a ityukta iti | akāro viṣṇurityu
ktaḥ | asya viṣṇorvidyā māyāpadavācyā prajñā saivāvidyā bhagavatprajñā | asyāḥ
sarvottamatvena prakṛṣṭatvānmāyāpadavācyatvam | mayaśabdaḥ prakṛṣṭārthe vartate | mayaiva
māyā | svārtheṇpratyaye ṭāp | tadvyapadeśaḥ | advaitaḥ sarvabhāvānāmityādāvadvaita
śabdena viṣṇorvyapadeśaḥ | paramārthāpekṣayeti | paramaścāsāvarthaśca paramārthaḥ
sarvebhya utkṛṣṭaḥ | tādṛśaścaiko viṣṇureva na tu tatsamastadadhiko vā kaścidanya
ityadvaitokterabhiprāyaḥ | anādimāyayā supta iti māṇḍūkyasthapūrvavākyepi māyā
śabdena bhagavadicchaivocyate | tathā ca bhāṣyam —

anādimāyayā viṣṇoricchayā svāpito yadā |
tayā prabodhamāyāti tadā viṣṇuṃ prapaśyati || iti |
jīveśvarabhideti | caśabdatrayaṃ tathāśabdadvayaṃ ceti śabdapañcakaṃ pañcānāṃ
bhedānāṃ mithaḥ samuccaye vartate | soyamiti | soyaṃ pañcavidho bhedaḥ satyonādi
śceti pratijñādvayam | tatrānāditvamupapādayati — sādiścediti | satyatvamu
papādayati — na cāsāviti | etat | dvaitam | mitam | bhagavatprajñāvi
ṣayībhūtam | tasmāt | uktaparamaśrutyanurodhāt |

dvāvimāviti | kṣaraścākṣara eva cetyatraivaśabdadyotitānyavyāvṛttiścaśabdadyo
titonyasamuccayaścaikatra yugapanna saṃbhavati | ata evakāro bhinnakramo dvāvityanena
saṃbadhyate | puruṣapadena cetano lakṣyate | tena strīṇāmapi saṃgrahaḥ | lokanaṃ lokaḥ |
paryālocanāyāṃ kṛtāyāmityarthaḥ | atha vā lokesminnīśitavyavarga ityarthaḥ |
sarvāṇi bhūtāni | brahmādayo jīvāḥ | kūṭastho mahālakṣmīḥ | taduktam —

brahmā śivaḥ sureśādyāḥ śarīrakṣaraṇātkṣarāḥ |
lakṣmīrakṣaradehatvādakṣarā tatparo hariḥ || iti |
brahmādayo jīvā mahālakṣmīścaitaccetanadvayameva pramāṇasiddham | uttamaḥ puruṣastu
na kṣarākṣaramadhyagataḥ kaścit | kiṃ tu tābhyāmanyaḥ paramātmā | lokatrayamiti
maharādisarvalokopalakṣaṇam | avyaya īśvara iti | aghaṭitaghaṭanāsāmarthya
śālitvarūpaiśvaryeṇa yuktatvādevākhilalokapraveśepi svayamavyaya eva | yathāgni
stambhanavidyāvatognipraveśepi na dāho bhavati tadvat | yo māmiti | evam |
avayavārthasahakāreṇa puruṣottamapadaśakyam | na tu rathaṃtaraśabdavatpuruṣottamaśa
bdasya mayi kevalā rūḍhirityāśayaḥ | asaṃmūḍhaḥ | puruṣottamatvamapāramārthikamiti
saṃmohavarjitaḥ | sarvabhāvena | sarvaprakāreṇa | etaditi | na ca buddhvā buddhi
māniti ktvāpratyayānupapattiḥ | ekasyā eva jñānakriyāyāḥ paurvāparyāsaṃbhavā
diti vācyam | buddhimānityasyāparokṣajñānītyarthenādoṣāt | mukhyaṃ ceti |
sarvavedānāṃ śrīpaterutkarṣa eva paraṃ mukhyaṃ tātparyam | tuśabdo bhinnakramonyatre
tyanantaraṃ yojyaḥ | tasmācchrīpaterutkarṣādanyatra tvavāntaraṃ tātparyaṃ na tu mukhya
mityarthaḥ | yuktaṃ ceti | yuktisiddhamityarthaḥ | tāmeva yuktimupapādayati —
mokṣo hīti | pramāṇaśiromaṇibhūtāḥ sarve vedā anityapuruṣārthasādhanaṃ na prati
pādayeyuḥ | kiṃ tu mokṣarūpanityapuruṣārthasādhanameva | tacca sādhanaṃ viṣṇuprasādaḥ |
sa ca tadguṇotkarṣajñānādeveti |

paramo vicintyaḥ | prītyarthaṃ sarvotkṛṣṭatayā jñātavyaḥ | karmapāśāditi |
mumukṣubhirityanena saṃbadhyate | tasminniti | tasminviṣṇau prasanne prīte sati
na kimapi durlabham | tatrāpi dharmārthakāmairalam | alamiti pratiṣedhārthe | dharmā
rthakāmā na prārthanīyāḥ | yataste dharmārthakāmā alpakāḥ kṣudrāḥ | puruṣārthānāmapi
teṣāmanityatvenāmukhyatvāt | mokṣastvaprārthitopi paramātmaprasādena labhyata eva |
yato mumukṣubhiḥ samāśritādanantādbrahmataroḥ sakāśānmuktirūpaṃ phalaṃ niścayena
mumukṣavaḥ prāpnuvantyevetyarthaḥ |

vyākopa iti | tattvamasīti śrutau tatpadena brahmābhidhīyate | tvaṃśabdena
ca jīvaḥ | he somya tvaṃ tadasītyarthaḥ | atra jīvabrahmaṇostādātmyamabhidhīyate |
tattayorbhedāṅgīkāre virudhyeteti śaṅkakābhiprāyaḥ | āheti | aviśeṣataḥ sāmā
nyena tacchabdo nityaparokṣamarthaṃ brūte | aviśeṣita iti pāṭhe śabdāntarasaṃnidhā
nena viśeṣārthako na cedityarthaḥ | tvaṃśabdaścāparokṣaṃ pratyakṣamarthaṃ brūte | tathā ca
tattvaṃśabdārthayorviruddhayoraikyaṃ na saṃbhavati | ato jīvasya brahmasārūpyapradarśana
tātparyikeyaṃ śrutiriti mantavyam | paratra paraśabdaḥ prayujyamāno vināpi vatiṃ
vatyarthaṃ gamayatīti nyāyāt | yathādityo yūpa ityukte yūpādityayoraikyāsaṃbhavā
dādityasadṛśo yūpa ityarthaḥ kalpyate tadvat | yūpo yajñastambhaḥ | jīvasyeti | nanu
muktasya paramātmanā saha buddhisārūpye paramātmanā jñātānāṃ kṛtsnaviṣayāṇāṃ
jñānaṃ muktasya syāditi cenna | muktena yadbudhyate tatparamātmabuddhyanusāreṇaivetī
dṛśasya buddhisārūpyasyātra vivakṣitatvāt | jīvaparamātmanostādātmyavyavacche
dārthaḥ prathamastuśabdaḥ | paramātmanā jñātaṃ sarvaṃ tu muktenāpi na jñāyata iti
viśeṣadyotanārtho dvitīyastuśabdaḥ | buddhisārūpyamevetyevakāronabhimatavyāvṛttyartho
nabhimatāṃ jīvaparamātmanoḥ svarūpaikatāṃ vyāvartayati na tvekasthānanivāsam |
tasyābhimatatvāt | eketi | atha vaikasminvaikuṇṭhaloke yo muktaparamātmano
rnivāso bhavati tadeva jīvasya paramaikyamityucyate | nanu paramātmano vyāpakatvena
baddhajīvasyāpi paramātmanā sahāsminbhūlokādāvekasthānanivāsostyevetyata
āha — vyaktisthānamapekṣyeti | jīvasya mokṣe mūlasvarūpavyañjakaṃ vaikuṇṭha
sthānaṃ vyaktisthānamityucyate | tadapekṣayāyamekasthānaniveśa ucyata iti bhāvaḥ |
sa prasiddha ekasthānaniveśa iti saṃbandhaḥ | neti | virūpato viruddhadharmatvānna
muktasyāpi paramātmanā saha svarūpaikatā | yataḥ paramātmanaḥ svātantryaṃ pūrṇatvaṃ
ca muktasya tu pāratantryamalpatvaṃ ceti vairūpyaṃ dṛśyate | pūrṇate ityatrārṣatvātpragṛ
hyāśrayaḥ prakṛtibhāvo na kṛtaḥ |

atha sa ātmātattvamasītyatra ātmā atat tvam — iti padaccheda itya
bhiprāyeṇa pakṣāntaramāha — atha veti | na bhavasīti | ataditi prasajya
pratiṣedhaḥ | jīveśayorvastutaḥ sārūpyameva naikyam | paraṃ tu sārūpyamūlaka aikya
bhramaḥ kadācitsyādataḥ śrutistayorakyaimāropya haṭhānniṣedhati | atha vā nañatrā
suraśabdādāvivānyārthe | svātantryādiguṇopeta eva paramātmā | tvaṃ tu tasmāda
nyadvastvasītyarthaḥ | uddālakena svaputraṃ śvetaketuṃ pratyayamupadeśaḥ kriyate |

nanu taditi padacchedenāyaṃ jīveśvarābhedopadeśaḥ prasiddhaḥ | tatkathamakārapraśleṣeṇa
padaṃ vicchidya bhedopadeśaḥ kathyata ityata āha — tasmāditi | chāndogyopani
ṣadi ṣaṣṭhedhyāye sadvidyāprakaraṇeṣṭamaṃ khaṇḍamārabhya ṣoḍaśakhaṇḍaparyantaṃ khaṇḍanavake
sa ātmātattvamasītyucyate | tatra sacchabdavācyaṃ brahmaivāsmājjīvādanyajjīvasyā
śrayabhūtamiti putraṃ pradidarśayiṣuruddālakaḥ 1 prathame khaṇḍe sarvaiḥ prāṇibhiranubhūtāṃ
suṣuptyavasthāṃ puraskṛtya tasyāmavasthāyāmayaṃ jīvaḥ sadrūpeṇa brahmaṇā saṃpanno bhavatī
tyuktavān | tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ — yathā pakṣighātakasya hastagatena sūtreṇa prabaddhaḥ pakṣī ba
ndhanamokṣārthī sannitastataḥ patitvānyatrāśrayamalabdhvā bandhanamevopaśrayate tadvadayaṃ
jīvaḥ svapne jāgare cetastataḥ patitvānyatra viśrāntisthānamalabdhvā suṣuptau sadrūpaṃ
brahmaivopaśrayate | atra mitho bhinnayorāśritāśrayayoḥ śakunisūtrayordṛṣṭāntābhidhānena
jīvādbhinnaṃ jīvāśrayabhūtaṃ sadbrahmeti sūcitaṃ bhavati | tataḥ sa ya eṣa mūlabhūto
tyantasūkṣma ātmaitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmātattvamasi śvetaketo ityu
ktam | tato 2 dvitīye khaṇḍe nāsmindehe jīvasyāśrayabhūto jīvādanyaḥ kaśca
nāsti bhedenānupalabhyamānatvāt — ityāśaṅkāpanodāya yathā bhramarairnānāvidhānāṃ
vṛkṣāṇāṃ puṣparasamānīyaikatra kṛtvā madhuni niṣpādite tatratyā rasā mitho bhinnā
apyamuṣya puṣpasyāhaṃ rasosmyayaṃ tvanyasyetyevaṃ mitho bhedaṃ na jānanti tathā jīvāḥ
svāśrayaṃ na jānantītyuktam | tathā ca yatra bhedenānupalabhyamānatvaṃ tatra na bhinna
syāstitvam — iti niyamasya vyabhicāro darśitaḥ | tataścetanaviṣayeyaṃ niyamo
styevetyāśaṅkya 3 tṛtīye khaṇḍe yathā cetanābhirgaṅgāyamunādinadīdevatābhiḥ
samudraṃ praviṣṭābhiriyamahaṃ gaṅgāsmīyamahaṃ yamunāsmītyevaṃ bhedo na jñāyate tathā
meghadvāreṇa samudrānnirgatābhirapīyamahaṃ samudrādāgacchāmīti na jñāyate tathā
parjanyadvāreṇa pṛthivyāṃ patitābhiḥ sravantībhirapīyamahaṃ samudrādāgateti na
jñāyate tadvaccetanasyāpi jīvasya suṣuptau jāgṛtau ca na svāśrayajñānamityuktam |
anena cetanaviṣayepi prāguktaniyamasya vyabhicāro darśitaḥ | tatostu nāme
śvaro jīvādbhinnastathāpi tadadhīnatvaṃ jīvasya kuta ityāśaṅkāpanodāya 4 caturthe
khaṇḍe vṛkṣasya mūle madhyegre vā kvacidabhyāghāte srāva eva kevalaṃ bhavati na tu
vṛkṣaḥ śuṣyati | kadācitu bāhyakāraṇābhāvepi śuṣyati | na hyetajjīvasyādhī
nam | jīvo hi sadā sukhamevecchati | tathā ca yathā vṛkṣaśarīre jīvasyeśvarā
dhīnatvaṃ tathā manuṣyādiśarīrepīti darśitam | tatostu jīvādanyo jīvā
śrayabhūta īśvaraḥ | astu ca tadadhīnatvaṃ jīvasya | paraṃ tu kena kāraṇeneśvarajñānaṃ
jīvasya na bhavatītyāśaṅkāpanodāya 5 pañcame khaṇḍe yathā nyagrodhaphale bhinne
sūkṣmaṃ bījaṃ dṛśyate | tasmiṃśca bīje bhinne na kiṃcidapi dṛśyate | sūkṣmataratvāt |
paraṃ tu tasmātsūkṣmatarādbījāvayavānmahānvaṭo jāyate sa yatprabhāvātsa paramasūkṣma
īśvaro na dṛśyate tadvajjīvāpekṣayāpi paramasūkṣmatvādīśvaro jīvena na jñāyata
ityuktam | tataḥ sūkṣmānmahato vaṭavṛkṣasyotpādanaṃ jīvasya cānabhimatopi
duḥkhitvādyanubhava ityevamīśvarasya kāryaṃ pratyakṣamanubhūyate kāraṇabhūta īśvarastu
nānubhūyata iti kathaṃ pratyetavyamityāśaṅkāpanodāya 6 ṣaṣṭhe khaṇḍe lavaṇamu
dake prakṣiptaṃ vilīnaṃ satkvāpi na dṛśyate tvacāpi na jñāyate paraṃ tu jihvayā
tadraso jñāyate | tathā ca yathā lavaṇaguṇe rasenubhūyamānepi lavaṇaṃ na dṛśyate
tatheśvarasāmarthye dṛśyamānepi neśvaro dṛśyata ityuktam | tata etādṛśoti
sūkṣma īśvaraḥ kathaṃ jñāyate prāpyate cetyāśaṅkāpanodāya 7 saptame khaṇḍe
yathā gandhāradeśasthaḥ kaściddhanikaścorairbaddhahastādyavayavaḥ pinaddhākṣopahṛtasarvasvo
vane visṛṣṭa ākrośankenacitkṛpālunā puruṣeṇa mocitosyāṃ diśi gandhārade
śosti gacchetyukto grāmādgrāmāntaraṃ gacchangandhārānprāpnoti tathā karmacoreṇā
pahṛtajñānasarvasvo jīvaḥ śarīravane visṛṣṭaḥ kṛpālunā sadguruṇopadiṣṭaḥ śravaṇā
disādhanaiḥ svajanmabhūmiṃ bhagavantaṃ paśyati prāpnoti cetyuktam | vṛkṣaśarīre
jīvasya bhagavadadhīnatvaṃ pradarśya mānuṣaśarīrepi tathaivānumeyamiti caturthakhaṇḍa
tātparyamuktam | saṃprati tu manuṣyaśarīra eva jīvasyeśvarādhīnatvamanubhāvayitu 8
maṣṭame khaṇḍe āsannamaraṇo vāgādilaye na kimapi vaktuṃ śaknoti na cāsannā
napi bāndhavānmatyabhijānāti saiṣā daśānabhimatāpi jīvenānubhūyate bhagava
dadhīnatvādityuktam | tato 9 navame khaṇḍe yathā śaṅkitasya corasya na mayā
cauryaṃ kṛtamiti vadato haste rājādhikāribhiḥ parīkṣārthaṃ taptaparaśuḥ sthāpyate |
coronṛtavādī ceddahyate satyavādī cetsatyena vyavadhānānna dahyate tathā tattva
jñānī mucyate itarastu badhyata ityuktam | paramātmānaṃ bhedena yo jānāti sa
tattvajñānī | evaṃ sthānanavakepi bheda eva dṛṣṭāntā abhihitāḥ | na tvekopi
dṛṣṭānto'bhedaviṣayobhihitaḥ | śakunisūtrayornānāvṛkṣarasānāṃ nadīsamudrayorjī
vavṛkṣayoraṇimadhānayorlavaṇodakayorgandhārapuruṣayorajñaprāṇādiniyāmakayoḥ stenā
pahāryayoścaikyābhāvāt | tasmānnāyamabhedopadeśa iti siddham |

anyathā | vailakṣaṇyājñāne | śarīrakṣaraṇāt | śarīravināśāt | tatparaḥ |
tābhyāṃ parastatparaḥ | kathaṃ tatparatvamityata āha — svātantryeti | sattāpratīti
pravṛttiṣu svādhīnatvaṃ svātantryam | kāryotpaktyādyanukūlotīndriyaḥ kāraṇadharmavi
śeṣaḥ śaktiḥ | akhilapadārthānāṃ tattadviśeṣasvarūpeṇa jñānaṃ vijñānam | sukhaṃ prasi
ddham | ādyagrahaṇena vīryaśauryaudāryakāruṇyādisaṃgrahaḥ | guṇairiti prakṛtyāditvā
ttṛtīyā | guṇairniḥsīmatvenetyasya niravadhikaitadguṇakatvāditi tātparyam | lakṣmyā
dīnāṃ guṇāstu na niravadhikāḥ | viṣṇumiti | atra tadīyasarvaguṇapūrṇatvajñā
nasya mokṣasādhanatvaṃ kathyate | etena brahmaṇi guṇā māyayā kalpitā na tu vastu
bhūtā ityapāstam | na hi māyikārthasya jñānaṃ mokṣasādhanam | kiṃ tu tattva
jñānameva | muktānāṃ cāśraya iti | nirdoṣāśeṣasadguṇatvaṃ viṣṇoreva na tu mukta
syetyāśrayāśrayibhāvopapattiḥ | nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti mu. 3 | 1 | 3
iti sāmyavākyaṃ tu duḥkharāhityādidharmeṇa sāmyaparamiti bodhyam |

pradhānatvakāraṇatvādineti | ādipadena sādṛśyagrahaṇam | na hi satya
jñāneneti | yo hi śuktikeyamiti jñānavān sa rajatajño na bhavati | tayo
rjñānayorvirodhāt | śuktijño hi tatrāropitaṃ rajataṃ naiva paśyati | pratyuta nedaṃ
rajatamityeva paśyati | pradhānatvahetukamekavijñānena sarvavijñānamupapādayati —
yathā pradhāneti | ityevamādivyapadeśa iti | yadyapi pradhānabhūtasya rājño
vijñāne satyapi bhṛtyā na vastuto jñātā bhavanti tathāpi tatra jñātavad vyabahāro
bhavati | bhṛtyajñānaphalasya pradhānajñānenaiva saṃpādanāt | tathā caikavijñānena sarva
vijñānaṃ phalāpekṣayoktaṃ na svarūpāpekṣayā | evaṃ cāvijñātaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati chā.
6 | 1 | 3 iti śrutau vijñātaśabdasya lakṣaṇayā saṃpāditavijñānaphalakamityarthaḥ |
lakṣaṇā ceyaṃ nirūḍhā | ato na lākṣaṇikaśabdaprayoge prayojanāpekṣā | etacca
vyapadeśo dṛṣṭa evetyanena sūcitam | kāraṇatvahetukamekavijñānena sarvavijñānamupa
pādayati — yathā ca kāraṇa iti | devadattakāraṇatvena yajñadatte vijñāte sati
devadatto devadattatvena jñātaścedupadeśaṃ vinaiva ayaṃ yajñadattaputraḥ — iti jñāyate |
tathā paramātmani jagatkāraṇatvena rūpeṇa jñāte sarvaṃ jagattatkāryatvena rūpeṇa jñāyata
eva | ādipadagrāhyasādṛśyahetukamekavijñānena sarvavijñānamupapādayati — yathā
vā sādṛśyāditi | yathā

stanakeśavatī strī syāllomaśaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ |
ityevaṃ kācidekā strīyaṃ strītyevaṃ strītvena rūpeṇa jñātā cetstanakeśādimattva
sādṛśyenānyāpi strīyaṃ strītyevaṃ rūpeṇopadeśaṃ vinaiva jñāyate tathā prāmāṇikaṃ vastu
satyamityevaṃ bhagavānayaṃ satya ityevaṃ satyatvena rūpeṇa jñātaścetprāmāṇikatvasā
dṛśyājjagadapi satyatvena rūpeṇa jñāyate | tathā ca prayogaḥ — jagatsatyaṃ prāmāṇika
tvādbrahmavaditi | tathā cetanaḥ paramātmā jñānānandādirūpeṇa jñātaśceccetanatva
sādṛśyājjīvā api jñānānandādirūpeṇa jñāyante | tathā ca prayogaḥ — jīvā
jñānānandarūpāḥ saccetanatvādbrahmavaditi | na ca jīvāḥ svatantrāḥ prāmāṇikatvā
ccetanatvādbrahmavadityanumānena jīveṣu svātantryamapi sidhyediti vācyam | teṣu
svātantryasya śrutyā bādhitatvāttatrānumānasyāpravṛtteḥ | tadeva sādṛśyamiti |
ekavijñānena sarvavijñāne hetutvena yatsādṛśyamuktaṃ tadevātra śrutāvapi yathā
somyetyādinā dṛṣṭāntavākyena tatra kāraṇatayā vivakṣitaṃ na tūpādānopādeyabhāva
statra kāraṇam | anyathā | ekavijñānena sarvavijñāne sādṛśyaṃ na kāraṇaṃ kiṃ tūpā
dānopādeyabhāva ityaṅgīkāre | yatraikavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ sādṛśyena cikīrṣitaṃ
tatra lāghavātkāṃcidekāṃ vyaktiṃ pradarśyaivamitarā ityevamanyā jñāpyante | tathā ca
tadanusāreṇātraikaśabdaḥ sārthakaḥ | tathā mṛṇmayaghaṭādiniṣṭhasādṛśyapratiyogitvaṃ
mṛdanvitatvena rūpeṇa mṛtpiṇḍasyeti piṇḍaśabdaśca sārthakaḥ | upādānopādeya
bhāvasya kāraṇatve tvekaśabdaṃ piṇḍaśabdaṃ ca vināpi vivakṣitārthapratipādanasya
pūrṇatvāttayorvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭameva | yena vinā vivakṣitavākyārthapratipattirbhavati ta
ddhyanākāṅkṣitatvānniṣprayojanameva bhavati | kiṃ copādānopādeyabhāvasya kāra
ṇatva ekaśabdaḥ piṇḍaśabdaśca viruddha eva | na hyekasyaiva mṛtpiṇḍasya sarvamṛṇmayopā
dānatvam | tathā mṛttikāyā eva mṛṇmayaghaṭādyupādānatvaṃ na mṛtpiṇḍasya |
piṇḍopamardena ghaṭādinirmāṇadarśanāt | na ca vāceti | ayaṃ hi śaṅkakābhiprāyaḥ —
yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt chā. 6 | 1 | 4 iti
dṛṣṭāntottaraṃ paṭhyamānaṃ vācārambhaṇamityādivākyaṃ dṛṣṭāntopapādakatayaiva yoja
nīyam | ghaṭaśarāvādikāraṇabhūtenaikena mṛtpiṇḍena vijñātena tadvikārabhūtaṃ ghaṭa
śarāvādikaṃ sarvaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati | na ca kāraṇajñānena tadvikārabhūtasya
kāryasya kathaṃ jñānamiti vācyam | kāryasya kāraṇānanyatvāt | na hi kāraṇavya
tirekeṇa kāryasattvaṃ dṛśyate | yadi kāraṇavyatirekeṇa kāryasyāsattvaṃ tarhi loka
idaṃ kāraṇamidaṃ tadvikārabhūtaṃ kāryamiti yā pratītirdṛśyate tatra vikāraśabdena
kimucyata iti cettatrāha — vācārambhaṇamiti | vācārambhaṇaṃ vāgārabdhaṃ kevalaṃ
śābdikamiti yāvat | nāmaiva nāmadheyam | vikāro vikāra iti yalloka ucyate
tatkevalaṃ śābdikaṃ nāmamātram | mṛṣeti yāvat | vācaiva kevalamastītyārabhyate
vikāraḥ | na tu vastugatyā vikāro nāma kaścidasti | anupalabdheḥ |
kāraṇabhūtā mṛttikaiva tu satyeti | evaṃ ca ghaṭādivikāreṣvapi kāraṇāṃśasyaiva
satyatvātkāraṇena vijñātena kāryam idamatra satyam — ityevaṃrūpeṇa vijñātaṃ
bhavatīti dṛṣṭāntopapattiḥ | tathā copādānopādeyabhāvahetukamevaikavijñānena
sarvavijñānaṃ na sādṛśyādihetukamityaṅgīkaraṇīyamiti | imāmāśaṅkāmapanu
danvācārambhaṇaśrutimarthāntareṇa yojayati — vācārambhaṇamiti | asaṃskṛtānāṃ
bhāṣāśabdānāṃ yadvācārambhaṇaṃ vāgindriyeṇoccāraṇaṃ tadvikāra utpādanaṃ na tu
saṃskṛtasya nityaśabdasyeva vyañjanam | mṛttiketyādikaḥ saṃskṛto nityaḥ śabdastu
na vāgindriyeṇotpādyate kiṃ tvabhivyajyate | ato'saṃskṛtā bhāṣāśabdā vikṛtā
evānityāśca | vastuto nāmadheyaṃ tu mṛttiketyeva | mṛttiketyākārakaṃ yatsaṃskṛtaṃ
śabdasvarūpaṃ tadeva vastuto yogyaṃ nāmadheyam | arthādavikṛtaṃ nityaṃ ceti
labhyate | yathāsmingrāmenye durācārā ayameva tu brāhmaṇa ityukte brāhmaṇaśabdasya
yogyo brāhmaṇa ityarthātsadācārasaṃpanna iti labhyate | yadyapyanyepi brāhmaṇā eva
tathāpi na te yogyā brāhmaṇā durācāratvāt | tathā mṛttiketyākārakaṃ yatsaṃskṛtaṃ
śabdasvarūpaṃ tadeva yogyaṃ nāmadheyam | yadyapyasaṃskṛtānyapi śabdasvarūpāṇi nāma
dheyānyeva tathāpi na tāni yogyāni nāmadheyāni | vikṛtatvādanityatvācca | vā
cārambhaṇaṃ vikāraḥ nāmadheyaṃ tu mṛttiketyeva — ityetadvacanaṃ yanmayā uddālakena
tvāṃ śvetaketuṃ pratyupadiṣṭaṃ tatsatyaṃ yathārthaṃ na tu pratārakamiti śrutyarthaḥ |
asyāḥ śruteḥ śaṅkākṛtpradarśitārthakatve tu vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro mṛttikaiva satyam —
ityevābhīpsitārthalābhe nāmadheyaśabda itiśabdaśca vyarthaḥ syāt | asmākaṃ tu
mate mṛttiketyetadeva nāmadheyam — iti vākyārtho vidheyaparatvādāvaśyakaḥ |
itiśabdaśca mṛttikāśabdasya śabdaparatvapradarśanena sārthakaḥ | gavityayamāhetyā
divat | itiśabdo hi padārthaviparyāsakṛdarthaparasya śabdaparatvaṃ śabdaparasya cārtha
paratvaṃ karoti | śabdaśāstre hi śabdaprakaraṇādagnerḍhak pā. sū. 4 | 2 | 33
ityādau yathāgnyādiśabdānāṃ śabdaparatvaṃ tathā na veti vibhāṣā pā. sū. 1 |
1 | 44 ityatra navāśabdayoḥ śabdaparatve prāpterthaparatvaṃ karoti | anyatra tu gavi
tyayamāhetyādāvarthaparatve prāpte śabdaparatvaṃ karoti | nanu vācārambhaṇaśruteḥ
saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtaśabdayornityatvānityatvapratipādanaparatve kathamanayā prāguktasya yathā
somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍeneti dṛṣṭāntasyopapādanamiti cenna | neyaṃ vācārambhaṇaśrutiḥ prā
guktadṛṣṭāntopapādikā | kiṃ tu prādhānyahetukamekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ yaduktaṃ tatra
svatantro dṛṣṭāntonayocyate | atra ca yathā somyetyanuvartate | he somya yathā avi
kṛtatvānnityatvācca mṛttiketyādikaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ nāmadheyaṃ pradhānaṃ na tvasaṃskṛtam | tatra
cāsaṃskṛtajñāne yatphalaṃ tatsaṃskṛtanāmadheyajñānātsaṃpadyate tathā jagajjñāne yatphalaṃ
tatparamātmajñānena labhyata iti |

prathama iti | satyasya vastuno'dvaitamaikyam | brahmaikameva satyamityevaṃ
rūpasya satyādvaitasya prapañcagatamithyātvasya satyatve bhaṅgaḥ syāt | brahma satyaṃ
prapañcagatamithyātvaṃ ca satyamiti satyadvayaprasaṅgāt | carama iti | prapañcagata
mithyātvasyaiva mithyātvaṃ cedarthādeva prapañcasya satyatvaṃ syāt | nanvanityatvamiti |
anityaḥ śabda ityucyamāne tacchabdagatamanityatvaṃ nityamanityaṃ vā | yadi nityaṃ
tarhi dharmasya sadā sattvāddharmiṇopi sadā sattvameveti nityaḥ śabdaḥ syāt |
anityatvasyānityatve tvanityatvasyābhāvānnityaḥ śabdaḥ syāt | tathā cobhayathā
pyanupapattiḥ | nityasameti | parakṛtapraśnasya yadasamīcīnamuttaraṃ dīyate tajjā
tirityucyate | asamīcīnatvaṃ ca dūṣaṇāsamarthatvena | tasya ca caturviṃśatiprabhedā
nyāyadarśane gautamena sādharmyavaidharmya5 | 1 | 1ityādisūtreṇa pratipāditāḥ |
tatra nityasamanāmako jātibhedoyam | nyāyeti | nyāyaśāstrasya nirmāṇe vedhā
brahmadevaḥ | nyāyaśāstrotpādaka iti yāvat | sa cātra gautamaḥ | gautamo hi nyāya
śāstre sūtraṃ cakāra | nityamiti | anityabhāvāt — anityatvāt | upapatteḥ — āpā
danāt | śabdaniṣṭhadharmasya anityatvasya nityatvāt tādṛśanityadharmāśrayībhūte
vastutaḥ anitye api śabde nityatvāpādanānnityasama ityucyate
iti sūtrārthaḥ | anityatvasyānityatvepyanityatvābhāvadaśāyāṃ na śabdasyānityatva
miti nityatvāpādanaṃ saṃbhavatyeveti bhāvaḥ | tārkikarakṣāyāmiti | ayaṃ vara
darājapraṇīto nyāyaśāstre granthaḥ | dharmasyeti | śabdagatasyānityatvarūpa
dharmasya tadrūpamanityatvam | atadrūpaṃ nityatvam | anityatvamanityaṃ nityaṃ vetyayaṃ
vikalpo nopapadyate | ubhayathāpi dharmiṇaḥ śabdasyānityatvadharmaviśiṣṭatvaṃ bhajyate |
anityatvasyānityatve kathaṃ śabdasyānityatvadharmaviśiṣṭatvam | anityatvasya nitya
tvepyanityatvadharmasya dharmiṇaṃ śabdamantareṇa sthiterabhāvāddharmiṇaḥ śabdasya sadā
sattvena kathaṃ śabdasyānityatvadharmaviśiṣṭatvam | tathā cobhayathāpi nityatvaprasaṅgā
nnityasamanāmā jātibhedoyamityarthaḥ | asyā iti | nityasama iti yā saṃjñā
sopalakṣaṇam | asya jātibhedasya yathāyogyamanvarthaṃ nāma tūparañjakadharmasama iti |
dharmasyoparañjakatvāpādakamuttaramuparañjakadharmasamaśabdenocyate | uparañjakatvama
vicāritaramaṇīyatvam | śabde'nityatvadharma ucyamānastāvatkālaṃ manasi pratiṣṭhāṃ
labhate yāvannoktavikalpodbhāvanam | tadanantaraṃ tu na sa dharmo manasi sāmīcīnyena
sthitimāsādayati | tathā cānityatvadharmasyāvicāritaramaṇīyatvaṃ prasajyate |
tasmāditi | tathā ca prapañco mithyetyukte tatra mithyātvaṃ tathyamatathyaṃ veti
vikalpodbhāvanamasaduttaramevetyato vaktumayogyamiti prapañcamithyātvaṃ sidhyatyeveti
śaṅkāśayaḥ | uttarayati — aśikṣiteti | trāsanaṃ vibhīṣikā | yaiṣā jātyu
ttaratvoktiḥ sā kevalamaśikṣitasya cakṣuṣi dhūliprakṣepaḥ | anayā jātyuttaratvoktyā
hyaśikṣita eva trasyenna tu śikṣitaḥ | śikṣito vidvānpuruṣastu naitajjātyuttaraṃ
manyate | yato'saduttaraṃ jātiḥ | sati hi doṣabīja uttarasyāsattvaṃ nāsati |
duṣṭatveti | duṣṭatvasya doṣasya mūlaṃ bījam | taddoṣabījaṃ dvividham | tatrādyaṃ
sādhāraṇaṃ yatparaṃ pratyuktaṃ paramiva svātmānamapi vyāpnoti | ata evāsyottarasya
svavyāghātakatvādasattvam | yathā pareṇa svābhyupagatārthasādhakatvena kasmiṃścittarka
udbhāvite tarkāprāmāṇyasya tarkeṇaiva sādhanam | etacca sādhitamaprāmāṇyaṃ na kevalaṃ
paroktameva tarkaṃ vyāpnoti kiṃ tu tarkāprāmāṇyasādhakaṃ svābhyupagataṃ tarkamapi
vyāpnoti | prakṛte tu prapañcagatamithyātvaṃ tathyamatathyaṃ vā — ityetādṛśavikalpodbhā
vanena prapañcagataṃ mithyātvameva dūṣitaṃ bhavati na tu svābhyupagataṃ prapañcasatyatva
miti naitatsādhāraṇam | dvitīyamasādhāraṇaṃ ca yadyapi svābhyupagatamarthaṃ na dūṣa
yati tathāpi paroktamapi na dūṣayati | yuktenāvaśyakenāṅgena rahitatvādayuktenā
nāvaśyakenāṅgenādhikatvādviṣayāvṛttitvācca | yathā pareṇa parvate vahnyabhāve sādhite
tatra vahniṃ sādhayata uttaraṃ parvato vahnimānmahānasavaditi | atrāvaśyakasya dhūma
vattvāditi hetuvākyasyābhāvānnaitaduttaraṃ svābhyupagataṃ vahniṃ sādhayati nāpi
parābhyupagataṃ vahnyabhāvaṃ dūṣayati | yathā ca tatraiva parvato vahnimāndhūmavattvātpra
kāśavattvātpārthivatvācca mahānasavadityuttaram | etaddhyuttaraṃ prakāśavattvādityā
dyadhikoktyā yogyatāmalabhamānaṃ na svābhyupagataṃ vahniṃ sādhayati nāpi parābhyu
pagataṃ vahnyabhāvaṃ dūṣayati | adhikoktirhi vaktuḥ svokteriṣṭārthasādhanatāyāmaviśvāsaṃ
sūcayati | atodhikoktigarbhottarasyāyogyatvam | yathā ca tatraiva parvataḥ pārthivo
gandhavattvāddhaṭavadityuttaram | etacca svābhyupagatena vahnirūpaviṣayeṇa parābhyu
pagatena vahnyabhāvarūpaviṣayeṇa cāsaṃbaddhamiti na vahniṃ sādhayati nāpi vahnyabhāvaṃ
dūṣayati | prakṛte tu prapañcagatamithyātvaṃ tathyamatathyaṃ veti vikalpodbhāvanarūpa
muttaraṃ na kenāpyāvaśyakenāṅgena rahitaṃ na vā anāvaśyakena kenāpyaṅgena yuktam |
nāpi prapañcasatyatvarūpeṇa viṣayeṇāsaṃbaddham | vikalpodbhāvanena prapañcamithyātve
dūṣite svābhyupagatasya prapañcasattvasya siddheḥ | nanu kathaṃ mithyātve dūṣite prapañca
sattvasiddhiḥ | yadi mithyātvamasattvaṃ syāttarhi tasyābhāvaḥ sattvarūpaḥ syānna tvanya
theti cenna | mithyātvāsattvayoḥ paryāyatvāt | ataścāsyottarasyāsattvābhāvānna
jātyuttaratvamiti | śākaṭiketi | śakaṭena carati śākaṭikaḥ | yo vetanaṃ
gṛhītvā śakaṭena parānparakīyaṃ dhānyādi vā grāmāntaraṃ nayati saḥ | ayaṃ cāśi
kṣitaḥ pāṃśulapādo viṃśatipañcakaṃ śataṃ ca samānamevetyajānāno lokopahā
syatāṃ gacchati |
maṅgalārtha iti | taduktaṃ gāruḍe —

sisṛkṣoḥ paramādviṣṇoḥ prathamaṃ dvau viniḥsṛtau |
oṃkāraścāthaśabdaśca tasmātprāthamikau kramāt || iti |
viṣṇoḥ sakāśādyatprathamaṃ samutpannaṃ tattajjātīyeṣūttamamityakhilaśabdamadhye
nayoḥ svarūpeṇottamatvātprāthamikatvam | tata eva ca maṅgalārthatvam | maṅgalaṃ
ca nāthaśabdasya vācyorthaḥ | kiṃ tvathaśabdaśravaṇamathaśabdoccāraṇaṃ ca mṛdaṅgadhva
nivanmaṅgalakṛtyaṃ karoti | athaśabdasya vācyārthastvānantaryameva | ānantaryasya
cāvadhisāpekṣatvātkasya pūrvavṛttasyānantaryamityapekṣāyāṃ yogyatābalādadhikāra
syānantaryaṃ gṛhyate | brahmajñānādhikāraprāptyanantaraṃ brahmajijñāsetyarthaḥ | etatsūtra
praṇayane sūtrakṛdabhimataḥ pūrvapakṣastu na brahmajijñāsā kartavyā | jijñāsāyā
viṣayabhūtaṃ hi brahma | brahmaśabdasya cātmārthaḥ | sa cātmā jīvaḥ sarvaiḥ prāṇimi
rahamityevaṃ mānasapratyakṣeṇa jñāyata eva | tadvyatiriktaśca na kaścanātmāsti |
pramāṇābhāvāt | tathā cātra jijñāsāyā viṣayābhāvaḥ | nāpi jijñāsāyāḥ kiṃci
tprayojanam | jñāyamānepi brahmaṇi prayojanānupalambhāt | viṣayaprayojanayora
bhāvānna tasyāṃ kaścanādhikārī saṃbhavati | tadabhāve ca dūra eva saṃbandhaḥ | tathā
ca viṣayaprayojanādhikārisaṃbandhānāmabhāvānna brahmajijñāsā kartavyeti naitacchā
stramārambhaṇīyamiti | siddhāntastu brahmajijñāsā kartavyā | brahmaṇo viṣayasya
sattvāt | brahma ca jīvavyatiriktaṃ sarvaguṇapūrṇaṃ tadvijijñāsasva tad brahma tai.
3 | 1 | 1 itiśrutipratipāditamiti na tasyāsattvam | sūtre jijñāsāviṣayasya
brahmaśabdena nirdeśāduktaśrutipratipādito viṣayaḥ sūtrakārairbrahmaśabdena sūcitaḥ |
nāpi prayojanānupalambhaḥ | mokṣarūpasya prayojanasyopalambhāt | tamevaṃ vidvāna
mṛta iha bhavati nṛ. pū. 1 | 6 iti śrutau brahmajñānānmokṣaprāpteruktatvāt |
brahmajñāne sati jñānino mokṣaścārthādbrahmaprasādādeva | śrutiśca bhavati — yamevaiṣa
vṛṇute tena labhyaḥ kā. 2 | 23 iti | yaṃ bhaktamayaṃ paramātmā prasannaḥ sansvī
yatvena svīkaroti tenaiva bhaktenāyaṃ paramātmā prāpyo bhavatītyarthaḥ | prasādaśca
prītisaṃpādanena bhavati | prītiśca brahmajñāne sati bhavatyeva |

priyo hi jñāninotyarthamahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ | bha. gī. 7 | 17
ityukteḥ | etacca prayojanaṃ sūtrakārairhetvarthakātaḥśabdena sūcitam | yato brahma
prasādānmokṣaḥ jñānaṃ vinā ca na prasādaḥ ato brahmajijñāsā kartavyeti | viṣa
yaprayojanayoḥ sadbhāvādadhikārī saṃbhavatyeva | tatsattve saṃbandhaśca prasiddha eveti
viṣayaprayojanādhikārisaṃbandhānāṃ sattvādbrahmajijñāsā kartavyeti śāstrārambhaḥ siddho
bhavati | athātaḥśabdeti | niyatirniyamaḥ | prāyaḥ sarvatra śāstreṣu sūtrakāraiḥ
prathamasūtrethāta etau śabdau yanniyamena prayujyete tatra ko heturityarthaḥ | ukta
niyame hetuśca tayoḥ śabdayoruttamatvam | taccārthadvārā svarūpeṇa ceti vidhādvayena
saṃbhavatītyāśayena pṛcchati — kaścārtha iti | athātaḥśabdayoravaśyavaktavyārthakatve
nottamatvamathaśabdasya māṅgalikatvātsvarūpeṇāpyuttamatvamityabhiprāyeṇottaramāha —
ānantaryeti | ānantaryādhikāre | brahmavidyādhikāraprāptyanantaramityarthe |
pratipādyaviṣayasya kiṃcinnirūpitānantaryaṃ prayojanaṃ cāvaśyaṃ vaktavyameva | tathā
cātatpratipādakayorathātaḥśabdayoruttamatvāttayoḥ prathamasūtre nirdeśaḥ | tadapyuktaṃ
gāruḍe —

athātaḥśabdayorevaṃ vīryamājñāya tattvataḥ |
sūtreṣu tu mahāprājñāstāvevādau prayuñjate || iti |
brahmavidyādhikāriṣu madhye devā uttamādhikāriṇaḥ | ṛṣigandharvā madhya
mādhikāriṇaḥ | manuṣyā mandādhikāriṇaḥ | adhikāriṣu ca viṣṇubhaktiḥ
1 adhyayanam 2 śamadamādiyogaḥ 3 saṃsārāsāratājñānapūrvakaṃ
vairāgyam 4 viṣṇupādaikasaṃśrayaḥ 5 ityete guṇā āvaśyakāḥ |
tatrādyayoḥ prādhānyedhikāriṇodhamatvam | tṛtīyasya prādhānyedhikāriṇo madhyama
tvam | caturthapañcamayoḥ prādhānyedhikāriṇa uttamatvamiti vivekaḥ |

sṛṣṭisthityādīti | ādiśabdena saṃhāraniyamanajñānājñānabandhamokṣāṇāṃ
saṃgrahaḥ | utpattīti | niyatiḥ sarvajaganniyamanam | āvṛtirajñānam | ekarāṭ
svatantraḥ | yato veti | yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante | yena jātāni
jīvanti | yatprayantyabhisaṃviśanti tai. 3 | 1 | 1 iti śrutiḥ | prayanti
prakarṣeṇa līyamānāni bhūtāni yadbrahmābhisaṃviśanti svecchayā samyak praviśantī
tyarthaḥ | ādiśabdena ya ādityamantaro yamayati bṛ. 3 | 7 | 9 ityādīnāṃ
niyamanādipratipādakaśrutīnāṃ saṃgrahaḥ |

śāstrayonitvāditi | jagatkāraṇasya brahmaṇaḥ śāstraikasamadhigamyatvādi
tyarthaḥ | nāvedaviditi | avedavidaśāstrajñastaṃ bṛhantaṃ pūrṇaṃ sarvajñaṃ sarvakartāraṃ
sarvasvāminaṃ na manute na jānāti | taṃ tveti | upaniṣadekasamadhigamyaṃ taṃ para
mātmānaṃ tvā tvāṃ pṛcchāmītyarthaḥ | atrāvedavinna jānātītyuktyaupaniṣadamiti
viśeṣaṇena ca jagatkāraṇasya paramātmanaḥ prādhānyenānumānagamyatvaṃ nāstīti
sūcyate | śrutisāhāyyeti | pramāṇāntaraṃ pratyakṣam | anumānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ ca
pramāṇaṃ śrutisāhāyyarahitaṃ cenna kutrāpyadṛṣṭaviṣaye niścayenārthaṃ sādhayatītyarthaḥ |
śrutismṛtīti | pramāṇāntaraṃ pratyakṣādikam | anyaḥ | pāśupatādiśāstrarūpaḥ |
tadaneneti | anena pūrvoktena pradarśitena bhedagrāhiṇā śrutyādipramāṇenādvaitama
tāśā nirastā bhavatītyanvayaḥ | taccādvaitamatamatrānanyalabhya ityādinā tātparya
mityantena granthenānūditam | advaitavādino hītthaṃ vadanti — śāstrādanyena pramā
ṇena yanna labhyate tatraiva śāstrasya tātparyam | bhedastu pratyakṣādibhiravagamyate |
atastatra na śāstrasya tātparyam | kiṃ tvadvaita eva | advaitasya pratyakṣādibhiranava
gamyamānatvāditi | anumānāditi | yadyanumānapramāṇeneśvaro jñāyeta tarhi
tadgato bhedopyanumānena jñāyata iti vaktuṃ śakyeta | paraṃ tu vastuto nānumāne
neśvaro jñāyata iti tadgatabhedasyāpi śāstrādanyena pramāṇenājñātatvānna śāstrasye
śvaragatabhedānuvādakatvam | kiṃ tu pramāṇāntareṇālabhya īśvaragato jīvādiprati
yogiko bheda eva śāstreṇa pratipādyata iti śāstrasya bhedaparatvamavagamyata ityarthaḥ |
ata evoktamiti | viṣṇutattvavinirṇaya iti śeṣaḥ | sadāgameti | santaḥ
samīcīnāḥ pāśupatādibhinnā ya āgamāstairhetubhūtairvijñeyaṃ viśiṣṭasvarūpeṇetara
vilakṣaṇatvena ca jñeyam | anumānādipramāṇāntaraistu na nārāyaṇasya tādṛśaṃ jñānaṃ
bhavatīti dyotayitumekaśabda upāttaḥ | samyagatīte atikrānte kṣarākṣare prakṛ
tijīvau yena tādṛśaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ sadā vande | etadvandanaṃ ca na nirvighnagranthasamāpti
mātroddeśena kṛtamiti sadetyanena sūcitam | nirdoṣaścāsāvaśeṣasadguṇaśceti karma
dhārayaḥ | pāratantryādidoṣarahitaḥ paripūrṇānandatvādisakalasadguṇayuktaśca nārāyaṇaḥ |
sacchabdena guṇānāṃ śobhanatvaṃ nityatvaṃ vā sūcyate |

śāstrasyeti | jagatkāraṇasya viṣṇoḥ śāstrapramāṇakatvaṃ śāstrayonitvā
diti sūtreṇopapāditam | tacca śāstrasya prāmāṇyaṃ viṣṇurūperthe eva nānyatra |
kutaḥ | tatraivārthe śruteḥ samanvayāt | etadeva tattu samanvayāditi sūtreṇocyate |
samyaganvayaḥ samanvayaḥ | upakrameti | upakrama ārambhaḥ | vistareṇa nirūpita
syārthasya sārāṃśakathanena samāpanamupasaṃhāraḥ | ekaprakārā asakṛduktirabhyāsaḥ |
prācuryeṇa pramāṇāntareṇāsiddhatvamapūrvatā | prayojanavattvaṃ phalam | stutinindā
phalakamadhikārthavacanamarthavādaḥ | upapattiryuktiḥ | śrutyarthasaṃśaye śrutestātparyamupa
kramādibhirliṅgairnirṇetavyaṃ bhavati | upakramādiṣu caikatra mithovirodhiliṅgadvaya
saṃnipāte pūrvāpekṣayottaraṃ prabalam |

upakramādiliṅgānāṃ balīyo hyuttarottaram |
ityukteḥ | tathā hi — upasaṃhārasya vyākhyānarūpatvenopakramāpekṣayā prābalyam |
ekatroktādapi bahulokteḥ prābalyādabhyāsasya tatopi prābalyam | bahuvāro
ktādapi mukhyasya prābalyādapūrvatāyāstebhyaḥ prābalyam | phalasya mukhyoddeśya
tvādupakramādibhyaḥ prābalyam | karaṇākaraṇayoriṣṭāniṣṭakathanādirūpārthavādasya
phalamātrāpekṣayādhikyādupakramādibhyaḥ prābalyam | upapatteḥ sarvamūlatvena sarvataḥ
prābalyamiti |

madhyamandireṇeti | pūrṇaprajñācāryāṇāmeva madhyamandira iti saṃjñā |
kvacinmadhyamandirabhaṭṭaputreṇeti pāṭho dṛśyate | pūrṇaprajñācāryaśca vāyostṛtīyova
tāraḥ | prathama iti | hanuśabdaścibukādhobhāgarūpaśarīrāvayavavācī hrasvokā
rānto dīrghokārāntaśca | atra tu hanūśabdena jñānamapyucyate | praśaṃsāyāṃ matu
ṣpratyayaḥ | tatra tatreti | pūrṇaprajñācāryapraṇīteṣu brahmasūtrabhāṣyaviṣṇutattvavini
rṇayamahābhāratatātparyanirṇayādigrantheṣu granthasamāptāvayaṃ ślokaḥ paṭhyate | yasya
trīṇīti | yasya vāyoralaṃ divyānyanuttamāni krīḍādiguṇayuktāni trīṇi rūpāṇi
vedavacane uditāni baḷitthā ṛ. saṃ. ma. 1 sū. 143 ityādiśrutau trayo
vatārā uktāstasya vāyordevasya tadalaṃ samyak mūlarūpaṃ baṭ balātmakaṃ darśataṃ
jñānapūrṇaṃ bhargo bharaṇagamanaguṇaṃ mahaduttamaṃ bhaviṣyanmahattattvasvarūpaṃ vā itthameva
vakṣyamāṇaprakāreṇa rūpatrayāvatārāya bhagavatā nihitaṃ preritamavatīrṇaṃ ca | ava
tāratrayasya vyāpārabhedaṃ darśayati — rāmeti | vāyoḥ prathamakaṃ hanūmadākhyaṃ prathamaṃ
rūpaṃ rāmavacāṃsi sītāṃ prati nayatīti tathā | atha vā rāmaviṣayakāṇi mūla
rāmāyaṇarūpāṇi vacāṃsi śiṣyānprati nayatīti tathā | atha vā rāmavacasi yo
nayo nyāya ājñārūpastadyuktam | vāyordvitīyaṃ vapurbhīmākhyaṃ rūpaṃ pṛkṣaḥ | pṛtaṃ senāṃ
kṣiṇotīti pṛkṣaḥ | pūrvapadāntyatakāralopa ārṣaḥ | kauravasenākṣayakaram | yade
tanmadhvo madhvākhyaṃ śāstranirmātṛ tṛtīyaṃ rūpamamunā madhvanāmnā keśave samarpaṇa
