buddhyā granthaḥ kṛtaḥ | madhuśabda ānandavācī | vaśabdena śāstrāparaparyāyaṃ tīrtha
mucyate | ānandakaraṃ tīrthaṃ śāstraṃ yasyāsau madhva ānandatīrthaḥ | pūrvapadāntyo
kāralopa ārṣaḥ |

madhvityānanda uddiṣṭo veti tīrthamudāhṛtam |
madhva ānandatīrthaḥ syāttṛtīyā mārutī tanuḥ ||
baḷittheti | baṭ itthā iti padacchedaḥ | devasya dyotanaśīlasya vāyordarśataṃ
sarvairdarśanīyaṃ tatprasiddhaṃ bhargasteja itthetthaṃ sarvairdṛśyamānaprakāreṇa vapuṣe śarīravya
vahārāya dārḍhyāya dhāyi dhāryate sarvaiḥ | prāṇavāyūpaskṛtena jāṭharāgninā bhuktā
nāmannānāṃ jaraṇena śarīradhāraṇaṃ prasiddham | tatropapattimāha — yataḥ kāraṇātsa
haso balādutpanno vāyurato balāya dhāryata ityarthaḥ | ayaṃ mantraḥ ṛ. saṃ. a.
2 a. 2 va. 8 ṛ. 1 sāyaṇācāryairṛgbhāṣya ādityaparatayā vyākhyātaḥ ||

div.head: atha nakulīśapāśupatadarśanam || 6 ||
div.p:
tadetaditi | vaiṣṇavamatamarocayamānā māheśvarāḥ pāśupataśāstramāśrayanta
ityanvayaḥ | vaiṣṇavamate paratantratvaṃ duḥkhāntādikasyepsitasyāspadaṃ na bhavati | mokṣepi
pāratantryanimittakaduḥkhasattvāt | muktā api viṣṇornityaṃ sevakā eva | tathā ca
sarvavidhaduḥkhasyānto mokṣe na bhavatītyato vaiṣṇavamataṃ māheśvarāṇāṃ na rocate |
māheśvarāstu mokṣe pāramaiśvaryaṃ kāmayante | pāramaiśvaryaṃ niratiśayaiśvaryam | kiṃ ca
vaiṣṇavābhimato mokṣo yuktyāpi na sidhyati | yato mokṣāvasthāyāṃ dāsyaṃ yukti
viruddham | tathā cānumānam — sevakā muktā na bhavanti paratantratvātpāramaiśvaryara
hitatvādvā baddhajīvavaditi | pratyuta yuktyā mokṣāvasthāyāṃ muktānāṃ pūrṇaṃ svātantryaṃ
sidhyati | tathā cānumānam — muktāḥ parameśvaraguṇasadṛśaguṇayuktāḥ puruṣatve
sati sarvaduḥkhabījarahitatvātparameśvaravaditi | īdṛśo mokṣaśca pāśupataśāstrā
śrayeṇa labhyate | tatra hi kāryakāraṇayogavidhiduḥkhāntarūpaṃ padārthapañcakaṃ tattva
jñānopayogitayā prapañcitam | paśūnāṃ jīvānāṃ patirmaheśvaraḥ | tena proktaṃ śāstraṃ
pāśupatam | jīvānāṃ paśuśabdavācyatvaṃ liṅgapurāṇe darśitam —

brahmādyāḥ sthāvarāntāśca devadevasya śūlinaḥ |
paśavaḥ parikīrtyante samastāḥ paśuvartinaḥ || iti |
yathāsmākaṃ gavāśvādayaḥ paśavastathā sarve prāṇino maheśvarasya paśavaḥ | yataḥ sarve
paśuvartinaḥ | paśuvadvartanta iti paśuvartinaḥ | jñānāpakarṣeṇa paśutulyatvātpaśava
ucyante | cintāmaṇighṛtavacanepi —

brahmādyāḥ sthāvarāntāśca paśavaḥ parikīrtitāḥ |
teṣāṃ patirmahādevaḥ smṛtaḥ paśupatiḥ śrutau || iti |

athāta iti | asminsūtre sūtrakāraiḥ pāśupataśāstrārambhaḥ pratijñāyate |
praśna iti | ādhyātmikādhibhautikādhidaivikarūpaduḥkhatrayasya sarvathā vināśaḥ
kathaṃ bhavatītyākārako duḥkhāntaviṣayakaḥ praśnaḥ | pañcakā iti | avāntarabhedena
pratyekaṃ pañcavidhā lābhamalādayoṣṭau gaṇāḥ | vṛttayaścāvāntarabhedena trividhā ityayaṃ
navamo gaṇaḥ | asya navavidhagaṇasya vettā tathā śiṣyasya saṃskartā ca gururucyata
ityarthaḥ | pañcakā ityatra pañcan — śabdāttadasya parimāṇamityarthe saṃkhyāyā ati
śadantāyāḥ kan pā. sū. 5 | 1 | 22 iti sūtreṇa kanpratyayaḥ | navānāṃ gaṇānāṃ
samāhāro navagaṇam | pātrāderākṛtigaṇatvātstrītvābhāvaḥ | navavidho gaṇo
navagaṇa iti madhyamapadalopī samāso vā | lābhā iti | atra lābhādigaṇa
navakamadhye lābhagaṇo mukhyaḥ | tatprāptiprakāraścettham — bhaikṣyādivṛttimataḥ sādha
kasya vāsacaryādibhirupāyairmithyājñānādimalebhyaḥ sakāśādviśuddhau jāyamānāyāṃ
vyaktāvyaktādyavasthāvatastasya dravyakālādibhirdīkṣākāribhirgurubhaktyādibhirbalaiśca
sahāyabhūtairgurujanaprabhṛtiyogyadeśe jñānādilābho bhavati | atra lābhagaṇa upā
deyaḥ | malagaṇo heyaḥ | sākṣātparaṃparayā ca tatsādhanībhūtā anye sapta gaṇā
iti navānāṃ gaṇānāmavaśyajñeyatvaṃ siddham | chāndasa iti | gaṇakāri
kāyāśchandotideśācchandasi ca dṛṣṭānuvidhitvādvyatyayo bahulam pā. sū.
3 | 1 | 85 iti sūtrānusāreṇātra liṅgavyatyayaḥ | yadyapi tatsūtraṃ prakaraṇādvika
raṇavyabhicārārthakaṃ tathāpi bahulagrahaṇātsarvavidhivyabhicāro bhavati | tathā
ca madhostṛptā ivāsate iti śrutāvamṛtatvavācimadhuśabdasya nityanapuṃsaka
tvepi liṅgavyatyayena madhoriti pulliṃṃṅganirdeśaḥ | adharamadhuṃ madhupastavājihīte
māgha kā. 7 | 42 iti māghakāvye madhumiti pulliṃṃṅgaprayogastu cintya
eveti kaustubhakārāḥ | jñānaṃ tapa iti | eṣu jñānādiṣu pañcasu lābheṣu pūrvapūrva
syottarottaro lābhaḥ sādhanabhūto dṛśyate | mithyājñānamiti | saktiheturvi
ṣayāsaktiheturviṣayasaṃnidhānādiḥ | cyutiḥ sadācaraṇādbhraṃśaḥ | paśutvasya jīvatvasya
mūlam | jīvatvaprāpakonādisaṃskāraḥ | viviktito vivekenaite pañca malā heyā
styājyā ityarthaḥ | vāsacaryeti | vāsacaryā samyaṅnivāsapaddhatiḥ | prapattiḥ
śaraṇāgatistvameva śaraṇaṃ mametyākārikā maheśvaraprārthanā | vāsacaryādayaḥ pañca
śuddhidvārā jñānādīnāṃ lābhānāmupāyā niścitā ityarthaḥ | yeneti | yena gurvā
dinā saṃnihitena kāryakāraṇādipadārthapañcakānusaṃdhānapūrvakaṃ jñānasya tapasaśca
vṛddhirbhavati sa gurvādirdeśa ityucyate | gururiti | janaśabdena jñānināṃ pariṣa
ducyate | ā lābheti | vāsacaryādyupāyānuṣṭhānamārabhya jñānādilābhaprāptiparyantaṃ
yatsādhakasyaikaprakāreṇāvasthānaṃ sāvasthā | upāyānuṣṭhānaṃ ca rucibhedena kasya
citprakāśitam | ajñā janā nindantu vā stuvantu tatraudāsīnyameva tasya |
iyaṃ vyaktāvasthā | kasyacidaprakāśitam | iyamavyaktāvasthā | ekasyaiva vā
sādhakasya viṣayabhedena kvacitprakāśitaṃ kvacidaprakāśitamavasthānaṃ bhavati | manasa
indriyāṇāṃ ca jayena yadavasthānaṃ sā jayāvasthā | sarvasvatyāgo dānāvasthā |
maheśvare satatamavicchinnā bhaktirniṣṭhāvasthā | atyantavyapohaḥ | sarvathā hāniḥ |
mithyājñānādīnāṃ pañcānāṃ malānāṃ punarudayo yathā na bhavati tathā teṣāṃ yo
'bhāvaḥ sā viśuddhiḥ | asyā abhāvarūpāyā viśuddheḥ pratiyogibhūtāḥ pañca malā
mithyājñānādayaḥ | tadbhedeneyaṃ pañcavidhā bhavati | mithyājñānasya hāniradharmasya
hāniḥ saktihetorhāniścayuterhāniḥ paśutvamūlasya hāniriti | ajñānasyeti |
saṅgakaraśabdena saktiheturucyate | paśutvaṃ jīvatvaprāpakaḥ saṃskāraḥ | dravyamiti |
dravyaṃ dīkṣāsādhanībhūtaṃ padārthajātam | kālaḥ śubhayogādiryogyaḥ kālaḥ | kriyā
gurusevanādiḥ | mūrtirupāsyadevatāpratimā | guruḥ paraṃparayā prāptopadeśaḥ | guru
bhaktiriti | gurāvavyabhicāriṇī bhaktirbuddheḥ prasādaḥ śītoṣṇasukhaduḥkhādidva
ndvasya jayo dharmaḥ sāvadhānatvaṃ ceti balapañcakam | pramādonavadhānatā | tada
bhāvo'pramādaḥ sāvadhānatvam | pañcamaleti | mithyājñānādayaḥ pañcamalā hi
vāsacaryādibhirupāyairnirasanīyāḥ | nirasanaṃ ca teṣāmekapade na saṃbhavatīti prathama
taste tathā laghavaḥ karaṇīyā yathā teṣāṃ nirāsaḥ sukaro bhavet | laghūkaraṇasādha
nībhūtāśca tisro vṛttayaḥ | bhaikṣyamutsṛṣṭaṃ yathālabdhaṃ cānnaṃ grāhyam | bhaikṣyaṃ bhikṣā
labdham | utsṛṣṭaṃ lokaistyaktam | yathālabdhamayācitam | taccāgamāvirodhena
saṃpādanīyam | itarathā kṛmyādidoṣadūṣitaṃ patitādisvāmikamapi grāhyaṃ syāt |
kvacidāgamāvirodhina ityasya sthāne mānāpamānavirodhina iti pāṭho dṛśyate |
annārjanakāle kvacinmāne jātepi na sukhaṃ tathāpamānepi na duḥkhaṃ bhāvanīyam |
sādhāraṇī vṛttiḥ saṃpādanīyeti tadarthaḥ |

ādhyātmikādīti | praśnasya duḥkhāntaviṣayakatvāttadviṣayakamuttaraṃ dātuṃ
pravṛttasya gurorbuddhyārūḍho duḥkhānta iti buddhisthaparāmarśināta itīdaṃśabdena sarva
nāmnā duḥkhāntaḥ parāmṛśyata iti bhāvaḥ | evamathaśabdasyātaḥśabdasya cārtho
nirūpitaḥ | paśupatirmaheśvaraḥ | śiṣyakṛtaduḥkhāntaviṣayakapraśnānantaraṃ duḥkhānta
sādhanāya maheśvareṇa prokto maheśvaraprāptyartho yo yogastadvidhiḥ kathyata iti
sūtrārthaḥ | pāśupataśāstrārambhapratijñeyam | etacchāstratattvabhūtāḥ kāryakāraṇayoga
vidhiduḥkhāntāḥ pañca padārthāḥ paśupatinā maheśvareṇa jīvapāśavimokṣaṇāyopa
diṣṭāḥ | te cātra prathamasūtre sūtrakāreṇa sūcitāḥ | paśuśabdena kāryaṃ patiśabdena
kāraṇaṃ pratipādyate | yogo vidhiśca tattacchabdenaiva nirdiṣṭaḥ | duḥkhāntaścātaḥśabdena
pratipādyata iti | tadāha — paśuśabdena kāryasyeti | pratipādanamityanu
ṣajyate | paśurhi prāyeṇa manuṣyādiparatantro dṛśyate | kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaparatantram |
ataḥ paratantratvasādharmyātpaśuśabdena kāryaṃ pratipādyate | kāraṇasyeti | atrāpi
pratipādanamityanuṣajyate | tatra hetumāha — īśvara iti | patiśabdasyeśvaravāci
tvādīśvarasya ca jagatkāraṇatvātpatiśabdena kāraṇaṃ pratipādyata iti bhāvaḥ | atredaṃ
bodhyam — cidacidātmakasakalapadārthajātasyāsvatantrasyātra śāstre kāryamiti pāri
bhāṣikī saṃjñā | tathā svatantrasya parameśvarasya kāraṇamiti pāribhāṣikī saṃjñā |
sthitikāraṇatvāt | asvatantrasya hyavasthānaṃ svatantrādhīnameva | yogo japadhyānādiḥ |
vrataṃ bhasmasnānādikaṃ vidhiḥ | duḥkhanivṛttipūrvakamaiśvaryaṃ duḥkhāntaśabdenocyate |
etāni pañca tattvaśabdavācyāni | etajjñānasya paramapuruṣārthasādhanatvāt | yasya
jñānaṃ paramapuruṣārthasādhanaṃ bhavati tadeva hi tattvam | uktāḥ pañca padārthāśca parama
puruṣārthaprāptayevaśyaṃ jñeyāḥ | tathā hi — pañcamo duḥkhāntaśca paramapuruṣārtharūpa
eveti jñeya eva | duḥkhasya mukhyaṃ bījaṃ cāsvātantryameveti tannivṛttaya aiśvarya
prāptaye cāsvatantreṇa jīvena svasvarūpamanye cāsvatantrāḥ svatantra īśvaraścetyete
yāthārthyena jñeyāḥ | tatsādhanībhūtaśca bhasmasnānādividhisahakṛto japadhyānādiryoga
iti tāvapyavaśyaṃ jñeyau | tathā ca pañcānāṃ tattvaśabdavācyatvaṃ siddhamiti |

athaitānpañca padārthāllilakṣayiṣurādau mukhyaṃ duḥkhāntaṃ vibhajate — tatra duḥkhānta
iti | tatrānātmaka iti | atrātmasattvepyaiśvaryarāhityena nirātmakatvavyapadeśaḥ |

aviśiṣṭaṃ vastu tāvadasatkalpaṃ nigadyate |
iti nyāyāt | ayamaparo mokṣaḥ | sātmakastu paraḥ | kevaladuḥkhanivṛtteḥ
pāṣāṇasyevākiṃcitkaratvāt | sātmaka iti | dṛkśaktiḥ kriyāśaktiśceti
śaktidvayarūpamaiśvaryam | dṛkśaktireva dhīśaktirjñānaśaktiścocyate | tatra sūkṣmeti |
cākṣuṣaṃ rūpaṃ tadāśrayadravyaṃ ca | sparśādītyādipadena rasagandhagrahaṇam | tatra sūkṣmāḥ
paramāṇvādayastadgatarūpādayaśca baddhajīvairna jñāyante | sthūlā api bhittyādivyava
hitā viṣayā na jñāyante | sthūlā apyavyavahitā api ca dūre vartamānāḥ parva
tādisthā viṣayā na jñāyante | muktasya tūktasarvaviṣayakaṃ jñānaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ |
aśeṣaśabdeti | śravaṇasya darśanentarbhāvasaṃbhavepi tasya tattvajñāne viśeṣata
upayogātpṛthaggaṇanam | aśeṣetyukteḥ sūkṣmasya dūrasthasya paśupakṣyādikṛtasya ca
śabdasya grahaṇam | siddhijñānamityasya siddhirūpaṃ jñānamityarthaḥ | yogādisādhana
janyaśaktiviśeṣarūpasiddhyā jāyamānaṃ jñānamiti vā | kvacitsiddhiśabdarahitaḥ
pāṭhaḥ | samasteti | cintitasya sarvavidhaviṣayasya cintāmātreṇa śāstrādisā
dhanānapekṣayaiva jāyamānaṃ jñānaṃ mananamityarthaḥ | granthata iti | īdṛśī tatra
paṅktirīdṛśaśca tadartha ityasaṃdigdhaṃ jñānaṃ vijñānamityarthaḥ | etadvijñānameva
śāstrapravacanopayogītyāha — svaśāstramiti | uktānukteti | samāsādīnāṃ
caturṇāṃ svarūpamanupadameva da. 6 paṃ. 106 vakṣyate | tattvavyāptaṃ tattvarūpeṇa saṃba
ddham | sadā nirantaramuditam | na kadāpi tirobhūtam | sarvaṃ jānāti sarvajñaḥ |
tasya bhāvaḥ sarvajñatvam | gurvādinā kathitasyākathitasya ca sarvasya padārthajātasya
samāsena vistareṇa vibhāgena viśeṣeṇa ca kāryakāraṇāditattvarūpeṇa nirantaraṃ
jñānamiti bhāvaḥ | śīghrakāritvamiti | śīghragāmitvamiti kvacitpāṭhaḥ |
ananteti | anantāni salakṣaṇāni vilakṣaṇāni sarūpāṇi ca yāni śarīrendri
yarūpāṇi karaṇāni tadadhiṣṭhātṛtvam | salakṣaṇāni lakṣaṇayuktāni loke yathā
dṛśyante tathā manuṣyapaśupakṣyādisaṃsthānāni | vilakṣaṇāni ekovayavaḥ
paśoraparaḥ pakṣiṇonyo manuṣyasyetyevaṃrūpāṇi | sarūpāṇi mithaḥsamānānyane
karūpāṇi | anyairdevadattādibhistulyarūpāṇīti vā |

evaṃ duḥkhāntaṃ lakṣayitvā kāryaṃ lakṣayati — asvatantramiti | jīvavargo jaḍa
vargaḥ svasvaguṇasahitaḥ sarvopi na svatantraḥ | tatra guṇānāmāśrayādhīnatvaṃ jaḍavargasya
jīvādhīnatvaṃ ca prasiddhameva | jīveṣvapi strīṇāṃ patyādipāratantryaṃ bhṛtyānāṃ
svāmipāratantryaṃ ca prasiddhameva | parameśvarādhīnatvaṃ tu sarvatrāviśiṣṭameva | tatra jīvā
asmiñchāstre paśuśabdena vyavahriyante | tathā jīvaguṇā vidyāśabdena jaḍāḥ
pṛthivyādayo guṇasahitāḥ kalāśabdena ca vyavahriyante | asvatantrarūpasya kāryasyā
vāntarabhedeṣveteṣu pārthakyena jñāteṣu saṃśayanivṛttyā kāryarūpasya tattvasya yāthārthyena
niścayo bhavatītyāśayenāha — eteṣāmiti | bodhābodheti | bodhasvabhāvā bodhā
tmikā | abodhasvabhāvā cābodhātmikā | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ — jīvo hi ghaṭādīnpadārthāṃ
ścittena jānāti | cetayate jānāti yena taccittam | cittaṃ cātra darśane nāntaḥkara
ṇasyāvāntarabhedaḥ | kiṃ tu jīvasya viṣayajñānārthaṃ yā pravṛttistadrūpo jīvaniṣṭho
guṇaviśeṣaḥ | sa ca guṇaḥ svayaṃ bodhātmakatvāddhaṭādīnpadārthānbodhayati | yathādityaḥ
svayaṃ prakāśarūpatvāddhaṭādīnpadārthānprakāśayati tadvat | cittākhyā pravṛttiśceyaṃ
kvacidvivekayuktā kvacittadrahitā | tatra vivekapravṛttiḥ pramāṇajñānena vyajyate |
sāmānyapravṛttirapi cittākhyātīndriyaiva | sā ca tatsādhyena sāmānyajñānātma
kena phalena vyajyate | yataścittaṃ bodhātmakaṃ bodharūpeṇa nijasvabhāvena ghaṭādī
npadārthānanugṛhṇāti | tena cānugraheṇa jaḍā api ghaṭādayaḥ padārthāḥ prakāśante |
ayaṃ ca cittākhyo guṇo bodhātmakatvājjñānasādhanībhūto bhavati | anyaścābo
dhātmako jīvaguṇo bodhasvabhāvarāhityena na jñāna upayujyate | dharmādharmayoḥ
saṃskārasya cātrāntarbhāvaḥ | tadāha — paśvartheti | paśutvaprāptiphalakau dharmādharmau
yasyāmantarbhūtau tādṛśī vidyā jīvaguṇaviśeṣastvabodhātmaka ityarthaḥ | evaṃ vidyā
rūpaṃ kāryaṃ vyākhyāya kalārūpaṃ kāryaṃ lakṣayati — cetaneti | kāryākhyeti |
kāryākhyā viṣayarūpā | kāraṇākhyendriyarūpā | indriyāṇāṃ ca viṣayajñapti
kāraṇatvātkāraṇaśabdena vyavahāraḥ | tatra viṣayāṇāṃ jñānamindriyādhīnam |
indriyāṇāṃ ca pravṛttirviṣayādhīnetyanayormithaḥ pāratantryam | cetanapāratantryaṃ cobha
yeṣāmapyaviśiṣṭameva | adhyavasāyeti | adhyavasāyo niścayaḥ | yadyapi vedā
ntibhiścittena sahāntaḥkaraṇacatuṣṭayamuktaṃ tathāpyatra pāśupataśāstre cittasya jīva
guṇentarbhāvādantaḥkaraṇatrayamatroktam | sāñjana iti | yena saṃbandhenaikasya
saṃbandhino dharmā aparasaṃbandhini vyapadiśyante tādṛśaḥ saṃbandhaviśeṣoñjana
śabdenocyate | jīvasya tu śarīrendriyasaṃbandhāccharīrendriyagatāḥ sthūlatvakāṇa
tvādayo dharmā vyapadiśyanta eva |

kāraṇarūpaṃ tattvaṃ lakṣayati — samasteti | idaṃ ca tattvaṃ maheśvararūpam |
maheśvaraśca yadyapyeka eva tathāpi sattvādiguṇabhedena sṛṣṭyādikriyābhedena
vibhakta iva bhavati |

yogarūpaṃ tattvaṃ lakṣayati — cittadvāreṇeti | ātmā jīvaḥ | cittaṃ ca jīva
gato bodhātmako guṇaviśeṣaḥ | taddvāreśvareṇa saha jīvasya yaḥ saṃbandhastaddheturyoga
ityucyate | yujiryoge iti dhātoḥ karaṇe ghañpratyayaḥ | kriyoparameti | upa
ramo nivṛttiḥ | niṣṭheti | avyabhicāriṇī maheśvare bhaktirniṣṭhā | tattvajñānaṃ saṃvit |
śaraṇagamanaṃ gatiḥ |

vidhirūpaṃ tattvaṃ lakṣayati — dharmārtheti | dharmo maheśvaraḥ | tadrūpo yorthastatsā
dhakastatsāmīpyādiphalako vyāpāra ityarthaḥ | ayaṃ ca vyāpāro vidheyatvādvidhi
śabdenocyate | vidhīyatesau vidhiḥ | karmaṇi kipratyayaḥ | tatra pradhāneti |
sākṣāddharmasādhako vyāpāraḥ pradhānabhūtaḥ | ayameva caryāśabdenocyate | tatra
bhasmeti | bhasmaśabdaḥ snānaśayanābhyāṃ saṃbadhyate | bhasmasnānaṃ bhasmaśayanaṃ
cetyarthaḥ | bhasmaneti | triṣavaṇaṃ trikālam | bhasmaśayanaṃ ca gṛhasthebhyo
bhikṣitvānnavadānītena bhasmanā kāryamiti brahmavidyābharaṇa uktam | yatreti |
laukikā ityasaṃskṛtamanasaḥ prākṛtā janā ucyante | te hi svayamanabhijñā upā
sakakṛtaṃ hasitādikaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrkhoyamiti nindeyuḥ | adṛḍhamanā upāsakaśca para
kṛtayā svātmanindayā kadācidvikṣiptacitto vratādbhraśyeta | atosyā vratacaryāyā
gūḍhatvamāvaśyakam | atha vaikāntapradeśe vratacaryā saṃpādanīyā | tatra hi caryāyā
gūḍhatvamarthādeva sidhyati | ekāntatāsaṃpādanārthameva krāthanādidvāracaryāpekṣyate |
yataḥ krāthanādikartaryupāsake doṣabhrameṇa prākṛtā janāstamupāsakaṃ nānusaranti |
śiṣṭamiti | japanamaskārarūpamupahāradvayaṃ loke prasiddhamevetyarthaḥ | krāthaneti |
krāthanaśabdasthāne kāyaneti pāṭhāntaram | tathā mandanetyatra mādaneti manda
yāneti ca | avitatkaraṇetyatrāpitatkaraṇeti | avitadbhāṣaṇetyatrāpitadbhāṣa
ṇeti | suptaliṅgeti | suptasya nidritasya liṅgaṃ netranimīlanādikam | atra
bodhābhāvo doṣaḥ | vāyvabhibhūtasyeti | vāyurvātavyādhiḥ | tenābhibhūtasya
grastasya | vastutastu vyādhyanabhibhūta eva saḥ | atra vyādhiḥ śarīradoṣaḥ |
upahateti | vastutastvanupahatapāda eva saḥ | atra kuḍātvamindriyadoṣaḥ |
rūpeti | vastutastvakāmuka eva saḥ | atronmattatā manodoṣaḥ | kāryākā
ryeti | atrānavadhānatā manodoṣaḥ | vyāhateti | atra śabdadoṣaḥ |

utkarṣo vāpakarṣo vā prāgyasyaiva nigadyate |
tasyaivātha tadanyaścedvyāhatorthastadā bhavet ||
apagatortho yasyetyapārthako nirarthakaḥ śabdaḥ | guṇabhūtastu vidhiriti |
vratarūpā dvārarūpā ca caryā nāśucyavasthāyāmanuṣṭheyā | bhakṣaṇottaraṃ prakṣā
lanātprāgucchiṣṭadoṣeṇāśucitvādayogyatayā na caryādhikāraḥ | tathā malamūtro
tsarjanādāvapi | tatra cānusnānena yogyatā saṃpādanīyā | anusnānaṃ ca snāna
pratinidhibhūtamudakopasparśanācamanabhasmasnānādikam | vratamadhye paṭhitaṃ bhasma
snānaṃ kālatraye vihitaṃ nityam | idaṃ bhasmasnānaṃ tu naimittikamiti viśeṣaḥ |
anusnāneti | nirmālyadhāraṇaṃ liṅgadhāraṇaṃ ca śucinaiva kāryam | tasya cāyaṃ
mahimā yāvanmaheśvarasya nirmālyaṃ liṅgaṃ vā dhatte tāvannāśuciriti |

nirmālyaṃ śirasā dhāryaṃ sarvāṅge cānulepanam |
iti tantrasāra uktam |

atha prāgukta da. 6 paṃ. 55 sarvajñatvalakṣaṇaghaṭakasamāsavistarādi
padārthāllaṃṃkṣayati — tatra samāsa iti | kṛtamiti | athātaḥ paśupateḥ pāśu
patayogavidhiṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti prathamaṃ sūtram | tacca yadyapi śāstrārambhaprati
jñārthakaṃ tathāpyānuṣaṅgikatayā pañcānāṃ padārthānāmuddeśastatra sūtrakāraiḥ saṃpāditaḥ |
sa ca pūrvaṃ da. 6 paṃ. 44 pradarśita eva | pañcābhidhānamiti | vista
reṇābhidhānamityarthaḥ | pañco vistaraḥ | paci vistāravacana iti dhātorbhāve ghañ
pratyayaḥ | asaṃkareṇa | pārthakyena | anyatra | nyāyādiśāstreṣu | iha |
pāśupataśāstre | pāramaiśvaryaprāptiśceti | cakāreṇa duḥkhanivṛttiḥ samuccīyate |
abhūtveti | pūrvamavidyamānaṃ paścātkārakavyāpāreṇa yadutpadyate tatkāryam |
arthādanityamityarthaḥ | paśvādīti | paśurjīvaḥ | ādiśabdena paramāṇvākā
śādisakalācetanapadārthajātasaṃgrahaḥ | sāpekṣamiti | taduktaṃ śārīrabhāṣye
vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye0 bra. sū. 2 | 1 | 34 iti sūtre sāpekṣo hīśvaro viṣamāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ
nirmimīte | kimapekṣata iti cet — dharmādharmāvapekṣata iti | naiyāyikādayo
pyevameva manyante | kaivalyādīti | kevalasyaikākino bhāvaḥ kaivalyam |
yathā japākusumādisaṃbandhābhāve sphaṭikasya svīyena śubhrarūpeṇāvasthānaṃ tathā
cetanasya buddhyādyupādhiviyoge yatsvarūpeṇāvasthānaṃ tatpuruṣasya kaivalyam |
tadyogena prāpyata iti yogaśāstra uktam |

indrajālamiti | indrāṇāmindriyāṇāṃ jālamāvarakam | yadvendrasya mahe
śvarasya jālaṃ māyā | mṛṣeti yāvat | nirapekṣa iti | īśvaro hi niratiśaya
svātantryaśālitayā prāṇikṛtadharmādharmāvanapekṣya phalaṃ prayacchatītyevamaṅgīkāre
prāṇikṛtaṃ puṇyapāpātmakaṃ karma vyarthameva syāt | sarvakāryāṇāṃ yugapadutpattiśca
prāpnoti | īśvarasya sāpekṣatve tu sukhaduḥkhavaicitryasaṃpādanena karmaṇaḥ sāphalyaṃ
bhavati | sarveṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ tulyakālatvābhāvena na sarvakāryāṇāṃ yugapadutpattiriti |
vyadhikaraṇatvāditi | prāṇikṛtakarmajanyamadṛṣṭaṃ prāṇiniṣṭham | jagadutpattya
nukūlo vyāpāraśceśvaraniṣṭhaḥ | tathā cānyatra vartamānamadṛṣṭaṃ kathamanyatra vyāpāraṃ
saṃpādayet | ato'gatyā nirapekṣasyaiva kāraṇatvamāstheyamiti bhāvaḥ | īśvarecchā
nugṛhītasyeti | yatheśvaraḥ karmanirapekṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ na tathā karmeśvaranirapekṣaṃ kāra
ṇam | kiṃ tvīśvarasāpekṣameva | yathā kṛṣikarmaṇoṅkurotpādanasāmarthyaṃ parjanyāpekṣaṃ
tadvat | tathā jīvakṛtaṃ puṇyapāpākhyaṃ karmeśvarecchāsahāyena svānuguṇaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ
vā dadāti | īśvarastu prāṇikṛtakarmānapekṣayaiva phalaṃ dātuṃ samartha ityanyat |
jīvakṛtaṃ karma trividham | kenacitkarmaṇeśvarastuṣyati kenacitkudhyati kenacittu na
tuṣyati nāpi krudhyati kiṃ tūdāste | tatrādyaṃ dvayaṃ saphalameva | tṛtīyaṃ tu niṣphalaṃ
bhavatu nāma na kācitkṣatiḥ | na caitāvatā tatrāpravṛttiḥ | īśvaraudāsīnyaniścayasya
pūrvamabhāvāt | kvacitkṛṣikarmaṇaḥ phalābhāvepi pūrvaṃ tādṛśaniścayasyābhāvātkarṣakasya
pravṛttirbhavati tadvat | atrāyaṃ niṣkarṣaḥ — īśvaraḥ karma ceti dvayaṃ jīvasya sukha
duḥkharūpaṃ phalaṃ dadāti | tatreśvarasya phaladāne na karmāpekṣā | karmaṇastu phaladāna
īśvarāpekṣāstyeva | tathā ca karmaṇo na vaiyarthyamiti na tatrāpravṛttirjīvānām |
nāpīśvarasya pūrṇasvātantryahāniriti | tataḥ kāraṇataḥ | tasmātkāraṇāt |
svecchācāritvāddhetoriti yāvat |

jñānamātramiti | pratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ vā viśeṣarūpeṇa sāmānyarūpeṇa vā katha
mapyastu tasmānnirvāṇaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ | nirvāṇaṃ mokṣaḥ | devānāmadhipo mahā
deva iti | idaṃ sāmānyarūpeṇa jāyamānaṃ śābdaṃ jñānaṃ kośamātrādutpadyate na
tatra śāstrāpekṣeti śāstrābhyāso niṣphalaḥ syāt | anekamaleti | malā
mithyājñānādayaḥ prāguktāḥ da. 6 paṃ. 21 | piśitaṃ māṃsam | paśavo jīvāḥ |
teṣāṃ malādhikyena saṃbhṛtatvānmaheśvarasākṣātkāro na saṃbhavati | kiṃ ca jīvane
trāṇāṃ māṃsayuktatvānmaheśvarasākṣātkārayogyatāpi nāsti | pāśupataśāstra
miti | yadyapi sāṃkhyanyāyādiśāstreṣu tattvānyuktāni teṣāṃ lakṣaṇāni vibhāgaśca
tatroktastathāpi na tatastattvānāṃ yāthārthyena niścayo bhavati | duḥkhāntāya duḥkha
mūlaṃ pāratantryamavaśyaṃ jñeyam | tathā ca svatantrāsvatantrabhedena tattvajñānamāvaśya
kam | tacca pāśupataśāstrādeva jāyata ityāśayaḥ | jñānamātra iti | mokṣasā
dhanatvenāṅgīkṛte satīti śeṣaḥ ||

div.head: atha śaivadarśanam || 7 ||
div.p:
vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyeti | viṣamo'samadṛṣṭiḥ | tasya bhāvo vaiṣamyam | jīvānāṃ
sukhaduḥkhatāratamyadarśanāttatkāraṇībhūtasyeśvarasya viṣamadṛṣṭitvam | nirghṛṇasya nirda
yasya bhāvo nairghṛṇyam | jagataḥ saṃhartṛtvam | prāṇikarmānapekṣatve hīśvara etaddoṣadvayaṃ
prasajyate | īśvarasya karmasāpekṣatvāṅgīkāre tu na doṣaḥ | sukhādyupabhoge prāṇi
karmaṇo'sādhāraṇakāraṇatvāt | īśvarastu parjanyavaddraṣṭavyaḥ | yathā tattadbīje satyapi
parjanyaṃ vinā nāṅkurotpattistadvat | na ceśvarasya prāṇikarmasāpekṣatvenīśvaratvaṃ
syāditi vācyam | bhṛtyādisevānusāreṇa phalapradasya rājño'rājatvādarśanāt |
patīti | patirīśvaraḥ | paśurjīvaḥ | pāśaḥ saṃsārabandhanam | evameteṣāṃ sāmā
nyataḥ svarūpamavagantavyam | patipaśupāśeti krame hetuṃ pradarśayati — tatra paśū
nāmiti | vidyāpādādiṣu caturṣu pādeṣu kramahetuṃ pradarśayati — dīkṣāyā
iti | guroḥ sakāśānniyamapūrvakamantropadeśo dīkṣā |

divyajñānaṃ yato dadyātkuryātpāpasya saṃkṣayam |
tasmāddīkṣeti sā proktā munibhistattvavedibhiḥ ||
iti dīkṣāśabdaniruktiḥ | mantragrahaṇaṃ ca dīkṣāvidhinaiva nānyathā |

granthe dṛṣṭvā tu mantraṃ vai yo gṛhṇāti narādhamaḥ |
manvantarasahasreṣu niṣkṛtirnaiva jāyate ||
ityuktatvāt | mantreti | mantrā mantreśvarā ādipadagrāhyā vidyeśvarāśca paśu
viśeṣā ityagre vakṣyante | teṣāṃ sāmarthyaṃ ca pāśotsāraṇādhīnam | pāśaviśeṣāśca
sāmarthyaviśeṣapratibandhakāḥ | bhaktānāmadhikāratāratamyena patiḥ pāśāndūrīka
roti | etatsarvajñāne sati patipaśupāśānāṃ viviktaṃ svarūpaṃ jñātuṃ śakyate
nānyathā | tataścādau dīkṣopapādakaṃ jñānam | tato dīkṣāvidhiḥ | itikartavya
teti yāvat | tato dīkṣāgrahaṇādhikārasiddhyartho japadhyānādiryogaḥ | tato
yogasahāyabhūtā caryā | yathauṣadhasevane sahāyabhūtaṃ pathyaṃ tadvat |

athaitaddarśane mokṣasādhanībhūtajñānaviṣayatvena tattvabhūtāḥ patipaśupāśarūpā
strayaḥ padārthā nirūpaṇīyāḥ | tatra prathamaṃ patipadārthaṃ nirūpayati — tatra
patīti | vidyeśvarādīnāṃ patiḥ | te cānantādayoṣṭau mūla evāgre da. 7 paṃ.
115 pradarśitāḥ | te ca na muktāḥ | kiṃ tu parameśvarānugṛhītā adhikāriṇaḥ |
atasteṣāṃ parameśvarapāratantryam | svātantryaṃ nāstīti | nakulīśapāśupatada
rśane muktānāṃ na kathamapi pāratantryamityuktam da. 6 paṃ. 3 | asmiñśaiva
darśane tu pāratantryaṃ svīkriyate | yathā parameśvarasya jagadutpādane prāṇikarmānapekṣatvaṃ
tatsāpekṣatvaṃ vetyetadviṣaye matabhedastadvanmuktasya svātantryaṃ pāratantryaṃ vetyetadviṣaye
pyastu | atha vā muktātmanāmiti vidyeśvarādīnāmityasya viśeṣaṇam | teṣāṃ para
muktyabhāvepyaparamuktirastyeva | vidyeśvarādīnāṃ ceti castvarthe | tathā ca para
muktibhājāṃ pūrṇaṃ svātantryameveti | nanu parameśvarāstitve tatpāratantryamanyeṣāṃ
syānnāma | tadeva tu kuta ityāśaṅkyānumānena tatsādhayati — tataśceti | tanuḥ
śarīram | karaṇānīndriyāṇi | bhuvanaṃ prasiddham | bhāvāḥ padārthāḥ | saṃniveśo
vayavaracanāviśeṣaḥ | manuṣyapaśupakṣilatāvṛkṣādiṣu śarīrādīnāṃ hastapādādyavayava
racanāviśeṣo niyamito dṛśyate | tataḥ sa kenāpi kṛta ityavagamyata ityarthaḥ |

kartṛdarśaneti | darśanamiha jñānamātram | kartā kaścinna jñāyata ityevaṃ
karturapalāpaḥ kartṛdarśanāpahnavaḥ | sa na yujyate | apahnave hetustu dehādeḥ kriya
māṇasya pratyakṣadarśanābhāvaḥ | tasya | kāryatvasya | vimatamiti | vimataṃ
vādagrastam | sakartṛkamakartṛkaṃ vetyevaṃ vādagrastaṃ tanubhuvanādikaṃ pakṣīkṛtya
sakartṛkatvaṃ sādhyate kāryatvāt | yadyatkāryaṃ tattatsakartṛkaṃ yathā ghaṭa ityanvaya
vyāptiḥ | yatsakartṛkaṃ na bhavati na tatkāryaṃ yathātmeti vyatirekavyāptiḥ | anva
yavyāptau sādhanaṃ vyāpyam | sādhyaṃ vyāpakam | vyatirekavyāptau tu sādhyābhāvo
vyāpyaḥ | sādhanābhāvo vyāpakaḥ | parameśvareti | parameśvaro viṣamasya duḥkhaja
nakasya ca jagataḥ kartā na bhavati vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyānāśrayatvādityanumānena virodhānna
parameśvarānumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavatītyādyāśaṅkā anyatra nirākṛtāḥ | yataḥ śarīrendri
yādīnāṃ karturabhāve yadṛcchayaiva tadutpattiḥ svīkāryā syāt | tathā sati tatra
sukhasādhanameva jīva upādadīta nānyat | paraṃ tu tatra jīvasyāsāmarthyaṃ dṛśyate |
atastasyānyena kenacinniyantrā bhavitavyam | vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyābhāvepi prāṇikṛta
karmāpekṣayeśvarasya kartṛtvamupapadyate | anīśaḥ | asamarthaḥ | śvabhram | narakam |
svātantryavihatiriti | sāpekṣatve pāratantryāvaśyaṃbhāvādityāśayaḥ |
svatantrasyeti | aprayojyatvaṃ prayojakaśūnyatvam | prayojakaśca svānabhīpsitakā
ryapravartakaḥ svābhīpsitakāryavighātakaśceti dvividhaścetana evātra gṛhyate | tena
karmaṇaḥ prayojakatvavivakṣāyāmapi neśvarasya svātantryahāniḥ | tathā coktaprayo
jakaśūnyatve sati karaṇādikārakacakraprayoktṛtvaṃ svātantryaṃ na tu karmādyanapekṣatva
rūpam | tattatkarmāśayeti | āśerate sāṃsārikāḥ puruṣā asminnityāśayaḥ |
karmaṇāmāśayaḥ karmāśayaḥ | puṇyapāparūpaḥ karmasaṃghāta iti yāvat | tadanusā
reṇāsya puruṣasyedṛśo bhoga idaṃ cāsya bhogyaṃ vastu bhogasādhanaṃ cedameteṣāmu
pādānaṃ cedamityādikaṃ sarvaṃ yo vijānāti tādṛśaḥ kartānumānena sidhyati |
bhogaḥ sukhaduḥkhasākṣātkāraḥ | upādānaṃ samavāyikāraṇam | ādiśabdena kāra
ṇāntaraparigrahaḥ | iheti | bhogyādikaṃ sarvaṃ yo viśeṣeṇa jānāti kiṃ ca
puṃsāṃ yaḥ karmāśayastasya pariṇāmaṃ ca yo vijānāti tādṛśaṃ taṃ parameśvaraṃ vinedaṃ
niyatasaṃsthānaṃ deśakālānurodhena niyatapariṇāmaṃ ca jaganna bhavedityarthaḥ | ṛte
vinā | vipākaḥ pariṇāmaḥ | vivādeti | vivādenādhyāsitaṃ yuktaṃ vādagrastamidaṃ
sarvaṃ jagatpakṣaḥ | buddhimatkartṛpūrvakatvaṃ sādhyam | kāryatvaṃ hetuḥ | ubhayavādi
saṃmataṃ kulālādikṛtaṃ ghaṭādikāryaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ | pakṣāntargatasyāpi niścitasādhyavattve
dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ bhavatyeva | ajñasyeti | kartari ṣaṣṭhī | sarvajñatvaṃ vinā sarvakartṛtvā
saṃbhavādityarthaḥ | mṛgendrairiti | mṛgendre ityapi pāṭho dṛśyate | mṛgendra iti
granthakārasya tatkṛtagranthasya ca nāma kaiyaṭavat | sādhaneti | yathā darśapūrṇamāsa
yāgasya sādhanaṃ samitpuroḍāśādikam | aṅgaṃ prayājādikam | phalaṃ svargādikam |

nāśarīra iti | parameśvarasya hastapādādyavayavarāhitye sa kathaṃ jagadutpattiṃ kartuṃ
śaknuyādityāśayaḥ | tathā ca prayogaḥ — parameśvaraḥ saśarīraḥ kartṛtvātkulālādiva
diti | astu śarīraṃ kā hāniriti cettatrāha — śarīravattve ceti | asmadā
divaditi | tathā ca prayogaḥ — īśvaraḥ kleśayukto'sarvajñaḥ parimitaśaktiśca bhavi
tumarhati saśarīratvādasmadādivaditi | aśarīrasyāpīti | śarīrasahāya
rahitasyāpītyarthaḥ | yadāyaṃ jīvātmā svaśarīraṃ cālayati tadā tādṛśaśarīracāla
narūpakriyākartṛtvaṃ śarīrasahāyarahitasyaiva śarīrāntargatasya kevalasya dṛśyate |
tathā ca yatra kartṛtvaṃ tatra śarīrasahāyatvamiti vyāptyabhāveneśvarasya saśarīratvamanu
mānena na sidhyatītyaśarīra eveśvaraḥ | abhyupagamyāpīti | saśarīratvaṃ svīkṛ
tyāpītyarthaḥ | parameśvarasyeti | malādipāśasvarūpamagre mūla eva vakṣyate
da. 7 paṃ. 176 | ādiśabdena māyāyā rodhaśakteśca grahaṇam | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ —
parameśvaro hyanādimuktaḥ | anyathā tasya yo muktipradastasyāpyanyo muktiprada
ityanavasthā syāt | ataścāvaśyaṃ kasyacidanādimuktatvamāstheyam | yaścānādi
muktaḥ sa eva parameśvara ityucyate | anādimuktasya ca malādayaḥ pāśā naiva
saṃbhavanti | pāśasattvenādimuktatvāsaṃbhavāt | pāśarahitasya ca na prākṛtaṃ śarīraṃ
saṃbhavati | prakṛteḥ pāśāntargatatvāt | akhilajagadupādānakāraṇībhūtā hi sā |
tadvikārabhūtameva cedaṃ bhautikaṃ śarīram | etadeva prakṛtivikārabhūtatvātprākṛta
mityucyate | śaktirūpairiti | taduktam —

śaktistu mātṛkā jñeyā sā ca jñeyā śivātmikā | iti |
mātṛkā varṇamālā | tasyāṃ sarve mantrāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ | taduktaṃ kālikāpurāṇe —

ye ye mantrā devatānāmṛṣīṇāmatha rakṣasām |
te mantrā mātṛkāyantre nityameva pratiṣṭhitāḥ || iti |
tathā ca mantrāṇāṃ śaktirūpatvaṃ siddham | mantramaye ca śarīre śarīrāvayavā
mantrarūpā eva vaktavyāḥ | tatreśānaḥ ma. nā. 21 iti mantro mastakasthānīyaḥ |
tatpuruṣāya ma. nā. 20 iti mantro mukhasthānīyaḥ | aghorebhyo ma. nā. 19
iti mantro hṛdayasthānīyaḥ | vāmadevāya ma. nā. 18 iti mantro guhyasthānīyaḥ |
sadyojātaṃ ma. nā. 17 iti mantro pādasthānīyaḥ | saṃhārarūpaṃ kṛtyamādā
nalakṣaṇam | sṛṣṭirūpaṃ kṛtyamudbhavalakṣaṇam | malādīti | prabhorvapuḥ śāktaṃ na
tvetādṛśaṃ malādyasaṃbhavādityanvayaḥ | etādṛśamasmadādiśarīrasadṛśam | ākā
ravāniti | sākārastvaṃ niyamenopāsituṃ yogyo bhavasi | upāsanā hi sevā
viśeṣaḥ | sevā ca kāyikavācikamānasikabhedena trividhā | tatra mānasikī
tāvannātra saṃbhavati | yato buddhirnirākāraṃ vastu nopaiti na viṣayīkaroti | buddhyā
vastuno viṣayīkaraṇaṃ ca vastvākārasadṛśākāragrahaṇam | tathā ca nirākārasya
dhyānādirūpā mānasikī sevā na saṃbhavati | buddhyā viṣayīkaraṇābhāvādeva
ca tatstotrapaṭhanādirūpā vācikyapi sevā na saṃbhavati | kāyikī pādyārdhyādi
rūpā sevā ca nirākārasya na saṃbhavatīti spaṣṭameva | kṛcchrādhveti | ayame
vādhvā kṛṣṇa ityaśuddha ityahita iti cocyate | anantādayo vidyeśvarā agre
vakṣyante da. 7. paṃ. 115 | ananto'hita iti | ahitedhvani prabhoḥ śivasya
prayojyatvenābhimatonantaḥ kartā prokta ityarthaḥ | evaṃ ceti | patipadārthaḥ
śivobhimata iti prāguktam da. 7 paṃ. 20 | śivaśabdena yo gṛhyate sa
patiśabdasyārtha iti tadarthaḥ | śivaśabdasya śivatvaṃ pravṛttinimittamiti śiva
śabdena śivatvayogino gṛhyante | śivatvadharmeṇa saha yo yogaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sa
vidyate yeṣāṃ te śivatvayoginaḥ | mantrādayo jīvaviśeṣā anupadameva paśunirūpaṇe
nirūpayiṣyante da. 7 paṃ. 118 | atha vā mantrā īśānādayaḥ pañca | mantreśvarā
maṇḍalyādayaḥ | maheśvarā vidyeśvarāḥ | mantrādayo jīvaviśeṣā apyasmadādidṛṣṭyā
śivakalpā eva | yataste paraśivānugraheṇa labdhādhikārāḥ śivatvaṃ prāptāḥ | ataḥ
śivatvayoginaḥ | muktātmānopi śivatvayoginaḥ | tadvācakāḥ śabdāśca svavā
cyārthadvārā śivatvayoginaḥ | śivatvaprāptisādhanībhūtā dīkṣādaya upāyāśca
kāryakāraṇabhāvasaṃbandhena śivatvayoginaḥ |

anaṇuriti | vyāpaka ityarthaḥ | aṇvitipāṭhe sūkṣmatvādaṇuśabdavācyatvaṃ na
tvaṇuparimāṇavaśāt | jīvo vyāpaka ityagre vakṣyamāṇatvāt | kṣetraṃ śarīraṃ
svabhogāyatanatvena jānātīti kṣetrajñaḥ | nānyadṛṣṭamiti | bālyatāruṇyā
dyavasthābhedena dehabhedasya darśanādbālyāvasthāyāṃ dṛṣṭasya tāruṇyāvasthāyāṃ smaraṇaṃ
na syāt | dehasyaivātmatvenātmabhedasattvāt | prakāśyaḥ | bodhanīyaḥ | ana
vastheti | ātmā yadi jñeyastarhi tasya jñātā tasmādanyaḥ svīkāryaḥ syāt |
ekasyāṃ jñānakriyāyāmekasyaiva kartṛtvakarmatvayorasaṃbhavāt | yaścānyo jñātātmā
sopi jñeya iti punastasyāpi jñātā tadapekṣayānya āstheyaḥ | mānādhīnā meya
siddhirityukteḥ | evaṃ tasyāpyanya ityanavasthā bhavati | ātmā yadīti |
mātuṃ yogyo meyaḥ | jñeya ityarthaḥ | yadyātmā jñeyo bhavettarhi tasya jñātānyo
bhavet | athāstu nāma tadapekṣayānyastasya jñātā kā hāniriti vaiyātyādyadi
kaścidbrūyāccettatrāha — para iti | ekasmindeha ekasya jīvasya jñātā paro jīvona
nubhūtopi tadānīṃ svīkartuṃ yogyo bhavedyadi tasyāpi jñātā paro vidyeta | tathā
cānavasthā | atha vā yadi sonyo dṛśyeta tarhi sa svīkāryaḥ syānnānyathetyarthaḥ |
tathātve cānubhavavirodhaḥ | deśeti | avacchinnatvamavacchedaḥ saṃkocaḥ | iyatteti
yāvat | tadabhāvonavacchinnatvam | deśata iyattāyā abhāvānnāvyāpakaḥ | tathā
kālata iyattāyā abhāvānna kṣaṇikaḥ | kiṃ tu vyāpako nityaśca | ana
vacchinneti | deśataḥ kālataścānavacchinna iyattārahitaḥ sadbhāvostitvaṃ yasya
tādṛśamityarthaḥ | bhogeti | bhogaḥ sukhaduḥkhasākṣātkāraḥ | sa caikasya devadattasya
yathā bhavati na tathānyasya yajñadattāderityevaṃ yo bhoganiyamastena jīvabahutva
manumīyate | karma tu na tanniyāmakam | jīvaikyapakṣemukenedaṃ karma kṛtamamukena
neti vaktumaśakyatvāt | nityeti | caitanyasya nityatvena tasya ca caitanyasya
dṛkkriyārūpatvena nityaṃ kartṛtvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati | tathā hi — baddhānāṃ jīvātmanāmi
ndriyadvārā tattatkriyākartṛtvaṃ sāṃprataṃ sarvatrānubhūyata eva | mumukṣūṇāṃ jīvātmanāṃ
malakarmādipāśajālotsāraṇārthaṃ vratacaryādiṣu pravṛttidarśanāttatra kartṛtvamastyeva |
muktānāmapi śivatvaprāptiriti kartṛtvamastyeva | śivatvaṃ hi niratiśayaṃ dṛkkriyārūpaṃ
caitanyam | kriyā ca kartṛtvaṃ vinā nopapadyate | caitanyamiti | sarvataśceti
pūrvānvayi | caitanyaṃ dṛgrūpaṃ kriyārūpaṃ ca | taddvividhamapyātmani sarvadā sarvaprakāreṇa
ca vartate | yato muktau caitanyaṃ sarvatomukhaṃ śrūyate | sarvataḥ sarvaprakāreṇa mukhāni
dvārāṇi yasya tādṛśam | kenāpi prakāreṇāpratihatamityarthaḥ | muktasya jñānaśakteḥ
kriyāśakteśca na kathamapi pratibandho bhavatīti tātparyam |

vijñānākaleti | na kalā yasya so'kalaḥ | vijñānenākalo vijñānākalaḥ |
evaṃ pralayenākalaḥ pralayākalaḥ | kalayā sahitaḥ sakalaḥ | vijñānayogeti |
vijñānaṃ parameśvarasvarūpavijñānam | yogo japadhyānādiḥ prāguktaḥ da. 6
paṃ. 82 | saṃnyāsaḥ karmatyāgaḥ | kalādayogre vakṣyante da. 7 paṃ. 130 |
bhogaḥ sukhaduḥkhasākṣātkāraḥ | sa badhyate niyamyateneneti bhogabandhaḥ śarīram |
tatprayojakāśca kalādayaḥ | karmaṇa eva kṣaye tatphalabhogasyābhāvena śarīrasyāna
pekṣitatvāccharīraprayojakaiḥ kalādibhirindriyairbhūtaiścātyantaṃ viyogātkevalena malena
yukto vijñānākalaḥ | malādipāśacatuṣṭayamagre vakṣyate da. 7 paṃ. 176 | teṣvā
dyāstrayo malaḥ karma māyākāryaṃ ceti | teṣu kevalena malena yukto na tu karmaṇā
māyākāryeṇa vā | rodhaśaktirūpacaturthapāśasaṃbandhastvakiṃcitkaraḥ | upasaṃhārā
diti | pralayena kalādervināśepi bījarūpeṇa teṣāmavasthānamastyevetyanyat |

kāluṣyeti | kāluṣyaṃ malaḥ | tatparipāko nāma tatra vidyamānāyā rodha
śakterupasaṃhāraḥ | punaḥ punaḥ kriyamāṇena karmaṇā male puṭāni saṃpadyante | tena
ca malaḥ paripakvo na bhavati | karmābhāve tu punaḥ puṭābhāvena pūrvasya malasyo
ttarottaraṃ paripāko bhavatyahinirlvayanīvat | yathā yathā paripākastathā tathā tadga
tāyā jīvasvarūpāvaraṇaśaktervināśo bhavati | antyāniti | asamāptakaluṣā
vijñānākalā ye jīvātmānastānparameśvaro mantrarūpānkaroti | mantrāśca karmaṇā
śarīreṇa ca vimuktāḥ kevalena malena yuktā jīvaviśeṣā eva | te ca saptakoṭi
saṃkhyākā itarajīvānugrāhakāśca bhavanti | paśava iti | vijñānakevalo
vijñānākalaḥ | pralayakevalaḥ pralayākalaḥ | kalādīti | kalādisaptakamantaḥ
karaṇatrayamindriyadaśakaṃ śabdatanmātrādigandhatanmātraparyantaṃ tanmātrapañcakamākā
śādibhūmiparyantaṃ bhūtapañcakaṃ ceti triṃśatsaṃkhyākaistattvairyutaḥ sakala ityarthaḥ |

pakvapāśadvaya iti | pakvaṃ jīrṇaṃ svakāryakaraṇāsamarthaṃ pāśadvayaṃ malakarmarūpaṃ
yasya tādṛśaḥ | vidyamānamapi pāśadvayamavidyamānavadeveti tatkāryasyāvaraṇasya
bhogasya cābhāvādayaṃ mukto bhavati | dvitīyastviti | punaḥ sṛṣṭyārambhakāla
iti śeṣaḥ | syātpuryaṣṭakamiti | antaḥkaraṇaṃ manobuddhyahaṃkārarūpaṃ trayam |
upalakṣaṇametatkalādisaptakasya | dhiyo jñānasya karma dhīkarma | jñeyamityarthaḥ |
tacca pañca bhūtāni pañca tanmātrāśceti daśakam | karaṇāni sādhanāni | jñānasya
sādhanāni pañca jñānendriyāṇi | karmaṇaḥ sādhanāni pañca karmendriyāṇi ca |
etāni triṃśattattvāni puryaṣṭakamityucyata ityarthaḥ | kalpāntamiti | pralayaparya
ntamityarthaḥ | pralaye puryaṣṭakasya vilayāt | mokṣāntamiti | sṛṣṭyavasthāyāmapi
mokṣaprāptikāle puryaṣṭakasya layasadbhāvāt | pṛthivyādīti | kalādibhūmiparya
ntāni yāni triṃśattattvānyuktāni tānyeva viparyayeṇa pṛthivyādikalāparyantāni
triṃśattattvāni bodhyāni | pratipuṃniyataḥ | pratijīvaniyataḥ | bhuvanajadeheṣu |
manuṣyapaśupakṣyādisakalasthūladeheṣu | kalākāleti | atrāyaṃ sṛṣṭikramaḥ —
māyārūpaṃ tattvaṃ sarvasyāsya jagato mūlabhūtaṃ sūkṣmatamaṃ pralayepyavināśi | sṛṣṭyā
rambhe parameśvarasaṃnidhānena tasyāḥ pariṇāmo bhavati | tatrādyaḥ pariṇāmaḥ kalā |
idaṃ tattvaṃ sūkṣmataraṃ pralaye vināśi guṇatrayātītaṃ ca | guṇatrayasyādyāpyutpattya
bhāvāt | tatastasmātkāla utpadyate | ayaṃ caikaḥ | agrimaṃ sarvaṃ kālādhīnam |
tato niyatirutpadyate | niyatiradṛṣṭam | tacca nānāvidhaṃ jīvakṛtapūrvakarmānusāreṇa
tattatkālānusāreṇa ca jīvaiḥ saṃbadhyate | tasmādvidyotpadyate | vidyaiva cittākhyo
jīvaguṇaḥ | tasmādrāga utpadyate | rāgaśca dveṣapratidvandvibhūto viṣayāsaktijanako
jīvaguṇaḥ | vidyā rāgaśca pratijīvaṃ bhinnaḥ | tato viṣayotpattau jāyamānāyāmādau
prakṛtirūpaṃ tattvamutpadyate | tatastatra guṇatrayamutpadyate | tatontaḥkaraṇatrayaṃ śabdādayaḥ
pañca tanmātrāḥ sūkṣmaṃ bhūtapañcakamindriyadaśakaṃ cotpadyate | tatastasmātsthūladeho
tpattiriti | anyathā | triṃśattattvātmakaṃ puryaṣṭakamityevam | addheti | satya
mityarthaḥ | tatsūtramiti | śabdādibhirlakṣaṇayā svāśrayībhūtāni pañca bhūtānyapi
grāhyāṇi | buddhyādiṣvanyatamena bhogasādhanatvarūpasādharmyātkalādisaptakamindri
yadaśakaṃ ca grāhyam | evaṃ vyākhyānena śabdaḥ sparśa iti sūtrasya triṃśattattvapara
tvamupapadyate | rāmakāṇḍakṛtaṃ vyākhyānaṃ tu na dṛṣṭamasmābhiḥ | śaṅkate —
tathāpīti | puryāṃ śarīrarūpāyāmaṣṭakaṃ puryaṣṭakam | saṃkhyākṛtavyavahārasya paraspa
raparihāreṇaiva dṛṣṭatvāttriṃśattattvātmake puryaṣṭakeṣṭasaṃkhyā kathamutpadyate ityāśayaḥ |
uttarayati — bhūteti | triṃśattattveṣvavāntaravargānusāreṇāṣṭasaṃkhyopapattiriti
bhāvaḥ | tatkāraṇeneti | tasya bhūtādivargapañcakasya kāraṇena sattvarajastamorūpa
guṇatrayeṇetyarthaḥ | pradhānaṃ ca guṇatrayāśrayamakhilajaganmūlakāraṇam | idameva
prakṛtiśabdena vyapadiśyate | kalādipañcakaṃ ca kalākālaniyatividyārāgarūpam |
maheśvaraḥ | vidyeśvaraḥ |

tatrādyāniti | yathā yathā malādīnāṃ pāśānāṃ paripākodhiko bhavati
tathā tathā teṣu pāśeṣu vidyamānā dṛkkriyācchādanaśaktirapi hīnā bhavati | śaktau
hīnāyāṃ ca vidyamānā api pāśā avidyamānakalpā eva bhavanti | tatasteṣāṃ
mantreśvarapadaṃ dadāti parameśvaraḥ | pūrvaṃ saptakoṭisaṃkhyākā jīvaviśeṣā mantrā uktāḥ |
teṣāmadhikāriṇa ete maṇḍalyādayoṣṭādaśādhikaśatasaṃkhyākā mantreśvarā jīvavi
śeṣāḥ | aharmukha iti | sṛṣṭikālo divasaḥ | pralayakālo rātriḥ | sṛṣṭyā
rambhakāla ityarthaḥ | tatsamā iti | tairmaṇḍalibhiḥ saṃkhyayā samāḥ | krodhādyā
aṣṭāvityarthaḥ | tatparipāketi | malādīnāṃ pāśānāṃ pūrṇe paripāke dṛkkriyā
cchādikāyāḥ pāśagatāyā rodhaśakteḥ sarvathā vināśāttaṃ mokṣādhikaraṇaṃ saṃbhāvya
parameśvarastadgurumūrtimadhiṣṭhāya tasya śiṣyasya dīkṣāṃ saṃpādya mokṣaṃ dadātītyarthaḥ |
pūrvamiti | vyatyāsitasya jīvatvaprāpakādanādisaṃskārānmocitasyāṇorjīvasya
pāśajālaṃ dūrīkaroti | mokṣaṃ dadātīti yāvat |

malakarmeti | ātmāśrito duṣṭabhāvo malaḥ | sa mithyājñānādibhedena pañca
vidhaḥ prāguktaḥ da. 6 paṃ. 21 | karma dharmādharmarūpaṃ prasiddham | māyā sarvasya
mūlakāraṇam | iyamevāvidyā pradhānaṃ prakṛtiriti cocyate | rodhaśaktirmalagataṃ
dṛkkriyāśaktyāvaraṇasāmarthyam | bindoriti | pañcamaḥ pāśo hi śivatattvapada
vācyo māyātmā binduḥ | itarapāśānāmabhāve kevalenānena pāśena baddhasya yadyapi na
śivapadaprāptirūpo mukhyaḥ paro mokṣastathāpi gauṇo'paro mokṣostyeva | yatoyaṃ
kevalaḥ pāśo vidyeśvarādipadaṃ prāpayati | vidyeśvarādipadaprāptireva cāparo mokṣaḥ |
tathā cāsya malādivatpāśatvābhāvena nāsmābhiratra pāśamadhye gaṇita iti bhāvaḥ |
prāvṛtīśa iti | pṛthivyādikalāparyantaḥ puryaṣṭakapadavācyatvena prāguktaḥ
da 7 paṃ. 137 triṃśattattvasaṃghātotra māyākāryaśabdenocyate | etatprāvṛtī
śādicatuṣṭayaṃ pāśajālamucyate | prāvṛtīśādipāśānāṃ dharmāstu tattannāmanirva
canenaiva saṃkṣepataḥ kīrtitā bhavantītyarthaḥ | dṛkkriye iti | jñānaśaktiḥ kriyā
śaktiścetyarthaḥ | anayoḥ svarūpaṃ prāguktam da. 6 paṃ. 50 | sa ceti |
na kevalamayamātmāśrito malaḥ svopajīvyasyātmanaḥ svarūpamācchādayati pratyuta
svānurodhena svatantra iva tamakāryepi pravartayaṃstaṃ niyacchatīveti bhāvaḥ | eka
iti | ācchādanaśaktirniyamanaśaktiścetyanekavidhā śaktiryasya sonekaśaktiḥ |
ayaṃ ca malastaṇḍulasvarūpācchādakatuṣavajjñeyaḥ | atha vā tāmradhātugatakālikā
tāmrā iti pra.vajjñeyaḥ | asyā iti | vastumātre yatsāmarthyaṃ sā śiva
śaktirucyate | yathāgnerdāhajananasāmarthyaṃ jale śaityotpādanasāmarthyaṃ tejasi vastu
prakāśanasāmarthyamandhakāre vastusvarūpācchādanasāmarthyamityādi | sā ca śakti
rāśrayānurodhena kvacidguṇāya kvaciddoṣāya ca bhavati | tathā cātra pāśagatā ro
dhaśaktiḥ pāśamadhiṣṭhāyātmasvarūpamācchādayatītyasyā aupacārikaṃ pāśatvamiti
bhāvaḥ | dharmānuvartanāditi | āśrayabhūtatattadvastudharmānusāreṇeyaṃ kvacitpāśa
ityupacaryata ityarthaḥ | yathānādiriti | alpakamityatrānādikamityatra ca svārthe
kapratyayaḥ | karmaṇolpatvaṃ cālpaphalajanakatvāt | yathā tasya jīvātmano malo
nādistathā tasyālpaṃ karmāpyanādyeva | yadyanādi saṃsiddhaṃ na syāttarhi kena hetunā
karmavaicitryaṃ syāt | sāṃprataṃ yathā vicitraṃ karma dṛśyate tathaiva tadanādi siddham |
karmaṇaḥ sāditvāṅgīkāre tu prārambhe tadvaicitryahetuḥ kaścitpradarśanīyaḥ syāt | sa
ca na kaściddarśayituṃ śakyata iti bhāvaḥ | mātyasyāmiti | mādhātorāṅpūrva
kādyādhātośca ghañarthe kavidhānamityanenādhikaraṇe kapratyayaḥ | tataṣṭāp | mā
cāsāvāyā ca māyā jaganmūlaprakṛtiḥ |

patividye iti | patiḥ parameśvaraḥ | vidyā tattvajñānaṃ jīvaguṇaḥ | avidyā
mithyājñānam | paśurjīvaḥ | pāśo malādiḥ | tasya pāśasya nivṛttau kāraṇamupāyā
japacaryādayaḥ prāguktāḥ da. 6 paṃ. 82 | yadyapi mukhyāni tattvāni patipa
śupāśarūpāṇi trīṇyeva tathāpi pāśamūlasya pāśanivṛttisādhanasya ca jñānaṃ tattva
jñānaṃ cetyetattrayamapyāvaśyakamiti ṣaṭtattvānyatroktānīti bodhyam ||

div.head: atha pratyabhijñādarśanam || 8 ||
div.p:
pratyabhijñeti | etaddarśanānusāriṇo janāḥ sāṃprataṃ kāśmīradeśe vartanta
iti śrūyate |

atrāpekṣeti | loke mṛddaṇḍacakrādīnāṃ ghaṭaṃ prati kāraṇatvaṃ yaducyate tanna
saṃbhavati | na hi mṛttikā ghaṭaṃ nirmimīte nāpi daṇḍaścakraṃ vā | mṛdādīnāṃ mithaḥ
sāpekṣatvena ghaṭanirmātṛtvamiti cetkasyāpekṣā | na mṛttikāyāḥ | apekṣāyāścetana
dharmatvāt | nāpi daṇḍasya cakrasya vā | tulyanyāyāt | atha kulālasya mṛdādya
pekṣeti cedāstāṃ nāma kulālasya sāpekṣasya ghaṭaṃ prati kāraṇatvam | evaṃ sthite
jagatkāraṇatvaṃ na karmaṇaḥ | acetanatvāt | nāpi karmasāpekṣasyeśvarasya jagatkā
raṇatvam | īśvarasya jagadutpādane karmāvalambitve pūrṇasvātantryabhaṅgāpatteḥ | pūrṇa
svātantryaṃ cānyamukhaprekṣitvābhāvaḥ | kathamapi parāvalambitvābhāvaḥ | ato
nirapekṣa īśvaraḥ svecchayaiva kevalamākāśādibhāvānvitaṃ jagannirmimīta iti
siddham | ākāśādīnbhāvāṃśca parameśvaraḥ svātmanyevāvabhāsayati darpaṇe prati
bimbavat | yataścetanācetanātmakaṃ sarvamidaṃ jaganna parameśvarāpekṣayā pṛthagbhūtaṃ kiṃ
tu tadantargatameva | yadyapi jīvā mitho bhinnā evaṃ nānāvidhamānameyādibhinnaṃ
jagadapi tathāpi parameśvarāpekṣayā na kiṃcidbhinnam | yathā vṛkṣa ityekatvaṃ śākhā
iti nānātvamevaṃ bhedābhedaśālī parameśvaraḥ | parameśvarasya jīvatādātmyaṃ svasaṃ
vedanenopapattyāgamena ca sidhyati | svasaṃvedanaṃ svānubhavaḥ | upapattiranumānam |
āgamaḥ śaivāgamaḥ | ahamīśvara eva nānya ityevaṃ yaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ sa pratya
bhijñetyucyate | tena pratyabhijñāmātreṇaiva ca parāparasiddhirbhavati | na tadarthaṃ caryā
prāṇāyāmādikleśaprayāsaḥ | bhasmasnānādikā bāhyacaryā krāthanādikābhyantara
caryā ca prāguktā da. 6 paṃ. 86 | parasiddhirmuktiḥ | aparasiddhirabhyudayo
devalokaprāptyādiḥ | yathā yathā sākṣātkārastathā siddhiriti sākṣātkārānuro
dhena siddhitāratamyam |

sūtramiti | sūtre saṃkṣepeṇārthabodhanam | vṛttau tadanvayārthakathanam | vivṛtau
padāntareṇārthabodhanam | vimarśinīdvayedhiko vicāraḥ | prakaraṇavivaraṇapañcake ca
krameṇa sakalaḥ śāstrārtha uktaḥ |

parameśvaraghaṭiteneti | gurucaraṇasevāpi parameśvarecchayaiva saṃpāditā bhavati |
svātmeti | yathā rājñā dattādhikāraḥ kaścana rājadāso dāsyarūpaṃ svādhikāraṃ
yathecchamupabhuṅkte tathānena sūtrakāreṇa pratibandharahitaṃ yatheṣṭamupabhogayogyamīśvara
dāsyaṃ kārtsnyena saṃpāditam | upabhogaścātra viditavedyatvena pratyabhijñāśāstrapra
kāśanadvārā paropakāreṇa ca mānasaḥ saṃtoṣaḥ | anyatheti | adhikārābhāvepi
śāstraviracane tatra mithyārthasyāpi pratipādanasaṃbhava iti tacchāstrānusāriṇāṃ
vañcanaṃ syāt | anavacchinneti | prakāśa ānandaḥ svātantryaṃ cetyetattrayaṃ para
mārthabhūtaṃ parameśvarasvarūpam | tadanavacchinnamamaryāditaṃ yasya tādṛśaḥ | adhi
kārīti | mumukṣūṇāṃ janānāṃ sarvasādhāraṇa eva pratyabhijñāśāstrāvalokanedhi
kāro na tu bhasmasnānādivratakarturviśeṣajanasyaiveti bhāvaḥ | yasyeti | idaṃ sarvaṃ
maheśvara evetyevaṃ maheśvarasvarūpaṃ yasya kathyate tasya tatsvarūpakathanaṃ sa eveśvaroham —
ityevaṃ sākṣātkārarūpamahāphaladaṃ bhavati | prajñānasyeti | prakṛṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ prajñānaṃ
pratyabhijñā | īśvarohamityevaṃ sākṣātkāraḥ | ekavāramiti | pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣā
dikam | śāstraṃ pratyabhijñāśāstram | pramāṇādinā dṛḍhasvarūpayā pratipattyā sākṣā
tkāreṇa sarvagate śivatva ekavāraṃ vijñāte sati paścātkaraṇasya pramāṇāderna kiṃci
tkāryaṃ nāpi bhāvanāyāḥ | na hi rogamuktau satyāṃ bhiṣajamapekṣate kaścit |
śivohamityanavarataṃ cintanaṃ bhāvanā | vastutaḥ suvarṇamapi idaṃ suvarṇam — ityevaṃ
suvarṇatvena yāvanna jñātaṃ tāvattajjñānasādhanībhūtaṃ nikaṣopalādyānīyate | asuvarṇa
buddhyā prāptasya parityāgasya nivṛttaya idaṃ suvarṇaṃ bhāvanīyamiti bhāvanā copadi
śyate | suvarṇajñānottaraṃ tu na kathamapi tadapekṣetyarthaḥ | apiśabdeneti | sūtrastho
pakāraśabdasyopa maheśvarasamīpe karaṇamupakāra ityarthaḥ | dāsyamiti yāvat | svayaṃ
dāsyaṃ prāpyetyuktvānantaramuktena parasyāpi tadicchannityapiśabdena svasya dāsyaprāpti
samuccīyate | tathā ca parameśvarasvarūpabhūtaṃ yatsvātantryaṃ tatprāptirūpadāsyaprāptyā
yaḥ sūtrakāraiḥ svasya parameśvarābhedaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ sotrāpiśabdena tairāviṣkṛtaḥ |
tathā ca paripūrṇatvenāptakāmānāṃ sūtrakārāṇāṃ pratyabhijñāśāstraviracane kevalaṃ
pareṣāmiṣṭārthasaṃpādanameva prayojanaṃ na tu svasyānyatkiṃciditi sūcitam | ya
marthamiti | upādeyaṃ tyājyaṃ vā yamarthamadhyavasāya tadupādānārthaṃ hānārthaṃ vopāḥ
yamanutiṣṭhati tatprayojanamiti gautamasūtrārthaḥ | rohaṇācalo meruparvataḥ | sa ca
suvarṇamayo ratnasānuśca | bhaktīti | bhaktiḥ parameśvarasya dāsyam | tadrūpalakṣmyā
yuktānāmanukūlavedanīyatvena prārthanīyaṃ nānyatkimapi bhavati | tathā tayā rahi
tānāmaprāptaparameśvaradāsyānāṃ pratikūlavedanīyatvena tyājyaṃ nānyatkimapi bhavati |
parameśvaradāsyaṃ hi saṃpatteḥ parā kāṣṭhā | tādṛśadāsyābhāvaścāpatteḥ parā kāṣṭheti
tātparyam | ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapakṣe | samastasaṃpatsamavāpterheturiti ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣapakṣe |
bahuvrīhipakṣe | samastasaṃpatsamavāptirheturyasyā iti samāse | samastasyeti |
yāvanna svasya nityasukhādivijñānaṃ saṃprāptaṃ tāvanna pratyabhijñodeti | tadabhivyañja
kacihnājñānāt | tathā ca samastasaṃpatsamavāpteḥ pratyabhijñāhetutvaṃ siddham |
pratisaṃdhāneneti | abhimukhībhūte vastuni sa evāyaṃ caitra ityākārakaprati
saṃdhānarūpaṃ yajjñānaṃ tatpratyabhijñeti vyavahriyata ityarthaḥ | prasiddheti | prasiddhaḥ
purāṇasiddhaḥ āgamānumānādipramāṇairjñātaḥ paripūrṇaśaktiśca yaḥ parameśvarastadvi
ṣaye svātmanyabhimukhībhūte satītyarthaḥ | jīvātmani parameśvarasvarūpāvaloka
nāsakte satīti yāvat | tacchaktipratisaṃdhānena | dṛkśaktyāviṣkaraṇena |
tatsamartheti | yathā hemantartau śaityādhikyādadhyayanāsamartheṣu baṭuṣu paścādagni
saṃnidhānenādhyayanaṃ kartuṃ pravṛtteṣvagniradhyāpayatīti prayujyate | tatrāgneḥ prayoja
kasya vyāpārodhyayanasamarthācaraṇameva | taccādhyayanapratibandhakaśaityanivāraṇarūpam |
tathā ca sūtrakārasya prayojakasya vyāpāraḥ pratyabhijñāsaṃbhavasamarthācaraṇameva | tacca
īśvarohamiti pratyabhijñā na saṃbhavati — ityākārikā pratyabhijñāpratibandhakībhūtā
yā viparītabhāvanā tannirāsaphalakaṃ pratyabhijñā saṃbhavatītyevamupapādanam |

yadīti | svabhāvaḥ svarūpam | īśvarasya hi caitanyaṃ svarūpam | jīvātmanopi
tadeva na tu tadbhinnaṃ tatsadṛśam | jīvātmano vastuta īśvarādabhinnatvāt | svasya
sadā prakāśamānatvācceti | māyāvaśāditi | yadyapi caitanyarūpeṇa jīvātmā
sadā prakāśate tathāpi pūrṇacaitanyarūpeṇa na prakāśate | īśvarasvarūpasya caitanyasya
pūrṇatayāvabhāse hi sati tadapṛthaktvena jīvātmanaḥ svasya prakāśanaṃ syāt |
ataḥ pratyabhijñāyā āvaśyakatvam | dṛkkriyātmakaśaktyāviṣkaraṇena sa eveśvaro
hamiti pratyabhijñāyāṃ jātāyāmīśvarasya kārtsnyena pratītiḥ siddhā bhavati |
advaitavedāntimatasya kakṣīkāreṇa māyāvaśādityuktam | ayamātmā |
jīvātmā | ayamātmetyādi pratijñāvākyam | jñānakriyāśaktimattvāditi
hetuvākyam | yo yāvatītyādyudāharaṇavākyam | ātmā cetyādyupanayavākyam |
ātmā jīvātmā | tasya jñānakriyāśaktyāviṣkaraṇena viśvajñānatvaṃ kartṛtvaṃ
ca | atha vāṃśato jñātṛtvena viśvajñātṛtvamastyeva | tasmādityādyupasaṃhāravā
kyam | pratijñādivākyapañcakamavayavapañcakamiti naiyāyikairvyavahriyate | karta
rīti | kartā jñātā cāyaṃ jīvātmā ādisiddho maheśvara eva na kadāpyanyaḥ |
evaṃ vastusthitau satyāṃ ko vicāraśīlo jīvātmā neśvara iti niṣedhaṃ pratipāda
yet | tathā sa īśvara iti siddhiṃ vā kaḥ kuryāt | asiddhasyātadrūpasya hi tadbhā
vasiddhyapekṣā na siddhasya | kiṃ tu māyāvaśādasminnīśvarasvarūpe jīvātmani sadā
prakāśitepīśvarasvarūpatvenānupalakṣite sati tadarthaṃ svagatadṛkkriyāśaktiprati
saṃdhānena pratyabhijñā pradarśyata ityarthaḥ | sarveṣāmiti | jīvacchabdaḥ śatranto
jīvavācī | sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ sthitirjīvāśrayaiva | jīvatāṃ prāṇināṃ jīvanaṃ caitanyaṃ
ca jñānaṃ kriyā ceti śaktidvayam | tatra jīvānāṃ svagatā jñānaśaktiḥ svataḥsiddhā
svasya svayaṃ prakāśate | kriyāśaktistu kriyayā nirvartyaṃ yatkāryaṃ tadāśritā satī pareṇa
svena cānusaṃdhīyate | tathānyaniṣṭhā jñānaśaktirapyanusaṃdhīyata ityucyate | yā
caiṣāṃ jīvānāṃ jñānaśaktirdeśakālavasturūpopādhyanurodhena saṃkucitā tattajjñeyapadā
rthānusaṃdhānakrameṇa nirūpyate sa eva pramātā maheśvaraḥ | sa ca kramarahitānandāpara
paryāyacaitanyarūpaḥ | nirupādhikakramarahitaśuddhajñānaśaktermaheśvarasvarūpatvādityarthaḥ |
sadeti | maheśvarasya dāsaḥ sadā svātmānaṃ śivasvarūpeṇa jānāti tathā madā
tmanā śivaśaktirūpeṇa ca sadā jānātītyarthaḥ | tadaikyeneti | saṃvijjñānaṃ
prakāśa iti yāvat | vimṛśatvaṃ vimarśo jñānakriyāśaktiḥ | arthāvabhāsa
katvamiti yāvat | sūryādiprakāśairviṣayāḥ prakāśyanta ityevaṃ yo loke prakā
śasya mārgaḥ sa tasya prakāśasya maheśvarasvarūpabhūtaprakāśena sahaikyādeva nānyathā |
tādṛśamaikyaṃ ca nirupādhikaprakāśasya bhedābhāvātsidhyati | sa ekaḥ prakāśa
evaikaḥ pramātetyucyate | sa eva ca nityena vimarśena maheśvara ityucyate | yato
devasya maheśvarasya vimarśa eva śuddhe nirupādhike jñānakriye ityarthaḥ | tameveti |
tameva maheśvarameva bhāntaṃ dīpyamānaṃ santaṃ sarvaṃ sūryādikamanubhāti | tatprakāśāna
ntarameva prakāśavadbhavati | yathā gacchantamanugacchataḥ puruṣasya svatantrā gatistathā
sūryādīnāṃ svatantraḥ prakāśo na bhavati | kiṃ tu tasya svaprakāśasya maheśvarasya bhāsā
dīptyā sarvamidaṃ sūryādikaṃ vibhāti prakāśavadbhavatīti śrutyarthaḥ | bhāvajātasya |
sūryacandrādeḥ | viṣayaprakāśasyeti | eka eva prakāśo viṣayabhedādbhidyata iti
bhāvaḥ | prakāśaḥ pramāteti | śaktiśaktimatorabhedāt | anavacchinnavimarśa
tvam | nirupādhikajñānakriyāśaktimattvam | ananyonmukhatvam | aparāvalambitvaṃ
svātantryam | bhāvātmeti | bhāvo dharmaḥ śaktiḥ | eṣa ceti | eṣa maheśvaro
nantaśaktitvādaparimitaśaktitvādevaṃ jagati puro dṛśyamānānamūnbhūtabhautikānbhā
vānpadārthānprakāśayati | iyaṃ jñānaśaktiḥ | tathā svecchāvaśādeṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ
yāsya maheśvarasya nirmātṛtā sā kriyāśaktiḥ | eṣāmiti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī | asyeti
śeṣe ṣaṣṭhī | itthamiti | hetukartā prayojakakartā | tatprayojako hetuśca pā0
sū0 1 | 4 | 55 iti pāṇinisūtreṇa prayojakakarturhetusaṃjñāvidhānāt | bhāvā
ābhāsante | maheśvaro bhāvānābhāsayati | atra prayojakakarturmaheśvarasya
ahaṃ bahu syām — ityevaṃvidhā yecchā saiva tasya kriyeti bhāvaḥ | tasmi
nniti | bījasattva evāṅkurasattvamityevaṃvidhānvayena yaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo
niścīyate sopi jaḍānāṃ na saṃbhavati | teṣāmapekṣārahitatvāt | etaccai |
taddarśanārambha evopapāditam da0 8 paṃ0 1 | tathā ca pradhānaparamā
ṇvādīnāṃ na jagatkāraṇatvam | nāpi cetanasyāpi jīvasya | asāmarthyāt |
ato jīvasya ghaṭādikāraṇatvepi na jagatkāraṇatvam | kiṃ tu maheśvarasyaiva
tathā cottarottaramupacīyamānā yā maheśvarasyecchā saiva tasya kriyā |
jagannirmātṛtvaṃ tasya saiva | jāyatesti vardhate vipariṇamatepakṣīyate vinaśyati
ceti ṣaḍbhāvavikārāḥ | aṅkuranālakāṇḍapatrapuṣpaphalādirūpeṇa paraḥsahasraṃ tatta
dbhedapradarśanam | ucchūnasvabhāvā | puṣyamāṇā | yogināmapīti | mṛttikāṃ
vinaiva yogināmicchāmātreṇa ghaṭo jāyate | evaṃ bījaṃ vinaiva teṣāmicchāmātre
ṇāṅkuro jāyate iti purāṇeṣu prasiddham | etaddhaṭādikaṃ na kevalamābhāsamātram |
kiṃ tu lokaprasiddhaghaṭādivatsthiraṃ svaprayojanībhūtajalāharaṇādikriyākaraṇasa
marthaṃ ceti bhāvaḥ | yadīti | tathā ca jaḍānāṃ kāraṇatvābhāvo na kevalamape
kṣāvihīnatvādeva kiṃ tu vyabhicāradarśanādapīti siddham | anya eveti | tathā
ca yogīcchādijanyavyatiriktānāṃ ghaṭāṅkurādīnāṃ mṛdbījādisaṃbandho na vyabhi
carita iti mṛdbījādīnāṃ kāraṇatvāṅgīkāre bādhakābhāva iti śaṅkakāśayaḥ |
sāmagrībhedāditi | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ — yeṣāṃ ghaṭānāṃ kāraṇatvena tava mṛtsaṃmatā
teṣvapi mithaḥ sāmagrībhedādbheda eva | tathā ca ghaṭaviśeṣaṃ prati mṛdviśeṣo na
vyabhicarita iti cedastu nāma | ghaṭasāmānyaṃ prati mṛtsāmānyasya vyabhicārastu
duruddhara eva | ghaṭasāmānye yogīcchājanyānāmapyantarbhāvāt |

vyāpārayanniti | yathā dāridryapīḍitaḥ kaścidaraṇye kvacidekānte sthitaṃ
yoginaṃ samārādhya labdhāśīrgrāma āgatya yāvatsvagṛhaṃ paśyati tāvaddhanadhā
nyādisamṛddhaṃ mandiraṃ paridṛṣṭavān | tatrāśīḥpradānottaramasya gṛhāgamanātprāgyo
ginā svasāmarthyena tattatparamāṇusaṃghaṭanapūrvakaṃ sarvaṃ saṃghaṭitamiti kalpyate | yadya
pyetadyogikṛtaṃ paramāṇusaṃghaṭanādikaṃ loke nālakṣyate tathāpi kāryakāraṇabhāva
saṃrakṣaṇāya tathā kalpanīyamiti śaṅkakāśayaḥ | yadi paridṛṣṭeti | yatra yoginā
vilambena kāryaṃ saṃpāditaṃ tatra tathā kalpanāyā avakāśaḥ syāt | yatra tu
yogīcchāsamanantaraṃ sadya eva ghaṭadehādi jāyate tatra tathā kalpanāpi na saṃbha
vati | avakāśābhāvāt | tathā ca tatra kāryakāraṇabhāvavyabhicāro'varjanīya
eveti kāryakāraṇabhāvasaṃrakṣaṇaṃ naiva saṃpāditaṃ bhavati | tasmādvilambena yogi
kṛtakāryakaraṇasthalenālakṣitasyāpi paramāṇuvyāpārasya kalpanā vyarthaiveti
bhāvaḥ | atha svamatenupapattiṃ pariharati — cetana eveti | bhūribhago mahaiśva
ryaśālī | bhagamaiśvaryam | niyamyante saurabhādayo dharmā anayeti niyatiḥ padma
tvādirūpo dharmaḥ | padmatvadharmasya hi saurabhaviśeṣeṇa saha sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ niyataṃ
dṛśyate | adṛṣṭaṃ vā niyatiḥ | brahmadevopi niyatimanuvartata eva na tu tadullaṅghane
tasya sāmarthyam | maheśvarapāratantryāt | maheśvarastu pūrṇasvātantryayukto līlayaiva
tadullaṅghanaṃ kartuṃ prabhavatīti na kāpyanupapattiḥ | nirupādāneti | upā
dānasaṃbhāra upakaraṇasamūhaḥ | tadrahitaṃ yathā syāttathā bhittirahite śūnyapradeśa
eva jagadrūpaṃ citraṃ tanvate kurvate | kalā candrasya ṣoḍaśo bhāgaḥ kauśalaṃ ca | tāsāṃ
nāthāya svāmine tasmai prasiddhamahaiśvaryayuktāya śūline mahādevāya nama ityarthaḥ |

eṣa iti | māyayāndhaḥ sannīśvarasvarūpājñānātkarmaṇā badhyate saṃsarati ca |
nūnamīśvarohamityākārakapratyabhijñayā sākṣātkṛteśvarasvarūpastu dṛkkriyāśakti
paripūrṇo mukta ityucyata ityarthaḥ | nanviti | ahaṃ bahu syāmitīcchayā para
meśvaraḥ sakalajagadrūpeṇāvirbhūtaḥ | tathā ca pramātā jīvopīśvarābhinnaḥ prameyaṃ
pṛthivyādyapi ceśvarābhinnamityetāvatā prameyasya pṛthivyādeḥ pramāturjīvātpārtha
kyābhāvena jīvaviśeṣayorbaddhamuktayorubhayorapi sādhāraṇameva pṛthivyādiprameya
syānusaṃdhānaṃ syādityāśayaḥ | yadyapyuktarītyā prameyaṃ jīvābhinnaṃ tathāpi tādṛ
śābhedasākṣātkāratadabhāvābhyāmanusaṃdhāne viśeṣa ityāha — meyamiti | amṛtaṃ
viṣaṃ vā suvarṇaṃ loṣṭhaṃ vā sādhāraṇaṃ sarvaṃ prameyaṃ svātmanaḥ sakāśādabhinnamiti
mukto manyate | ata eva maheśvaravattasyāmṛte viṣe vā sarvatra samaiva dṛṣṭiḥ |
baddhastu punaḥ sarvaṃ prameyaṃ svātmanaḥ sakāśādvastuto'bhinnamapyabhedasākṣātkārā
bhāvenātyantaṃ bhinnamiti manyate | tathā ca tasya nāmṛte viṣe ca samā dṛṣṭirityarthaḥ |

na hīti | yathā mṛtsalilādisakalasahakāriyuktatve satyajñātamapi bījamaṅku
ramutpādayatyeva tathā svayamīśvarasvarūpa ityevaṃrūpeṇājñānepi jīvasya vastuta
īśvarasvarūpatvāttena sadā muktenaiva bhavitavyamiti śaṅkakāśayaḥ | nirbandhaḥ |
āgrahaḥ | arthakriyeti | arthaḥ prayojanaṃ phalamiti paryāyāḥ | prayojanabhūtā
kriyetyarthaḥ | sā bāhyāntarabhedena dvividhā | bījasyārthakriyāṅkurotpādanarūpā
bāhyā | putrajanmāderarthakriyā cānandotpādanarūpāntarā | pramātā jñātā jīvaḥ |
tasya yā viśrāntirbāhyābhyantaraprayatnaviśeṣarāhityaṃ tajjanito yaścamatkāra ānandaḥ
sa tasyāmāntarakriyāyāṃ pradhānam | putrajanmādi hi śrutaṃ satsadya eva prayatnā
saktamapi manaḥ prayatnānabhimukhaṃ kṛtvā taddvārā kṣaṇaṃ tadadhikaṃ vā svānuguṇamānandaṃ
vidhatte | ajñātaṃ tu putrajanmādikaṃ vastutaḥ sadapyarthakriyāṃ na karoti | tathā
cāntarārthakriyā tadutpādakasya pratyabhijñāne satyeva jāyata iti siddham | ihā
pīti | parasiddhirmokṣaḥ | aparasiddhirabhyudayaḥ | tannimittabhūtaṃ yajjīvātmaikyaṃ
tasya yā prayojanabhūtā kriyā sā ca dṛkkriyāśaktipūrṇatāsaṃpādanarūpā | tasyāṃ
cāhamīśvara ityevaṃ jñānamūlako ya ānandaḥ sa pradhānam | tathā ca jīvātmaikatvaṃ
jñātameva dṛkkriyāśaktirūpacaitanyasya pūrṇatāṃ saṃpādayatsadānandadāyakaṃ bhavatīti
bhāvaḥ | tasminniti | pratyabhijñāne jāte satītyarthaḥ | tadīyeti | nāyakasya
pūrvaṃ śrutā ye rūpavattvādayo guṇāsta eveme yesminpuraḥsthite manuṣye dṛśyanta ityevaṃ
jñānaṃ yāvanna jāyate tāvannāyikākartṛkaṃ tādṛśamanuṣyāvalokanamitarajanāvalo
kanatulyameveti na tasyā hṛdyaṃ tadbhavati | taistairiti | upayācitairityatra napuṃsake
bhāve ktaḥ pā. sū. 3 | 3 | 114 iti sūtreṇa bhāve ktapratyayaḥ | mama putradra
vyādilābho vidheyaḥ ahaṃ tvatpūjanaṃ kariṣyāmi — ityevaṃvidhā prārthanā navasa
iti pra. ityarthaḥ | upanataḥ | samāgataḥ | evam | mayā yaḥ prārthitaḥ soyam —
ityevaṃrūpeṇa | rantumityantarbhāvitaṇyartham | ramayituṃ nāyikāmānandayitumityarthaḥ |
prabhavatīti śeṣaḥ | vihitapratānaḥ | kṛtavistāraḥ ||

div.head: atha raseśvaradarśanam || 9 ||
div.p:
parameśvareti | jīvātmanāmīśvarasvarūpādapṛthagbhāvaḥ pūrveṣāmivaiṣāmapi
saṃmata evetyarthaḥ | piṇḍeti | piṇḍaḥ śarīram | avadhāritātmatattvasyābhyā
sātiśayenāpahṛtamithyājñānasya prārabdhaṃ karmopabhuñjānasya jīvataḥ sata eva yā
muktiḥ sā jīvanmuktiḥ | iyamevāparamuktirucyate | sā prāyaḥ sarvasaṃmataiva |
rāmānujaprabhṛtayaḥ kecinnāṅgīkurvantītyanyat | pāradādīti | capalo rasaḥ
sūtaśca pārade amarasiṃ0 2 | 9 | 99 ityamaraḥ | pārata ityapi |

pāratastu manākpāṇḍuḥ sūtastu rahito malāt |
pāradastu manāk śītaḥ sarve tulyaguṇāḥ smṛtāḥ ||
iti śabdārṇavaḥ | pārado gadita iti | śivagaurīsaṃvādoyam | paro mokṣaḥ |
tadarthamayaṃ yasmātsādhakottamairgaditastasmādayaṃ pārada ityucyate | tādṛśaṃ tasya
sāmarthyaviśeṣaṃ darśayitumāha — supta iti | pratyaṅgamantaraṅgam | mamāntaraṅgājjā
toyaṃ pāradaḥ suptaścenmatsama eva | pratyaṅgasaṃbhavatvaṃ rasaśabdavācyatvena darśayati —
mameti | prakārāntareṇeti | śravaṇamanananididhyāsanādijanyaṃ tattvajñānaṃ
prakārāntaram | tantroktakulācārā api jīvanmuktyupāyatvena tāntrikairuktāḥ |

jīvanmuktāvupāyastu kulamārgo hi nāparaḥ | iti |
tathā ca pāradasevanena śarīrasthairyasaṃpādanadvārā jīvanmuktirityeṣā vācoyuktirna
yuktā | vāco vacaso yuktirvācoyuktiḥ | sayuktikatvena bhāsamāno vaco
viśeṣaḥ | ṣaṣṭhyā ākrośe pā. sū. 6 | 3 | 21 itisūtrasthena vāgdikpaśyadbhyo
yuktidaṇḍahareṣu — iti vacanena ṣaṣṭhyā aluk | ṣaṭsvapīti | akhileṣu darśa
neṣu ṣaḍdarśanāni mukhyāni | teṣu yadyapi prāyo jīvanmuktiruktā tathāpi śarī
ratyāgānantaraṃ muktistaiḥ sarvairevoktā | ato darśanakārāṇāṃ jīvanmuktāvaruciriti
saṃbhāvanayā lokānāṃ jīvanmuktāvaviśvāsena niḥsaṃśayapravṛttirna syāditi bhāvaḥ |
iti dhaneti | anityāniti padacchedaḥ | muktāviti pūrvānvayi | ṣāṭkau
śikasyeti | śarīraṃ hi tvagasṛṅmāṃsamedosthimajjārūpaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ kośairvinirmi
tam | tatrādyāstrayo mātṛtaḥ pare trayaḥ pitṛtaḥ prāpyante | etaccānityamastu
nāma | rasābhrakapadavācyā yā haragaurīsṛṣṭistajjanyasya śarīrasya nityatvameva |
raso harasṛṣṭiḥ | abhrakaṃ gaurīsṛṣṭiḥ | tatsaṃyogajanitasya nityaśarīrasya prāptau
na ṣāṭkauśikasya pūrvaśarīrasya tyāgaḥ | pratyuta haragaurīsṛṣṭijaśarīrasaṃbandhena
tatra divyatvaṃ dārḍhyaṃ ca saṃpādyate | tena ca tasya mṛtyubhayaṃ nāstīti siddhaṃ
bhavati | tattadātmakatvamiti | śarīrasya taddharagaurīsṛṣṭirūpatvamagrimaśloka
uktamityarthaḥ | abhraka iti | pāradaḥ siddhaścettena viddhaṃ lohamapi suvarṇaṃ
bhavatītyatastasya dāridryanāśakatvam |

devā iti | maheśā anantādayo vidyeśvarāḥ | te ca prāgdarśitāḥ da. 7
pa. 115 | kāvyo daityānāṃ guruḥ śukrācāryaḥ | tadātmaketi | tadātmikā
rasapraśaṃsātmikā yā kathā nānāvaktṛko vākyaviśeṣasaṃdarbhastena vittāḥ prasiddhāḥ |
tena vittaścuñcupcaṇapau pā. sū. 5 | 2 | 26 iti sūtreṇa caṇappratyayaḥ | sadā
rasakathāṃ kurvanta ityarthaḥ | karmayogeṇeti | rasaḥ pāradaḥ | pavanaḥ śarīrānta
rasaṃcārī prāṇavāyuḥ | sa ca prāṇāyāmena niruddho gativiśeṣaṃ prāpitaḥ svayaṃ
mūrchita iva sannapi yogino vyādhiṃ harati | nirodhātiśaye tu svayaṃ mṛta iva
sannapyayaṃ prāṇavāyuryoginaṃ na svasmādviyojayati | stambhitaścedākāśagatiṃ saṃpā
dayati | nānāvarṇa iti | yatrāneke varṇā vidyante ghanatvaṃ cāñcalyaṃ ca vihā
yārdratvādilakṣaṇaṃ yatra dṛśyate taṃ mūrchitaṃ vadantītyarthaḥ | akṣataśceti | akṣataḥ
kṣayarahitaḥ | laghudrāvī īṣaddravayuktaḥ | punaḥ saṃskārakāle ca yasya sphoṭanaṃ
vikāso bhavati tadetadbaddhasūtasya lakṣaṇaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ |

nanviti | haragaurīsṛṣṭī rasābhrake | tayoḥ sādhane satyeva tatsevanena śarīra
dārḍhyaṃ saṃpadyate | prasādhitayostayoḥ sevane tu tattīvratāṃ soḍhuṃ nārhatiṃ bhautikaṃ śarīra
miti śarīrasyāpakarṣa eva syādityāśayaḥ | na ca raseti | vādārthamarthavādaḥ | rasaśā
strasya hi pāradapraśaṃsātiśaye tātparyaṃ na tu vācyamaryādayā pratīyamānārthānusāreṇa
vastusthitiḥ | yathā — api giriṃ śirasā bhindyāditi vākyasya śaktyatiśayaprati
pādane tātparyaṃ tadvat | evaṃ ca rasaśāsnaṃ pāradadhātustāvakorthavāda ityā
śayaḥ | arthavādatvāṅgīkāre hi rasaśāstrasya gauṇī vṛttiḥ svīkāryā syāt |
sā cāgatikagatiḥ | tathā ca mukhyavṛttyārthapratipādane saṃbhavati sati gauṇyā
vṛtteḥ kalpanamanyāyyamityabhiprāyeṇāha — dehavedheti | khecarī gatiḥ |
antarikṣamārgeṇa gamanam | yathā loha iti | kartavyaḥ sevanīyaḥ | sūtakaḥ
pāradaḥ | sa ca yathā lohe praviṣṭo lohaṃ divyarūpatāmāpādayati suvarṇatvaṃ
prāpayati tathā dehe praviṣṭo dehaṃ divyarūpatāṃ prāpayati |

vārtam | phalgu | tucchamityarthaḥ | avārtam | satyam | avināśīti
yāvat | galiteti | sarvādhvavivakṣitaḥ | sarveṣu adhvasu prasthāneṣu vivakṣitaḥ |
sarvadarśanasaṃmata ityarthaḥ | yaditi | kāsaśvāsau rogaviśeṣau | khokalā — iti
damā — iti ca prākṛtabhāṣāyāṃ prasiddhau | yaccharīraṃ jarayā jarjaritaṃ kāsādi
janyapīḍayā samākrāntaṃ ca ata eva yatra vidyamānānāmapi jñānendriyāṇāṃ gatiḥ
kuṇṭhitā bhavati tādṛśaṃ śarīraṃ samādhau yogyaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ | parataḥ | ṣoḍa
śavarṣānantaram | tāruṇye viṣayāsakto bhavatītyarthaḥ |

kathamekāyatanatvamiti | evaṃ ca jīvanmuktaśabdaḥ śaśaśṛṅgādiśabdavada
saṃbhavadarthapratipādakaḥ syādityāśayaḥ | sā kimiti | padaṃ vastu | muktirjñeyava
stuni niviśate na vā | muktirjñānaviṣayā svīkriyate na veti yāvat | ajī
vata iti | mukterjñeyatve jñeyatvasya jñātṛsāpekṣatvānmuktasya jñātṛtvamavarjanīyam |
tacca jīvata eva saṃbhavatīti jīvanmuktaśabdavācyārthopapattiḥ | na kevalamupapatti
mātram | kiṃ tu jīvanmuktireva muktirna tu videhamuktiḥ | uktavikatnpāsahatvā
diti bhāvaḥ | tadāha — rasāṅketi | rasaśāstroktamārgānusāreṇaiva jīvanmuktatvaṃ
saṃbhavati nānyathā | yadyapi bhinnabhinnayuktisamāśrayeṇa tatra tatra darśanāntareṣu
jīvanmuktatve pramāṇāntarāṇi pradarśitāni tathāpi teṣvidaṃ jīvanmuktatvaṃ jñātṛjñeya
miti sarvatantreṣu saṃmataṃ viddhi | yaccājīvato jñānaṃ na saṃbhavatyato jñāturjīvana
mastyeva | tasmāddehanityatvaṃ na śaśaviṣāṇāyamānaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ | idam |
dehanityatvam | śarīraṃ hi viśaraṇasvabhāvam | tacca nityaṃ kathaṃ bhavet | kvaci
ccharīrasya nityatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ cenna hi dṛṣṭenupapannaṃ nāmeti nyāyena kathaṃcitsvīkārya syā
dityāśayaḥ | nṛpañcāsyo narasiṃhaḥ | sacciditi | yadastyeveti sadā prakāśate
tatsadityucyate | ata eva tasya cidrūpatvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca | atra narasiṃhaśarīrasya
nityatvaṃ spaṣṭamevoktaṃ bhavati | tatratyaṭīkākṛduktiṃ pradarśayati — nanvetaditi |
ṭīkāyāṃ nanvetadityādirna saṃgacchata ityetatparyanta ākṣepagranthaḥ | śarīrasya sattvaṃ na
saṃbhavatīti tadāśayaḥ | sanakādītyādiḥ kathamasatsyādityetatparyantastatsamādhāna
granthaḥ | pratyakṣaśrutipurāṇarūpapramāṇatrayeṇa śarīrasya sattvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavatīti tadbhāvaḥ |
kāśyādīti | tathā coktam —
pūrṇaliṅgaṃ maheśāni śivabījaṃ na cānyathā | iti |
tathā

pāradaṃ parameśāni brahmaviṣṇuśivātmakam |
yo yajetpāradaṃ liṅgaṃ sa eṣa śambhuravyayaḥ || iti ca |
sūtasaṃhitāyāmapi —

guṇāṃstu rasaliṅgasya vaktuṃ śaknoti śaṃkarī |
siddhayo rasaliṅge syuraṇimādyāḥ susaṃsthitāḥ || iti |

pramādāditi | yatra rasanindāśravaṇasaṃbhavastatra na gantavyam | kadāci
danavadhānena rasanindā karṇapathaṃ gatā cecchivaṃ smaredityarthaḥ ||

div.head: athaulūkyadarśanam || 10 ||
div.p:
aulūkyadarśanamiti | idameva kaṇādadarśanamiti vaiśeṣikadarśanamiti ca
vyapadiśyate | kaṇādo hyatra sūtraṃ cakāra | kaṇādaṛṣirhi kāpotīṃ vṛttimanutiṣṭha
nrathyānipatitāṃstaṇḍulakaṇānādāya pratyahamāhāraṃ cakāra | ataḥ sa kaṇāda iti
kaṇabhakṣa iti vā nāmnā prasiddhimavāpa | ayamevaulūkyaḥ | ulūkasyarṣerapatyamau
lūkyaḥ | kaśyapagotrotpannoyamityāhuḥ | tapasvine kaṇādamunaye svayamīśvara ulū
karūpadhārī pratyakṣībhūya padārthaṣaṭkamupadideśetyapyaitihyaṃ śrūyate | tatopyasya darśa
nasyaulūkyadarśanamiti prasiddhiḥ | gautamena hi pramāṇādiṣoḍaśapadārthānāṃ tattva
jñānānmokṣaprāptirityuktaṃ nyāyaśāstre | tattu kaṇādasya saṃmatameva | paraṃ tvasmiñja
gati vidyamānānāṃ padārthānāṃ madhye ke dharmiṇaḥ katividhāśca te tathā ke dharmāḥ
kiyantaśca te ityevaṃ mitho'saṃkīrṇarūpeṇa yāvanna padārthajñānaṃ tāvatsādharmyavaidharmya
jñānābhāvena sāhacaryaniyamarūpavyāptijñānaṃ na sulabhamityato dravyaguṇādibhedena
saptaiva padārthā iti niścityāsya dravyasyedaṃ svarūpameta eva ca tasya guṇā ityādi
sarvaṃ suvyavasthitaṃ kaṇādaḥ pratyapādayat | ata īdṛśaṃ viśeṣamuddiśya pravṛttatvādi
daṃ vaiśeṣikaśāstramiti gīyate | asmiñchāstre pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ceti pramāṇadvayame
veti śrīdharamatānusāriṇaḥ | pratyakṣamanumānaṃ śabdaśceti pramāṇatrayamiti vyoma
śivācāryāḥ | itareṣāṃ pramāṇānāmanumānentarbhāvaḥ | anupalabdhestu pratyakṣenta
rbhāva iti bodhyam |

iha khalviti | akhilo hi vicāraśīlo janturduḥkhaṃ hātumicchati |
duḥkhasya svabhāvataḥ pratikūlavedanīyatvena sarvānubhavasiddhatayā hātavyatvāt |
duḥkhahānopāyaśca parameśvarasākṣātkāra eva nānyaḥ |

tamevaṃ viditvāti mṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyateyanāya śve. 3 | 8
iti śruteriti bhāvaḥ | yadeti | yathā carmaveṣṭanavadākāśaveṣṭanaṃ na kadāpi saṃbha
vati tathā parameśvarajñānaṃ vinānyenopāyena duḥkhavināśaḥ kadāpi na saṃbhavatīti
tātparyam | āgameneti | guroḥ sakāśātparameśvarasvarūpasya tadguṇānāṃ cāgamena
śravaṇam | śrutasyārthasya dṛḍhapratipattayenumānānusāreṇa yuktipūrvakaṃ svamanasi
cintanam | śrutasya matasya cārthasya dhyānābhyāsavaśena punaḥ punaḥ svānte
bhāvanā | evaṃ prakāratrayeṇa svabuddhiṃ parameśvaraviṣayiṇīṃ kalpayannuttamaṃ yogaṃ labhata
ityarthaḥ | tatra mananamiti | taduktamudayanācāryaiḥ —

nyāyacarceyamīśasya mananavyapadeśabhāk |
upāsanaiva kriyate śravaṇānantarāgatā || kusu. 1 | 13 iti |
nyāyena carcānumitirūpā | sā ca śravaṇottarakālabhavamananarūpā īśasyopā
sanaiveti tadarthaḥ | vyāptijñāneti | vyāptisvarūpaṃ prāṅnirūpitam da. 1
paṃ. 71 | padārthaṣaṭkam | dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyarūpam |
athāta iti | athaśabda ānantaryārthaḥ śrutyā ca maṅgalaprayojanopi bhavati |
śiṣyajijñāsānantaraṃ yataḥ śravaṇādipaṭavosūyārahitāśca śiṣyā upasannā ataḥ
kāraṇājjñānanidānaṃ dharmaṃ nirūpayiṣyāma iti sūtrārthaḥ | dharmasvarūpaṃ tu yatobhyu
dayaniḥśreyasasiddhiḥ sa dharmaḥ ka. sū. 1 | 1 | 2 iti sūtre pratipāditam | abhyu
dayaḥ svargastattvajñānaṃ vā | niḥśreyasaṃ mokṣaḥ | daśalakṣaṇyāmiti | daśānāṃ
lakṣaṇānāṃ samāhāro daśalakṣaṇī | lakṣaṇaśabdodhyāyavācī | kecidantevāsino
vidhivadadhītavedavedāṅgā anasūyakāḥ saṃpannaśravaṇā mananārthaṃ paramakāruṇikaṃ bhaga
vantaṃ kaṇādamahārṣiṃ vidhivadupaseduḥ | tataḥ sa muniḥ sūtrāṇāṃ daśādhyāyīṃ viracya
tānupadideśa | tatra pratyadhyāyamāhnikadvayam |

samaveteti | samavetāḥ samavāyasaṃbandhena vidyamānā ye sakalāḥ padārthāḥ
padārthaṣaṭkamadhye samavāyabhinnā dravyādayaḥ pañca teṣāṃ kathanamityarthaḥ | samavāyasya
samavāyāntarāṅgīkāreṇavasthā syādataḥ samavāyo na samavetaḥ | tatra dravyaṃ
svāvayaveṣu samavetam | guṇāḥ karmāṇi ca dravyeṣu samavetāni | sāmānyaṃ jātiḥ |
sā ca dravyaguṇakarmasu triṣu samavetā | viśeṣāśca nityadravyeṣu samavetāḥ |
yadyapi niravayavāḥ paramāṇavo na kvāpi samavetā evamākāśādayopi tathāpi
samavetatvamityasya samavāyasaṃbandhavattvamityarthe tātparyaṃ bodhyam | jātimaditi |
jātimatāṃ dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ nirūpaṇamityarthaḥ | tadupayogīti | śarīravivecano
payogibhūtaṃ paramāṇukāraṇatvādikam | śrauteti | śrutipratipāditetyarthaḥ |
cāturāśramyeti | catvāra āśramāścāturāśramyam | guṇavacana pā. sū. 5 | 1 |
124 iti sūtre caturvarṇādīnāṃ svārtha upasaṃkhyānam — iti vārtikena caturāśrama
śabdātsvārthe ṣyañpratyayaḥ | tathāvidhe | āhnikadvayayukte | buddhinirapekṣeti |
rūparasādayo guṇā buddhinirapekṣāḥ | dvitvaparatvāparatvapṛthaktvādayo buddhisāpekṣāḥ |

tatroddeśa iti | nāmamātreṇa vastusaṃkīrtanamuddeśaḥ | yathā dravyaguṇakarmasā
mānyaviśeṣasamavāyāḥ padārthā iti | lakṣaṇaṃ tu tattadasādhāraṇadharmavacanam |
yathā guṇavattvaṃ dravyatvamityādi | yathālakṣitasyaitallakṣaṇamupapadyate na veti
vicāraḥ parīkṣā | vibhāgāpekṣayeti | uddiṣṭānāṃ dravyādīnāmavāntarabhedakathanaṃ
vibhāgaḥ | yathā pṛthivyādibhedena dravyaṃ navavidhamityādiḥ | tathā coddeśo vibhāgo
lakṣaṇaṃ parīkṣā ceti caturvidhāsya śāstrasya pravṛttiriti vaktavyaṃ na tu trivi
dhetīti śaṅkakāśayaḥ | viśeṣoddeśarūpatveti | tathā coddeśo dvividhaḥ sāmā
nyoddeśo viśeṣoddeśaśca | dravyaguṇādayaḥ ṣaṭpadārthā iti sāmānyoddeśaḥ | pṛthi
vyādīni navadravyāṇi rūpādayaścaturviṃśatiguṇā ityādirviśeṣoddeśaḥ | kimatreti |
prathamaṃ dravyasyoddeśastato guṇasyetyādikrame kiṃ kāraṇamityarthaḥ | samasteti |
ādau dharmiṇi vijñāte tato dharmā vijñātuṃ śakyante | yathā vijñāte manuṣye
tadgatāḥ sthaulyakārśyādayaḥ | ata eva dharmāpekṣayā tadādhārabhūtasya dharmiṇaḥ
prādhānyam | dravyādipadārthaṣaṭkamadhye guṇādīnāṃ pañcānāṃ sākṣātparaṃparayā vā
dravyamādhāraḥ | tatra guṇakarmaṇoḥ sākṣādādhāraḥ | jātestu dravyatvapṛthivītvaghaṭa
tvādikāyāḥ sākṣāt | guṇakarmagatāyā guṇatvakarmatvādijātestu guṇakarmadvārā
paraṃparayā | viśeṣāṇāṃ sākṣāt | samavāyasya tu kvacitsākṣātkvacidguṇādidvārā |
tathā ca sarvādharatvena prādhānyāddravyasya prathamamuddeśaḥ | rūpādīnāṃ dravyadharmāṇāṃ
dravyāpekṣayā aprādhānyādguṇatvam | guṇaśabdasyāpradhānavācitvāt | yadyapi guṇa
karmādīnāṃ pañcānāmapyaprādhānyaṃ samaṃ tathāpi vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ rūparasādiṣveva sāṃke
tikī guṇasaṃjñā | guṇādipañcakamadhye viśeṣasamavāyayorna kvāpi pratyakṣamiti
tayoścaramaṃ nirdeśaḥ | guṇakarmajātīnāṃ madhye guṇakarmaṇorjātyāśrayatvena jātyape
kṣayā prādhānyāttataḥ pūrvaṃ nirdeśaḥ | guṇakarmaṇormadhye guṇasya sakaladravyavṛttitvā
tpūrvamupasthitiḥ | karmaṇastu katipayadravyavṛttitvena paścādupasthitiḥ | ato
guṇasya pūrvaṃ nirdeśaḥ paścātkarmaṇaḥ | karma hi nākāśādiṣu caturṣu vibhudravyeṣu
saṃbhavati | calanātmakasya karmaṇasteṣvaṅgīkāre vibhutvasyaiva bhaṅgāpatteḥ | yadyapi
guṇā api na sarve sarvadravyeṣu vidyante | pṛthivyādiṣu buddhyādīnāmasaṃbhavāt |
ākāśādiṣu ca rūparasādīnāmasaṃbhavāt | tathāpi guṇatvena rūpeṇa guṇānāṃ
sakaladravyavṛttitvamavyāhatameveti bhāvaḥ |

nañartheti | nañartho niṣedhaḥ | tadullikhitā dhīrnāstītyevamabhāvarūpeṇa
jāyamānaḥ pratyayaḥ | tādṛśapratyayaviṣayībhūtaḥ saptamaḥ padārtho'bhāvarūpostu nāma |
astītyevaṃ bhāvarūpeṇa pratīyamānāstu dravyādayaḥ ṣaḍeveti | niyamavyavacche
dyamiti | ṣaḍevetyevakāreṇa yaḥ saptamaḥ padārtho vyāvartyate sa pramāṇasiddhosti
vā na veti vikalpaḥ | pramitatve | pramāṇasiddhatve | kathaṃtarāmiti | sutarāṃ
niṣedhāsaṃbhava ityarthaḥ | pratiyogipramitiṃ vinā niṣedhānupapatteḥ | na hīti |
prekṣāvānvicāraśīlaḥ | mūṣikasya viṣāṇaṃ śṛṅgaṃ vandhyāyā apatyamiva loketya
ntāsaṃbhavi | tathā ca nedaṃ mūṣikaviṣāṇaṃ nāyaṃ vandhyāputra ityevaṃ kadācidunmatto
brūyānna tu vicāraśīlaḥ kaścit | mūṣikaśabdo mūṣakaparyāyaḥ | muṣerdīrghaśca
uṇā. sū. 2 | 42 itisūtreṇa kikanpratyayaḥ | saptamatayeti | na kevalasya
saptamasya niṣedhaḥ | nāpi kevalasya bhāvasya | kiṃ tu saptamatvaviśiṣṭasya bhāvasya |
kevalaḥ saptamondhakārādiḥ pratīyate | kevalo bhāvaśca śaktisādṛśyādiḥ pratī
yate | evaṃ bhāgaśaḥ pratiyogipramitiḥ | niṣedhastu viśiṣṭena rūpeṇa | na hi yenaiva
rūpeṇa niṣedhastenaiva rūpeṇa pratiyogipramitirapekṣyata iti rājājñāsti | tathā ca
yadyapyandhakāraḥ saptamosti tathāpi na sa bhāvaḥ | tasya tejo'bhāvarūpatvāt |
tathā yadyapi śaktisādṛśyādirbhāvaḥ padārthosti tathāpi na sa saptamaḥ | ṣaṭsvanta
rbhāvāt | tathā hi — dāhaśaktipratibandhakena maṇyādinā yuktasya karatalasyāgnisaṃ
yoge satyapi dāho na jāyate | kevalasya tu jāyate | tathā ca śaktiratiriktaḥ
padārthaḥ svīkārya iti cet — naitadyuktam | agneryā dāhaṃ prati kāraṇatā saiva śaktiḥ |
pratibandhakābhāvo hi kāryamātre kāraṇamastyeva | tathā ca kimatiriktaśaktika
lpanayā | evaṃ sādṛśyamapi na padārthāntaram | kiṃ tu tadbhinnatve sati tadgatadharma
vattvameva | kṛtam | alam |

dravyatvaṃ nāmeti | gaganaṃ cāravindaṃ ceti dvandvaḥ | dvandvānte śrūyamāṇasya
samavetapadasya pratyekaṃ saṃbandhaḥ | gaganasamavetatve satyaravindasamavetatve
ca satītyarthaḥ | dravyatvaṃ hi pṛthivyādiṣu navadravyeṣu vartamānaṃ gaganepi vartateravi
ndepi ca vartate | aravindasya pṛthivyantargatatvāt | aravindaṃ kamalam | nityaṃ ca
dravyatvam | jāternityatvāt | tathā gandhāsamavetaṃ ca | gandho hi guṇaḥ |
dravyatvaṃ ca dravyeṣveva vartate na guṇeṣu | atra gaganasamavetatve satītyasyābhāve
pṛthivītvetivyāptiḥ | pṛthivītvaṃ hyaravindasamavetaṃ nityaṃ ca | tathā gandhasamā
nādhikaraṇamapi gandhe na vidyata iti gandhāsamavetaṃ ca bhavati | kiṃ tu gaganasa
mavetaṃ na bhavati | pṛthivītvasya pṛthivīmātraniṣṭhatvāt | aravindasamavetatve
satītyasyābhāve gaganagataikatvasaṃkhyāyāmativyāptiḥ | sā hi gaganasamavetā |
nityā ca | nityagatasyaikatvasya nityatvāt | gandhe ca na vidyate | guṇe guṇāna
ṅgīkārāt | kiṃ tvaravindasamavetā na bhavati | yadyapyaravindepyekatvaṃ vartate
tathāpi tadgaganagataikatvāpekṣayā bhinnameva | nityatve satītyasyābhāve gananāravi
ndetyetadubhayagatadvitvasaṃkhyāyāmativyāptiḥ | sā hi gaganasamavetāravindasamavetā
gandhāsamavetā ca bhavati kiṃ tu na nityā | dvitvādisaṃkhyāyāḥ sarvatrāpekṣābu
ddhijanyatvenānityatvāt | gandhāsamavetatvamityasyābhāve dravyaguṇakarmetyetattritaya
niṣṭhāyāṃ sattāyāmativyāptiḥ | sā hi gaganeravinde ca vartate nityā ca | kiṃ tu
guṇeṣvapi vartate | ato gandhāsamavetā na bhavati | guṇatvaṃ nāmeti | samavā
yikāraṇāsamavetā tathā asamavāyikāraṇabhinnasamavetā sattāyāḥ sākṣādvyāpyā
ca yā jātistadeva guṇatvamityarthaḥ | dravyaguṇakarmetyetattritayaniṣṭhāyāḥ sattāyāḥ
sākṣādvyāpyaṃ dravyatvaṃ guṇatvaṃ karmatvaṃ ceti jātitrayameva | pṛthivītvādikaṃ tu
dravyatvasya sākṣādvyāpyaṃ bhavati sattāyāstu paraṃparayā | bhavati ca guṇatvaṃ sama
vāyikāraṇāsamavetam | samavāyikāraṇaṃ hi dravyameva | tatra guṇatvasyāvidyamāna
tvāt | guṇatvaṃ guṇa eva vartate na tu dravye | tathā guṇatvamasamavāyikāraṇabhinna
samavetamapi bhavati | asamavāyikāraṇabhinnā ātmaviśeṣaguṇāḥ | teṣāṃ kutrā
pyasamavāyikāraṇatvābhāvāt | tanniṣṭhaṃ ca guṇatvam | atra samavāyikāraṇāsa
maveteti padābhāve dravyatvetivyāptiḥ | bhavati ca dravyatvaṃ sattāyāḥ sākṣādvyā
pyamasamavāyikāraṇabhinne dravye samavetaṃ ca | dravyasya kutrāpyasamavāyikāraṇa
tvābhāvāt | kiṃ tu samavāyikāraṇāsamavetaṃ na bhavati | samavāyikāraṇe dravye
vidyamānatvāt | asamavāyikāraṇabhinnasamaveteti padābhāve karmatvetivyāptiḥ |
karmatvaṃ hi samavāyikāraṇe dravye na vartata iti samavāyikāraṇāsamavetaṃ sattāyāḥ
sākṣādvyāpyaṃ ca | kiṃ tvasamavāyikāraṇabhinnasamavetaṃ na bhavati | sarveṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ
saṃyogaṃ prati vibhāgaṃ prati vā asamavāyikāraṇatvasyāvarjanīyatvenāsamavāyikāra
ṇabhinnasya karmaṇo'bhāvāt | sattāsākṣādvyāpyeti padānuktau jñānatvādāvati
vyāptiḥ | jñānatvaṃ hi jñāna eva na samavāyikāraṇe dravya iti bhavati samavā
yikāraṇāsamavetam | ātmaviśeṣaguṇānāṃ jñānādīnāṃ kutrāpyasamavāyikāraṇa
tvābhāvenāsamavāyikāraṇabhinne jñāne samavetaṃ ca | kiṃ tu tajjñānatvaṃ guṇatvasya
sākṣādvyāpyaṃ na tu sattāyāḥ | samavāyikāraṇāsamavāyikāraṇabhinnasamaveteti
pāṭhe yatsamavāyikāraṇaṃ na bhavati nāpyasamavāyikāraṇaṃ bhavati tatsamavetetyartho
bodhyaḥ | dravyatvaṃ tu samavāyikāraṇabhinnasamavetaṃ kvāpi na bhavati | dravyamātrasya
niyamena samavāyikāraṇatvadarśanāt | īśvaropyasmadapekṣābuddhijanye jīveśvaragata
dvitve samavāyikāraṇaṃ bhavatyeva | karmatvaṃ nāmeti | nityeṣu padārtheṣu yadasama
vetatvaṃ samavāyasaṃbandhenāvidyamānatvaṃ tena sahitā yuktā | nityapadārtheṣvavidyamā
neti yāvat | tādṛśī sattāyāḥ sākṣādvyāpyā ca yā jātistadeva karmatvamityarthaḥ |
dravyatvajātirnityeṣu paramāṇvākāśādiṣu samavetā | tathā guṇatvajātirapi
nityeṣu jalādiparamāṇuniṣṭheṣu rūpādiguṇeṣu paramātmaniṣṭhajñānādiguṇeṣu ca sama
vetā | ato nityāsamavetā na bhavatīti tayorvyudāsaḥ | karma tu na kiṃcidapi
nityam | kiṃ tu sarvaṃ karmānityameva | tathā ca karmatvajātirnityāsamavetā bhavati |
nityasamavetatvarahiteti vā pāṭhaḥ | sāmānyamiti | pradhvaṃsasya vināśasya yaḥ
pratiyogī vināśī padārthastasya bhāvaḥ pradhvaṃsapratiyogitvaṃ vināśitvam | tena
rahitamavināśi | tathā anekeṣu samavetaṃ ca yattatsāmānyaṃ jātirityarthaḥ |
viśeṣa iti | anyonyābhāvaḥ paramāṇvādīnāṃ mitho bhedastadvirodhinā sāmānyena
jātyā rahitaḥ samavāyasaṃbandhena vidyamānaśca yaḥ sa viśeṣaḥ | sāmānyarahita
ityuktyā sāmānyavatāṃ dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ vyāvṛttiḥ | samaveta ityuktyā samavā
yasya vyāvṛttiḥ | samavāyasya samavāyāntarābhāvena tasya samavetatvābhāvāt |
anyonyābhāvavirodhītyanena sāmānyavyāvṛttiḥ | yadyapi sāmānyaṃ svataḥ sāmā
nyarahitameva tathāpi na tasya sāmānyarāhityamanyonyābhāvavirodhitvena | kiṃ tva
navasthādoṣeṇa | viśeṣeṣu tu yadi viśeṣatvarūpaṃ sāmānyaṃ svīkriyeta tarhi viśe
ṣāṇāṃ viśeṣatvameva na syāditi rūpahānireva syāt | sarveṣāṃ sāmyāpātāt |
tataśca svāśrayeṣvanyonyābhāvapratītijanakatvaṃ teṣāṃ vyāhanyeta | atasteṣāṃ sāmā
nyarāhityamanyonyābhāvavirodhitvenaiveti | samavāyastviti | yasya saṃbandhasya
samavāyo nāsti tādṛśo yaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sa samavāya ityarthaḥ | saṃyogasaṃbandhasya
pāribhāṣikaguṇatvena tasya saṃyogiṣu samavāyasaṃbandhena vidyamānatvāttadvyudāsaḥ |

pṛthivītvaṃ nāmeti | pākajaṃ yadrūpaṃ tatsamānādhikaraṇībhūtā dravyatvasya sākṣā
dvyāpyā yā jātistadeva pṛthivītvamityarthaḥ | pākastejaḥsaṃyogaḥ | tena hi
pṛthivyāṃ rūpādiguṇānāṃ parāvṛttirdṛśyate | yathā tejaḥsaṃyogena pakva āmraphale
pītarūpādikam | naivaṃ jalādau | jalegnisaṃyogenoṣṇasparśabhānepi na tatratyasya
śītasparśasya parāvṛttiḥ | uṣṇatā tvaupādhikī jale praviṣṭānāmagnikaṇānāmeva |
uṣṇatāpratītikālepi jalaṃ vastutaḥ śītameva | tadānīṃ śītasparśo na bhāsata
ityanyat | jalatvādāvativyāptivāraṇāya pākajarūpasamānādhikaraṇetyuktiḥ |
atredaṃ bodhyam — yasyā jāterlakṣaṇaṃ vidheyaṃ tadbhinnāḥ sarvā jātayo lakṣaṇaghaṭakaiḥ
padairvyāvartanīyāḥ | tāśca dvividhāḥ | lakṣyabhūtajātyā samānādhikaraṇāstadvyadhi
karaṇāśca | ādyā api dvividhāḥ | lakṣyabhūtajātervyāpyāstadvyāpikāśca | tatra
pākajarūpasamānādhikaraṇetyanena pṛthivītvavyadhikaraṇānāṃ jalatvādīnāṃ vyāvṛttiḥ |
vyāpyānāṃ vyāpikānāṃ ca dvividhānāmapi samānādhikaraṇajātīnāṃ dravyatvasākṣā
dvyāpyeti padena vyāvṛttiḥ | pṛthivītvavyāpakajāterdravyatvasya sattāyāśca dravyatvavyā
pyatvābhāvāt | pṛthivītvavyāpyānāṃ ghaṭatvādijātīnāṃ dravyatvavyāpyatvepi
sākṣādvyāpyatvaṃ nāstīti | aptvamiti | aptvavyadhikaraṇānāṃ pṛthivītvā
dīnāṃ jātīnāṃ saritsāgarasamavetatve satītyanena nirāsaḥ | tathāptvavyāpyānāṃ
sarittvasāgaratvasarastvādīnāṃ ca tenaiva nirāsaḥ | sarittvasya sāgarasamavetatvābhā
vāt | sāgaratvasya ca saritsamavetatvābhāvāt | sarastvādīnāṃ tvanyatarasminnapi
na samavetatvam | aptvavyāpakasya dravyatvasya sattāyāśca jvalanāsamavetapadena
nirāsaḥ | tejastvamiti | cāmīkaraṃ suvarṇam | tacca tejoviśeṣa eva | pada
kṛtyaṃ pūrvavadbodhyam | tvagindriyeti | tvagindriyasya vāyavīyatvāttatsamavetā
dravyatvasya sākṣādvyāpyā jātirvāyutvamityarthaḥ | ākāśeti | ākāśatvakāla
tvadiktvāni na dravyatvāparajātayaḥ | teṣāmekaikavyaktivṛttitvena jātitvasyaivā
bhāvāt | saṃyogājanyeti | saṃyogājanyo janyaśca yo viśeṣaguṇastatsamānā
dhikaraṇasya viśeṣasya yadadhikaraṇaṃ tadevākāśam | viśeṣāṇāṃ nityadravyavṛttitvādā
kāśe kaścana viśeṣostyeva | sa ca viśeṣaguṇena śabdena saha samānādhikaraṇaḥ |
śabdasyākāśavṛttitvāt | śabdaścānityatvājjanyaḥ | saṃyogājanyopi bhavati |
vibhāgajasya śabdajasya ca śabdasya sattvāt | atra viśeṣādhikaraṇamityuktyā
dvyaṇukatryaṇukādīnāmanityadravyāṇāṃ guṇakarmādīnāṃ ca nirāsaḥ | viśeṣāṇāṃ
nityadravyamātravṛttitvāt | pṛthivīparamāṇugatā rūpādayo viśeṣaguṇā janyā api
na saṃyogājanyāḥ | teṣāṃ pākajatvāt | pākastejaḥsaṃyogaḥ | jalatejovāyupara
māṇugatā viśeṣaguṇāstu na janyāḥ | dikkālayormanasi ca na viśeṣaguṇaḥ kaścit |
paramātmaniṣṭhā buddhyādayo viśeṣaguṇā na janyāḥ | jīvātmaniṣṭhāstu buddhyādayo
janyā api na saṃyogājanyāḥ | teṣāṃ manaḥsaṃyogajanyatvāt | tadevamākāśamevai
kamīdṛśaṃ pariśiṣyate | śabdaguṇakamākāśamityuktyaiva nirvāhe saṃyogājanyetyādyu
ktirvaicitryaviśeṣasphoraṇārthā | viśeṣādhikaraṇatvena keṣāṃ mithaḥ sādharmyaṃ viśeṣaguṇa
samānādhikaraṇaviśeṣādhikaraṇatvena ca keṣāṃ sādharmyamityādijñānaṃ hyanumāne
vyāptyudāharaṇapradarśanāyopayujyata iti | vibhutve satīti | digasamavetaṃ yatpa
ratvasyāsamavāyikāraṇaṃ tadādhārabhūto yo vibhuḥ padārthaḥ sa kāla ityarthaḥ | paratvaṃ
dvividham — samīpavastvapekṣayā dūravastuni vidyamānaṃ kaniṣṭhāpekṣayā jyeṣṭhe vidya
mānaṃ ca | ādyasyāsamavāyikāraṇaṃ digvastunoḥ saṃyogaḥ | ayaṃ diksamavetaḥ |
saṃyogasya dviṣṭhatvāt | dvitīyasyāsamavāyikāraṇaṃ kālavastunoḥ saṃyogaḥ | ayaṃ
