vedaśākhāṃ sarvāmadhyāpayati tamācāryaṃ pūrve munayo vadanti | upanayanapūrvake
ṇādhyāpanena hi kaścidatiśayodhyāpake janyate | sa evācāryaśabdapravṛttini
mittamiti tattātparyam | śikṣā kalpo vyākaraṇaṃ niruktaṃ chando jyotiṣamiti
vedāṅgāni ṣaṭ | rahasyamupaniṣat | upaniṣadāṃ vedatvepi prādhānyavivakṣayā
brāhmaṇavasiṣṭhanyāyena pṛthaṅnirdeśaḥ | upaniṣadāṃ vedāntaśabdena prasiddhatvādveda
syāntaḥ samīpa ityarthenopaniṣadāmavedatvabhrāntyā rahasyagrahaṇamiti tu medhā
tithirvyākhyātavān | vidhitvaṃ na sidhyatīti | adhyāpanavidhilabdhatvenā
dhyayanasyāprāptatvābhāvāt | nityānuvādatveneti | kvacidvidhāyakatvena pratī
yamānaṃ vākyaṃ nityaprāptasyānuvādakamapi bhavatīti bhāvaḥ | tasmāditi |
svādhyāyodhyetavyaḥ tai. ā. 2 | 15 ityasyānuvādakatvena vidhitvasyaivābhā
vādarthāvabodhaparyantaṃ tattātparyasya vaktugaśakyatvādityarthaḥ |

arthāvabodhamapīti | apinādhyayanasya samuccayaḥ | adhyāpanavidhinā yada
dhyayanamākṣipyate tadarthāvabodhasahitaṃ kevalaṃ veti vikalpaḥ | adhyāpanasi
ddheriti | adhyāpanasyādhyayanaṃ vinānupapattirityato'gatyādhyayanamākṣipyate |
tathā ca yāvatā vinānupapattistāvata evākṣepo bhavennādhikasya kasyaciditi
bhāvaḥ | asaṃbhavāditi | asaṃbhavamevopapādayati — āpātata iti |
yadasaṃdigdhamaprayojanamiti | prakarṣeṇekṣaṇaṃ prekṣā | vastunaḥ samyaṅnirīkṣaṇam |
tacchālinaḥ prekṣāvantaḥ | te hi tādṛśaṃ vastu paraṃ prati bodhayituṃ pratipāda
yanti | paraṃ tu prayojanasattvepi yadviṣaye na saṃdehaḥ kiṃ tu nirṇaya eva tatra prati
pādanaṃ vyartham | saṃdehasattvepi ca yatra na kiṃcitprayojanaṃ tatrāpi pratipādanaṃ
vyarthameva | tathā ca saṃdehaprayojanarūpaṃ dvayaṃ militaṃ satprekṣāvatāṃ pratipādane
cchāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavati | anyatarasyābhāve tādṛśecchāyā anudayāt | ubhayā
bhāve tu sutarām | yathā devadattasya manaḥsaṃṃllagnenendriyeṇa saha saṃbaddhaḥ spaṣṭā
lokamadhye vartamāno ghaṭaścettajjñāpanāya na kopi pravartate tadvat | spaṣṭālokama
dhyamityadhiśīṅsthāsāṃ karma pā. sū. 1 | 4 | 46 iti sūtreṇādhārasya karmatvam |

ata ūrdhvaṃ tu chandāṃsi śukleṣu niyataḥ paṭhet |
vedāṅgāni ca sarvāṇi kṛṣṇapakṣeṣu saṃpaṭhet || manuḥ 4 | 98
iti manuvacanena vedāṅgādhyayanena saha vedādhyayanasya vidhānāt | padapadārthayoḥ
saṃgatiḥ saṃbandho gṛhīto yena tasya jñātaśaktikasyetyarthaḥ | āmnāyepi |
vedepi | prāpnotyeveti | śabdasya bodhakatvaśaktisvābhāvyādvidhiṃ vināpi svata
evārthāvabodhaḥ prāpnotyevetyarthaḥ | viṣaṃ bhuṅkṣveti | ajñānena śatrugṛhe bhoja
nārthaṃ gacchantaṃ putraṃ prati mātṛvākyametat | mātā hi na kathamapi putraṃ viṣabhojane
pravartayedityatosya vākyasya vācyortho viṣabhojanavidhirūpo na vivakṣyate |
kiṃ tvasya gṛhe bhojanaṃ mā kārṣīriti gamyamānortha eva vivakṣyate | avivakṣā
yāmiti | vedavākyādbhāsamānopyartho vivakṣita eva na cetkimarthaṃ vicāra
śāstramityāśayaḥ | āptapraṇītatveneti | āptoccāritatvenetyarthaḥ | āptapadenātra
mātā gṛhyate | āptalakṣaṇaṃ tvanubhavena vastutattvasya kārtsnyena niścayavānrāgādi
vaśādapi nānyathāvādītyuktaṃ carake patañjalinā | vādha iti | putraṃ prati viṣa
bhojanapreraṇāyā mātaryasaṃbhavāt | pratīyamānorthaḥ | vācyorthaḥ |

syādetaditi | śaṅkāgranthārambhasūcikeyaṃ śaṅkākṛta uktiḥ | agre yanmayo
cyate tadyadi sthiraṃ na syāttarhīdaṃ yuṣmaduktaṃ niścitaṃ bhavediti tadarthaḥ | naiyā
yikamatānusāreṇa śaṅkeyam | naiyāyikā hi vedasya pauruṣeyatvaṃ manyante | pauruṣe
yatvaṃ ca puruṣaviracitānupūrvīviśeṣaviśiṣṭatvam | puruṣa īśvaraḥ | siddhānti
saṃmataṃ vedasyāpauruṣeyatvasādhakamanumānamanuvadati — atheti | ayaṃ hi siddhā
ntyabhiprāyaḥ — yatra granthādau granthānte granthasyāvāntaraprakaraṇānte vā granthakartrā
kartṛtvena svanāmollekhaḥ kṛtastatra pauruṣeyatve na kaścidvivādaḥ | yathā mahā
bhāṣyapradīpasiddhāntakaumudīraghuvaṃśanaiṣadhādiṣu | yatra ca granthakartāramārabhya
saṃpradāyāvicchedena guruparaṃparayā kartā smaryate tatrāpi na vivādaḥ | yathā pāṇi
nipatañjalivyāsaprabhṛtibhirviraciteṣu vyākaraṇayogavedāntādisūtreṣu | yatra ca
granthakartrā granthe kvāpi kartṛtvena svanāmollekho na kṛtaḥ saṃpradāyavicchedena ca kartā
na smaryate tatra pauruṣeyatve saṃdehostu nāma | paraṃ tu saṃpradāyāvicchedepi kartā na
smaryate tadā kartṛsmaraṇābhāvasya kāraṇaṃ karturabhāva evāvaśyaṃ vācya ityevaṃ veda
syāpauruṣeyatvaṃ sidhyatīti | viśeṣaṇeti | hetuvākyaghaṭitaṃ yatsaṃpradāyāvicchede
satītyetadviśeṣaṇaṃ tasyāsiddhatvenāyaṃ svarūpāsiddho hetuḥ | yathā śabdo nityaḥ
dravyatve sati sparśarahitatvādākāśavat | atra pakṣabhūte śabde dravyatvaṃ nāstītyato
dravyatve satītyetadviśeṣaṇamasiddham | apramīyamāṇeti | vedasya kartā pramāṇena
na sidhyatyatha vā smaraṇaviṣayo na bhavatīti vikalpaḥ | parameśvarasyeti |
pramitiḥ pramāṇajanyaṃ jñānam | tathā ca śrutayaḥ — asya mahato bhūtasya niḥśvasi
tametadyadṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ bṛ. 2 | 4 | 10 tasmādyajñātsarvahutaḥ ṛcaḥ sāmāni
jajñire | chandāṃsi jajñire tasmādyajustasmādajāyata tai. ā. 2 | 12 idaṃ sarva
masṛjata ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni bṛ. 1 | 2 | 5 | tepānāntrayo vedā ajāyanta
iti | yo dharmaśīla iti | parasparamasaṃbaddhā ekatra saṃgṛhītā aneke sphuṭa
ślokā muktakaśabdenocyante | sarvāsmaraṇasyeti | vedasya kartā kadāpi kvāpi
kenāpi na smaryata iti niścayo'sarvajñānāṃ durlabha iti bhāvaḥ | siddhāntisaṃ
matamanumānaṃ śaṅkārūpeṇānuvadati | nanviti | atrāyaṃ prayogaḥ — vedādhyayanaṃ
gurvadhyayanapūrvakaṃ vedādhyayanatvādvartamānavedādhyayanavaditi | vedasya pauruṣeya
tvāṅgīkāre tu tādṛśavedakartṛpuruṣakṛtavedādhyayanasya gurvadhyayanapūrvakatvaṃ na saṃbha
vati | uktavyāptibalāttu tatrāpi tasyāvaśyakatvamiti vedasyāpauruṣeyatvamevā
ṅgīkāryaṃ bhavati | pratisādhanamiti | pūrvapakṣiṇā vākyatvahetukānumānena
yatpauruṣeyatvaṃ sādhitaṃ tatpratikūlaṃ vedādhyayanatvarūpaṃ sādhanaṃ heturyatretyanumānavi
śeṣaṇam | ityābhāseti | yathedaṃ bhāratādhyayanatvahetukamanumānamābhāsī
bhavati tathā vedādhyayanatvahetukānumānamapi | hetoraprayojakatvāt | na hi
yadyadadhyayanaṃ tattadgurvadhyayanapūrvakameveti niyame kaściddheturasti | likhitapāṭhake
prathamaprakāśake ca vyabhicārāt | yadi tadadhyayanameva netyucyate tarhi pauruṣe
yatvāṅgīkārepi na tvaduktānumānaṃ pratikūlam | ko hyanya iti | puṇḍarīkākṣo
nārāyaṇaḥ | sa eva vyāsarūpeṇāvatīrya mahābhārataṃ cakāra | tathā ca viṣṇu
purāṇavacanam —

kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ vyāsaṃ viddhi nārāyaṇaṃ vibhum |
konyo hi bhuvi maitreya mahābhāratakṛdbhavet || vi. pu. 3 | 4 | 5
iti | tathā ca bhāratasya vyāsakartṛkatvaniścayena tatra gurvadhyayanapūrvakatvānu
mānaṃ bādhitaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ | sakartṛkateti | tathā ca vedādhyayanepi gurvadhya
yanapūrvakatvānumānaṃ bādhitaṃ bhavatīti pūrvapakṣyāśayaḥ | atha prakārāntareṇāpyapauru
ṣeyatvānumānaṃ bādhitaṃ bhavatītyāha — kiṃ ceti | apauruṣeyatve hi nityatvamavaśyaṃ
bhāvi | vedasya ca nityatvamanumānena bādhyata ityāśayaḥ | sāmānyavattve
satīti | sāmānyaṃ jātiḥ | tadāśrayatve satītyarthaḥ | śabde ca śabdatvaṃ tadvyāpyāḥ
katvādijātayaśca syureva | pratyabhijñeti | pratyabhijñā pratyakṣaviśeṣaḥ | indri
yasahakṛtasaṃskārajanyaṃ jñānamiti yāvat | atiphalgu | atituccham | lūneti |
lūnaśchinnaḥ | yaśchinnaḥ keśaḥ sa na punarjāyate | kiṃ tu tatsajātīyaḥ | tathāpi
keśatvarūpā jātirubhayatraikaiveti jātyabhiprāyeṇa sa evāyaṃ keśa iti pratyabhi
jñā jāyate tadvat | evaṃ dalitakundādāvapi bodhyam | līlāvigrahagrahaṇam |
līlayā yathecchaṃ śarīrendriyādidhāraṇam |

na vipratipattiḥ | na vivādaḥ | uktapauruṣeyatvāṅgīkārepīśvaraviracitatvā
bhāvenāsmadabhimatāpauruṣeyatvasvīkāre bādhakābhāvāt | mālatīmādhaveti |
savyabhicāro vyabhicāreṇa sahito heturhetvābhāsa ucyate | vyabhicāraśca hetoḥ
sādhyābhāvavadvṛttitvam | yathā dhūmavānvahnerityatra dhūmābhāvavatyayogolake vahneḥ
sattvam | prakṛte ca tvaduktānumāne da. 12 paṃ. 138 vākyatvaṃ hetuḥ | sādhyaṃ
pauruṣeyatvam | tacca pramāṇāntareṇārthamupalabhya tatprakāśanāya racittatvam |
mālatīmādhave ca saṃvidhānakaṃ kavinā svakapolakalpitaṃ na pramāṇāntareṇa tasyo
palabdham | tathā ca sādhyābhāvavati mālatīmādhave vākyatvaṃ vartata ityayaṃ
vākyatvarūpo heturasaddheturiti bhāvaḥ | pramāṇatve satīti | na vākyatvarūpaḥ
kevalo hetuḥ | kiṃ tu pramāṇatve sati vākyatvam | mālatīmādhavasya ca pramāṇa
tvābhāvena viśeṣaṇābhāvaprayuktaviśiṣṭābhāva iti tatra hetorabhāvānna savya
bhicāra ityāśayaḥ |

prakārāntareṇa pauruṣeyatvaṃ khaṇḍayati — kiṃ ceti | pauruṣeyatvavādibhiḥ
puruṣapadena yo yathāvidho gṛhyate sa tathāvidho nāstyeva | dūre tatkṛtatvaṃ pauruṣe
yatvamiti bhāvaḥ | deśakāleti | viprakṛṣṭamindriyeṇāsaṃbaddham | deśāntare
lokāntare vā vidyamānaṃ vastu deśato viprakṛṣṭam | bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyacca vastu kālato
viprakṛṣṭam | svabhāvato viprakṛṣṭaṃ tu cakṣuṣo rasagandhādikam | cakṣuḥsaṃyuktapuṣpā
digatānāṃ rūparasagandhādīnāṃ cakṣurindriyeṇa saha saṃyuktasamavāyarūpasaṃni
karṣāviśeṣepi cakṣuṣā rūpameva gṛhyate na rasagandhādikam | svabhāvato viprakṛṣṭa
tvāt | yataścakṣurindriyasya svabhāvo rūpasya grahaṇaṃ na rasasya | rasasya ca svabhāvo
rasanendriyeṇa grāhyatvaṃ na cakṣurindriyeṇa | evaṃ gandhasya svabhāvo ghrāṇendriya
grāhyatvam | evamanyeṣāmindriyāṇāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ ca svabhāvā ūhyāḥ | taccakṣuriti |
īśvarasyendriyairviprakṛṣṭasyāpi vastunaḥ pratītirjāyata ityarthaḥ | gurubhiḥ | kumā
rilabhaṭṭācāryaiḥ | yatrāpīti | atiśayaḥ sāmarthyaviśeṣaḥ | svārthaḥ svaviṣayaḥ |
yaḥ sāmarthyaviśeṣo dṛṣṭaḥ sa svaviṣayānatikrameṇa dūrasūkṣmādidṛṣṭau kāraṇaṃ bhavenna tu
svaviṣayātikrameṇa | yato na kadāpi rūpe śrotravyāpāraviṣayatvamityarthaḥ |
īśvarendriyeṣu niratiśayasāmarthyāṅgīkārepi tena dūrasthaṃ parvatādigatamavyava
hitaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca paramāṇvādikaṃ dṛśyeta na tu deśādiviprakṛṣṭamiti | ata eva |
yuktyā sarvajñasiddherabhāvādeva | āgamo hi sarvamūlabhūtaḥ | tatsaṃpradāyapravarta
katvādīśvare sarvajñatvamupacarya yaḥ sarvajñaḥ mu. 1 | 1 | 9 ityādyāgamopapattirna
tvīśvare vastutaḥ sarvajñatvamāgamabalādāstheyaṃ yuktivirodhādityāśayaḥ | kāṭhaketi |
tenaproktamityasya prātipadikāttena proktamityartheṇādayaḥ pratyayā bhavantītyarthaḥ | praka
rṣeṇoktaṃ proktam | kṛtamiti yāvat | prakarṣaśca svayaṃviracanapūrvakatvam | kaṭhaśabdāttena
proktamityarthe vaiśampāyanāntevāsibhyaśca pā. sū. 4 | 3 | 104 iti sūtreṇa
ṇinipratyayaḥ | tasya kaṭhacarakālluk pā. sū. 4 | 3 | 107 iti sūtreṇa luk |
kalāpiśabdāttena proktamityarthe kalāpinoṇ pā. sū. 4 | 3 | 108 iti
sūtreṇāṇ pratyayaḥ | tittiriśabdāttena proktamityarthe tittirivaratantukhaṇḍikokhā
cchaṇ pā. sū. 4 | 3 | 102 iti sūtreṇa chaṇpratyayaḥ | kaṭhaśabdātkalāpaśa
bdāttaittirīyaśabdācca tadadhīta ityarthe tadadhīte tadveda pā. sū. 4 | 2 | 59 iti sūtre
ṇāṇpratyaye proktālluk pā. sū. 4 | 2 | 64 iti sūtreṇa tasya lukū | keva
laproktapratyayāntānāṃ tu na sādhutvam | chandobrāhmaṇāni ca tadviṣayāṇi pā. sū.
4 | 2 | 66 ityuktatvāt | kaṭhena proktamadhīyate kaṭhāḥ | kalāpinā proktamadhīyate
kālāpāḥ | tittiriṇā proktamadhīyate taittirīyāḥ | atra yadyapi kaṭhādibhi
stāstāḥ śākhā na viracitāstathāpi teṣāmadhyayanasaṃpradāyapravartakatvena śākhāsu
tatkṛtatvamupacarya yathā kaṭhādisamākhyā bhavati tadvadeveśvare sarvajñatvam | samākhyā
yaugikaḥ śabdaḥ | vastutastu tena proktam pā. sū. 4 | 3 | 101 ityatra prokta
mityasya na kṛtamityarthaḥ | kṛte granthe pā. sū. 4 | 3 | 116 ityanena gatārthatvāt |
kiṃ tu svayamanyena vā kṛtamadhyāpanenārthavyākhyānena vā yatprakāśitaṃ tatprokta
mityucyate | tathā ca kaṭhādisamākhyā mukhyavṛttyaiva pravṛtteti |

na ceti | anumānaṃ pratyabhijñā cānupadamevoktā da. 12 paṃ. 150 |
sāṃpratam | yuktam | sa evāyaṃ gakāra iti pratyabhijñārūpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ gatvarūpa
jātyaikyamūlakamiti yaducyate tanna yuktamityarthaḥ | balavadbādhaketi | dṛḍhata
rapramāṇena vyaktibhedaniścayotra balavadbādhakam | kvacidvyabhicāreti | sa
evāyamiti pratyabhijñā hyaikye satyeva bhavatīti niyamaḥ | kvacittvaikyābhāvepi
lūnapunarjātakeśādau sa evāyamiti pratyabhijñā kathaṃcijjāyamānā dṛśyate tadu
ktaniyamasya vyabhicāradarśanam | sūcīkaṭāhanyāyena dvitīyakalpaṃ prathamato
dūṣayati — tatra kvaciditi | tadutprekṣāyāmiti | kvacillūnapunarjātakeśādau
vyaktibhedapratyakṣopalambharūpabādhakasadbhāvenāgatyā svīkriyamāṇaṃ niyamavyabhicāraṃ
dṛṣṭvā taddṛṣṭāntamātreṇaiva kevalamanyatra bādhakābhāvepi kiṃcidbādhakaṃ parikalpya
tādṛśakalpanāyāṃ kriyamāṇāyāmityarthaḥ | utprekṣeteti | kaścidgacchanyadṛcchayā
pādāṅgulyavaghātena sadyo mriyate | kaścitpūgīphalakhaṇḍabhakṣaṇasamaye galevaro
dhātsadyo mriyate | kaścidvidyutpātādinā | etadālocya yadi kaścitsvasya
tathāvidhajīvanabādhanamajñātvaiva tathāvidhaṃ syātkimiti saṃbhāvayati tarhi
saṃśayagrastasya tasya sarve vyavahārā luptaprāyāḥ syuriti tātparyam | balavadbādha
kamāśaṅkate — nanviti | idaṃ sa evāyaṃ gakāra ityākāram | tāsām |
gakārādivyaktīnām | anyatheti | vyaktyaikye hi ya eva gakārādayo varṇāḥ
somaśarmaṇādhītāsta evānyenetyatomukodhīte nāmuka iti vyavahāro nirālambanaḥ
syādityāśayaḥ | gatvādīti | sa evāyaṃ gakāra ityākārakasya vyaktiviṣaya
kasya pratyabhijñānasya jātiviṣayakatvakalpanāyāṃ na pramāṇamityarthaḥ | yathā
gotvamiti | yena gotvajāteḥ svarūpaṃ vastuto na jñāyate tasya vastuta ekamapi
gotvaṃ bhinnabhinnadeśādyupādhibhede sati bhinnaṃ pratīyate — idaṃ gotvamasmaddeśāpe
kṣayā vilakṣaṇamityādi | naitāvatā gotvabhedastavāpi saṃmatastathaiva gakārādi
vyaktiviṣayepītyarthaḥ | saṃsthānamavayavaracanāviśeṣaḥ | upadhānamupādhiḥ | vāmanaṃ
hrasvam | vyañjakabhedāditi | nābhipradeśātprayatnaprerito vāyurvaktraṃ prāpya
jihvāgrādisparśapūrvakaṃ kaṇṭhādisthānānyāhatya dhvaniṃ janayati | sa ca dhvaniḥ
svāntaḥsthatvena gakārādīnvarṇānabhivyanakti | ayameva dhvanirnāda ityucyate |
tādṛśavyañjakadhvanigatālpatvamahattvādidharmasaṃbandhādekāpi gakārādivyaktirbhinnava
dbhāsate | somaśarmādhīta iti vibhāgopyetanmūlaka eveti bodhyam | asi
ddhiriti | gakārādiṣu svābhāvikaviruddhadharmābhāvāt | na hīti | nanvevaṃ
svābhāvikasyaikyasya kadāpyavighātaścedākāśe ghaṭādyupādhitopi bhedo na syāditi
cet — iṣṭāpattirevetyāha — mā bhūditi | ākāśasya ghaṭādyupādhibhedādapi bhedo
nāstyeva | aupādhiko bheda iti pravādasya tūpādhirbhinna ityarthe paryavasānaṃ
bodhyam | nanu gakārādivyaktyaikyeyaṃ gakāraḥ somaśarmaṇādhītoyaṃ cendraśarmaṇeti
mitho vyāvṛttapratyayaḥ kathamupapadyata ityata āha — tatra vyāvṛtteti | nādani
dānaḥ | vyañjakadhvanimūlakaḥ | prayojanaṃ tviti | gakārādivyaktyaikyāttatra
gatvādijātirnāstyeva | ekavyaktivṛttikatvādyathākāśe | ghaṭatvādijātīnāṃ
prayojanaṃ tu ghaṭoyaṃ ghaṭoyamityākārapratyayajananam | taccātra gakārādivyaktyai
kyādeva labdhaṃ bhavati | yacca tāro gakāro mando gakāra ityākārakabhedapratī
tirūpaṃ vyaktinānātvaprayojanaṃ tadvyaktivyañjakanādebhya eva sidhyati | tathā ca
gatvādijātiviṣayiṇī buddhirvṛthaivetyarthaḥ | pratyabhijñā | soyaṃ gakāra ityākā
rikā | niravagrahā | nirbādhā |

asiddheriti | mīmāṃsakā hi varṇātmakasya śabdasya dravyatvamicchanti |
madhvamatānuyāyinopi kakārādīnāṃ dravyatvamāhuḥ | tathā ca śabdasya guṇatvameva
nāsti kuta indriyagrāhyaviśeṣaguṇatvamiti pakṣabhūte śabde hetoravṛttyā svarūpā
siddho hetuḥ śabdo guṇaścākṣuṣatvāditivat | dhvanyātmakaśabdasyānityatvānumānaṃ
tu niṣphalam | tasyāsmanmatepi siddhatvena sādhanānapekṣatvāt | aśrāvaṇa
tveti | upādhisvarūpaṃ prāguktam da. 1 paṃ. 93 | yatrānityatvaṃ tatrāśrā
vaṇatvaṃ yathā ghaṭādāviti sādhyavyāpakatā | yatrendriyagrāhyaviśeṣaguṇatvaṃ tatrā
śrāvaṇatvamiti na niyamaḥ | śabda eva vyabhicārāditi sādhanāvyāpakatvam |
tathā cāśrāvaṇatvarūpopādhisattvātsopādhiko heturvyāpyatvāsiddha iti bhāvaḥ |
śabdānityatvavādyudayanācāryoktimanuvadati — udayanastviti | itthaṃ hi tanma
tam — anityaḥ śabdaḥ | tadutpattivināśayoḥ pratyakṣasiddhatvāt | utpannaḥ śabda
iti vyavahāraḥ śabdotpattipratyakṣamūlakaḥ | tathā nivṛttaḥ kolāhala iti vyava
hāraḥ śabdavināśapratyakṣamūlakaḥ | nanu śabdavināśasya pradhvaṃsābhāvarūpasya kathaṃ
pratyakṣam | abhāvapratyakṣaṃ pratyāśrayapratyakṣasya kāraṇatvāt | śabdavināśāśraya
syākāśasyātīndriyatvenāpratyakṣatvāditi cenna | vāyoracākṣuṣatvepi tadgatarūpā
bhāvasya cākṣuṣatvadarśanenoktakāryakāraṇabhāvānabhyupagamāt | sopīti | yathā
vyañjakadhvanirūpopādhigatāstāratvamandatvādayo viruddhā dharmāḥ śabde asantopi
bhāsante tathaiva tadgatāvutpattivināśāvapītyutpannaḥ śabdo nivṛttaḥ kolāhala iti
vyavahāropapattiḥ | yathā dattaṃ raktabaliṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃpādito vetālo na pīḍayati
tathotpannaḥ śabdo nivṛttaḥ kolāhala iti vyavahārasyāsmatkṛtāmupapattiṃ dṛṣṭvā
samāhita udayano na śabdanityatāṃ pīḍayituṃ prabhavatīti bhāva; | yo hi
nityatva iti | nityasya nānāvidhasya śabdasya pratyekaṃ vyāpitve vyañjakadhva
ninā sarvaśabdopalabdhiḥ syāt | avyāpitve yatra yo nāsti tasya tatra vyañja
kenāpyupalabdhirna syāt | paraṃ tu nāyaṃ doṣaḥ | vyañjakena dhvaninā yo yatra saṃskri
yate tasyaiva tatropalambhābhyupagamāt | yugapaditi | śabdānāṃ vyāpakatvātsarve
śabdā yugapadeva śrotrendriyeṇa saṃbaddhā iti teṣāṃ madhyemuka eva vyañjakadhvaninā
saṃskriyata iti niyamo na saṃbhavati | tathā cānumānam — śabdaviśeṣo na
niyatasaṃskārakasaṃskārya itaraiḥ saha saṃbandhāviśeṣāt | paraṃ tu nāyaṃ saddhetuḥ |
sarveṣāṃ jīvātmanāṃ vibhutvātsarvatra sattvepi cākṣuṣādijñānakāla ekasyaivātmavi
śeṣasya saṃskāryatvadarśanāt |

atha prāmāṇyavādamārabhate — syādetaditi | pramāṇatveti | pramāṇānāṃ
yathārthānubhavānāṃ bhāvaḥ prāmāṇyam | etadeva pramātvam | pramāśabdena yathārthā
nubhavasyaiva vyapadeśāt | tathā ca yathārthānubhavaniṣṭho dharmaviśeṣaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ
pramātvaṃ pramāṇatvamiti cocyate | evamayathārthānubhavaniṣṭho dharmaviśeṣo'prāmāṇya
mapramātvamapramāṇatvamiti cocyate | tatkāraṇaviṣaye yo vādaḥ sa prāmāṇya
vādaḥ | sa dvividhaḥ | janakakāraṇaviṣayako jñāpakakāraṇaviṣayakaśca | prāmā
ṇyasya kāraṇaṃ ca svayamanyadveti saṃśayo vādabījam | tatra svayamityanena prāmāṇyaṃ
tadāśrayībhūtaṃ jñānaṃ tatkāraṇasāmagrī ca gṛhyate | etattritayātiriktamanyapadena
gṛhyate | evamaprāmāṇyaviṣayepi svaparapadayorartha ūhyaḥ | tatra pramāṇatvāpramāṇa
tvayordvayorapi kāraṇaṃ svayameveti sāṃkhyamatam | dvayorapi kāraṇamanyaditi naiyāyi
kamatam | pramāṇatvasya kāraṇamanyadapramāṇatvasya tu svayameveti saugatānāṃ
matam | saugatā bauddhāḥ | pramāṇatvasya kāraṇaṃ svayamapramāṇatvasya tvanyaditi
mīmāṃsakamatam | vedavādina iti | etaduttarānvayi |

atha parataḥprāmāṇyavādināṃ mataṃ pūrvapakṣatvenotthāpayati — kiṃ ca kimi
damiti | jñānagataḥ prāmāṇyarūpo yo dharmaḥ sa kiṃ svayaṃ svasmādevotpadyata
uta svāśrayībhūtajñānādutpadyatetha vā svāśrayībhūtajñānakāraṇādutpadyata iti
pakṣatrayam | jñānasya yāni sādhāraṇāni kāraṇāni tasmādutpanno yo jñānaviśeṣa
stadvṛttitvaṃ prāmāṇyasyeti caturthaḥ pakṣaḥ | jñānasya yāni sādhāraṇāni kāraṇāni
tanmātrādutpanno yo jñānaviśeṣastadvṛttitvaṃ prāmāṇyasyeti pañcamaḥ pakṣaḥ |
sāvadyaḥ | nindyaḥ | dravyatvāpātāditi | taduktam —

samavāyikāraṇatvaṃ dravyasyaiveti vijñeyam | bhā. pa. 23 iti |
jñānaṃ tvātmano guṇa iti na sa kadāpi kasyāpi samavāyikāraṇaṃ bhavatīti
bhāvaḥ | prāmāṇyasyeti | prāmāṇyaṃ hi pramāṇabhūtānekajñānavṛttiḥ sarvānugato
dharmaviśeṣaḥ | īdṛśo dharmaḥ sāmānyamityucyate | jātyupādhibhedena sāmānyasya
dvaividhyaṃ tarkakaumudyāmuktam | tatra prāmāṇyasya jātitve tasya nityatvānna janma
saṃbhavaḥ | yadi ca pratyakṣatvādibhiḥ sāṃkaryātprāmāṇyaṃ na jātirityucyate
tadā tasyopādhisvarūpatvam | upādhiśca sakhaṇḍākhaṇḍabhedena dvividhaḥ | tatra
prāmāṇyasyākhaṇḍopādhisvarūpatve nityatvameva | sakhaṇḍopādhestu yathāyathaṃ
dravyādyanyatamasvarūpatvātkvacinnityatvaṃ kvacidanityatvam | yathā pṛthivītvādinā
sāṃkaryāccharīratvaṃ na jātiḥ | kiṃ tūpādhiḥ | tathā ca śarīre yacceṣṭā
śrayatvaṃ tadeva śarīratvaṃ nānyat | ceṣṭāśrayasya bhāvaśceṣṭāśrayatvam | tacca ceṣṭāsvarū
pameva | prakṛtijanyabodhe prakāro bhāva iti vaiyākaraṇasiddhāntāt | ceṣṭā ca
hitāhitaprāptiparihārārthā kriyā | evaṃ ca śarīratvasya kriyārūpopādhisvarūpa
tvenānityatvam | atra tu prāmāṇyaṃ yathārthānubhavatvamityuktameva | yathārthānubha
vatvaṃ cānubhavaniṣṭhaṃ yāthārthyam | anubhavaśca smṛtibhinnaṃ jñānam | tasya yāthārthyaṃ
ca bādhātyantābhāvaḥ | bādhitaṃ hi jñānamayathārthaṃ bhavati | tathā cānubhavātmaka
jñānasya yo bādhātyantābhāvaḥ sa evātropādhiḥ | atastādṛśabādhātyantābhāvarūpameva
prāmāṇyam | atyantābhāvaśca nitya eveti nopādhirūpatvepi prāmāṇyasyotpattiḥ
saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ | etaduttaraṃ ca prathamadvitīyapakṣayorapi bodhyam | ata eva |
nityatvādeva | jñānaviśeṣa iti | yathā vastutaḥ śuktau satyāṃ tatra kācādidoṣa
dūṣitendriyasya jāyamānamidaṃ rajatamityākārakamayathārthaṃ jñānam | etacca jñāna
sāmānyasāmagrījanyaṃ bhavatyeva | jñānasya sāmānyasāmagrī hīndriyaprakāśādikā |
idaṃ rajatamityuktāyathārthajñāne ca yadyapi duṣṭānīndriyāṇi kāraṇāni bhavanti
tathāpi tānīndriyatvaṃ nātikrāmantyeveti jñānasāmānyasāmagrījanyatvaṃ na
vihanyate | yathā vṛkṣasya sāmānyakāraṇaṃ mṛjjalādisahakṛtaṃ bījam | vṛkṣaviśeṣa
bhūtāyāḥ śiṃśapāyāstu tādṛśo bījaviśeṣaḥ | sa ca bījaviśeṣopi bījameva |
yadi bījaṃ na bhavettarhi vṛkṣaviśeṣotpattirbījaṃ vinaivetyākasmikī svīkartavyā
syāt | tathā coktamayathārthajñānaṃ jñānasāmānyasāmagrījanyo jñānaviśeṣaḥ | tadā
śritaṃ cāprāmāṇyamityaprāmāṇye prāmāṇyalakṣaṇaprasaktyātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ |
yadyapyayathārthaṃ jñānaṃ jñānasāmānyasāmagrījanyaṃ bhavati tathāpi doṣasyādhikasya
tatra kāraṇatvena jñānasāmānyasāmagrīmātrajanyaṃ na bhavatītyetadabhiprāyeṇa mātra
padaghaṭitatvena pañcamapakṣasyotthānam | kiṃ doṣābhāveti | yathā ayathārthajñāna
sthale sāmānyasāmagryapekṣayādhikasya doṣarūpakāraṇasya sattvena mātrapadena vyā
vṛttiḥ kṛtā tathā yathārthajñānasthale sāmānyasāmagryapekṣayā adhikasya doṣābhāva
rūpakāraṇasya sattvena mātrapadena tatra vyāvṛttirna kriyatetha vā kriyata iti
vikalpaḥ | tatra mātrapadena yadi vyāvṛttiḥ kriyate tarhi prāmāṇyalakṣaṇasya na
kimapyudāharaṇamityasaṃbhava eva syādato na doṣābhāvasya vyāvṛttirityabhiprāye
ṇādyapakṣotthitiḥ | yathārthajñāne doṣābhāvasya kāraṇatvameva nāstītyatastasya vyāvṛ
ttāvapi na kṣatirityabhiprāyeṇa dvitīyapakṣasyotthitiḥ | nāpi dvitīya iti |
yathārthajñāne doṣābhāvasya na kāraṇatvamiti yaducyate tatkiṃ jñānaṃ janayatāmindri
yādīnāṃ doṣābhāvaḥ kevalaṃ sāhāyyaṃ karoti na tu pārthakyena tasya jñānaṃ prati
kāraṇatvamityabhiprāyeṇātha vā niḥsvarūpasyābhāvasya na kvāpi kāraṇatvamityabhiprā
yeṇa | ādya āha — doṣābhāvasahakṛtatveneti | sati doṣābhāve yathārthajñāno
tpattirasati netyanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ yathārthajñānaṃ prati doṣābhāvasya kāraṇatā
durnivāreti bhāvaḥ | dvitīya āha — abhāva iti | athāstīti | kāryatva
miti śeṣaḥ | bhāvo yatheti | abhāvasya niḥsvarūpatvāttasya samavāyikāraṇatvaṃ
na saṃbhavatīti cenmābhūnnāma | nimittakāraṇatvaṃ tu tasya svīkāryameva |
bādhakābhāvāt | evaṃ pañcabhirapi prakāraiḥ svataḥprāmāṇyasya nirvaktumaśakyata
yārthādeva parataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ svīkāryaṃ bhavati | tatrānumānamapi pramāṇamityāha —
tathā ceti | prāmāṇyaṃ yathārthajñānatvam | ayaṃ pakṣanirdeśaḥ | jñānasāmānyakā
raṇavyatirikto hetuśca doṣābhāvarūpaḥ | tadadhīnatvaṃ sādhyam | kāryatve sati
jñānaviśeṣāśritatvaṃ hetuḥ | evaṃ prāmāṇyasyotpattau paratastvaṃ prasādhya jñaptau
paratastvamanumānena sādhayati — prāmāṇyamiti | parata iti | na tu jñāna
jñāpakasāmagrīmātrādeva | jñānaṃ yena jñāyate tanmātrādeva na tādṛśajñānagataṃ
prāmāṇyaṃ jñāyate | tathā hi — pūrvamadṛṣṭena pathā gacchataḥ kasyaciddūrata idaṃ jalamiti
jñāne jāte satīdaṃ jñānaṃ pramā na veti saṃśayo bhavati | paścātsaṃnihitaṃ gatasya tasya
jalopalambhānantaraṃ pūrvamutpannaṃ jalajñānaṃ pramā phalavatpravṛttijanakatvāt | yanna
pramā na tatphalavatpravṛttijanakaṃ yathā aprametyanumānena prāmāṇyaṃ jñāyate | yadi
prāmāṇyaṃ jñānajñāpakasāmagryaiva jñāyeta tadā jñānotpattyanantaramevāntarapratyakṣeṇa
jñānasya jñātatvāttadgataprāmāṇyasyāpi tadānīmeva | jñātatvātsaṃśayotpattirna syā
diti bhāvaḥ | pūtikūṣmāṇḍaṃ śaśaśṛṅgādirivāsaṃbhavī padārthaḥ |

tadetaditi | ākāśasya muṣṭyā hananaṃ yathā na saṃbhavati tathaivaitatpūrvapakṣi
kṛtaṃ svataḥprāmāṇyadūṣaṇodbhāvanaṃ na saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ | tadatiriktajanyā na bhava
tīti | jñānasāmānyasāmagrīta eva jñānaviśeṣasya pramārūpasyotpattirna tu tatrā
dhikasya guṇasya doṣābhāvasya vā hetutvam | doṣastu pramāpratibandhaka iti
mīmāṃsakamatam | ghaṭādipramāvaditi | pakṣaikadeśopi sādhyavattvena niścitaśce
ddṛṣṭāntatvenopādeyo bhavatyeva | audayanam | udayanena proktam | prameti |
doṣāpekṣayātiriktastathā jñānasāmānyahetubhyaśca yotiriktastajjanyatvābhāvaḥ
sādhyaḥ | doṣavyatirikteti padānuktāvapramājñānasya jñānahetvatiriktadoṣajanyatvena
dṛṣṭāntatā na syādatastaduktiḥ | pratisādhanaṃ sādhyābhāvasādhakaṃ hetvantaram |
tadrūpeṇa graheṇa grastamudayanoktamanumānam | tathā ca satpratipakṣa ityāśayaḥ |
doṣābhāvasyāprameti | yathā ghaṭaṃ prati niyatapūrvavṛttyapi daṇḍatvaṃ daṇḍarūpaṃ ca
na ghaṭakāraṇamucyate | tasya kāraṇatvābhāve kutaḥ pūrvavṛttitvaniyama iti cedda
ṇḍasya ghaṭakāraṇatvenābhimatasya daṇḍatvena rūpeṇa ca vināvasthātumaśakyatvāt |
atastadanyathāsiddham | tathā pramājñānaṃ prati niyatapūrvavṛttirapi doṣābhāvo na
pramājñānakāraṇam | tasya pūrvavṛttitvaniyamastu doṣasyāpramāhetutvena doṣasattve
pramotpattirna syāditi | tathā ca pramājñānasthale niyatapūrvavṛttinā doṣābhāvenā
pramājñānasya pratibandhaḥ kṛta ityeva na tu tasya kaścana pramājñānotpādanopayogī
vyāpāraḥ | tathā ca doṣābhāvasya pramājñānaṃ prati na kāraṇatvaṃ kiṃ tvanyathāsi
ddhatvamiti | nanu pramājñānaṃ prati guṇasya kāraṇatvānaṅgīkāre kṛtaṃ guṇe
netyata āha — tasmāditi | guṇebhyo hi doṣāṇāmabhāvo jāyate | doṣābhā
vācca saṃśayaviparyayayorasaṃbhavena dviprakārakamapyaprāmāṇyaṃ notpadyate | aprāmā
ṇyābhāve cotsargabhūtaṃ prāmāṇyamanapoditameva bhavati | apavādābhāva utsarga
vyavasthiteḥ | tenotsargo nayoditaḥ iti pāṭhepavādābhāve utsargo nayenaiva
svabhāvata evodito bhavati na tu tadudayārthaṃ kasyacidapekṣetyarthaḥ | etanmūlaka eva
guṇasya doṣābhāvasya vā prāmāṇyaṃ prati hetutvamiti bhramonyeṣāmiti bhāvaḥ |

evaṃ prāmāṇyasyotpattau svatastvamabhidhāya jñaptāvapi svatastvaṃ sādhayati —
tatheti | pramājñaptiḥ prāmāṇyasya jñānam | prāmāṇyāśrayībhūtaṃ jñānaṃ yayā sādha
nasāmagryā jñāyate tayaiva tadgataṃ prāmāṇyaṃ jñāyate na tu tatotiriktasyānumānāde
rapekṣeti bhāvaḥ | tadupapatteriti | saṃśayopapatterityarthaḥ | tathā ca prāmāṇyajñānaṃ
prati doṣādayaḥ pratibandhakā iti tātparyam | tāvakam | tvadīyam | prāgukta
da. 12 paṃ. 250 mudayanaproktaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ parata iti | anaikāntikateti |
prāmāṇyasya parato grāhyatvaniyamastvadabhimato vyabhicarita ityarthaḥ | dura
vasthā syāditi | tathā ca svataḥprāmāṇyameva svīkāryamiti bhāvaḥ | kiṃ ca
suvarṇarajatādīṣṭasādhanavastudarśane dṛṣṭamātra eva tadānayanārthaṃ sadyo dhāvati |
na tu madhyenumānādinā tādṛśajñānaprāmāṇyaniścayaḥ kriyamāṇonubhūyate |
parataḥ prāmāṇye tu jhaṭiti pravṛttirna syāt |

naiyāyikāstu na sarvatra pravṛttirjñānaprāmāṇyaniścayamapekṣate | kiṃ tu tādṛśa
sthale prāmāṇyaniścayaṃ vinaiva pravṛttiḥ | anubhavopi tathaivetyāhuḥ | tadetanmata
manūdya dūṣayati — yadatreti | tatprācuryaṃ ceti | pravṛttiprācuryaṃ kartṛbhūtamicchā
prācuryamapekṣate | yathāyathecchā balavatī syāttathā tathā tadanusāreṇa pravṛttirapi
balavatī bhavati | śaighryeṇeti yāvat | iṣṭasādhanatājñānamiti | apekṣata iti
saṃbadhyate | evamagrepyapekṣata ityasya saṃbandho bodhyaḥ | nirvicikitsā |
saṃśayarahitā | niściteti yāvat | yadi saṃśayājjāyamānāyāḥ pravṛtterekamapyudā
haraṇaṃ niścitaṃ bhavettarhi sarvatra tathātvasaṃbhavātprāmāṇyaniścayo vṛthā syāt | tathā
ca na saṃśayātkvacidapi pravṛttiḥ | aniścite vastuni sattvasyaiva durlabhatvāt |
tasmāditi | sadvastubodhakatvena buddheḥ prāmāṇyam | arthasya śuktyāderyadanyathātvaṃ
rajjatarūpeṇāvabhāsanaṃ taddhetoḥ sakāśādutpannaṃ yaddoṣajñānaṃ tasmāttatprāmāṇyamapo
dyata ityarthaḥ |

vidhyarthavādeti | tatrājñātārthajñāpako vedabhāgo vidhiḥ | yathāgnihotraṃ juhu
yātsvargakāmaḥ | ayaṃ ca mānāntareṇāprāptasvargaprayojanavaddhomaṃ vidhatte | agniho
trahomena svargaṃ bhāvayediti vākyārthaḥ | prāśastyanindānyataraparaṃ vākyamarthavādaḥ |
yathā vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā tai. saṃ. 2 | 1 | 1 iti | ayaṃ cārthavādo vāyude
vatāstutidvārā vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta tai. saṃ. 2 | 1 | 1 iti vidheḥ prāśastyaṃ
bodhayati | yathā ca sorodīttadrudrasya rudratvam tai. saṃ. 1 | 5 | 1 iti | ayaṃ
cārthavādo rodanādrajatotpattibodhanadvārā barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyamiti niṣedhopayo
ginīṃ rajatanindāṃ bodhayati | prayogasamavetārthasmārako vedabhāgo mantraḥ | yathā
syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi tai. brā. 3 | 6 iti | puroḍāśasya sukhakarāsanakaraṇa
rūpārthaprakāśanadvārāsya yajñādikarmaṇyupayogaḥ | arthaśca mantraireva smartavyo na prakā
rāntareṇeti niyamāśrayaṇānmantrāmnānaṃ na vyartham | udbhidā yajetetyādāvudbhidā
dayaḥ śabdā yāgaviśeṣanāmadheyabhūtāḥ | bhāvanāmabhidhatta iti | tapratyayo hi
pāṇininā vidhyarthakatvena vidhīyate | vidhiśca śābdī bhāvanaiveti kumārilabhaṭṭā
cāryamatam | ārthī bhāvanāpi tapratyayavācyaiva | bhāvanādvayasvarūpaṃ tayoḥ saṃba
ndhaśca prāguktaḥ pṛ. 264 pa. 24 | yajetetyatra prakṛtiryajadhātuḥ | tadartho yāgaḥ |
tādṛśayāgaviṣayiṇī pravṛttirārthī bhāvanā | tādṛśārthabhāvanāphalikā śābdī
bhāvanā śrutikartṛkapreraṇārūpetyarthaḥ | siddhe vyutpattimiti | itthaṃ hi prabhā
karagurūṇāṃ matam | vṛddhavyavahāro hi śaktigrāhakaśiromaṇibhūtaḥ | tasmājjāya
māno gavādipadānāṃ śaktigrahaḥ kāryānvita eva gavādyarthe na tu kevale | nāpī
tarānvitamātre | vidhiviṣayabhūtānayanakriyānvitāṃ gāṃ dṛṣṭvaiva śaktigrahasya
jāyamānatvāt | vidhiśca na śābdī bhāvanā | kiṃ tu niyogaḥ | kasyacitkvaci
tkarmaṇi viniyoga iti yāvat | tādṛśavidhiviṣayībhūtānayanakriyāyāṃ nīdhātoḥ
śaktiḥ | tādṛśānayanakriyānviteṣu gavādyartheṣu gavādipadānāṃ śaktiḥ | tathā ca
sarveṣāṃ padānāṃ kāryānviterthe śaktiḥ siddhā | siddhavākyeṣu tu kāryāṃśā
bhāvena sarvatrāgatyā lakṣaṇāśrayaṇīyā bhavatu nāmeti | paraṃ tvetatkumārilabhaṭṭā
cāryā na sahante | prathamataḥ kāryānvite śaktigrahepi paścātkāryāṃśatyāga eva |
sarvatra siddhavākyeṣu lakṣaṇāśrayaṇaṃ tu kliṣṭam | agatyā svīkartavyetyapi na |
tajjñānāmapi siddhavākyeṣu sarvatra lakṣaṇāyā buddhāvanārohāt | lakṣaṇāhetormukhyā
rthabādhāderapyananubhavāt | kāryāṃśatyāgavatpaścādanvayāṃśasyāpi tyāga eva |
ākāṅkṣāyogyatādivaśena tadupasthityā tasyānyalabhyatvāt | ananyalabhyasyaiva
śabdārthatvāditi | abhihiteti | anvayāṃśarahitā eva śabdaiḥ svārthā abhidhī
yante | abhihitānāṃ ca teṣāmākāṅkṣādivaśādanvayo bhavatītyevaṃvādināmi
tyarthaḥ | niyogamiti | tapratyayobhidhatte iti saṃbadhyate | anviteti |
anvitamevārthaṃ śabdobhidhatta iti vādināmityarthaḥ ||

div.head: atha pāṇinidarśanam || 13 ||
div.p:
prakṛtibhāga iti | yasmātpratyayo vidhīyate sa prakṛtibhāgaḥ | yathā rāmaḥ
iti pade rāmeti prakṛtiḥ | visargaḥ pratyayaḥ | rāmeti prātipadike ca ramadhātuḥ
prakṛtiḥ | akāraḥ pratyayaḥ | evaṃ kriyāpadepyūhyam | pīteti | patañjalinā
proktaṃ pātañjalaṃ vyākaraṇamahābhāṣyam | tadrūpaṃ jalaṃ yaiḥ pītaṃ teṣāṃ kṛtavyākaraṇa
mahābhāṣyādhyayanānāmityarthaḥ | mahābhāṣyakārasyeti | etacca vākyaṃ yadyapi
bhagavatā patañjalinā vyākhyātaṃ tathāpi tadanyasyeti na bhramitavyam | kiṃ tu
svasyaiva vākyaṃ svenaiva vyākhyātam | tathā ca bhāṣyalakṣaṇam —

sūtrārtho varṇyate yatra vākyaiḥ sūtrānusāribhiḥ |
svapadāni ca varṇyante bhāṣyaṃ bhāṣyavido viduḥ || iti |
kaiyaṭenāpi tatraivamuktam — svavākyaṃ vyākhyātuṃ tadavayavamathaśabdaṃ tāvadvyācaṣṭa
iti | prastūyate na veti | prastūyate prārabhyate | śabdānuśāsanamityetāvaduktau
vākyaparipūrtisaṃpādanāyānvayayogyakriyāpadamavaśyamadhyāhāryaṃ bhavati | tacca
kiṃ prastūyate ityatha vānyatkiṃcitstūyata ityādikamiti saṃdeho bhavati | atha
śabdaprayoge tu tasya prārambhārthakatvāttadānuguṇyena prastūyata ityasyaiva kriyāpadasyā
dhyāhāro bhavati | yadyapi stūyata ityādyadhyāhāreṇa vākyaparipūrtiranvayaśca saṃbhavati
tathāpyathaśabdārthatvena prārambhaṇakriyātropasthitā bhavati na tu stavanādiketi na
tadvācakakriyāpadādhyāhāraḥ | śabdānuśāsanaśabdasya vyutpattipradarśanapūrvakaṃ tasya
vyākaraṇārthakatvaṃ sādhayati — anena hīti | śabdā anuśiṣyanteneneti
śabdānuśāsanaṃ vyākaraṇaśāstram | tadupakāriṇa iti | arthaprakāśanadvāreti
bhāvaḥ | vṛddhavyavahārādibhiḥ śaktigrāhakapramāṇairloke śabdaśaktimavadhārya tada
nusāreṇa

lokāvagatasāmarthyaḥ śabdo vedepi bodhakaḥ |
iti nyāyena vaidikaśabdārthabodhane pravṛtteḥ | lokāvalokitāṃ padaśaktiṃ padā
rthayogyatāṃ ca svīkṛtyaiva vedasya pracārāt |

paryanuyuñjata iti | paryanuyogaḥ praśnaḥ | pṛcchantītyarthaḥ | itthaṃ hi
praṣṭurabhiprāyaḥ — kartṛkarmaṇorubhayoḥ prasaṅge karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī bhavatītyubhayaprāptāviti
sūtrārthaḥ | yadyapyatha śabdānuśāsanamiti vākye śabdasya karmaṇa evopādānaṃ na tu
karturācāryasya tathāpi dhātoḥ sakarmakatvenobhayoḥ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ prasaṅgostyevetya
nena sūtreṇa śabdānāmiti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī | tasyāṃ ca satyāṃ karmaṇi ca pā. sū.
2 | 2 | 14 iti sūtreṇa samāso niṣidhyate | tatra caśabdasyetiśabdārthakatvātka
rmaṇīti śabdamuccārya vihitā ṣaṣṭhītyartho labhyate | sā cobhayaprāptau karmaṇīti
sūtreṇa vihitā | tathā caitatsūtreṇa yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra tadantasya na ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣa
samāsa iti karmaṇi ceti sūtrasyārthaḥ | tathā ca śabdānāmanuśāsanamiti
vyastaṃ prayoktavyaṃ na tu samastamiti | yasminniti | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ — ubhayaprāptā
viti sūtre kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kṛti pā. sū. 2 | 3 | 65 iti pūrvasūtrātkṛtītyanuvartate |
tasyobhayaprāptāviti viśeṣaṇam | ubhayoḥ prāptiryasminkṛtpratyaye iti vyadhikaraṇa
bahuvrīhiḥ | kartṛkarmaṇorubhayorarthayoḥ ṣaṣṭhyāḥ prāptiścobhayoḥ prayoge satyeva saṃbha
vati | tathā ca yatra tātparyārthānusāreṇāvaśyaka ubhayoḥ prayogastatrobhayorarthayoḥ
ṣaṣṭhyāḥ prāptau karmaṇyeva ṣaṣṭhī na tu kartarītyanena sūtreṇa niyamyate | āścaryo gavā
mityudāharaṇam | tatra hyāścaryaṃ pratipādyam | tacca yadyaśikṣito dogdhā durdohā
gāvaśca dogdhavyāstadaiva nirvahati nānyathā | atastatrāgopeneti kartṛpadamavaśyaṃ
prayoktavyaṃ bhavati | ataḥ kartṛkarmaṇorviśiṣyopādānādastyubhayaprāptiḥ | idhmeti |
karmaṣaṣṭhyantedhmaśabdasya pravraścanaśabdena saha ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣaḥ | evaṃ palāśaśātana
śabdopi | athobhayaprāptāviti sūtre bahuvrīhibalādubhayoḥ prayoga ityarthalābhe
pyāvaśyakatvārthe na pramāṇam | tathā cānāvaśyakasthalepi dvayoḥ prayoge sati
tasya pravṛttiriti mataṃ tadātrācāryapadādhyāhāreṇobhayaprāptisattvādasya pravṛttau
samāsānupapattiriti cet — tatra samādhānāntaramāha — kartaryapīti | apinā
karmaṇi | kecidaviśeṣeṇeti | ubhayaprāptāviti niyamasyāpavādabhūtaṃ vacanaṃ tatra
paṭhyate — strīpratyayayorakākārayornāyaṃ niyama iti | bhedikā bibhitsā vā
rudrasya jagata ityudāharaṇam | bhediketyatra bhidadhātorbhāve akapratyayaḥ |
bibhitsetyatra bibhitseti sanpratyayāntādbhidadhātorbhāve akārapratyayaḥ | anayośca
striyāṃ ktin pā0 sū. 3 | 3 | 94 ityadhikāre vihitatvātstrīpratyayatvam | atra
karmaṇyeveti niyamābhāvājjagata iti karmaṇi rudrasyeti kartari ca ṣaṣṭhī bhavati |
apavādabhūtaṃ dvitīyaṃ vacanaṃ ca śeṣe vibhāṣeti | strīpratyaya iti saṃbadhyate | akā
kāravyatiriktastrīpratyayepyubhayaprāptāviti niyamo nāsti | dvayorapi ṣaṣṭhī | tatra ka
rtari ṣaṣṭhī vikalpena bhavatītyarthaḥ | vicitrā jagataḥ kṛtirharerhariṇā vetyudāharaṇam |
atra dvitīyavacane strīpratyaya ityasya saṃbandhaṃ kecinna kurvanti | kiṃ tvaviśeṣeṇā
kākāravyatirikte bhāvapratyayamātre vikalpaṃ vadantaḥ śabdānāmanuśāsanamācārye
ṇācāryasya vetyatra kartṛvācakādācāryapadātṣaṣṭhīvikalpamicchanti | tathā cobhaya
prāptāviti niyamāprāptyā samāsaniṣedho na bhavati | atha veti | ṣaṣṭhī śeṣe
pā0 sū. 2 | 3 | 50 iti hi sūtram | kārakaprātipadikārthavyatiriktaḥ
svasvāmibhāvādiḥ saṃbandhaḥ śeṣastatra ṣaṣṭhī bhavatīti tadarthaḥ | yathā rājñaḥ puruṣa
iti | vastutaḥ karmādīnāmapi karmatvādibhiravivakṣāyāmanena ṣaṣṭhī yathā grāmasya
gacchatīti | iyameva śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhīti vyavahriyate | tathā cātra śabdasya
karmatvenāvivakṣayobhayaprāptāviti niyamāpravṛttyā na samāsaniṣedhaḥ | ānartha
kyamiti | satyapi samāsaniṣedhavidhāyake śāstre gavāṃ doha ityatra yadi
karmatvasyāvivakṣayā gavāmiti śeṣe ṣaṣṭhī kriyate tarhi samāse godoha
iti prāpnotyeveti kiṃ samāsaniṣedheneti | svaracintāyāmiti | godoha
ityatra śeṣaṣaṣṭhyā samāse samāsasya pā0 sū. 6 | 1 | 223 iti sūtreṇānto
dātto bhavati | etadapavādabhūtaṃ gatikārakopapadātkṛt pā0 sū. 6 | 2 | 139
iti tu na pravartate | pūrvapadasya gatyādyanyatamatvābhāvāt | satopi karma
kārakasya goḥ karmatvenāvivakṣitatvāt | gateḥ kārakādupapadācca parībhūtasya
kṛdantasyottarapadasya prakṛtisvaro bhavatīti tadarthaḥ | samāsaniṣedhābhāve tu
karmaṣaṣṭhyantasyāpi gopadasya dohaśabdena saha samāsaḥ syāt | tatra ca pūrva
padasya kārakatvādanena sūtreṇa doha ityuttarapadasya prakṛtisvaraḥ syāt | doha
iti ghañpratyayāntaṃ ñityādirnityam pā0 sū. 6 | 1 | 197 iti sūtre
ṇādyudāttam | gatikārakopapadātkṛditi prakṛtisvareṇa tasyaivāvasthāne go̲
dohaḥ! iti madhyodāttaṃ samastaṃ padaṃ syāt | tacca neṣyate | ataḥ samāsa
niṣedha āvaśyakaḥ | yatheṣṭamiti | lokairvākyaprayogakāle prāyaḥ svarānādara
ṇāt | viśeṣoktiriti | svaraviśeṣamātroddeśena kṛtāta eva laukikaśabdeṣva
nupayuktā samāsaniṣedhaśāstrādikā viśeṣoktirvaidikeṣu śabdeṣu pravartatām |
anena prakāreṇaiva teṣāṃ sūtrāṇāṃ sāphalyaṃ bhavati | yatosau pāṇinistṛjakābhyāṃ
kartari pā0 sū. 2 | 2 | 15 iti samāsaniṣedhaṃ kurvannapi svayameva janikartuḥ
pā0 sū. 1 | 4 | 30 tatprayojakaḥ pā0 sū. 1 | 4 | 55 ityevaṃ samastaṃ
padaṃ nirdiśati | evaṃ nirdiśanpāṇiniḥ samāsaniṣedhaśāstrāṇi na tādṛśasthale
samastapadasyāsādhutvabodhanārthaṃ kṛtāni kiṃ tu kevalaṃ svaraviśeṣasiddhyarthameveti
dhvanayati |

śaṅkate — tasyārthasyeti | vyākaraṇarūpasyārthasya vyākaraṇaśabdādyathā śīghraṃ
pratipattirbhavenna tathā śabdānuśāsanaśabdāditi vilambenārthopasthāpakamadhikākṣaraṃ
ca śabdānuśāsanamiti nirarthakamabhihitamiti śaṅkāśayaḥ | tadīyeti |
vyākaraṇaśāstrasya hi vaidikaśabdārthabodhakatvena vedāṅgatvam | sa ca vyākaraṇa
śāstragataḥ śabdārthabodhakatvarūpo dharmaḥ śabdānuśāsanaśabdātpratīyate na vyāka
raṇaśabdamātrāt | śabdānāmidaṃ vyākaraṇamiti nirṇayasya tāvanmātrādalā
bhāt | anupapatteriti | vidhivaśātṣaḍaṅgavedādhyayane pravṛttirbhavatu nāma |
paraṃ tu yāvadvyākaraṇasya vedāṅgatvaṃ nāvagataṃ tāvattatra pravṛttirdurlabhaiva bhavediti
bhāvaḥ | tarhīti | saṃskāraḥ prakṛtipratyayavyutpādanam | pratyavāyaḥ pāpam |
anadhītavyākaraṇaśāstrāṇāṃ prakṛtipratyayavyutpādanapūrvakaṃ śabdārthajñānābhāvena te
kadācidaśvaśabdasthāne asvaśabdamityevamapaśabdānapi prayuñjīran | apaśabdapra
yogācca teṣāṃ pāpabhāktvaṃ syāt | prāyaścittīyāmiti |

prāyaḥ pāpamiti proktaṃ cittaṃ tasya viśodhanam |
prāyaścittaśabdāttasmai hitam pā0 sū. 5 | 1 | 5 iti sūtreṇa prāyaścittāya
hitamityarthe chapratyayaḥ | prāyaścittamastyasyāmityarthe tadasya tadasminsyāditi
pā0 sū0 5 | 1 | 16 iti sūtreṇa vā | sārasvatīṃ sarasvatīdevatākām |
apaśabdaprayogajanyapātakanirasanāya hīyaṃ sārasvatīṣṭirvidhīyate |

pratipadapāṭha iti | rāmakṛṣṇādyekaikaṃ padaṃ paṭhitvā tasya sādhutvaṃ bodhanīya
mityarthaḥ | śabdānāṃ śabdapārāyaṇamiti | vyākaraṇaśāstrarūperthe śabdapā
rāyaṇaśabdo yogarūḍhaḥ | yadyapyanenaiva gamyamānatvātpunaḥ śabdānāmityanupādeyaṃ
tathāpi pratipadapāṭhavihitānāmiti viśeṣaṇābhidhānāya taduktiḥ | yathā —

nirvātapadmodarasodarābhyāṃ vilocanābhyāmavalokayantī | kā. pradī. u. 7
ityatra vilocanābhyāmityuktirnirvātetyādiviśeṣaṇadānāyaiva kṛtā tadvat |
pārāvāptiḥ | pārasyāntasyāvāptiḥ prāptiḥ | adhītīti | adhītirguroḥ sakā
śādgrahaṇam | bodhaḥ punaḥ punarabhyāsena taccintanam | ācaraṇaṃ yajñādau tathānu
ṣṭhānam | pracāraṇaṃ śiṣyebhyodhyāpanam | śaṅkāmupasaṃharati — tasmāditi |
upāyasya pratipadapāṭhasyāsaṃbhavādityāśayaḥ | samādhatte — maivamiti | śabda
pratipattiḥ śabdārthajñānam | tasya pratipadapāṭhaḥ kāraṇamiti kāryakāraṇabhāvo
niścitaścettadā kāraṇāsaṃbhavātkāryasyāsiddhirāpādanīyā syāt | na tu tathā
kāryakāraṇabhāvosmābhiḥ svīkriyata iti bhāvaḥ | tarhi śabdārthajñāne ka upāya
iti cettatrāha — prakṛtyādīti | karmaṇyaṇiti | idaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇam |
karmavācaka upapade dhātoraṇpratyayo bhavatīti sūtrārthaḥ | kumbhaṃ karotīti
kumbhakāraḥ | kāṇḍaṃ lunātīti kāṇḍalāvaḥ | kumbheti karmavācaka upapade kṛdhā
toraṇpratyaye ṇakārasyetsaṃjñāyāṃ lope cāco ñṇiti pā0 sū. 7 | 2 | 115
iti sūtreṇa vṛddhau satyāṃ kumbhakāra iti lakṣyaṃ sidhyati | tadvadeva kāṇḍalāva
iti | evamekenānena śāstreṇānekāni lakṣyāṇi sidhyanti | ātonupasarge
ka iti | idaṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrvasya sāmānyalakṣaṇasyāpavādabhūtam | prādyupasa
rgarahite karmavācaka upapade satyākārāntāddhātoḥ kapratyayo bhavatīti sūtrārthaḥ |
dhānyaṃ dadātīti dhānyadaḥ | dhanaṃ dadātīti dhanadaḥ | atra karmaṇyaṇiti sāmā
nyalakṣaṇasya na pravṛttiḥ | tadapavādabhūtasyāsya viśeṣalakṣaṇasya pravṛtteḥ | evama
nena laghubhūtenopāyena sakalaśabdānāṃ prakṛtipratyayavibhāgavyutpādanapūrvakamarthajñānaṃ
bhavati | kathaṃ tarhi bṛhaspatirindrāya da0 13 pa0 66 ityādinā śabdā
nuśāsanasyāśakyatvamucyata iti cettatrāha — bṛhaspatiriti |

pradhānaṃ ceti | vākyārthajñānakāraṇībhūtasya padapadārthajñānasya vyākaraṇā
dhīnatvāditi bhāvaḥ | phalavāniti | phalaśabdena vākyārthajñānaṃ vivakṣyate |
taduktamiti | vākyapadīye hariṇeti śeṣaḥ | āsannamiti | tasya vedākhyasya
brahmaṇa idaṃ vyākaraṇamāsannaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭataram | sādhutvapratipattiphalakasya svarūpa
saṃskārasya sākṣādupakārakatvāt | tapasāṃ cāndrāyaṇādīnāṃ madhya idamuttamaṃ
tapaḥ | dṛṣṭaphalahetutvāt | budhā vedānāṃ mukhyamaṅgaṃ vyākaraṇamāhurityarthaḥ |
rakṣoheti | prayojanaśabdena prayojakaṃ phalaṃ cocyate | tatrāgamaḥ prayojakaḥ |
rakṣādīni catvāri phalāni | āgamo yathā — brāhmaṇena niṣkāraṇo dharmaḥ ṣaḍaṅgo
vedodhyeyo jñeyaśceti | śrutireṣeti haradattādayaḥ | smṛtiriti tu bhaṭṭācāryāḥ |
tanmata āgamapadenāgamamūlakatvātsmṛterapi grahaṇaṃ bodhyam | kāryatenuṣṭhāpyate
neneti kāraṇaṃ phalam | niṣkāraṇo dṛṣṭaphalābhisaṃdhirahito nitya ityarthaḥ | rakṣā
vedasaṃrakṣaṇam | laukike prayoge kvāpyadṛṣṭāni rūpāṇi veda upalabhyante — devā
iti prayoktavye devāsa iti | ājjaserasuk pā0 sū. 7 | 1 | 50 iti
sūtreṇāsugāgamaḥ | devairiti prayoktavye devebhiriti | bahulaṃ chandasi pā0 sū.
7 | 1 | 10 iti sūtreṇaisādeśābhāvaḥ | ātmaneti prayoktavye tmaneti | mantre
ṣvāṅyāderātmanaḥ pā0 sū0 6 | 4 | 141 iti sūtreṇākārasya lopaḥ |
etānyadṛṣṭapūrvāṇi rūpāṇyupalabhya vyākaraṇānabhijñaḥ kadācidbhrameṇa prāmādika
tvaśaṅkayā pāṭhāntaraṃ kalpayet | tathā cānupūrvībhaṅgaḥ syāt | vyākaraṇaśāstrajño
hi teṣāṃ rūpāṇāṃ sādhutvaṃ paśyanvedānupūrvīṃ saṃrakṣati | ūho nāma vaidikaśabdānāṃ
tattaddevatāliṅgādyanusāreṇa vipariṇāmaḥ | agneye juṣṭam tai. saṃ. 1 | 1 | 4
iti mantro vede paṭhyate | yatra ca sūryo devatā tatra tadanusāreṇa sūryāya
juṣṭamiti mantraḥ kalpanīyaḥ | evaṃ liṅgavacanabhedepyūhyam | vaiyākaraṇa eva cohaṃ
kartuṃ śaknoti | laghuśabdena lāghavamucyate | vaiyākaraṇo hi śabdānāṃ prakṛtipra
tyayavibhāgaṃ jñātvā pratipadapāṭhāpekṣayā lāghavena śabdārthaṃ jānāti | asaṃdehaḥ
saṃdehābhāvaḥ | yathā sthūlapṛṣatīmanaḍvāhīmālabheta iti śrūyate | anaḍvāhī
gauḥ | tadviśeṣaṇaṃ sthūlapṛṣatīti | tatra karmadhārayo bahuvrīhirveti saṃdehaḥ |
karmadhāraye sthūlā cāsau pṛṣatī ceti vigrahaḥ | gavāṃ śarīre dṛśya
mānā bindavaḥ pṛṣacchabdenocyante | atra tu lakṣaṇayā pṛṣadvatītyarthaḥ | tathā
ca bindavaḥ sthūlāḥ kṛśā vā kathamapi santu | gauḥ sthūlā bindumatī
cāpekṣitā bhavati | bahuvrīhau tu sthūlāni pṛṣanti yasyāmiti vigrahaḥ | atra
tu gauḥ sthūlā kṛśā vā yathātathāstu | bindūnāṃ tu sthaulyamapekṣitaṃ bhavati | tathā
ca kīdṛśī gaurgrāhyeti saṃdehe vaiyākaraṇaḥ sthū_lapṛ!ṣatīmiti pūrvapadāntodāttaṃ
dṛṣṭvā bahuvrīhirayamiti niścinoti | sthūleti pūrvapadasya bahuvrīhau prakṛtyā pūrva
padam pā0 sū. 6 | 2 | 1 iti sūtreṇa prakṛtisvaraḥ | karmadhāraye tu samāsasya
pā0 sū. 6 | 1 | 223 iti sūtreṇāntodāttaṃ sthū_la_pṛ_ṣa_tīmiti padaṃ syāt |

śāstrapūrvaka iti | vyākaraṇaśāstrajñānapūrvakaṃ yaḥ śabdānprayuṅkte sobhyu
dayena yujyate | yathā yośvamedhena yajate ya u cainamevaṃ veda tai. brā. 3 | 1 | 7
ityatra vedeti śabdoktyā jñānapūrvakamanuṣṭhitādagniṣṭomayāgātphalaṃ prāpyata ityuktaṃ
tadvat | veda jānāti | samyagjñātaḥ prakṛtipratyayavibhāgajñānapūrvakaṃ śāstrādava
gataḥ | kāmadhugiti | kāmāndogdhīti kāmadhuk | yatheṣṭaphalaprada ityarthaḥ |
nākamiti | nākaḥ svargalokaḥ | baddhāḥ prakṛtipratyayavibhāgajñānapūrvakārthāva
gamena sajjībhūtā ye vāgrūpā rathāste ca suprayuktāścet — taiḥ sādhanabhūtaiḥ pravaktāra
iṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ yatra tādṛśaṃ svargalokaṃ prayānti | ye cāvaiyākaraṇāḥ saṃskārarāhityā
ccikkenāvyaktaśabdena mitaṃ tulyaṃ yathā tathā bhāṣante te pādairmārgaṃ kaṣantastāḍayantaḥ
santo yānti | na teṣāṃ ratheneva śīghraṃ sukhakaraṃ ca gamanaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ |
catvārīti | śṛṅgā śṛṅgāṇi | trayo asyetyatra hastāso asyetyatra ca prakṛtyāntaḥ
pādam pā0 sū. 6 | 1 | 115 iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ | śīrṣaśabdo'kārānto
napuṃsakaḥ | hastāso hastāḥ | maho mahān | mahyate pūjyata iti mahaḥ | ghañarthe
kavidhānamiti karmaṇi kapratyayaḥ | martyānityatra nakārasya dīrghādaṭi samānapāde
pā0 sū. 8 | 3 | 9 iti sūtreṇa rutve yatve yalopaḥ | pūrvasyākārasyātoṭi
nityam pā0 sū. 8 | 3 | 3 iti sūtreṇānunāsikaḥ | asminmantre śabdasya vṛṣa
bhatvena rūpaṇaṃ kriyate | nāmākhyāteti | nāma subantam | ākhyātaṃ tiṅa
ntam | upasargāḥ pra paretyādayaḥ | nipātāśca vā hetyādayaḥ | upasarganipātayo
rnāmatvepi pṛthagupādānaṃ gobalīvardanyāyena | laḍādīti | bhūtādikālatraya
bodhakā laḍādayaḥ pādā ityarthaḥ | kālānāṃ tu na pādatvakalpanā | teṣāṃ varṇa
rūpatvābhāvena tatra tādṛśakalpanāyā asaṃbhavāt | yadyapi lakārā daśa tathāpi
tadbodhyakālānāṃ tritvānusāreṇa bodhakeṣu teṣu tritvaṃ kalpayituṃ śakyam |
śabdātmānāviti | ātmaśabdaḥ svarūpavācī | nityānityabhedena yaddvidhā
śabdasvarūpaṃ tanmastakadvayamiti kalpyate | tatra vyaṅgyo nitya āntaraḥ |
vyañjakastvanityo vaikharīrūpaḥ | tiṅā saheti | kartrādiṣaṭkārakabodhikāḥ ṣaṭ |
taditarā caiketi sapta vibhaktayaḥ | kartrarthakatiṅāṃ karmārthakatiṅāṃ ca kārakabodhaka
tvena ṣaṭsu saṃgrahaḥ | taditaretyanena prātipadikārthamātre prathamāyāḥ śeṣalakṣaṇāyāḥ
ṣaṣṭhyā bhāvārthakatiṅvibhakteśca saṃgrahaḥ | anye tu prathamā dvitīyetyādaya eva
sapta vibhaktayaḥ | tiṅāṃ saṃgrahastu kālabodhakatvena pādeṣu jāta evetyāhuḥ |
urasīti | vargapañcamairyaralavaiśca yuktasya hakārasyoraḥ sthānam | akārakavargaha
kāravisargāṇāṃ kaṇṭhaḥ sthānam | kaṇṭhaśabdena mukhāntargatānyanyāni tālvādi
sthānānyupalakṣyante | ṛkāraṭavargarephaṣakārāṇāṃ śiraḥ sthānam | śabdakarmā
śabdārthakaḥ | nanu śabda eva kathaṃ śabdaṃ karotīti cettatrāha — iheti | roravītī
tyasya vivaraṇaṃ yacchabdaṃ karotīti kṛtaṃ tatretyarthaḥ | nityaḥ śabda evāyamakhilaṃ
prapañcaṃ vistārayati | etaccānupadameva pradarśitāyāṃ harikārikāyāṃ spaṣṭam |
mahāndeva iti | mahānparabrahmasvarūpo devontaryāmirūpaḥ śabdo manuṣyeṣu
praviṣṭa ityarthaḥ | mahatā deveneti | sāmyaṃ sāyujyam | vyākaraṇaśāstrajaśabda
jñānapūrvakaṃ prayogeṇa kṣīṇapāpaḥ puruṣohaṃkārādigranthīnvicchidyāntareṇa śabdabra
hmaṇātyantaṃ saṃsṛjyata iti bhāvaḥ |

sphoṭākhya iti | etattattvamagre mūla eva sphuṭībhaviṣyati | anādīti |
ādyantarahitaṃ śabdarūpaṃ brahma | taccānimittakatvādakṣaraṃ vikāraśūnyam | tadeva ca
jagadrūpeṇa bhāsate | yasmācchabdabrahmaṇaḥ sakāśājjagato racanā bhavatītyarthaḥ |
nirūpitaṃ caitannāgojībhaṭṭairlaghumañjūṣāyām saṭīkamudritapustake pṛ. 176 |

dvidheti | apoddhṛtya pravibhajya | yathā padārthāvagataye prakṛtipratyayāḥ padebhyaḥ
pṛthakkalpyante tathā vākyārthāvagataye vākyebhyopi padāni pṛthakkalpyante | tacca
pṛthakkalpitaṃ padajātaṃ nāmākhyātabhedena dvidheti kaiściducyate | upasarganipātayoḥ
pṛthaggaṇanāyāṃ caturdheti | karmapravacanīyānāṃ pṛthaggaṇanāyāṃ pañcadhetyarthaḥ | upa
sargāḥ kriyāgataviśeṣadyotākāḥ karmapravacanīyāstu kriyānuyogikasaṃbandhaviśe
ṣadyotakā iti bhedaḥ | yathā japamanuprāvarṣat | atra japapratiyogiko varṣaṇānu
yogiko yastayorlakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sonunā karmapravacanīyena dyotyate |
karmapravacanīyaśabde kriyāvācinā karmaśabdena kriyānuyogikaḥ saṃbandho lakṣyate |
propasṛṣṭādvacadhātorbāhulakātkartaryanīyarpratyayaḥ | kriyāviśeṣeti | yathokto
dāharaṇe kriyāviśeṣo varṣaṇam | tena saha jāto yo japasya saṃbandhastasyāvacchedo
lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāva eva saṃbandha ityevaṃrūpaḥ saṃkocastaddhetustajjñāpakaḥ karmaprava
canīyonuḥ |

naiyāyikamatenāśaṅkate — nanviti | naiyāyikāstu ghaṭamānayetyādivākyoccā
raṇasamaye ye ghakārādayo varṇāḥ kaṇṭhādisthāneṣu vāyusaṃyogenotpadyante ye ca
śravaṇendriyagocarā bhavanti sadyo vinaśyanti ca sa eva śabdo na tu tadati
riktaḥ kaścit | kambugrīvādimadvastuno vācakaśca sa eva | ataścānitya eva śabda
ityāhuḥ | vaiyākaraṇāstu nāyaṃ śabdaḥ | kiṃ tu śabdasya vyañjako dhvaniḥ | eta
dvyaṅgyo hi śabdaḥ | sa eva kambugrīvādimadvastuno vācakaḥ | sa ca nityaḥ |
notpadyate na vinaśyati | ayameva sphoṭa ityucyate | dhvaniśca tadvyañjakonarthaka
eva | tathā ca ghaṭamānayetyādyuccāritena dhvaninā vācake nitye śabdemivyakte sati
tasmādarthabodho bhavatītyāhuḥ | keciditi | naiyāyikādaya ityarthaḥ | ekapa
dāvagateriti | ekaṃ padamityekatvāvagāhinī sarvajanaprasiddhā pratītirbhavati |
taccaikatvaṃ na varṇaniṣṭham | teṣāṃ nānātvāt | atastādṛśaikatvāśrayībhūtaṃ varṇasamū
havyaṅgyamavaśyamanyatkiṃcidāstheyam | sa eva sphoṭa iti | arthapratyayāsaṃ
bhavāditi | ekaikasminvarṇa uccārite tasmāttādṛśārthapratīteradarśanāt | kiṃ ca
varṇānāṃ pratyekamarthavattva ekenaivārthapratītisiddhāvitaravarṇavaiyarthyaṃ ca syāt | pade
ca yatra yāvanto varṇāstatra tāvatsaṃkhyākānāṃ vastūnāṃ bodhāpatteśca | prāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ
varṇānāṃ paryāyatāpatteśceti | yenoccāriteneti | uccāraṇakriyayā prakāśitene
tyarthaḥ | sāsnā gogalakambalaḥ | lāṅgūlaṃ puccham | kakudaḥ pṛṣṭhagalayormadhyeva
sthita unnatapradeśaḥ vaśiṃḍha iti pra. | khuraḥ śapham | viṣāṇaṃ śṛṅgam |
saṃpratyayo bodhaḥ | nādābhivyaṅgya iti | nādena varṇarūpeṇa dhvaninābhivyakta
ityarthaḥ |

na carama iti | caramasyānabhivyaktipakṣasya sphoṭavādibhirapyanabhyupagamena
loketyantāsaṃbhavitvena ca prathamatastatkhaṇḍanam | sūcīkaṭāhanyāyāt | sarva
deti | arthapratyayorthabodhaḥ | tadrūpaṃ kāryam | tasya ca sphoṭaḥ kāraṇam | sa
cābhivyaktyanapekṣaḥ | tādṛśasya ca tasya sarvadā sattvena sadaivārthabodhaḥ syādi
ti bhāvaḥ | vyāvartanīyā iti | pratinivartanīyā ityarthaḥ | sphoṭavādinaṃ
pratyāpādanīyā iti yāvat | tathā hi — varṇāḥ pratyekamabhivyañjayantīti pakṣo na
saṃbhavati | ekaikasminvarṇa uccārite tasmātsphoṭābhivyakteradarśanāt | kiṃ caike
naiva varṇenoccāritena sphoṭābhivyaktāvitaravarṇoccāraṇavaiyarthyam | pade ca yatra
yāvanto varṇāstatra tāvatsaṃkhyākānāṃ sphoṭānāmabhivyaktyāpatteśca | nāpi varṇāḥ
saṃbhūya sphoṭamabhivyañjayanti | kṣaṇikānāṃ varṇānāmāśutaravināśitvena samūhā
saṃbhavāt | yasyeti | paryanuyogaḥ praśnaḥ | niravayavo vācakaḥ sphoṭo varṇajñā
nenābhivyajyata iti yasya mataṃ sopi sphoṭavādī vaiyākaraṇopi ye tena sphoṭa
vādinā prativādinaṃ prati praśnāḥ kṛtāḥ kiṃ varṇāḥ samastā vyastā vā da.
13 paṃ. 131 ityādayasteṣvekenāpi na vimucyate | sphoṭasya sāvayavatve tvekai
kena varṇenāvayavaśaḥ sphoṭobhivyajyata iti vaktuṃ śakyeta | paraṃ tu sphoṭavādī
sphoṭasya niravayavatvaṃ manyate | atastatkṛtāḥ praśnāstanmata evopakṣeptuṃ śakyanta
iti bhāvaḥ | suptiṅantamiti | prathamādvitīyādayaḥ pratyayāḥ supśabdeno
cyante | kriyāpadaghaṭakāḥ pratyayāstiṅśabdenocyante | dvividhā api vibhakti
saṃjñakāḥ | tādṛśadvividhapratyayāntaṃ śabdasvarūpaṃ padasaṃjñakaṃ bhavatīti sūtrārthaḥ |
te vibhaktīti | ta ityanena varṇāḥ parāmṛśyante | vibhaktisaṃjñakapratyayāntā
varṇāḥ padasaṃjñakā bhavantīti sūtrārthaḥ | etatsūtradvayānurodhena varṇasamudāya eva
padaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ sphoṭākhyaṃ kiṃcidityāstheyam | yadyapi varṇānāmāśutaravi
nāśitvena samūhāsaṃbhavātpadabuddherasaṃbhavastathāpi vṛddhavyavahārādibhirvarṇasamudā
yasya saṃketagrahapūrvakamekārthapratyāyakatvadarśanena vināśibhirapi varṇairuttarottarama
nugraho bhavatītyanubhavabalādāstheyamityetāvatā samūhakalpanayā padabuddhirupapadyata
ityāśayaḥ | śaṅkate — tarhīti | yaścobhayoriti |

yaścobhayoḥ samo doṣaḥ parihāropi vā samaḥ |
naikaḥ paryanuyoktavyastādṛgarthavicāraṇe ||
iti tannyāyasvarūpam |

kāśakuśeti | yathā nadyādau bāhubhyāṃ tartuṃ pravṛttasyāsāmarthyena majjataḥ
prāṇasaṃrakṣaṇārthamālambanaṃ dṛḍhatarameva kiṃcidapekṣyate na tu tṛṇaviśeṣabhūtaṃ kāśaku
śādikaṃ tadvadevedamiti bhāvaḥ | paraspareti | yathā sūtraṃ vinā puṣpeṣu mālāpratyayo
nopapadyate tathā mitho vilakṣaṇavarṇamālāyāmapyekasyānekavarṇānugatasya kasyā
pyabhāvena padapratyayo nopapadyata iti bhāvaḥ | dhaveti | dhavādayastrayo vṛkṣavi
śeṣāḥ | tathā | ekasminpradeśe sahāvasthitāḥ | utpannapradhvastatvāditi |
tathā ca varṇasamūho durupapāda iti bhāvaḥ | nanu sphoṭavādinopi mate sphoṭābhi
vyañjakatvena varṇasamūho nopapādayituṃ śakyata iti cet — iṣṭāpattiḥ | sphoṭasyā
bhivyaktistu na varṇasamūhenaikapada eva bhavati | kiṃ tu krameṇaiva | tadāha — abhivya
ktipakṣepīti | etaccānupadaṃ mūla eva sphuṭībhaviṣyati | ekārtheti | ekārtha
pratyāyakatvaṃ padatvaṃ ceti dvitayamapi sphoṭavādibhirvarṇasaṃghātasya na kalpyate kiṃ
tu sphoṭasyaiva | tathā ca sphoṭamanabhyupagacchatā tadubhayamapi varṇeṣu tatsamūhaṃ
kalpayitvā sādhanīyam | tacca parasparāśrayagrastam | yadyapyekārthapratyāyakatvama
nubhūyate tathāpi sphoṭābhyupagamena tasyopapattau satyāṃ nāsaṃbhavino varṇasamūhasya
kalpanā nyāyyeti bhāvaḥ |

prāgukteti | kimabhivyakta da. 13 paṃ. 147 ityādigranthenoktaḥ |
ghaṭṭeti | rājagrāhyakarasthānaṃ ghaṭṭakuṭī | grāmādgrāmāntaraṃ śakaṭena gacchankaścana
kṛpaṇo vaṇik sāyaṃ dūratastatsthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā taddeyaparihārāya tatpṛṣṭhabhāgena vanānta
reṇa jigamiṣustamasyajñānena mārgāccyutaḥ kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ vanāntare paribabhrāma |
prabhāte yāvanmārgamāgacchati tāvattadeva sthānaṃ saṃnihitataramabhūt | soyaṃ ghaṭṭa
kuṭīprabhātanyāyaḥ | prathamo dhvaniḥ | prathamo varṇaḥ | tathā ca pratyekaṃ varṇasya
sphoṭavyañjakatvamiti nāsaṃbhavinaḥ samudāyasya kalpaneti bhāvaḥ | nādairiti |
antyena dhvaninā saha nādairuccāryamāṇaiḥ pūrvaiḥ sakalairdhvanibhirāhitaṃ sthāpitaṃ
bījaṃ vyaktyavagamānuguṇasaṃskāro yasyāṃ pūrvapūrvasaṃskārasahakṛtasaṃskārāvṛttyā prāptaḥ
paripāko yogyatāviśeṣo yasyāṃ tādṛśyāṃ buddhāvamukoyaṃ śabda ityavadhāryate
niścīyata ityarthaḥ | paramārtheti | paramārthabhūtā yā saṃvinnirvikalpakaṃ kenāpi
viśeṣeṇa rahitaṃ sāmānyajñānaṃ tadrūpā yākhilapadārthānugatā sattā saiva ghaṭapaṭā
disaṃbandhibhedena ghaṭatvapaṭatvādijātirūpā ghaṭapaṭādiśabdānāmartha ityarthaḥ |

ākṣipati — yadīti | saṃhatāḥ | samuccitāḥ | gaganaromantheti | carvi
tasyāpakṛṣya punaścarvaṇaṃ yadgomahiṣyādibhiḥ kriyate sa romanthaḥ | sa yathā gaga
nasyākāśasya na saṃbhavati tathāyamākṣepotyantāsaṃbhavītyarthaḥ | tadātmanā |
ghaṭatvapaṭatvādirūpeṇa | sā nityeti | sā sakalapadārthānugatā saṃvidrūpā sattaiva
nityā | saiva mahānātmā mahadbrahma | tāṃ sattāmeva tvatalādayaḥ pratyayā vadanti |
tvatalādayaḥ pratyayā hi bhāve vidhīyante | ghaṭasya bhāvo ghaṭatvaṃ ghaṭatetyādi
yathā | ghaṭādīnāṃ bhāvaśca sattaiveti | harikārikādvayārthamāha — āśrayabhūtai
riti | nāparamanvayīti | sakalagovyaktyanusyūtaṃ sattātiriktamanyatkiṃcinna
pratibhāsata ityarthaḥ | jātimanya iti | anekavyaktivartinī yā jātistāme
vānye kriyāmāhuḥ | sakalapācakavyaktiniṣṭhā yā pācakatvajātiḥ saiva pacana
kriyeti tātparyam | udayavyayavaidhuryāt | utpattivināśarāhityāt | tadvi
vartatayā | tasyāṃ sattāyāṃ pratibhāsamānatayā | yathā śuktireva rajatarūpeṇāva
bhāsate tathākāśādyakhilaprapañcarūpeṇa sā sattaivāvabhāsate | paricchedaḥ saṃkocaḥ |
vyāpakaṃ vastu na deśataḥ paricchidyate | sarvatra sattvāt | nityaṃ vastu na kālataḥ
paricchidyate | sarvadā sattvāt | tathā sarvādhiṣṭhānabhūtaṃ vastu na vastutaḥ paricchi
dyate | bhedābhāvāt | yataśca mahānanādirayamakhilaḥ prapañcaḥ sattāyāmavabhāsate
tataḥ sā sattā trividhaparicchedarahitā brahmarūpaiveti bhāvaḥ |

evaṃ jātipadārthavādinaye jāteḥ sattātonatirekātparamārthasaṃvidrūpā sataiva
sarveṣāṃ śabdānāmartha iti prasādhya vyaktipadārthavādinayepi sa evārtha iti nirū
payati — dravyapadārtheti | dravyaṃ ghaṭādivyaktiḥ | śaktigraho hi vṛddhavyavahāreṇa
bhavati | vyavahāre ca gāmānayāśvaṃ nayetyādau tattatkriyāviṣayatvena vyavahriya
māṇā vyaktireva dṛśyate | ato jātiviśiṣṭā vyaktiḥ padārtha iti tanmatam |
saṃvillakṣaṇaṃ tattvamiti | paramārthabhūtaṃ nirvikalpakajñānasvarūpaṃ sattākhyaṃ
tattvamityarthaḥ | satyaṃ vastviti | yathā kīdṛśo gavaya iti pṛṣṭe satyagavaya
syāsaṃnidhānādinā tajjñāpanāsaṃbhave taccitraṃ pradarśyate | tatra cāsatyamapi rekhā
gavayaṃ dṛṣṭvā yathedṛśo gavaya ityevaṃ satyagavayasvarūpaṃ niścīyate tathā asatyabhūtai
rdravyarūpairupādhibhiḥ satyameva śabdairabhidhīyate | śabdā hi pravṛttinivṛttiyogyāṃ
vyaktiṃ puraskṛtya taddvārā sattākhyaṃ satyameva tattvamabhidadhatītyarthaḥ | adhruveṇeti |
adhruvamasthiram | caitramaitrābhyāṃ mārge gacchadbhyāṃ kasyacidgṛhasyopari sthitaḥ
kāko yadṛcchayā dṛṣṭaḥ | paścāccaitreṇa kva devadattagṛhamiti pṛṣṭo maitraḥ kākavaddevadattasya
gṛhamiti tadgṛhaṃ bodhayati | tatra yadyapi kāko na sthirastathāpi tena nimittabhū
tenedaṃ devadattasya gṛhamiti caitreṇa gṛhyate | ayaṃ tadgṛhajñānopāyaḥ | gṛhaśabdena
tu tacchuddhaṃ kākarahitamevābhidhīyate | tathā goghaṭādiśabdairvyaktiṃ puraskṛtya
taddvārā tādṛśavyaktirahitaṃ sattākhyaṃ satyaṃ tattvameva kevalamabhidhīyata ityarthaḥ |
siddha iti | kiṃ pāṇiniḥ śabdamarthaṃ tayoḥ saṃbandhaṃ ca sṛjatyatha vā kevalaṃ smara
tītyāśaṅkāyāṃ tatsamādhānaparamidaṃ vārtikam | siddhaśabda iha nityavācī |
śabderthe tatsaṃbandhe ca nitye sati tajjñāpanārthameva kevalaṃ pāṇineḥ pravṛttiriti
vārtikārthaḥ | arthaviṣaye ca jātiḥ padārtho vyaktiḥ padārtha iti pakṣadvayam |
vyaktirdravyam | pakṣadvayepyarthasya nityatvameva | tatra jātiḥ padārtha ityaṅgīkāre
jāteḥ sattārūpāyā nityatvamastyeva | sattātiriktajātivādinopi jāternityatva
mevecchanti | dravyaṃ padārtha iti pakṣepyarthasya nityatvamevetyāśayena dravyaṃ hi
nityam pāta0 mahābhā. pṛ. 7 paṃ. 11 iti bhāṣyakṛdbhiruktam | tatra
dravyaśabdena yadi goghaṭādikaṃ laukikaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhyate tarhi tasyānityatvena dravyaṃ
hi nityam — iti bhāṣyakṛduktirna saṃgacchata ityāśayena tatra kaiyaṭena asatyo
pādhyavacchinnaṃ brahmatattvamatra dravyaśabdavācyam — ityuktam | tadevaṃ jātivyaktipakṣa
yorubhayorapi paramārthasaṃvillakṣaṇabrahmasattaiva sarveṣāṃ śabdānāmartha iti siddham |
siddhe śabdārthasaṃbandhe — itivārtikokterarthavacchabdasyāpi nityatvameveti nityasya
sphoṭarūpasyaiva śabdasya vācakatvaṃ na tvanityasya varṇarūpasya dhvanerityevaṃ sphoṭaḥ
sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ |

adhunā loke pratītau jātivyaktipakṣāvupapādayati — jātiśabdārtheti |
vājapyāyano jātipadārthavādī | vyāḍirvyaktipadārthavādī | pāṇinestu dvayamapi
saṃmatam | atredaṃ bodhyam — jātiguṇakriyāsaṃjñābhedena caturvidhāḥ śabdāḥ | pravṛ
ttinimittabhedena caitaccāturvidhyam | jātipravṛttinimittakaḥ śabdo jātiśabdaḥ |
evaṃ guṇapravṛttinimittakaḥ śabdo guṇaśabdaḥ | evameva kriyāśabdaḥ saṃjñāśabdaśca |
yathā gauḥ śuklaścalo ḍittha iti | atraikasyāṃ govyaktau catvāraḥ śabdāḥ prayujyante |
tādṛśavyaktigatāṃ gotvajātiṃ jñātvā gośabdaḥ prayujyate | tathā tadgataṃ śuklaguṇaṃ
jñātvā śuklaśabdaḥ | calanakriyāṃ jñātvā calaśabdaḥ | ḍittheti saṃjñāṃ jñātvā
ḍitthaśabdaḥ | tatra cānekaṃ darśanam — pravṛttinimittaṃ jātyādikameva tattaccha
bdānāṃ vācyorthaḥ | vyaktestu tadāśrayatayākṣepādināvagama ityekam | vyakti
reva vācyorthaḥ | pravṛttinimittaṃ tvanekavyaktyanugamakatayā kevalaṃ tadupalakṣaṇam —
iti dvitīyam | pravṛttinimittaviśiṣṭā vyaktirvācyortha iti tṛtīyam | vāja
pyāyanastu prathamadarśanānusārī | kiṃ tu tatrāpi pravṛttinimittaṃ na caturvidhaṃ kiṃ
tu sarveṣāṃ śabdānāṃ jātirūpamekameveti manyate | anekagovyaktisamavetā gotva
jātirgośabdasya pravṛttinimittam | sa eva tasya vācyorthaḥ | tathā ghaṭādiniṣṭho
yaḥ śuklo guṇastadgatā śuklatvajātiḥ śuklaśabdasya pravṛttinimittam | sa eva tasya
vācyorthaḥ | śuklaśabdācchuklaguṇapratyayastu tādṛśajātisaṃbandhādbhavati | śuklaguṇavi
śiṣṭasya ghaṭādidravyasya śuklaśabdātpratyayastu tādṛśajātisaṃbandhiguṇasaṃbandhādbhavati |
tathānekacalanakriyāniṣṭhā calanatvajātiścalaśabdasya pravṛttinimittam | sa eva tasya
vācyorthaḥ | calaśabdāccalanakriyāyāḥ pratyayastu tādṛśajātisaṃbandhāt | kriyāśra
yasya devadattāderbodhastu tādṛśajātisaṃbandhikriyāsaṃbandhāt | ḍitthasaṃjñakasya paśvā
derekasyāpi kaumārayauvanādyavasthābhedena bhedāttādṛśānekavyaktiniṣṭhā ḍitthatvajāti
rḍitthaśabdasya pravṛttinimittam | sa eva tasya vācyorthaḥ | vyaktibodhastu tādṛśa
ḍitthatvāśrayatayā bhavati | jātistviti | yadyapi govyaktīnāmānantyā
dgośabdārthajñānaṃ duṣkaraṃ tathāpi gotvajātyā sakalagovyaktyanugamo bhaviṣyati |
tathā ca gotvajātiḥ kevalaṃ vyaktyupalakṣaṇaṃ na tu vācyakukṣau tasyāḥ praveśaḥ |
jātyākhyāyāmiti | jātyākhyāyāmekopyartho vikalpena bahuvadbhavati |
brāhmaṇāḥ pūjyāḥ | brāhmaṇaḥ pūjyaḥ | brāhmaṇajātiḥ pūjyetyarthaḥ | atra brāhmaṇaśa
bdasya brāhmaṇatvajātau tātparyam | tathā caitatsūtrānurodhena jātiḥ padārtha iti
mataṃ pāṇineḥ saṃmatamiti gamyate | sarūpāṇāmiti | vibhaktimātre yāni
sarūpāṇyeva dṛṣṭāni teṣāmeka eva śiṣyate | rāmaśca rāmaśca rāmau | asati hyasmi
nsūtre ghaṭaśca paṭaśca ghaṭapaṭāvitivadrāmarāmāviti syāt | rāmaśca rāmaśca rāmaśca rāmā
ityatrāpyevam | atra vyaktiḥ padārtha iti mate vyaktyanekatvāttadanusāreṇa dvayo
strayāṇāṃ tatopyadhikānāṃ vā rāmaśabdānāṃ prayogaḥ prāptaḥ | tannivṛttaya idaṃ
sūtram | tathā caitatsūtrānurodhena vyaktiḥ padārtha iti mataṃ pāṇineḥ saṃmatamiti
gamyate | pārṣadaḥ | anusārī | parṣacchabdācchaiṣikoṇpratyayaḥ | parṣatsabhā |
jātyādipadārthavādināmanekeṣāṃ yā sabhā tadgatasarvasabhyasādhāraṇaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ na
kasyāpyekasyāsādhāraṇamityarthaḥ | tasmāditi | jātipakṣe gotvādijāterbra
hmasattātonatirekādvyaktipakṣepyasatyabhūtavyaktyupādhidvārā satyasya brahmatattvasya
pratipādanamityarthaḥ | tasmācchaktīti | satyaḥ sarvavyāpī sadrūpa ekorthaḥ para
mātmā tattacchabdavācyatvāvasthāyāṃ śaktivibhāgena bahurūpaḥ sanprakāśata ityarthaḥ |
yatreti | trayī vedatrayī | ayaṃ draṣṭedaṃ dṛśyamidaṃ darśanamityevaṃ tripuṭīkalpanā
yatra nāsti tasyaivātmarūpaikārthasya vedāntaśāstrajñāḥ satyatvamāhurityarthaḥ |

nanu brahmatattvaṃ sarveṣāṃ śabdānāṃ vācyam | vācakaśca sphoṭarūpaḥ śabdaitye
tāvatā dvaitāpattiḥ | tathā ca kathamadvayaṃ brahmatatvaṃ sarvaśabdārtha ityāśaṅkyāha —
abhyupagateti | vācyeti | sā brahmasattā sarvaśabdānāṃ vācyā | tato vāca
kātsphoṭarūpācchabdācca na pṛthak | evaṃ vācyavācakayorabhedepi tayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ
kevalaṃ kalpanāvaśādbhāsate | yathā jīvaparamātmanoraikyepi kalpanāvaśādvyavahārada
śāyāṃ niyamyaniyāmakabhāvaḥ saṃbandhastayorbhāsate tadvat | svapnāvasthāyāmiva
jāgradavasthāyāmapi kalpanāmūlaka evāyamakhilaḥ prapañco bhāsata iti tātparyam |
saṃvṛtivaśāt | āvaraṇavaśāt | kalpanāvaśādvā |

taddvāramiti | anena vyākaraṇasya prāśastyaṃ bodhyate | adhividyam |
vidyāsu | vibhaktyarthevyayībhāvaḥ | tadvyākaraṇamapavargasya mokṣasya dvāram | tathā
vāṅmalānāṃ cikitsitaṃ yathā vaidyaśāstraṃ śārīrāṇāṃ malānām | tathā sarva
vidyānāṃ pavitram | vidyāsvartho hi śabdairupagṛhīto bhavati | śabdasya saṃskāraśca
vyākaraṇādhīnaḥ | ato vidyāsvetadvyākaraṇaṃ prakāśata ityarthaḥ | idamādyamiti |
siddhiḥ kaivalyaprāptiḥ | tasyāḥ sopānamārge yāni parvāṇi teṣu prathamaṃ pādavi
nyāsasthānamidaṃ vyākaraṇam | mumukṣūṇāṃ saraloyaṃ rājamārga ityarthaḥ ||

div.head: atha sāṃkhyadarśanam || 14 ||
div.p:
atha pariṇāmavādināṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ matamutthāpayati — atheti | pariṇā
meti | sato dravyasyāvasthāntarāpattiḥ pariṇāmaḥ | sarvāṇi prakṛtyādīni
tattvāni tattatkāryarūpeṇa pariṇamanta iti hi sāṃkhyamatam | etaccānupadameva
sphuṭībhaviṣyati | vivarteti | aparityaktapūrvarūpasya vastuno'satā rūpāntareṇa
pratītirvivartaḥ | yathā śuktikāyā rajatarūpeṇa pratītiḥ | ayaṃ ca vivartavādo
vaiyākaraṇairmāyāvādibhiradvaitavedāntibhiścāśrīyate | te hyadhiṣṭhānabhūte brahmarūpe
vastunyasadevedaṃ sarvaṃ jagadbhrāntyā pratibhāsata iti vadanti | teṣām |
sāṃkhyānām | catasro vidhā iti | sāṃkhyaśāstrābhimatatattvajātasyetyādiḥ |

prakarotīti | prakarṣeṇa karoti kāryamutpādayatīti prakṛtiḥ | prakarṣaśca tattvā
ntarārambhakatvam | tathā ca yasmāttattvāntaramutpadyate tādṛśaḥ kāraṇaviśeṣaḥ prakṛ
tiśabdenocyate | yadyapi mṛddhaṭādīnāṃ pṛthivyapekṣayā tattvāntaratvābhāvena
mṛdādīnāṃ tattvāntarotpādakatvābhāvānna prakṛtitvaṃ tathāpi prakarṣasyāvivakṣayā
prakṛtiśabdasyopādānakāraṇasāmānyavācitvaṃ gṛhītvā mṛdādīnāṃ ghaṭādiprakṛtitvaṃ
loke vyapadiśyate | tathā ca tattvāntarārambhakatvaṃ prakṛtitvamiti prakṛtisāmā
nyalakṣaṇam | prakṛṣṭā kṛtirasyā iti vā vigrahaḥ |

atredaṃ bodhyam — uktaṃ prakṛtitvaṃ pradhānamahadahaṃkārapañcatanmātrarūpatattvāṣṭa
kasādhāraṇam | tatra 1 pradhānaṃ triguṇātmakam | sattvarajastamāṃsi trayo guṇāḥ |
te ca tatra sāmyāvasthāḥ | sāmyādevedaṃ sattvamidaṃ raja iti vyavahārayogyatāpi
na tatra śakyate vaktum | ata eva na tattattvatrayaṃ kiṃ tvekameva vyapadiśyate |
sattvarajastamāṃsi vastuto dravyarūpāṇyeva | mahadādyupādānakāraṇatvāt | saṃyo
gavibhāgāśrayatvācca | puruṣabhogasādhanatvena guṇabhūtatvātparaṃ teṣāṃ guṇatvavyava
hāraḥ | gandhavyatiriktāyāḥ pṛthivyā yathā gandho guṇastathā sattvāditrayavyatiri
ktāyāḥ prakṛteḥ sattvādayo guṇā iti tu na mantavyam | sattvādīnāṃ prakṛtisva
rūpatvena prakṛtidharmatvābhāvāt | taduktaṃ sāṃkhyapravacanasūtre sattvādīnāmataddharmatvaṃ
tadrūpatvāt sāṃ. pra. sū. 6 | 39 iti | prakṛterguṇā iti vyavahārastu vanasya
vṛkṣā itivadbodhyaḥ |

sattvaṃ rajastama iti guṇāḥ prakṛtisaṃbhavāḥ | gī. 14 | 5
ityatra guṇapadena na prakṛtisvarūpabhūtānāṃ guṇānāṃ grahaṇam | kiṃ tu tatkārya
bhūtā vaiṣamyāvasthā mahattattvādikāraṇībhūtā ye sattvādayasteṣāṃ grahaṇam | prakṛti
svarūpabhūtānāṃ guṇānāṃ grahaṇe tu teṣāṃ nityatvenotpattyabhāvātprakṛtisaṃbhavā
ityuktirna saṃgacchate | vaiṣamyaṃ ca sattvarajastamasāṃ pratyekamanekavyaktīnāṃ mithaḥ
sajātīyasaṃvalanena laghutvaprakāśādiphalopahita idaṃ sattvamidaṃ raja ityādivyava
hārayogyaḥ pariṇāmaviśeṣaḥ | idaṃ vaiṣamyāvasthaṃ guṇatrayaṃ prakṛtyapekṣayā pṛthakta
ttvatrayamityāśayena kaiścitsāṃkhyaśāstrajñairaṣṭāviṃśatitattvapakṣa uktaḥ | sattvādīnāṃ
laghutvādayaḥ svabhāvaviśeṣāḥ sāṃkhyakārikāyāmuktāḥ —

sattvaṃ laghu prakāśakamiṣṭamupaṣṭambhakaṃ calaṃ ca rajaḥ |
guru varaṇakameva tamaḥ sāṃ. kā. 13 iti |
evaśabdo bhinnakramastama ityanena saṃbadhyate | tathā āvṛttyā sattvamityanena raja itya
nena ca saṃbadhyate | sattvameva laghu prakāśakaṃ ceṣṭam | sattvasya laghutvādeva tatkāryabhūte
ṣvindriyeṣu viṣayagrahaṇaunmukhyarūpaṃ pāṭavaṃ dṛśyate | tathā sattvasya prakāśakatvādeve
ndriyāṇāṃ viṣayaprakāśakatvaṃ dṛśyate | raja evopaṣṭambhakaṃ calaṃ ceṣṭam | yato rajaścalaṃ
svabhāvataḥ sakriyam | ataḥ sattvasya tamasaścopaṣṭambhakaṃ tattatkāryotpāde pravartakam |
sattvatamasorakriyatvena tatra svābhāvikapravṛttyabhāvāt | tama eva guru tathā āvarakaṃ
ceṣṭam | gurutvaṃ tu laghutvavirodhī sthitihetubhūto dharmaḥ | tatprakarṣeṇa ca sattvasvabhāvā
rajaḥsvabhāvāśca pratibadhyante | etadevāvarakatvam | sattvasya laghutvādeva prakāśa
katvam | rajasaścalatvādevopaṣṭambhakatvam | tamasaśca gurutvādevāvarakatvamiti |
prakṛtisvarūpabhūtaṃ sattvaṃ rajastamaśca pratyekaṃ nānāvidham | anekā hi sattvavya
ktayaḥ | tatra kāścidaṇuparimāṇāḥ kāścidvibhuparimāṇāḥ | na tu madhyamaparimāṇāḥ |
tathā sati ghaṭādivadanityatvaprasaṅgāt | vaiṣamyāvasthaṃ kāryabhūtaṃ sattvaṃ tu madhyama
parimāṇamapi bhavati | evaṃ rajastamasī api nānāvidhe | na caivaṃ guṇatrayamityu
ktirna saṃgacchate | sattvādīnāṃ pratyekamanekatvenāsaṃkhyatvāditi vācyam | guṇa
vibhājakasattvatvādyupādhitrayābhiprāyeṇa guṇatrayoktyupapatteḥ | yathā vaiśeṣikamate
pṛthivyādidravyanavake pṛthivījalatejovāyvātmamanasāṃ pratyekamanekatvepi pṛthi
vītvajalatvādidravyavibhājakopādhinavakābhiprāyeṇa nava dravyāṇīti vyavahāra
stadvat | sattvādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ dharmā uktāḥ sāṃkhyatattvavivecane aṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ
sāṃ. samāsasū. 1 iti sūtre | sattvasya sukhaprasādaprakāśādayo dharmāḥ |
rajaso duḥkhakāluṣyapravṛttyādayaḥ | tamaso mohāvaraṇastambhanādayaḥ | dharmadharmi
ṇorabhedātsattvaṃ sukhātmakamiti vyavahāropapattiḥ | evaṃ rajo duḥkhātmakaṃ tamo
mohātmakamityapi |

etacca mūlaprakṛtirūpaṃ tattvamanumānena sidhyati | ata evaitadānumānikamiti
gīyate | tathā ca prayogaḥ — mahadādikāryaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakadravyakāryaṃ kāryatve sati
sukhaduḥkhamohātmakatvāt | vastrādikāryabhūtaśayyāsanādivat | nanu nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto
yuktaḥ | vastrādikāryabhūtānāṃ śayyāsanādīnāṃ sukhādisādhanatvepi sukhādyātmaka
tvābhāvāt | sukhaduḥkhamohāstvāntarā manodharmā evānubhūyanta iti cetsatyam |
kāraṇaguṇāḥ kārye guṇāntaramārabhanta iti nyāyena manodharmāṇāṃ sukhādīnāṃ kāra
ṇaguṇapūrvakatvāttādṛśasukhādyārambhakatvena manasaḥ paraṃparayā kāraṇībhūtāyāṃ mūla
prakṛtau sukhādidharmā avaśyamāstheyāḥ | te ca mūlaprakṛtigatāḥ sukhādaya ukta
nyāyena kāryaviśeṣe manasīva pañcamahābhūtarūpe kāryāntarepi sukhādyārambhakāḥ
syureva | bādhakābhāvāt | tathā ca bhautikeṣu viṣayeṣu sukhādisiddhau dharmadha
rmiṇorabhedādbhautikānāṃ śayyāsanādīnāṃ sukhādyātmakatvaṃ sidhyatīti dṛṣṭānto
papattiḥ | ghaṭarūpaṃ paṭarūpamiti pratyayavaccandanasukhaṃ strīsukhamiti pratyayādapi
viṣaye sukhādikaṃ sidhyati | sukhādyutpādakatvācca viṣaye sukhādikamucitamiti |

2 prakṛtisaṃjñake tattvāṣṭake dvitīyaṃ tattvaṃ buddhiḥ | asyā buddhereva mahaditi
saṃjñā | dharmajñānavairāgyaiśvaryākhyaprakṛṣṭaguṇayogāt | idaṃ ca mūlaprakṛtibhūtātpra
dhānasaṃjñakātprathamatattvādutpadyate | idamapi pradhānavattriguṇātmakam | tatra
sattvāṃśaḥ pradhānam |

sāttvikāṃśātpradhānāttu mahattattvamajāyata |
ityuktistu sattvāṃśaprādhānyābhiprāyā | buddhyahaṃkāramanorūpatattvatrayātmaka
syāntaḥkaraṇavṛkṣasya mahattattvamaṅkurāvasthā | niścayavṛttikamantaḥkaraṇaṃ buddhiḥ |
abhimānavṛttikamantaḥkaraṇamahaṃkāraḥ | saṃkalpavṛttikamantaḥkaraṇaṃ manaḥ | pradhāna
mivedaṃ buddhitattvamapi nānāvidham | brahmādisthāvarāntānāṃ jīvānāṃ pratyekame
kaikamupādhibhūtam | sarvāsu buddhiṣu sattvāṃśaprādhānyepi kvacidrajastamasorapi
prākaṭyaṃ bhavati | brahmaviṣṇumaheśānāmupādhibhūtāyāṃ buddhau krameṇa rajasaḥ sattvasya
tamasaśca prākaṭyam | kānicidbuddhitattvāni rajastamasoḥ prākaṭye tirobhūtasa
ttvāni mahacchabdavācyānyapyamahāntīvādharmājñānāvairāgyānaiśvaryayuktāni bhavanti |
tādṛśopādhiyuktāḥ kṣudrā apuṇyavanto jīvā dharmācaraṇe na pravartante | adha
rmācaraṇe ca pravartante |

3 sāmānyaprakṛtikā viśeṣā iti nyāyena buddhisāmānyabhūtānmahattattvā
dbuddhiviśeṣabhūtatattvotpattiḥ | ahaṃtedaṃte ca buddhiviśeṣau | tatrāhaṃtāmantareṇe
daṃtāyā anudayādādau buddhiviśeṣabhūtamahaṃkāratattvamutpadyate | idaṃ ca prakṛti
saṃjñake tattvāṣṭake tṛtīyaṃ tattvam | mahattattvamivāhaṃkāropi trividhaḥ sāttviko
rājasastāmasaśca | sāttviko vaikārika ityucyate | rājasastaijasa ucyate |
tāmaso bhūtādirityucyate | yatra rajastamasī abhibhūya sattvaguṇa utkaṭo bhavati
sa sāttvikaḥ | sa ca taijasāṃśasahāyena pravṛttidharmāṇyekādaśendriyāṇi jana
yati | ata indriyotpattiḥ sāttvikāttaijasācca vyapadiśyate | pañcajñānendriyāṇi
pañca karmendriyāṇi manaścetyekādaśendriyāṇi | yatra ca sattvarajasī abhibhūya
tamoguṇa utkaṭo bhavati sa tāmasaḥ | sopi taijasāṃśasahāyena pravṛttidharmakaṃ
tanmātrapañcakaṃ janayati | pūrvavadeva tanmātrapañcakotpattistāmasāttaijasācca vyapa
diśyate |

4 — 8 tanmātrapañcakaṃ ca śabdatanmātraṃ sparśatanmātraṃ rūpatanmātraṃ rasata
nmātraṃ gandhatanmātraṃ ceti | nirviśeṣā ye śabdasparśarūparasagandhāstadāśrayī
bhūtāni sūkṣmāṇi pañca bhūtāni tanmātraśabdenocyante | viśeṣāstu śabda udāttā
nudāttaniṣādarṣabhādayaḥ | sparśe śītatvoṣṇatvamṛdutvādayaḥ | rūpe śuklatvanīlatvā
dayaḥ | rase madhuratvāmlatvādayaḥ | gandhe surabhitvāsurabhitve | śāntaghoramūḍhāḥ
pañcasvapi viśeṣāḥ śabdatvasparśatvādivyāpyā jātiviśeṣā eva | tathā coktaṃ
sāṃkhyatattvavivecane —

śabdatanmātramityetacchabda evopalabhyate |
na tūdāttaniṣādādibhedastasyopalabhyate || ityādi |
etaccākāśavāyutejojalapṛthivīnāṃ pañcānāṃ bhūtānāṃ krameṇa prakṛtibhūtam |

etatprakṛtyaṣṭakamekādaśendriyāṇi 9 — 19 pañca mahābhūtāni 20 — 24 ceti
caturviṃśatitattvāni | pañcaviṃśaḥ 25 puruṣaḥ | sa ca jīvātmā | na tu tadatiriktaḥ
sarvajña īśvaraḥ kaścit | tatra pramāṇābhāvāt | jīvātmā ca pratiśarīraṃ bhinnaḥ |
anyathā sukhaduḥkhamohajanmamaraṇabandhamokṣavyavasthānupapatteḥ | tathā ca sāṃkhyaprava
canasūtram — janmādivyavasthātaḥ puruṣabahutvam sāṃ. pra. sū. 6 | 45 iti | sa
ca jīvātmānādiḥ sūkṣmaścetanaḥ sarvagato nirguṇaḥ kūṭastho nityo draṣṭā bhoktā
kṣetravicca bhavati |

vaiśeṣikairuktānāṃ saptapadārthānāmeṣvevāntarbhāvaḥ | tatra dravyeṣu pṛthivyādiṣu
navasu pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśamanāṃsi tattadrūpeṇaiva pañcaviṃśatitattveṣu nirdi
ṣṭāni | ātmā ca puruṣapadena nirdiṣṭaḥ | dikkālayorākāśentarbhāvaḥ | tathā ca
sāṃkhyapravacanasūtram — dikkālāvākāśādibhyaḥ sāṃ. pra. sū. 2 | 12 iti |
guṇakarmasāmānyānāṃ dravya evāntarbhāvaḥ | dharmadharmiṇorabhedāt | viśeṣasamavāyau
tu naiva svīkriyete | anupayogāt | abhāvastu bhāvāntarameva | ghaṭaprāgabhāvo
mṛdeva | ghaṭadhvaṃsaḥ śakalānyeva | ghaṭātyantābhāvaḥ kevalādhikaraṇameva | ghaṭānyo
nyābhāvaḥ paṭādireveti |

atha sṛṣṭikramaḥ kathyate — avyaktākhyā mūlaprakṛtiḥ pravṛttisvabhāvā svatantrā
ca sṛṣṭyārambhe svayameva kṣubdhā satī jīvaviśeṣeṇa nārāyaṇākhyena saṃyujyate |
tataśca sajātīyairanyaiḥ prakṛtyaṃśairnyūnādhikabhāvena militā satī mahattattvamāra
bhate | na ca puruṣasya prakṛtyā saha saṃyoge asaṅgo hyayaṃ puruṣaḥ bṛ. 4 | 3 | 15
iti śrutivirodha iti vācyam | vikārahetusaṃyogasyaiva saṅgaśabdārthatvāt |
padmapatramivāmbhasā bha. gī. 5 | 10 ityevamucyamānā padmapatrasyāsaṅgatoktā
rthenaivopapadyate | mahattattvaṃ ca cetanācetanātmakam | tatrācetanāṃśasya mukhyaivo
tpattiḥ | cetanāṃśasya tvabhivyaktirūpā gauṇyeva | evaṃ sṛṣṭhyārambhe jīvaviśeṣa
bhūtā ādiśaktirapi mahattattvakāraṇībhūtaviṣamāvasthaguṇatrayasaṃbandhādabhivyajyate |
iyameva prakṛtyadhiṣṭhātrī devatā mahālakṣmyambā bhavānī durgetyādiśabdaiḥ purāṇe
ṣūcyate | jīvagatā akhilā viśeṣāḥ pradhānādyupādhisaṃbandhena bhāsamānā
aupādhikā eva | tataḥ pūrvaṃ nirviśeṣā jīvasamaṣṭirbrahmaśabdenocyate | svayaṃbhūstu
saviśeṣā jīvasamaṣṭiḥ | viśeṣāstvaupādhikā eva | tasyopādhirliṅgaśarīram |
liṅgaśarīraṃ tu buddhyahaṃkāramanojñānendriyakarmendriyapañcatanmātrāṇāmaṣṭādaśānāṃ
samudāyaḥ | saptadaśānāṃ samudāya ityuktistvahaṃkārasya buddhāvantarbhāvaṃ kalpa
yitvā neyā | prāṇaśca buddhereva vṛttibhedaḥ | upādhiścātmacaitanyasyābhivyakti
sthānam | vahnerindhanavat | idaṃ ca liṅgaśarīramādau svayaṃbhuva upādhibhūtameka
meva jāyate | tato vyaṣṭijīvānāmupādhibhūtāni vyaṣṭiliṅgaśarīrāṇi tadaṃśabhū
tāni tato vibhajyante | piturliṅgaśarīrātputraliṅgaśarīravat | ayaṃ ca svayaṃbhūḥ
svaliṅgaśarīrāvayavānsūkṣmānalpānsvāṃśacetanāsu saṃyojya sarvānprāṇinaḥ
sṛjati | jīvāśca vastuto bhinnā eva | teṣāṃ samaṣṭiḥ svayaṃbhūḥ | ayaṃ ca vastutaḥ
sanneva jīvānāṃ mitho bhedaḥ śarīrādyupādhibhirabhivyajyate dīpena ghaṭādiriva |
na tvasannevopādhinābhivyajyate | yathā jala uṣṇasparśo'sanneva tejasā svakīya
statrābhivyajyate tadvadatra na mantavyam | jīveṣu mitho bhedasya naisargikatvāt |
svayaṃbhūreva ca sthūlaśarīropādhiko nārāyaṇa ityucyate | tadutpattikramaścettham —
mahattattvādutpannastaddaśamāṃśohaṃkāraḥ | tasmāttanmātradvārotpannaṃ taddaśamāṃśabhūtamā
kāśam | evaṃ tatopi nyūnastaddaśamāṃśo vāyuḥ | taddaśamāṃśabhūtaṃ tejaḥ | tadda
śamāṃśabhūtaṃ jalam | taddaśamāṃśabhūtā pṛthivī | saiva ca sthūlaśarīrasya bījam |
taccāṇḍarūpeṇa pariṇamate | tatra madhye taddaśamāṃśabhūtaṃ caturdaśabhuvanātmakaṃ svayaṃ
bhuvaḥ sthūlaśarīram | ayameva sthūlaśarīropādhiko nārāyaṇa ityucyate |
tanmātrotpatteḥ prāgindriyotpattirindriyotpatteḥ prāktanmātrotpattiriti vā nātra
kramaniyamaḥ | tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāvena krame pramāṇābhāvāt | indriyāṇāṃ
madhyemukameva prathamamutpadyata ityayamapi niyamo nāsti | tanmātrotpattau tvasti
kramaḥ | tāmasāhaṃkārātprathamaṃ śabdatanmātramutpadyate | tasmācchabdatanmātrādahaṃ
kārasahitātsparśatanmātraṃ śabdasparśobhayaguṇakamutpadyate | tasmātsparśatanmātrāda
haṃkārasahitādrūpatanmātraṃ śabdasparśarūpaguṇakamutpadyate | evaṃ tataścaturguṇaṃ rasata
nmātraṃ pañcaguṇaṃ gandhatanmātramiti | tanmātrebhyaśca tādṛśaguṇakānyeva mahābhūtānyu
tpadyante | pradhānamahadahaṃkārapañcatanmātrarūpaṃ prakṛtyaṣṭakaṃ pañca jñānendriyāṇi pañca karme
ndriyāṇi manaścetyekādaśendriyagaṇaḥ pañca mahābhūtāni ceti caturviṃśatitattvāni |
sarvoyaṃ mūlaprakṛteḥ pradhānasya prapañcaḥ | puruṣastu pañcaviṃśo na kasyāpi prakṛtirna
kasyāpi vikṛtiḥ | tathā ca saṃkṣepato dvividhaṃ tattvaṃ cidacidrūpaṃ puruṣapradhānātmakam |
tayorbhedajñānātpuruṣo mukto bhavati | etadbhedajñānāyaiva prakṛtipariṇāmabhūtānāṃ
mahadāditattvānāṃ saṃkalanam | anyathā buddhimanaḥprāṇaśarīrādibhya ātmopā
dhibhyaḥ sakāśādātmani bhedo na samyagjñāyeta | tathā ca prakṛtipuruṣayoravive
kātsaṃsāro vivekānmokṣa iti siddham |

na ca bījāṅkureti | yathā bījasya kāraṇamaṅkurastasyāṅkurasya bījāntaraṃ
kāraṇam | tasyāpi bījasyāṅkurāntaraṃ kāraṇaṃ tasyāpi punarbījāntaramityevaṃ
prāptāpyanavasthā doṣāya na bhavati | gatyantarābhāvāt | tathaivātrānavasthā na doṣā
yeti śaṅkāśayaḥ | pramāṇābhāvāditi | yatra pratyakṣādipramāṇena dvayormithaḥ
kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ siddho bhavati tatra tayordvayormadhye prāthamyaṃ kasyetyākāṅkṣāyāṃ
pravāhānāditvaṃ svīkṛtyānavasthā na doṣāya bhavati | etāvāneva bījāṅkuranyā
yasya viṣayaḥ | prakṛte tu pradhānasyāmukaṃ kāraṇamityatra na kiṃcitpramāṇamityaprā
māṇikasya kāryakāraṇabhāvasya kalpanena prāptānavasthā doṣāyaiva syāditi bhāvaḥ |

abhimānohaṃkāra iti | ahamatrādhikṛto mamātra sāmarthyaṃ madarthā ime
viṣayā ahamamukosmītyādirabhimānātmako'sādhāraṇavyāpāro yasya sohaṃkāra
ityarthaḥ | vyāpāravyāpāravatorabhedavivakṣayābhimānohaṃkāra ityuktam | tasmā
dahaṃkārāddvividhaḥ sargaḥ pravartate | prakāśakajaḍabhedena dvividhā sṛṣṭirjāyate |
tadeva prakāradvayamāha — ekādaśeti | ekādaśakaśca gaṇa iti pāṭhe ekādaśasaṃkhyā
parimāṇamasyetyekādaśakaḥ | ekādaśaśabdāttadasya parimāṇamityarthe saṃkhyāyā ati
śadantāyāḥ kan pā. sū. 5 | 1 | 22 ityanena kanpratyayaḥ | pañcajñānendriyapañca
karmendriyamanasāṃ prakāśakānāmekādaśānāṃ gaṇa ekaḥ | śabdatanmātrādīnāṃ
jaḍānāṃ pañcānāṃ gaṇoparaḥ | nanvahaṃkārādekarūpātkāraṇātkathaṃ jaḍaprakāśakayo
rmitho vilakṣaṇayorutpattirityata āha — sāttvika iti | ekopyahaṃkāraḥ
sattvarajastamasāṃ guṇānāmudbhavābhibhavābhyāṃ bhinnastrividho bhavati | tatraikaḥ sattva
pradhāno vaikṛtasaṃjñakaḥ | tasmātsattvapradhāna ekādaśendriyagaṇa utpadyate |
bhūtāderahaṃkārātpañcatanmātrotpattiḥ | yataḥ sa bhūtādistāmasastamoguṇapradhānaḥ |
ayaṃ dvitīyaḥ | tanmātrāṇi santyasmingaṇa iti tanmātraḥ | arśaāditvānma
tvarthīyocpratyayaḥ | rajaḥpradhānastaijasastṛtīyaḥ | tasya kāryaṃ tu noktābhyāmanya
ttṛtīyaṃ kiṃcit | kiṃ tvindriyagaṇastanmātragaṇaśceti sāttvikatāmasayoḥ kāryameva
rājasasya kāryam | yataḥ sattvaguṇastamoguṇaśca samarthopi kriyārahitatvānna
tāvatkāryaṃ karoti yāvattaṃ na rajoguṇaścālayati | tathā ca rājasohaṃkāra itarayoḥ
kriyotpādanadvāreṇa sāhāyyakārīti tātparyam | buddhīndriyāṇīti | indra
śabda ātmavācī | tasya cihnamindriyam | indriyapravṛttyā hyātmānumīyate |
indriyaśabdaśca sāttvikāhaṃkārakārye yogarūḍhaḥ | tena nāhaṃkāretivyāptiḥ
śaṅkanīyā | ubhayātmakamiti | jñānendriyāṇāṃ karmendriyāṇāṃ ca pravartakatvānmanaḥ
svayaṃ jñānendriyaṃ karmendriyaṃ cetyarthaḥ | tallakṣayati — saṃkalpakamiti | samyakkalpa
yatīti saṃkalpakam | manaḥsaṃbaddhenendriyeṇa pūrvaṃ sāmānyarūpeṇālocitaṃ vastu
paścādidamīdṛśaṃ nedṛśamiti samyakkalpayati manaḥ | samyakkalpanaṃ ca viśeṣaṇa
viśeṣyabhāvena vivecanam | tacca manaścakṣurādibhiḥ saha sāttvikāhaṃkārakāryatva
rūpasādharmyeṇendriyamucyate | indriyaśabdasya tatraiva yogarūḍhyaṅgīkārādityāśayaḥ |
etatsarvaṃ sāṃkhyatattvakaumudyāṃ spaṣṭam | tadevāha — vivṛtaṃ ceti |

goghaṭādīnāmiti | vivekajñānaṃ hi mokṣasādhanam | vivekaśca bhedaḥ | sa
ca yasya yasmāttayordvayorjñāne satyeva jñātuṃ śakyate nānyathā | taddvayaṃ ca prakṛti
puruṣarūpaṃ tattvaśabdenocyate | ata eva tattvajñānānmokṣa iti pravādaḥ | tathā
ca vivekajñāne pratiyogitvenānuyogitvena vā yasya saṃbandhastattattvamiti tattva
sāmānyalakṣaṇam | tatra mūlaprakṛteratyantasūkṣmatvena durjñeyatayā tato bhedaḥ puruṣe
puruṣādvā tatra bhedo durjñeya iti tadarthaṃ prakṛtikāryajñānamāvaśyakam | kāryabhedena
hi kāraṇabhedānumānasaṃbhavāt | prakṛteḥ sākṣātkāryaṃ mahattattvam | taddvārāhaṃkāraḥ |
taddvārā ca pañcatanmātrāṇi | etatsaptakamapi sūkṣmamiti na viśadatayā jñātuṃ
śakyate | ataḥ prakṛteḥ paraṃparayā kāryabhūto viśadatayā jñātuṃ śakyaścendriyāṇāṃ
bhūtānāṃ ca gaṇovaśyaṃ tattvarūpeṇa varṇanīyaḥ | ayaṃ viśadatayā jñātuṃ śakyaḥ
ṣoḍaśako vikāragaṇastena tena svakāryaviśeṣarūpeṇa jñātaḥ svasmātpuruṣe bhedaṃ
grāhayansvakāraṇādapi prakṛtiparyantātpuruṣe bhedaṃ grāhayati | bhautikānāṃ goghaṭā
dīnāṃ tvānantyātteṣāṃ bhedajñāpakaṃ viśeṣarūpeṇa jñānamaśakyam | anupayogi ca
mokṣasādhanībhūtabhedajñāne | bhūtebhyaḥ sakāśādātmano bhedena jñāne sati bhauti
kebhyaḥ sakāśāttasya bhedena jñānamakiṃcitkaram | puruṣo hi nirviśeṣo vidhimu
khena jñātumaśakyo nedṛśastādṛśa ityevaṃ niṣedhamukhenaiva jñāpanīyaḥ | sa ca yathā
sthūlebhya indriyagrāhyebhyaśca bhūtebhyaḥ sakāśādbhedena jñāyamānaḥ puruṣo na sthūlo
nāpīndriyagrāhya ityevaṃ jñāyate tena ca sthaulyādayastatra niṣiddhā bhavanti tathā
bhautikebhyaḥ sakāśātpuruṣasya bhedajñāne tatra kedhikā dharmā niṣiddhāḥ syurye
bhūtebhyo bhedajñānepyaniṣiddhāḥ | na kepi tādṛśā dharmāḥ puruṣe bhāsanta ityato
bhautikānāṃ mokṣasādhanībhūtavivekajñāne na pratiyogitvena nāpyanuyogitvena
saṃbandha iti na goghaṭādīnāṃ bhautikānāṃ tattvāntaratvamiti bhāvaḥ | prakṛterma
hāniti | jāyata iti śeṣaḥ | atra ṣoḍaśako gaṇa ekādaśendriyāṇi pañca
tanmātrāṇi ca | ṣoḍaśasaṃkhyā parimāṇamasyeti ṣoḍaśakaḥ | ṣoḍaśaśabdātkan
pratyayaḥ | tasmādapi ṣoḍaśakānniṣkṛṣṭebhyaḥ pañcabhyastanmātrebhyaḥ sakāśātpañca
bhūtāni jāyante | niṣkṛṣṭebhya ityadhyāhāraḥ |

dṛṣṭamiti | dṛṣṭaṃ pratyakṣam | āptavacanamāptavākyaṃ śabdaḥ | pratyakṣamanumānaṃ
śabdaśceti trividhaṃ pramāṇabhiṣṭam | ebhistribhireva sarveṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ siddhatvāt |
upamānādīnāṃ pramāṇāntarāṇāṃ triṣvevāntarbhāvāt | prameyasya prakṛtyāditattva
jātasya siddhiḥ pratītiḥ pramāṇādbhavati | tatra viṣayasaṃnikṛṣṭenendriyeṇa saha
manaso viṣayadeśe jāyamānā viṣayākārā vṛttiḥ pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam | sā ca
vṛttistatraivātmani pratibimbate | ātmano vibhutvāt | tādṛśavṛttipratibimbāva
cchinnaṃ caitanyaṃ pratyakṣapramā | evaṃ vyāptijñānajanyā sādhyaviśiṣṭapakṣākārā mano
vṛttiranumānaṃ pramāṇam | tādṛśavṛttipratibimbāvacchinnaṃ caitanyamanumitiḥ |
āptavākyajñānajanyā padārthasaṃsargākārā manovṛttiḥ śabdapramāṇam | tatpratibi
mbāvacchinnaṃ caitanyaṃ śābdajñānam | aparokṣatvaṃ parokṣatvaṃ smṛtitvaṃ saṃśayatvaṃ
